description:
<p>Author: PANCHWATY <p>
Find the secret button to advance to the next level! There are 8 levels. The map is themed around colors. We hope you enjoy our map.
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Elytra Party is one of the top elytra racer games currently available for the Bedrock Edition. It’s recommended to play in multiplayer (but it’s not required) and you can select between several different modes to customize the difficulty to your own skill level. There is also an extra party mode which is suitable for more players as it has larger rings.
title: SG Elytra Party

description:
Author: Skyriad

This map takes place on an abandoned island where you play as a character who have been shipwrecked there and have to find whatever ways you can to survive. There are structures left on the island but there are no people to house them. All of it is like a huge mystery but an answer to it can not be certain.
title: Survival++ Adventure

description:
Author: qaismarei

This map will take you in a long adventure at 30 challenging levels in 2 different chapters. the game will get harder and harder after every level. You most find the stone button for completing the levels.
title: Find The Button: The Long Adventure

description:
Author: umerkk164

This is a map which includes several different concepts for new dimensions, biomes and items in Minecraft. There are items with different attributes, customized mobs, custom crafting and much more. Even though most features are created by the use of command blocks there are also some textures which have been customized with a new resource pack.
title: The Tempest Box

description:
Author: Kingsly_Productions

Fatal Fortress: The End is an RPG adventure map in which you'll play as a character who come across an old mansion in the deep and dark forests of Minecraft. You decide to explore it but that decision is most likely something you're soon to regret. Inside the mansion you will find deadly traps, puzzles and other difficult obstacles.
title: Fatal Fortress: The End

description:
Author: TalMelamed

The brewing stand is a block in Minecraft which can be used for brewing potions. You can then consume the potions to gain temporary powers such as increased strength or agility. This is a redstone map which recreates the block on a much bigger scale. And since it’s entirely powered by redstone you can actually use it to brew potions!
title: Working Brewing Stand

description:
Author: Jesus War

RULES:

Do NOT cheat in the minigame

You SET the TIME which will define how long the match will be

Do not be looser and wait until the other players die or win

2+ players to play this game

There is a spectator mode now, if you lose while the match is still, you can spectate them.

There is a parkour, while your friends are still playing you can do the parkour in the map to not get bored
title: The Simpsons Hide And Seek

description:
By khangjhao

The map is based on the game "bomber friends". this is the map for you if you are looking for a multiplayer minigame map.In map you will fight your friends with bombs (creeper) in the map total of 3 maps (overworld, nether, the end). The winner is the last survivor.

You can choose skills, see how many matches you have played, credits and how to play

how to play: (first you need at least 2 people to play this game, if that's enough, here's how to play)

Choose your system at the lobby, there are 5 skills for you to choose from:

1.tanker(resistance 2)

2.runner(run faster)

3.invisible man

4.two bombs (two bombs each time)

5.none skills

In the match everyone will start dropping bombs on each other until there is only one person left, that person will be the winner or when the time runs out they will all lose

There are 3 maps: overworld, nether, the end
title: Bomber Minigame

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Zombies 3 is a PvE sequel of SG Zombies. In this map we have added guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack plus re-wrote the whole code so there is way less lag. It has also been created on an entire new map (By Hypixel: Towerfall) with 5 different zones and some of gates to unlock. There are more cool features and the waves are also a whole lot harder. This might be one of the most challenging sequels ever!
title: SG Zombies 4

description:
Author: SkyGames

This map includes a fully functional setup for hosting a Prisons game on a Realms server or on a local multiplayer server. You’ll out by going into the starter mine and mine pumpkins and melon which you then sell to work yourself up to the other mines. Mine A is free but you need to buy a pickaxe from the Custom Crafting Shop in order to progress in the map.
title: SG Legacy Prisons

description:
Author: Gona, Daniel Martinez

This map takes car racing to an entire new level in Minecraft Pocket Edition. It consists of one great racing track which even at top speed will take several minutes to complete. Along the track there are multiple spectator stands and other cool details. Take this opportunity to participate in your very first (I would assume) World Champion Grand Prix (but in a somewhat more blocky and pixelated environment)!
title: MCPE Circuit

description:
Author: sxemarc

Welcome to Plants Vs Zombies! In this mini game inspired by FvDisco’s Zombie Siege, you’ll have to defend your home base from waves of zombies for as long as possible!
title: Plants Vs Zombies MiniGame v1.0

description:
Author: Tronbot

This map includes 20 different redstone creations and all of them somehow make use of pistons. It's a great showcase to demonstrate the great variety of things which you can build with redstone and especially piston blocks. Some of the examples include automated farms and clever hidden staircases.
title: 20 Piston Creations

description:
Author: ChipssLive

Explore a secluded area rumored to be the grave of a long lost pirate crew, and uncover fun secrets along the way! There are 10 secrets in total to find!
title: The Isle of Mysteries

description:
Author: KingKaden

Finally, you'll press start game where you and your opponents will be teleported to the center to fight it out! When someone dies, they'll be teleported into a room of their own where they can go right into another round, or customize the next round in the control panel! Happy fighting!
title: The KingKaden

description:
Author: McpeTPX

Author: McpeTPX

Lightning Wars is a new gamemode minigame created by McpeTPX. This meant is aimed for 2 players with the objective being that each team have different lightning weapons which they must use to take down the enemy team. You will get 5 minutes to build a base and during that time you’re allowed to access the creative inventory.
title: Lightning Wars

description:
Author: Faith_shupee

This map features a beautiful fantasy castle built in the middle of a jungle. There are lots of things to see both on the inside and around the castle. For example, it has a draw bridge, a jungle, several towers and a library. If you are looking for a new place to live (in Minecraft) then why not a castle? It will no doubt keep you safe since there's a big wall surrounding it.
title: CompaCastle

description:
Author: The Obsidian Gemstone, Cheete

Mined Prison: Dark Secrets is the fifth map in a very popular adventure map series. Once again you find yourself in a bit of trouble. The group whose mission was to take down the corrupt system of the prison has been captured and everything you once had is long gone. Do you have what it takes to bring things back to order and perhaps finally get out of this mess? We’ll see about that as you try to complete a series of different challenges ranging from parkour to puzzles.
title: Mined Prison: Darkest Secrets

description:
Author: Skygames

Have you ever wanted the ultimate YouTube experience? This map lets you have that full experience, with 10 recording studios, two theatres, and tons of office spaces. This map shows off a YouTube themed office, with the best systems for content creation and video management.
title: Headquarters – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: xLeonardoArt

Dive into a world of sand and fun! welcome to the Krusty Krab! Come on into this wonderful world! I have also wanted a world like this but I can never find it! so I took it into my own hands. enjoy!
title: Krusty Krab

description:
Author: Translatie

The city

In this project I am building the medieval city Retsos. As a big Game of Thrones fan I based the city a bit on King’s landing of Game of Thrones. This project is far from ready but I hope you enjoy this first update.

city includes:

– arena

-church

-smith

-brothel

-medieval houses

-the castle (golden keep)
title: Project Retsos

description:
Author: PopularMMOs Antny The Cool Gamer

This map is made for two players, one as the fighter and the other as the “Wave Starter. ” Fight waves of mobs to make your way to the final stage. The question is: Are you ready to beat it? With 20 waves of mobs, access to the command blocks (some are under the floor,) and a bonus wave, the fun will keep going forever! If you are ever bored and want to play with a friend, this is a map to do it on.

The stages go from easiest to hardest. If you are the wave starter, make sure to give the fighter appropriate resources for each wave. Feel free to preview the waves before you start playing with somebody!!! Mobs will be spawned in the castle and will emerge to attempt to end your life, which you obviously must not let happen. Some stages are hard not to die on, so it is okay if you die multiple times in a row. Make sure to watch the entire trailer and enjoy the epic battles!
title: Mob Battle

description:
Author: MCPE_Map_Maker

This map features a small survival island with lots of trees and a big, flat area on the beach for building a base of some sort. It was created with WorldPainter on Java and then ported over to Bedrock Edition. It’s a perfect little island if you’re looking for a new survival island adventure as there are plenty of trees and other resources you’d need for building.
title: First Custom Island

description:
Author: megastrikermcpe

Project Spectron is an insane massive adventure and exploration map which offers a cybernetic atmosphere and lots of cool places for players to explore. The map doesn’t have a linear story or required quests, but there are a few optional missions included with the map. Players have total freedom to explore and survive inside Synthport City, fight against crazy cybernated monsters and use a great range of different weapons such as a scope or a saber.
title: Project Spectron

description:
Author: MatPatCat

Temple Run PE is a timed parkour map where the ground behind you will get pulled away by pistons as you continue through the map. Every two checkpoints you will get 10 seconds added to the clock but it’s never enough time to rest. You constantly have to be on your move if you want to complete this map.
title: Temple Run PE

description:
Author: insanit_17

THE INSANE PARKOUR is not a beginner map. You will need a lot of skill and persistence to complete all levels. The difficulty is extremely high, similar to Kaizo!
title: The Insane Parkour

description:
Author: Red.Engi_VN

After 10 months of hard work, I bring you all: “Team Fortress 2: Capture The Intelligence. The legendary 2fort map of TF2 was made on Minecraft with over 300 command blocks. Choose a class, choose a team, kill the enemy team and capture the intelligence. The weapons on Team Fortress 2 are replaced with cool enchanted weapons in Minecraft. The Halloween edition of the map will be coming soon.
title: Team Fortress 2

description:
Author: megastriker

aVIRa is a very ambitious and detailed adventure map for Minecraft. In the map, you play as a programmer who has been sent to a giant computer which for years has been abandoned. As you journey deeper into the mysterious systems of the computer things slowly start to unravel and you will soon find yourself up against an artificial superintelligence which might not have your best interests in mind.
title: aVIRa

description:
Author: Dogking120

Minecraft overworld is overrated. Become a dwarf and try to survive in a harsh cavern world converted from Java Edition! There’s no surface, no escape! You’ll have to make do with what you got. This will truly be a challenge for even the most hardcore Minecraft players.
This is a map generated using the Java Edition buffet features and then converted to Bedrock Edition. The overworld is completely replaced by caves and you’ll have to survive using underground resources.
title: Cavern Expanse

description:
Author: FalBuilds

This map features a seaside house located on a small seashore. Behind the house you will find a tropical forest that you can explore by yourself. There is also a dock in front of the house where you can park your boat or view the beautiful huge sea. The house is a three-story mansion with plenty of living space, including multiple bedrooms, a kitchen and a pool area.
title: Sandview Modern House

description:
Author: JKearnsl

A world with modified swords in a historical style for multiplayer play with your realm friends. A unique opportunity to occupy a territory (players' private territory), a stable economy and much more are already waiting for you!
title: REALM Alicia

description:
Author: Sky Levitation

Sky Levitation is a multiplayer map which combines skyblock PvP with levitation. There are a bunch of different islands and on each one you will find a chest with some gear, weapons and food. But that's not all. You will also find a pressure plate which will give you a temporary levitation effect. Use this effect to access the other islands, loot items and ultimately slay your enemies.
title: Sky Levitation

description:
Author: PeacelandGov

New Liberty City was the first city in the Republic of Peaceland. It was founded back in 8th November, 2012 which makes it almost half a decade old by now. The creators behind this city are the same ones who are building the State of Democratia (which soon is going to be rebranded as the Republic of Peaceland).
title: Peaceland Origins – Quinquennium

description:
Author: SlenserP

Emerald Town is a survival map with elements of RPG. Your main objective is to survive for as long as possible while completing the quests found in the book you’ll retrieve at spawn. There are five different quests in total and they include goals to further expand your farm and other related assets. For example, one of the goals is to obtain 100,000 G (money) and another is to collect 64 iron ingots.
title: Emerald Town

description:
Author: DarcxGamerMC

Freerunning is an extreme parkour map which includes a whole lot of gameplay as there are countless of levels. It's best suited as a multiplayer map but it is also enjoyable in single player mode. It's a massive parkour track with lots of fun surprises such as a boost effects and so on. If you like parkour then you'll most likely enjoy this map!
title: Freerunning

description:
Author: SKYGAMES

Rainbow Runner is an FFA PvP where all players must race to a floating and rotating rainbow block on colorful blocky islands. The islands have holes inbetween them and are very dangerous! The player who gets to the Rainbow Block first, becomes the Rainbow Runner! This player can hit all other players off the map, they must protect the floating rainbow block or if someone else gets it, They become the awesome Rainbow Runner!!!
title: Rainbow Runner

description:
Author: VolcanicDilemma

Island Disaster Survival is a multiplayer game where you and your friends are placed in a map and have to make it through a round without being killed by a disaster. Rounds last for approximately 2 minutes. Victorious players will be awarded 1 point at the end of each round.
title: Island Disaster Survival

description:
Author: BlackZero

This is a puzzle map in which you will put your brain on a test. How good is actually your memory? Give this puzzle map a try to find out! There are 10 different levels and in each one you will have to try to memorize some stuff which you then will be quizzed on. Each level consists of three rooms. In the first room which you enter you have to memorize all blocks and how they are placed. You are not allowed to make any physical notes (e.g. on a piece of paper). Everything must me memorized only by the use of your own brain.
title: Remember Death

description:
Author: ZEROBYTE

Ah hoy Welcome to Fallaydin (Warship Name) The Warship i made was suppose to be a replica of Yamato. The Warship Includes Underground base, 10 Shooters (The shooters is now Working!) Captain Area, 6 floors, and Missle Ammo. The WarShip has more than 10,000+ blocks (It might lag)

How To Play A Battle
First you need to download a texture pack called WarStuff Check the Gun Chest right where you spawn if there is guns that means you got the Texture pack working. To Play a Battle the 1st Team need to be U.S Fighter Jets. The 2nd Team need to be the WarShip. For the WarShip you need to fill in the chest with food, Guns, Sniper, and other things. The Fighter jets need to have a rocket launcher and a gernade. The Fighter jets need to be in creative and if you get shot down your not dead you still have 5 more lives. The Fighter jets need to destroy the ship. The Warship Team need to stay inside because they have only two lives. Have Fun Battling!
How Long Was This Built?
This was Built in 4 days Wednesday to Saturday. In fact the ship has over 10,000+ block and its not done yet, I feel like i ran out of ideas. The WarShip is still 81% There will be future updates.
title: WarShip

description:
Author: TrueVulpis

A very simple, yet beautiful world depicting many of Japan's wonders. This world was made as a school project, but we decided to branch out, we hope you enjoy the world and we hope you give a good rating if you think it deserves it!
title: The 7 Towers

description:
Author: POCKETKENT

The most luxurious, pure and expensive Modern Mansion you’ll want to have is here, with a lot of joy and excitement to come with the design, utilities and privacy of your new home!
title: Luxurious Modern Mansion

description:
Author: Anibration

This is a find the buttons map that contains 14 challenging levels. This map works only in singleplayer. This map also offers you hints that you can use throughout the map.
title: Find The Buttons!

description:
Author: SkyGames

This minigame is all about parkour. Parkour between the platforms that move in different directions. Your objective is to make it for as long as possible in the game. The difficulty, also known as speed, slowly increase over time. In the lobby there are options for changing the look of the platforms.
title: Platform Jumpers

description:
Author: Wartave, MegaStriker, CookieModder

Fractured World is an adventure which takes place in an entire other world called World 013. Most of the world has been completely destroyed with the remaining life only populating the few last sky islands. You’ve been sent to this world because of your bad behavior in the Overworld and your tasked with the objective to explore the islands and defeat the bosses. Do you have what it takes to escape this crazy world?
title: Fractured World

description:
Author: effovex

Welcome to Progressive Skyblock! A unique map experience you’re bound to remember and want to play again alone or with friends! Have fun and leave a rating! Enjoy your stay.
title: Progressive Skyblock

description:
Author: Voxellab Studio

Dark Harvest Keep is an amazing building based on castles and ancient structures.
title: Dark Harvest Keep

description:
Author: Tyler707 Proarcher

Do you feel like exploring a new type of world terrain? Then this map is for you. It features a fully customized world terrain which has been imported to a normal world. The map includes areas such as frozen rivers, pyramid deserts and even a Nether world in the Overworld.
title: The Perfect Cross

description:
Author: minedrum

This map showcases a large scale bamboo farm design that works using a 2-way flying machine. The redstone involved is fairly simple and easy to understand and copy. Bamboo is great because it can go straight into the furnace unlike kelp which needs to be crafted into a block before being burnt.
title: Bamboo Farm Design

description:
Author: BlackZero

Lava Escape 2 is a really intense minigame and parkour map which is suitable for parkour beginners. In each level the main challenge is to quickly complete the obstacle course. If you are successful then you will be able to move on to the next level. However, if you are too slow then you'll soon notice lava dripping down your forehead and kill you.
title: Lava Escape 2

description:
Author: chinesehorse

Northern Industria has been in development for more than half of a year. The final product is an amazing highway consisting of 4000 blocks which runs through a beautiful landscape of villages and other structures one would expect in the countryside of Minecraft. There are lots of details throughout the map which we highly encourage you to explore and discover for yourself!
title: Northern Industria

description: The Four Towers of Parkour is a map where you have to get to the top of 4 themed towers. The towers are themed based on the 4 basic elements (Air, Earth, Water, and Fire). This map was made by me (Rieleyhunt) and tested by Joshua Searle.
title: The Four Towers of Parkour

description:
Author: BlackZero

This map includes 8 different memory challenges. Each level has a couple of separate rooms. In the first one you have to try to memorize all of the blocks and in the second one you have to try to spot a difference. This is a great challenge for anyone who enjoy puzzles or similar games where you need to focus your mind. The first few levels shouldn’t be much of a hassle but just wait until you get to later levels!
title: Remember Death 2

description:
Author: Trauxe

Domed is a Minecraft Survival map in which you are placed in a small, circular world which is housed right under a glass dome. This small world has modified ore spawns, making all ores slightly more common, due to the finite size of the map as it is currently.
title: Domed

description:
Author: claire1593

Have you ever wanted to see an epic indoor aquarium in Minecraft? Hello, my name is claire1593 and I, too, wanted to explore an awesome aquarium without having to pay or switch consoles. I have been working on this project for the past five months, and I hope you guys enjoy it. Since this aquarium is only 3/5ths of the way done, please check out my Instagram at clairel593 for more updates.
title: Prismarina Aquarium

description:
<p>Author: BLOCKBLOKESTUDIO <p>
A series of find the button maps all built under the theme of festivity! So far there are 3 maps for you to enjoy but we plan to add many more very soon so leave your suggestions and we’ll be sure to credit you!
title: Christmas Find the Button

description:
Author: Herotorxp

With 29 Mini games! and 46 different places with huge designs. And you will see here some of the popular Mini games from popular servers like

Bedwar,Skywar,Tnt run, Death run, Block Party and much more! So check this out!
title: Boom Battle Heroes

description:
Author: thecommandercreeper

McDonald Mystery is an adventure map taking place in a small city. You’re a detective and you need to solve the mystery happening at a McDonald’s restaurant. This map consists out of three different chapters (each explained further down on this page). Ronald McDonald is the main protagonist in this map. If you see him – make sure to run!
title: McDonald Mystery

description:
Author: venom36

This command block creation map creates working security Cameras in Minecraft using tag and name commands. This world allows you to use up to 7 security Cameras which are fully functional and you can place wherever you want. This world uses texture packs, MRM resource pack created by DarkStudios
title: Working Security Cameras

description:
Author: amazingameryt26

Herix Deathrun is a deathrun which was inspired by Cizzorz Deathrun! The name Herix comes from the best MCPE YT clan (Herix Clan). There are 5 levels some are hard and some are very easy! Herix clan was actually 2 of the best clans in the MCPE YT Clan community, both of the clans were called Hero and Cinix soon the owners of it PigmenMC (Owner of Hero Clan) and Bryant Vidals (Owner of Cinix Clan) decided to merge the clans to an even bigger clan which is now called Herix!
title: Herix Deathrun!

description:
Author: Lexer_Gaming

This is a city which has been in constant development for somewhere around two years by now, but this is the first time it's being released here. LexerCity is a modern city with many great architectural designs, including several skyscrapers, apartment complexes and more. There are lots of different things to see here and that makes it fun to explore. It should be noted, however, that it's a fairly small city but it's still pretty cool.
title: LexerCity

description:
Author: skygames

2D World is an amazing survival challenge! Play the 2D survival game with friends and travel across the 2D world! Find resourses and dig for diamonds in the really hidden and rare caves! Once you have a diamond pickaxe, You will be able to destroy the obsidian walls blocking you from the outside 3D world!
title: 2D World V1

description:
Author: ElectroCreeper

Ocean Dream is a huge cruise ship with an extremely detailed exterior as well as inside with all of the interiors decorated. It got all the facilities you could possibly imagine. Everything from swimming pools and water slides to more relaxing environments such as lounges and restaurants. Exploring the entire ship would take lots of time, but it's actually well worth it.
title: Ocean Dream Cruise Ship

description:
Author: mcpe_map_maker

This biome is located in a normal generated minecraft world, but created with the program WorldPainter. The Water is replaced by lava and covered with stained glass. Also I used big grey trees.
title: Mystical Biome

description:
Author: Mauwee

The Floor kills is a multiplayer minigame where you have to do quite simple parkour in order to complete an obstacle course. If you drop down on the floor then you will die immediately and have to start over. However, there are also useful blocks along the way which will give you different boost effects.
title: The Floor Kills

description:
Author: CHKGIRL

The objective is to find and press a button in each room in order to unlock a door which leads to the next level. In that sense it's a fairly simple objective but it's actually easier said than done. There are 15 different levels and by each level it gets more difficult. But since there's no time restraint it shouldn't be too difficult to complete.
title: FindtheButton

description:
Author: KopiandCy

The Jungle is a great map to use for your next survival adventures. The base includes five different homes (some of which are in the trees), lots of livestock and a mine. You can't use it for achievements but as long you don't care about that it's a really neat place to explore, and especially so if you like jungles.
title: The Jungle

description:
Author: Towninator24

The Battle of Hoth takes place in the The Empire Strikes Back. Join the battle as a member of the Empire hunting Rebel members hidden in the snowy landscape in Hide & Seek or go toe to toe with eachother in a PVP game.
title: Star Wars: The Battle of Hoth

description:
Author: FROSTCRAFT

If you like robot slime/honey? You should try this map it’s a controllable robot that allowed you to make it move and to make it stop.

It also help you to understand the difference between honey block and the slime block of how they work.
title: Walking Robot Dog

description:
Author: creepergamerzxz

This map adds several new items to the game by the use of redstone and commands blocks. All items have new features which will give you powers of a wizard. For example, one of the new items lets you transform blocks into thin air. And another item can be used for speeding up the time. All items require that you are within a close proximity of the command blocks though.
title: Be a Wizard

description:
Author: TNTrocks101

Half-a-Heart Run v.2 is a fun race course, BUT YOU ONLY HAVE HALF A HEART! This map has courses that will make you take your time. Why take my time? BECAUSE YOU HAVE HAVE HALF A HEART >:D This takes the courses from the original makes them bigger and better. This map will put up a challenge. You will have to locate where to fall, have patience and time your jumps, or else you will fail!! The only advice I can give you is good luck
title: Half-a-Heart Run

description:
Author: krivas

This map includes Every Sound in Minecraft Bedrock Edition. (Over 500 different sounds) If you are a map maker, this is very useful for finding sounds that fit to your project. This was originally released for Minecraft 1.1.0.9, but is now updated to version 1.8.1 with many new sounds. This map supposedly includes all the different sounds which are included in the original version of the game (meaning, no external resource packs are required). You can play each sound by pressing a button on a command block and you can hover over the command blocks to get information about each sound. It’s especially useful for map makers who want to add sounds to their own maps.
title: EverySoundInMCPE

description:
Author: _ta

This is a full-scale casino black jack with the concept of money made with command blocks. Try your luck and learn some cool card games. It’s also offers a very high resolution display so it should be easy to play. Available actions bet double down split insurance surrender You can play against dealers with these actions. Rule Split only once per game Double down possible after division If you have two ace, you can not draw a card after splitting.
title: Casino Black Jack

description:
Author: blockberrystudios

BlockBerry Studios presents LevitationPvP! This is a kit pvp map where you will select a kit, and fight to the death in a arena. The arena has a shulker and slime blocks, so it’ll be a bouncing/levitation fight! How to play This map is very simple, you should first go to the info section, before playing. To play, just click the button below the sign that says “Play”. Then, pick a kit and get ready for battle! You will be automatically teleported to the arena!
title: BlockBerry Studios – LevitationPVP

description:
Author: vivek1128

Elytra Championship is a an elytra wings map where you need to fly through rings in order to complete the levels. The objective is always to be first to the finish line and the one with most wins is the ultimate elytra champion. It can be played for anywhere between 1 – 4 players. Begin by choosing a team. There are four different to choose from: red, yellow, green or blue. You will only be allowed to go through rings which are of this color. Anyone doing otherwise must start over the current level. Make sure that all players read and understand the instructions and rules at the beginning of the map before starting. Pull the lever to start the redstone countdown.
title: Elytra Championship

description:
Author: TheR001010

This is a really good Block Party minigame which has been in development for two weeks, and today is finally the release date. You’ll need at least two players to start playing, but once you’ve that everything is automated including all game mechanics and so on. This makes a very smooth and enjoyable gaming experience as it doesn’t require any resets or anything. You can find more detailed information about rules and gameplay in the map.
title: BlockParty Original

description:
Author: Zad103

This is an adventure map which makes use of a custom made addon. You play as a character who has broken into a secret facility where some scientists keep a genetically modified wolf. The wolf is extremely powerful and is worth a tremendous amount of money and you’ve been sent there to capture it. It’s an enjoyable adventure map with cool items such as a teleportation device which you will need to complete certain tasks. It takes somewhere around 20 minutes to complete. If you got the time it’s definitely worth to play! Important: Once you’ve loaded the world make sure that one behavior pack and one resource pack are loaded in your settings. Just open Settings and you can see which addons are active. The packs are included in the .McWorld file and are automatically imported.
title: MCgenetic (Addon)

description:
Author: PIFFLEKNOB

Welcome To Galendor is the Corrupted Minecraft map that just wouldn’t die. Having undergone a world-shattering chunk corruption, and thousands of hours of obsessive level design, Welcome To Galendor is now a massive adventure map with two game modes:

QUEST MODE: 1-4 players, 30+ storyline-driven quests!

CONQUEST MODE: 1-4 teams battle for control of 5 Conquest Beacons spread across the realm!
title: Welcome To Galendor: Quest or Conquest

description:
Author: achachin-wormwal

MPT Sky Island is a small island in the sky. There is only one tree, a river, animals, and most importantly ores underground. Try to survive and thrive in this small island. Supplies are limited so the island gives you challenges to survive.
title: MPT Sky Island

description:
Author: LIGGED

This map is based on the video game “this is the only level”. It is an adventure map in which we must go through a series of riddles to continue the story through multiple challenges, but always on the same stage.

The scenario will always be the same with tiny changes that you must discover to unlock the next level

Throughout history we find different problems, for example, we find underwater:
title: THIS IS THE ONLY LEVEL

description:
Author: darksidestudios

We created an island that contains a mysterious house that got exploded because there’s was a meteor landed after ages! What’s “Mysterious Island”? This island does contain only one house and some small structures.The main idea of this island or map is like recording videos, or anything else.
title: DS : Mysterious Island

description:
Author: NXUS

The Subterranean Facility is a large and complex structure which you will find yourself exploring in hope to find a way out and take back your freedom. It's an epic adventure taking place in one of the most amazing structures specifically created to provide you a mind-boggling escape adventure in Minecraft. A large majority of the map includes the great challenge of finding a way out. But to escape, you will first need to do a whole lot of exploration. There are several ways to get to the end and the total playtime is expected somewhere around 30 minutes (excluding the tutorial).
title: The Subterranean Facility

description:
Author: chipsslive

An adventure map spanning multiple dimensions full of secrets built without any mods block by block! There are a total of 19 labeled secrets to find on top of countless other easter eggs in the map. Find all the secrets to get to the end! They are very hidden. ???? There’s also lots of lore to learn about in the world!
title: Kingdom Secrets

description:
Author: VideoCarp1

Gameplay
You’re trapped in this area, you have almost all the resources you need within this very chunk. You can escape this place, but how will you get back? In chunk survival, you’re in a normal survival world, an infinity one, nearby a village. You can’t reach it, near you is but a single tree, 2 dubs (double chests) and a lot of fern, grass and some flowers.

All you begin with, is a simple tree, and a book. The book contains some more information about the map that may not have been mentioned here. This is normal survival, except you’re in a chunk, and there are but 2 ways to get out. A teleporter is hidden somewhere within this chunk you’re stuck in, and there’s another way for you to escape the chunk, without finding the teleporter, if you can think of it, and if you can get enough “volcanic rock”. “volcanic rock” is just a hint of what you’ll need for it.

This map is completely mod-free, and add-on-free, made with just pure commands, so that won’t exist.
title: Chunk Survival

description:
Author: FantasticToast

Hello there! Is Minecraft too easy for you? Or vanilla Minecraft is just boring? You are in the right place! Try this famous Minecraft survival challenge – SkyGrid!
title: Advanced SkyGrid Survival

description:
Author: galaxyflare

TNT FIGHT is a little minigame where you put down a tnt on the ground and try to kill your enemies so you can win! It is basically a PvP minigame but the weapon is only tnt.

TNT FIGHT is still in BETA but is still playable an enjoyable.

Here’s how it goes:
First you will be met with the beautiful lobby.
Then You will pick either HARD MODE (still in progress) or TEAM MODE.
then you have to pick your teams RED or BLUE.
After, you will wear your armor and get tnt
Then You will get teleported in an arena to FIGHT!
And the rest is fun but you still have to follow some rules:

RULES:

*You can’t place TNT 2 or more times in a row.

*You can’t break anything.

*Don’t do anything else but fun, it ruins the game.

*You can’t play this in single player.

*And have fun!.
title: TNT FIGHT

description:
Author: Jhomes

This is a useful command block creation which lets you spawn a quarry machine which will automatically mine an area of 7?7 blocks and collect the item into a chest. Since it's using command blocks it's only possible to use this for worlds where you can enable creative mode since it's required for obtaining the command blocks.
title: Working Quarry

description:
Author: KlutzesMaps

This map takes you through eight different obstacle courses which include a good range of jumping challenges. It's suitable for most players, even ones who are more experienced doing parkour in Minecraft. The map uses redstone to unlock levels once you've completed something and in each level there is a prize. Try your skills and finish the path!
title: Parkour Path

description:
Author: ilikecutepeople

Halloween Town is a really cool and spooky town which you must explore some time during Halloween. Here you will find many cool structures but also really scary creatures which will most likely make you not want to stay there for too long. A texture pack is included in the map and this will make most textures in the map look entirely different compared to without.
title: Halloween Town

description:
Author: Dany16

This is a great map if you need some type of arena to fight other players. It’s a really well designed map which features a huge tree which has the appearance of a man (with wild hair). Surrounding the giant tree are interconnected skyblock islands. There are no specific set of rules or guidelines which you need to follow. Make up your own as you go and have some fun!
title: Big Tree Man

description:
Author: Vladu11

This map includes the great challenge of fighting Entity_303 in an epic boss battle powered by advanced command block technology! Both the boss and the player have unique sets of powers and no addon has been used to enable these features. The map has been in the works for over three months and the end result is definitely pretty cool.
title: Entity_303 Boss Battle

description:
Author: Veinify

This is a recreation of roblox game called “Lab Experiment” where you survive on the plate and be the last one standing. Every seconds disasters will come and your job is to survive them! There alot of Game Mode you can have such as giant plate, sudden death (lowered), skyscraper, and others such as heal, poison, planks etc.
title: Lab Experiment

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is the world used on official SkyGames fan realm and now you’ll be able to set it up as your own world as well to either use on your own Realms or on a local multiplayer game. The world includes a cool lobby with minigames as well as a bunch of cool minigames. Some of the games include TNT Run, Block Party and Kit PvP. Here’s a link to their official Realm.
title: SG Fan Realm World

description: This is the Temple Glide map originally from Minecraft Console Edition! The aim of the game is to race your friends or yourself to fly to the end of this fun and challenging course using Elytra and Fireworks!
title: Minecraft Elytra Race!

description:
Author: M7MoGameR

This map includes a luxurious mansion estate located on a huge private island island. Lots of redstone and command blocks have been put in place in order to make it as secure as possible. For example, it has a fully functional laser gate which can only be passed with the right key. The estate also includes its own basketball court, a dock with multiple yachts and tons of other things worth exploring.
title: $10,000,000 ULTRA House

description:
Author: NotABigGamer

Did you enjoy the Quartz Parkour? We hope you did, because here is a small sequel to it! With the help of Iwanamalawi, we have made a smaller version of Quartz Parkour available to you! Have fun with 20 new levels that test your parkour skills!
title: Quartz Parkour Mini

description:
Author: dudebroagain

Cold and alone. Awakened in a dark cell. One day a shining savior comes to your aid and gives you the key out of your cell. Traversing through the undead and slaying powerful creatures. You must venture through the dungeon in search of your escape.
title: Dungeon Escape (Complete)

description:
Author: DelisoJan

This is a survival minigame which takes place on an island which you've been shipwrecked on. The only thing you're left with are your own survival skills. Around the island there are bedrock blocks which require other blocks in order to construct important structures on the island. You'll basically need to collect different resources to construct the structures.
title: DelisoJan's Island Tycoon

description:
Author: Tiranoh

This is a survival map taking place far up in the sky on multiple different floating islands. The main objective is to find a way to visit and explore all of them. But it’s not going to be easy. First off you need to build the bridges and then there are also monsters on the different islands who can be quite dangerous. How long will you be able to survive?
title: The Adventure-Islands

description:
Author: GGManYT

In this map you have to use a pair of elytra wings to fly through a series of obstacles. This is probably the most challenging elytra map out there right now as it requires you to fly both horizontally and sometimes make a huge leap vertically into some tunnel. And the fact that you have to play the majority of the map in darkness (during night) surely doesn’t make things easier. Either way, it’s a really fun map to play!
title: Flying With Elytra

description:
Author: Cre8 Studio

Call your friend and have fun in this Puzzle Minigame! you needed to work together to complete the various puzzle levels and reach the end of the map, Will you be able to complete the puzzles together?
title: Mega Puzzles!

description:
<p>Author: CHRISMP <p>
Merry Christmas, well not yet it’s Christmas eve so you can’t wait for the day to come when you get presents!

But when you sleep someone is in your house if it’s your house anymore!

How to play?

It’s a simple free roam mode where you must run from the known evil animatronics survive until the clock strike 6AM to celebrate Christmas!
title: Christmas Fright

description: This is a lobby which was originally created to use for a server called Evo. But since that project was dropped by the creator he decided to share the lobby with everyone.  It’s a really cool lobby with a futurstic space theme. It’s perfectly suitable to use for a Realms server, or for some other use in case you want something space themed.  It actually appears to be using the Moonscape map for the base terrain.
title: Evo Server Lobby

description:
Author: DIAUB

This is the first map in a series known as Super Hostile created by Vechs. “Sea of Flames II” takes place in a volcanic environment which poses many challenges to the player. The goal of the map is to complete the Victory Momentum which requires the player to conquer dungeons and overcome obstacles along the way.

Super Hostile is one of the most popular and challenging Minecraft map series ever created. This map was originally created (and updated) by Vechs for Minecraft Java Edition 1.2.5. The world was converted from Java edition to Bedrock edition using MC Tool Chest. With the lack of Super Hostile on the Bedrock platform, there is an entire Minecraft audience who has yet to experience the series
title: Super Hostile 01 – Sea of Flames II

description:
Author: swagcaster

This city even has many buildings with redstone integration wherever possible including power lights, showers,plumbing, elevators and even fully animated garage doors, this map is great for things like roleplay, cops n robbers, Pvp, checking out redstone, pvp with guns, playing around with mods, driving, and just about anything else you feel like doing on the map.
title: The City of Swagtropolis

description:
Author: danrobzprobz

This is a map all about breeding chickens on a void world, the chickens lay various resources for you to progress, contains a chicken boss. But beware this map isn’t for the casual minecraft player, it’s designed to be hard! You spawn in a glass egg, with nothing except a few things & a couple of custom chickens(dirt,skeleton). You need to progress with just that, its a super fun & grindy style of map. Plus there is way over 55+ chickens for you to breed & collect! Plus, like I said before a chicken boss, which is super tough, also there are machines in the little chicken trader shop for you to buy, which will also help you on your way! The nether/end are possible too, lastly in the map I’ve made a full breeding guide book for help. Happy breeding & collecting. Good Luck!
title: Hardcore ChickenBlock

description:
Author: scarletgaming17

Do you like Legend of Zelda? Do you like Minecraft? or perhaps do you like both? Well if you do then The Legend of Zelda: Timelines Collide is for you! This is just version 1 of the map! Version 2 will have more features! You start off in a random sky island location,then you realized that you slept for a hundred years! everything looks different than before..you grabbed the items in the chests and started walking around the new Hyrule! Rules: -No Cheating -No Breaking Blocks (Except for Grass)
title: The Legend of Zelda: Timelines Collide [V1]

description:
Author: sxemarc

Minecraft Cake Defense! Here’s a early version of a Remastered Cake defense by FvDisco in Bedrock Edition! In this re-imaging of FvDisco’s Cake defense you’ll have to defend your cake from Herobrine and his Minions in 10 levels of Increasing difficulty!
title: Cake Defense

description:
Author: BjankyMiner

This map features an amazingly modern mansion which lets you live the life of a millionaire in Minecraft. All of it is realistically designed and this means that it will include custom furniture which doesn't have any actual functions except for just looking realistic. It's a great map if you want to live in a modern house in a survival world or if you just need some inspiration for your own creations.
title: Modern Super Mansion

description:
Author: megastriker

BlockGears is the perfect map for anyone who enjoy racing. You'll be able to select among three different racing tracks and in each one you'll be driving a different vehicle. The vehicles include a Ferrari 458, a dirt bike and a Formula One car. It is a really awesome map which includes a great variety of experiences and it's probably best played with friends!
title: BlockGears

description:
Author: YEEYEEBOI

Travel through mines and mazes to find the ingredients to make the diamond block to discover an ancient town with even more riches and treasures. Will you find the great treasure?

You are a traveler, adventurer, or mercenary hired to find 9 diamond , place it in a mysterious device to open a gate to an ancient village, that dates back to the age of “indev.”

Through the journey you will find jungles, sky blocks, gold mines, and more, Make sure to look out for hidden levers in the desert mine for hidden treasures,

This is my first map so please give some advice or ways to make future maps better.

Happy Travels!
title: The Yrnoka Treasure Caves

description:
Author: NotABigGamer

With over 100 levels, The Triangle is our largest parkour yet! This map offers traditional parkour, custom music, and even built in mini games throughout it. We hope you enjoy this map!
title: The Triangle

description:
Author: Luma

The Japanese Garden Arena is an awesome place to compete with your friends in battles to find out who is the best fighter. It has been specifically designed for 1 vs. 1 battles but you can also play it with bigger teams. The design of the arena is based on Asian architecture and it's actually Luma's (the creator) first time using that style to build. As a whole, it's a pretty cool map.
title: Japanese Garden Arena

description:
Author: Elijahr241

It’s not much, but I figured it wouldn’t hurt to post it. I made a CakeWars map that is fully automated, with 2 teams. There are also 2 diamond islands, and a enchantment island in the middle.

There are 5 islands.

A middle island with an XP generator and a villager that sells tools, armor, and blocks
2 team islands each with a villager (Which sells tools, armor, and blocks), an emerald spawner, and an anvil
2 Islands with a diamond generator.
title: CakeWars

description:
Author: Mr Seanyy PH

This Game is Hard, there is no spawnpoint if you die, this game is continuos/you need to finish the game without getting killed or falling in the lava

How To Play? It’s easy , jump all the objects, do not die and finish the game

Rules: Do not commit to cheat, cheats are not allowed

Gameplay: Multiplayer is playable, The game is in Adventure Mode, use the button to move or jump.
title: The Floor Is Lava: Hard Edition

description:
Author: XCHRISS

Neuschwabenland, from narrow streets to large fortresses and isolated villages.

Fields that are endless and forests with ruins. From Gloria to decline.

The empire, it lives – And that forever to the end!

Neuschwabenland is a medieval city, which has several smaller villages and towns in the area of ​​influence. They are spread around the capital of its fields. Each city has its own flag and houses.
title: Neuschwabenland

description:
Author: frostcraft

BombSquad is very addicted minigames that allowed you to play up to 10 players

you can also play it alone by fighting AI/NPC

If you know the game Bomberman you should try this map because it”s like a Bomberman in a minecraft version.

How to play?
Choose a battle arena

To throw a bomb press and hold your screen

Only one player can win the game

And don’t forget to have fun ^_^
title: BombSquad

description:
By Koffyt

This contestant did a good job, with his style of construction, he has quite a lot of imagination and experience when building.We have two houses to visit, a clever well to collect water, a decorative mushroom, and a warehouse to store your supplies.The interior details are very nice and well set.It can be used as a survival world to play with friends and have even more fun.

On January 20, a contest was broadcast on the koffyt youtube channel "The best medieval construction", this construction is set in medieval times.

In case you were wondering, who is this contestant? Finity.The creator Finity gave us the rights to publish this map.
title: Medieval Village 5

description:
Author: Party Squad

Lucky Block Race is a fun multiplayer minigame where players have to run through a course and destroy lucky blocks. Every time a lucky block is destroyed anything can happen. Sometimes you will get valuable items such as an iron sword and other times a creeper or something else dangerous might spawn. There is really no way to tell what will happen other than giving it a try in-game!
title: Lucky Block Race

description:
Author: Dan Lags

This house was originally built by Dan Lags (who is a YouTuber) on the Xbox console edition of Minecraft but it has since been ported to Pocket Edition. It's based on a real life home called The Stone Mansion. Two years ago it was on sale for a price tag of 49 million dollars making it the most expensive home in New Jersey, USA.
title: The Alpine Mansion

description:
Author: EdherJR2

Island In The Sky is basically the same as skyblock survival except that this map also contains a store where you can trade resources with villagers. It's a really good challenge if you want to test your survival skills and see how long you can survive. You can either play it in single player mode or in multiplayer together with other players.
title: Island In The Sky

description:
Author: SkyGames

Cave Crusher is a remake of River Raid which is an old classic video game originally for the Atari 2600 console. You will control a small rocket ship which you must steer past (or destroy) obstacles like bridges but also use for shooting zombies and creepers to gain points. Collect gas tanks to increase your fuel level, or else you’ll lose and have to start over. There’s also score system which you lets you see your current score and also save your best one.
title: SG Cave Crusher

description:
Author: Supershiftery

This map is a factions map which is based off the game ARK: Survival Evolved. In this map you can make your own bases and try to become the greatest faction out there. Except for other players you will also find dinosaurs to make your survival more difficult and interesting.
title: Ark Survival Factions Realm/Server

description:
Author: MINIPRO27YT

If you’ve been watching a few bits and pieces from the minecraft community, you’ve probably heard of the famous tournament server for content creators, Minecraft Championships (MCC). This map is a recreation of one of their PvP based minigames, Battle Box.
title: Battle Box

description:
Author: the-sonic-master

Do you have what it takes to Escape The School? This fun singleplayer map tests your Minecraft Skills and your ability to solve puzzles! Will you break free or become prisoners like all the other candidates who dared to challenge! Story Not long ago you moved house from the big city of Mineland to the small rural village of Blocksville. You have just started your first day at the new school, but immediately realised something was not right. Now you must escape but it will not be easy! Can you use your Minecraft Skills and puzzle-solving abilities to master each room, avoid the nasty surprises and ultimately escape? Well, we can only wish you good luck, you’ll definitely need it! Rules Do not change any world settings – they are configured this way for a reason! Do not cheat. Only use the resource packs provided with the map. Do not use custom packs or mods. If you are recording for YouTube, Twitch etc, you must give credit to the map creator (The Sonic Master).
title: Escape The School

description:
Author: SkyGames

The map contains a few trees, a camping area and a small mountain to climb and mine! It is a great creation to use as a survival spawn! There is also default and normal terrain surrounding the island, so you can play normal survival!
title: Pirate’s Wreck Survival Spawn

description:
Author: TGC_YT

Mega Skyblock is a little bit different from the ordinary skyblock survival challenge as it includes 41+ different islands (instead of just one) which the player is required to go out and explore in order to complete the map. Each island is supposed to symbolize a biome or a dimension and will provide you with new materials you can use to survive.


How to play?
The player starts on a skyblock island which includes only the most basic resources you’ll need to survive. Open the chest to find some items. Make sure to use them sparingly as there’s no way to get any of the items back if you lose or break them. There are 41+ different islands and on each one, you will be able to find new resources that are necessary for your survival.
title: Mega Skyblock

description:
Author: TeamNectar

DanTDM (TheDiamondMinecart) is one of the biggest YouTubers in the Minecraft community with millions of followers all over the world. This map includes a replica of the lab which is often featured in DanTDM's videos. There have been a few similar maps posted here in the past but this is so far the best one since it's bug free and is built in an infinite world. This means that you can use DanTDM's lab as a base in your next adventure!
title: DanTDM's Lab (Infinite World)

description:
Author: SCERRI

In this map you will have to prepare yourself to die for 75 times, attention, it is not as easy as you might think. Are you ready to die? Download the map now!

Dying is normally not something you should strive for in Minecraft. However, in this map, that is the only way to proceed in the levels. Each level is a small puzzle inside a square shaped room where your objective is to find a way to kill yourself in order to access the next level. It’s a really fun and new way to play Minecraft.
title: 75 Ways To Die

description:
Author: Kidsource

This is a hide-and-seek minigame which is best suitable for multiplayer. The arena is themed as a Lost Forest and include a bunch of cool features. It got a fully automatic countdown timer which is started by the seeker after performing a specific task. Hiders can take advantage of things like the automatic teleporters to quickly escape the seeker. The arena includes lots of different hiding spots, everywhere from underground caves to treetops.
title: Lost Forest Hide and Seek

description:
Author: ZackTDM

Always dreamed of living in a tree house? Well, here's your chance! This map features a really nice tree house which is located deep in a forest. It is several stories high and includes many useful rooms and balconies used for everything from enchanting to storage and sleeping quarters. It's a useful map if you are looking for some place to live but don't want to build it yourself.
title: Treehouse

description:
Author: Fluffyalien1422

Derp Quest is an adventure map where you travel through different places by digging straight down to collect diamonds for Derp. These places include, Candyland, The Sky Castle, Crystal Island, and more.
title: Derp Quest

description:
Author: SahandPlayzYT

This map features a beautiful mansion in the mountains which is perfect for anyone who want someplace nicer to live than a dirt house. The mansion includes features such as a living room, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom and a gaming room. Everything to ensure that your needs are satisfied. So what are you waiting for? Move in to this mansion today!
title: Mountain Modern House

description:
Author: SkyGames

Fortnite is the massive gaming success of the year. SkyGames has created the amazing game in Minecraft! If you love Fortnite, or just Battle Royale in general, then this is one of the best such maps you will find for Bedrock Edition!
title: Fortnite 2.0

description:
Author: CreeperGamerZXZ

This map is inspired by Five Nights At Freddy's but in this map you will be in a factory trying to survive through night. But is not going to be easy because there are alive hostile animatronics roaming the factory. It's considered a survival map with some horror elements. At this point there doesn't seem to be much other functionalities in terms of the items and so on.
title: One Night At Frankie's

description:
Author: EaterComputer

Welcome to the Pala Resort. Ride one of the 25 different quality rides in Action Park and experience many fun midway games or experience the other experiences the Pala Resort has to offer!
title: Action Park

description:
Author: TeamBOB123

This map is a fully automatic minigame called Connect 4 in which players take turn to drop sand blocks (by pressing buttons) into a huge a grid. The first player to line up four cubes wins and you can easily restart the map by pressing a restart button in the lobby. It's very easy to get started!
title: Connect 4

description:
Author: Schleid

This is a must-play for anyone who’s a space enthusiast. It’s a short adventure map in which you’ll play as an astronaut who will be going on a short journey to the International Space Station (ISS), explore the Moon and then return back to Earth. It’s a really well made map with great instructions and cool simulations. The spawn is inside a small room. Make sure to open the chest as it contains all the necessary items and instructions which you will need to get started. (Read all the notes!)
title: Apollo 18

description:
Author: asianroofsteam

Asian architecture and animals such as elephants, tigers, crocodiles, etc., 30 profession villagers, 30 mini-games, Custom legends, Improved behaviors, tradings, fishing, hunting, etc. Even the How to Play is customized just for you!
title: Asian Roofs

description:
Author: Wheaten, DiamondKing567

Half Heart is a challenging minigame map which uses an addon to set the player’s health to just one half heart. The difference from let’s say a dropper map is that you have to plan your jumps more carefully as you are more vulnerable to heights because of your health reduction. This map contains just five short levels but it’s definitely worth playing as it’s both a unique type of map and also a lot of fun!
title: Half Heart

description:
Author: TheSixthHour

Brookfield is a miniature city which started its construction in mid-2016. It’s the biggest miniature city currently available (for Bedrock Edition). It includes tens of skyscrapers and loads of different areas worth exploring. The city is very well planned with a great variety of different districts. Have fun exploring!
title: Brookfield

description:
Author: Tal Melamed

The player who successfully gets three in a row is the winner and then the game starts over. It’s a really simple game but nonetheless enjoyable if you’ve got a few minutes with a friend to kill!

Download, share and enjoy!

How to play?

It’s really simple. Just press one of the buttons to make your choice on the screen.
title: Working Tic Tac Toe – Redstone & Commands

description:
Author: thecommandercreeper

Previously, you have been escaped from Ronald’s forest and leave the city by entering a place named MineVille. Here in Mineville, you feel that there is still something strange. As you check some houses, you see that there are poisoned persons near meals. You already know that Ronald McDonald has a new evil plan. His McDonald’s Factory is the reason for this villager’s deaths. You must save MineVille from this factory and destroy the main source of these poisonous meals. This map is the continuation of the first McDonald Mystery. In the previous map, you have been already solved the mystery in McVille. And escaped from Ronald McDonald and entered a place named MineVille. Here in MineVille, you feel something strange. As you check some houses, there are delivered McDonald looking box and there are poisoned persons inside the houses. Now you know that Ronald has a new evil plan. His McDonalds Factory is the reason for these happenings. As a detective, you must invade the factory and save MineVille from that evil Ronald McDonald.
title: McDonald Mystery 2

description:
y Flippy YT

Huggy Wuggy is a tall, blue, toy. In Poppy Playtime he is evil, like an experiment gone wrong, and he trys to kill you. In Minecraft he is almost exactly like in game.
title: Poppys Playtime

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

Redstone in Bedrock Edition is quite complicated to work with. This map consists of a fairly decent house filled with simple to more complicated redstone contraptions. Most of the contraptions are BluFlyaway’s own designs. From simple hidden rooms to overly complicated garage doors each room has at least one redstone contraption. There is also an underground section which will be worked on more in the future.
title: Blu’s Redstone House

description:
Author: srlongman1

This is a Capture The Wool (CTW) and Destroy The Monument (DTM) map inspired by Overcast Network (R.I.P). It consist in three objectives: two wools and a monument, which is made with one obsidian and one gold block. Features: Two teams: Cyan and Orange Three objectives No mods needed, just redstone and command blocks are used. There are some chests with useful items Diamond and iron blocks on the center islands
title: Holo Sunset

description:
Author: Argent Studio

Welcome to the premium version of tycoon 2.0, tycoon is back with a spooky event, Play and experience the Halloween event that’s came with new upgrades, new themes and more!!
title: Tycoon 2.0

description:
Author: Terria, Galaxia

DeathRUN is an extremely intense multiplayer minigame where two teams will compete against another in a dangerously fun minigame. There’s one long obstacle course containing several different challenges and on each challenge one team will have the ability to activate traps. If you enjoy parkour and teamwork, then this is a great map for you!
title: Galaxia’s DeathRUN

description:
Author: GCS Team

Our take on this classic Minecraft minigame has finally arrived, but this time with our won GCS twist. Beware, once you press the “play” button, everything breaks loose. You must have great stealth, as well as a quick wit in order to even come close to coming out on top. Do you have the skills to, not only defeat all your opponents, but also uncover power-ups that will aid you on your mission?
title: QuakeCraft

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Ravine Rush is an intense minigame where you need to find a way to destroy your enemy’s life points and blow them up. But there’s more than that. For example, when killing your enemy they will drop skulls which you can use for buying upgrades at your team’s base. Ravine Rush is a great game to play with friends!
title: SG Ravine Rush

description:
Author: Tenshinryu, Skayloss

Thimble is a really fun multiplayer minigame where players take turns jumping of tall structures and try to safely fall into the water while also placing a block. As time goes by the pool of water will be getting smaller and players will eventually accidentally fall on the blocks and die. It's a really clever and enjoyable minigame and somewhat similar to droppers.
title: Thimble

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a minigame with 16 different levels and each of them are based on a different food item. There are desserts like cookies and cake but also meals like hamburgers or pizza. The main objective in each level is to search and find a button to access the next level. If you get stuck and can’t find the button then there’s a hint book which you can read to get some further information. Have fun!
title: Find The Button: Food Edition

description:
Author: Pailomots

This is one of the few maps that has the mechanics that 2 players must help each other to complete different parkours. This map is cooperative, it is mandatory to play with friend.
title: 2 Players | Parkour

description:
Author: DaSchmitt, BobTheCreeper

This map features several robots which utilize blocks of redstone and slime blocks with piston mechanics to enable functionalities required for walking robots. They are not just limited to walking since they are also mounted with weapons which let them shoot TNT blocks at their enemies. There are six different robots in total and one of them is based on the Mech Master Nine Million in Minecraft Story Mode.
title: New Slime Block Robots

description:
Author: rep_astoria

Footscray is a real nice city with many different areas to explore. The architecture is faithful to the original Minecraft theme and almost what you’d expect if there was in fact naturally generated cities in Minecraft. The city is constructed in a really beautiful terrain with four different biomes surrounding it. Have fun in Footscray City!
title: Footscray City

description:
Author: ashishx

You are trapped inside a dark and cold hospital for an unknown reason. you must find different items and use them in correct ways to get out of there. High quality textures and good sounds make the map better. it’s time to have a new adventure!


Story
Back in 2000, someone had an accident and woke up since years and now he is trying to escape
You are now in a cold hospital.
Search for keys to escape!
You are all alone no one is here to help you but you gotta help yourself.
title: Black Snow (Short)

description:
Author: Zucth

ROTAR Series first part is called: Realm Of The Adventure Road design as a 4 multiplayer RPG, inspired by Hypixel. with myself unique quality known as word “HARDCORE”. This map use a wave systems while travel, chest around you not much story. The map was made for whoever love PVE maps. but the only one target is to defeated the FALLEN KING at the fallen capital. seperate in three part
title: Realm Of The Adventure Road (ROTAR 1)

description:
Author: Raid games

Raid Arena is a 2-4 player kit based battle map! Players start by picking a kit. Each kit has four "gear slots" which each have a piece of gear that can be upgraded using levels. Kits also have a "special" ability that only they posses.

After selecting their kit players will fight in one of four preselected arenas to fight in. The last man standing will receive two levels and a victory point. Everyone else who died only receives one level.

After players receive their levels they will be taken to the "shop". There they can use their levels to purchase upgrades to their gear that will help them win in future fights.

After all players have left the shop the next round of fighting will start, this time in a different arena and players have purchased better gear. This cycle of fighting then upgrading gear continues until one player has collected ten victory points.
title: Raid Arena

description:
Author: CREEPERGAMERZXZ

This is the multiplayer version of the One Night’s At Frankie’s Freeroam minigame. The main difference is that there are two separate teams (animatronic vs night guard) whose main objectives are (depending on their roles) to either kill the other player or escape him from killing you. If you choose animatronic then you will be able to choose between four different ones.

How to play?
This map is optimized for two players. You begin the game by selecting whether you want to be an animatronic or a night guard. You can’t be on the same team as the other player since it’s a competitive map.
title: One Night At Frankie’s : Multiplayer Edition

description:
Author: Voxellab Studio

The Amazing World of Gumball is a famous American animation series for the Cartoon Network.
title: Gumball Watterson House

description:
Author: TjDragon097

This map has 10 extremely confusing levels, one bonus level, and one boss fight. For the boss fight I didn’t want to make the boss a traditional wither or ender dragon. So instead I made it a husk with strength and 250 health. These levels are extremely confusing and I had a lot of people stuck on the first map so I added hints. I wanted it themed as an adventure so you go from overworld levels, to nether levels, to another overworld level, to end levels, to the final overworld level.
title: Pointless 2!

description:
Author: disneyfan2005

This one of the best theme parks I have ever come across which is specifically created for Minecraft Pocket Edition. In the map you will find lots of different attractions such as roller coasters and even the Cinderella fairy tale castle. It’s a really cool map to explore no matter whether you’ve visted a Disney Park or not since it’s very well built and extremely detailed!
title: DisneyPark

description:
Author: LGAMER24

Want to know which of you and your friends is the best in minecraft PVP… this map will let you know it! A map with 20+5 character kits to choose from, a 150×150 wide arena, and a shop to help you during the battle! An awesome battle and tournaments can happen! A battle royale!
title: KITPVP 2.0

description:
Author: GoldenEnergy

Fight endless waves of mutated monsters in The Monster Arena. Take part fun and intense monster battles, but keep in mind that it’s very challenging as there’s no way to stop the monsters from spawning once you’ve entered the arena. Due to its difficulty it’s recommended to play together with other players, but you can also play it in single player.
title: The Monster Arena

description:
Author: Cheete

﻿VerseCrafter: Eternal Envy is the third map in a series of adventure and puzzle maps where you as a player will go on a journey through your own memories and try to unlock the forgotten. By completing the previous two maps you've successfully passed two memory gates but you're not done yet. The next challenge requires you to conquer the emotion of УGreedФ. As a whole, it's a fun and experimental adventure with an intriguing storyline.
title: VerseCrafter: Eternal Envy

description:
Author: FirmFeet

In this game you will have to DESTROY the opponents ship by throwing tridents that explode on impact. Their is a catch tho, if you try to jump out of your ship and touch the water you will instantly DIE and have to spectate your team mates.

Instructions on how to play:

Step 1, Once you get onto the map wait for all you friends to join then press the “Play” button
Step 2, You will appear above 2 small pirate ships. To chose your teams you will need to run over to above the ship by that time the timer would have already counted down.
Step 3, Once you get onto the pirate ships you will need to get some tridents from the lower deck, to get their you will need to locate the ladders going down when you get to the lower deck you will see lots of barrels towards the back of the ship inside of them will be plenty of tridents.
title: Pieratship Warz!

description:
Author: MattH44

Aquatic Parkour is a challenging parkour map consisting of 10 different parkour levels. Each level is based on something in Minecraft relating to the sea. This can be everything from a specific mob to an underwater structure. You can either play this map alone or together with other players. Your objective is to complete each level by jumping around on the different blocks and reaching the final platform. Step on the pressure plate to teleport to the next level.
title: Aquatic Parkour

description:
Author: Brix_18

Food Edition!

Wanna have fun while quarantined? Let’s stay home and play my map! This map has BIG PIZZA, BIG ICE CREAM SANDWICH, BIG CANDIES, BIG FRIES, BIG TACOS, BIG HOTDOGS, BIG EGGS, BIG DONUTS, BIG CHOCOLATES and BIG BURGERS! so what are you waiting for? PLAY NOW! and HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FRIENDS! ????
title: Find The Button: Food Edition

description:
Author: gunnerbossgreece

Entity_505 it’s a new shadow entity a glitch? a error? Who knows? But the sure thing is that entity is not created by the 303 or herobrine or null who is that entity? Will be a ally? Or enemie? Here you are again living a normal life everything is good until something appear to destroy the world a new entity has born not from 303 not from herobrine or the shadow who is that entity? Will help you or you have to fight him? Explore places and fight his minions.
title: Entity_505 The New Terror!

description: This map includes more than five different subway stations, a fully automatic system for departure and other processes to keep things moving smoothly and without interruptions. There is also a custom texture pack which adds signs such as arrows and similar to make it a more seamless and enjoyable experience. Redstone is an essential part of this build which automates nearly everything.
title: Metro 2.0

description:
Author: nacform

This map, made by NACForm, is a base that runs through a massive double ravine and accommodates multiple rooms providing the best resources for survival. The player enters through a hidden piston door that reveals a massive system of hallways equipped with tools, resources weapons, armor and much more. The map also features the Place Me! add-on made by CODANRAIGENXXI.
title: UNDERGROUND RAVINE BASE!

description:
Author: RyFol

This custom terrain features a small survival island situated somewhere far out in the ocean. On the island there’s an active volcano with tons of lava. The terrain was most likely created using WorldPainter or a similar terraforming tool and then ported over to Bedrock Edition. It exists in a normal world terrain, so this means you can explore more than just the island in case you choose to use it for survival gameplay or similar.
title: Volcano Island

description:
Author: ARIANNAMARZ

This is a rainbow parkour map containing 7 easy levels. it is a multiplayer map, so bring all your friends! Msg me on insta if there are anybugs or any recommandations on new maps i should do!
title: Easy Rainbow Parkour

description:
Author: CreeperGamerZXZ

This is the multiplayer version of the One Night's At Frankie's Freeroam minigame. The main difference is that there are two separate teams (animatronic vs night guard) whose main objectives are (depending on their roles) to either kill the other player or escape him from killing you. If you choose animatronic then you will be able to choose between four different ones.
title: One Night At Frankie's Multiplayer

description:
Author: PhantomBro95

The Overworld, the Nether and the End are the only three dimensions in Minecraft PE. That’s all great but imagine a dimension which was entirely made out of diamonds. If that is interesting to you then you have to give this map a try. It’s a concept which introduces the Diamond Dimension to Minecraft and what it could look like if it existed.
title: Diamond Dimension

description:
Author: azozgamer936

Meet the big brother of cs_assault – cs_assault_big_kit! In this map there is a new gamemode called Kit and it was suggested by TitanPlayz269. The game mechanics are exactly the same as to cs_assault but much bigger, better and more fun! In this particular map there are 6 different kits that you can choose from: Sniper, Tacticuler, Rash B, CT (Counter-Terrorist), T (Terrorist) and Hitman. This map is based on the Counter-Strike 1.6 map and not CS:GO.
title: cs_assault_big_kit

description:
Author: dalton51

It was specially designed for your survival spawn. It is of course possible to be able to do RP or even PvP there.
title: Village Asterix

description:
<p>Author: MINECLAN888 <p>


Yay, the winter season is here! This simple map is great for a survival world spawn, or a starter house, or even for role playing!

-Includes holiday music & lights!
title: Cozy Winter Cabin

description:
Author: Johnson

This map is good if you are looking to set off your next survival adventure with a little bit of a story. You'll start out on a small island with a lighthouse and from there you'll take a boat to another island. There are few different custom made structures and some chests which will provide you the base necessities for surviving. Don't expect too much though, it's a fairly simple map.
title: Simple Sea Settlements

description:
Author: RenderPhoenix Creatives

Hide, seek and Kill! Our brand New PVP map for 5-10 players solo competitive battle. This Map features a unique and detailed arena model, abilities and effect systems, teleportation system inside the map. Easy and fun to play and fully customizable for personal uses.


How to play?
1. Someone needs to be a host who will maintain the match in creative mode.

2. There is a Host/Admin corner in the lobby where the host will find the start button and other stuff.

3. Players will join the game and wait in the lobby until everyone present and ready.
