4. When everyone will ready, turn on the start button and wait until everyone passes the gate.

5. Ensure to turn off the start button then so that the lobby gate being closed.

6. Player will battle with each other until the last man standing is found. Dead players will respawn in the Lobby.
title: HOLO PvP

description:
Author: Hrhett

Ultimate Slayer is a quite unrestricted arena with automated processes such as the ability to obtain kits by pressing buttons or stepping on pressure plates to get teleported to a new space. It's quite barebones at this point but hopefully that will improve as the development of the map continues.
title: Ultimate Slayer

description:
Author: Joshspaceboy

Welcome to a brand new adventure built in MCPE, a full, completely unique Zelda game. This is a full-length game that can take around 15 hours to complete! With a focus on dungeons, the first version of this game comes with 10 large main story dungeons, 4 sub-dungeons, and a minigame dungeon, as well as some other areas to explore. It has the full story of the game and is completely playable to the final boss. While it is a game tailed to fans of the Zelda franchise, if you enjoy puzzles and adventures you will probably love this map too!
title: The Legend of Zelda

description:
Author: Angious2004

This is a roleplay map ambiented in the SCP Foundation universe and intended for multiplayer, but of course you can also use it to play alone. It is very big and includes almost all the rooms found in SCP – Containment Breach, other extra rooms I added and a full exterior.
title: SCP Site 19 2004

description:
Author: MisterDabs

Christmas is getting closer and Santa Claus needs all the help he can get. However, last week all of his helpers got kidnapped. He tried to contact the Federal Bureau of Elfinvestigation but they couldn’t help him. Give this map a try if you want to get in Christmas mood already. Play as one of Santa’s elves and try to escape captivity to try to save Christmas before it’s too late!
title: Save the Christmas

description:
Author: eckoxsoldier

it’s a Survival Island world. We built some incredible things all in survival and below are a list in case you are curios Rebuilt village multiple statues wizard/watch tower drowned farm food farms auto farms villager farms end farm animal barn drained guardian temple
title: Last Ever Minecraft 360 World

description:
Author: zereaper

This map takes place in a chilling facility of horror. You’re stuck in there with a maniac (known as Jigsaw) who will force you through all kinds of crazy challenges to test your willingness for survival. All in all, it’s a distasteful and sick experience (at least compared to the usual maps you’ll play). Even though it might sound harsh it’s actually a compliment because it is in fact a horror map.
title: Jigsaw

description:
Author: Veryhackerinc

Do you have what it takes to reach the top of the parkour with lava rushing you! Are a parkour master who likes challenges? Then play this map. 1-5 players!
title: Lava Escape New!

description:
Author: AD003330

Are you bored with finding sky block maps? Biomes Skyblocks will definitely not disappoint you (or not?) Hope you like it. This is just the beginning of my map making it for you to try for the first time. Hope you enjoy!
title: Biomes Skyblocks

description:
Author: Gerardo X

Galaxy 2 is a CTM map where you have to go to the different galaxies trying to get the trophy for each one, thus seeking to complete the altar and thus be able to face the destroyer of galaxies to defeat it and thus return the light of day to galaxy X.
title: Galaxy 2

description:
Author: 2cuteRedstoneKitty, TripleThreat817

Start your Magical Journey as a witch/wizard in the MAGIC map! With hundreds of commands to implement characters you can speak with, different Magic Types, a fully-working Magical Battle Arena, and more, this map is a great adventure for everybody! At the beginning you are given a hard decision about war- which side will you take? After you choose you are assigned a Magic Type. Every Magic Type has different abilities, and the characters on the map interact differently with every type! Make choices and start gaining your first wand, robes, and even have your first battle! After the adventure map is finished, you have the option to go to a role-play village and add your friends, so that you can mess around as a wizard/witch without the nagging quests.
title: MAGIC – An RPG Adventure

description:
Author: Therealechonox

What would you do if you were locked in a room… And your only memory was that you needed to escape! This map is inspired by the point-and-click adventure games. In this map, you are investigating the past of Charles Reolosus. Upon entering his old factory, you realise that you are locked in and you need to escape. Read the various journals scattered about to learn more about the predicament you are now in.
title: Room Escape

description:
Author: TypicalUsername9708

This map features 10 different redstone contraptions which all would be a useful addition to most houses. The including structures are everything from hidden entrances, a shower to mob farm. Basically anything which can improve the overall gameplay and your chances for surviving. It's also fairly easy to review each structure and get a better grasp of the involved redstone.
title: 10 Redstone Contraptions for Houses

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Explore a millionaire’s rural paradise — a secluded British manor house set within a forest with expansive grounds and amenities. This complex has a completed exterior and interior. There will be one more update to include: cinema, gym, airstrip, pool house, guest house, wine cellar, etc. Please comment with suggestions for the final update.
title: Christmas at Titan Manor

description:
Author: r4isen1920

Among other Hide and Seek Bedrock maps, I think this is the one that has power-ups and items in it! The smurfs village buit by @FizzmanB (Fizzman797), so we’ve put together a minigame map! Items and power-ups, including one legendary item – will make as you’re like a god!

Starting the Game
The game requires a minimum of 2 players to play and start. Simply press the button ahead of you, if the necessary players are joined in!

A random seeker will be chosen.
The game will initiate, game starts within 15 seconds, releasing all hiders.
Some powerups may be available, and some should not.
Once all hiders released, they’ve be given atleast 30 seconds of time to hide
Hiders can use power-ups to decrease the time.
Seekers can use their power-ups to easily find hiders lurking somewhere.

Power-Ups & Game Changer
For Hiders
There are 4 total items (including power-ups) for hiders. These are the following:

Hint item: Launch Fireworks – Will summon fireworks wherever you want nearby. Also reduces the seek time by 5 seconds
Hint item: Summon Lightning Bolt – Summons the lightning bolt directly above the hider’s head! Since it will lead the seeker into high probability of finding you easily, summoning lightning bolts can reduce the seek time by 10 seconds
Emergency Escape Pad – Summons a pad where a hider can use to escape from the deadly seeker! Run for your lives! As it only usable ONCE!
Legendary Item: Book of Hiding (passive) – Not all hiders can posses the power right away. You have to do something first before obtaining the item. It is a passive item, you’ll know what it does if by any chance you’ve obtained it.

Cooldown: all hider’s share the same cooldown, power-ups and items; with this, if one uses an item or power-up, everyone has to wait before using power-ups again – to avoid abusing seek time from running out so fast.

For Seekers
Seeker’s have only two items (including power-ups). These are as follows:

Epic: Movement eye Tracker (EMeyeT) – With the work of epicness, this can detect nearby hiders within 8 blocks of range within it! Once detected, it will notify all seeker’s of who has been detected nearby. Although, it may be epic, its not legendary enough that it can be hacked easily – any hiders can stand on it and hack as they want, it may take a few seconds, but will buy hiders some time to work with. Every successful hack, will take some time for the EMeyeT to rebuild. Seeker’s can also modify the EMeyeT by standing on it as well, returning the EMeyeT to their inventory without hesitation! Only one EMeyeT can be summoned at a time.
Seeker’s Instinct (passive) – Everytime a hider uses a hint item, seeker’s can identify where is it, if near.
Repair Time: Like hiders, seekers also share the amount of time when reparing EMeyeT! Since they share, they also share information of what EMeyeT holds.

More Features!
Pause menu will show information of who’s the hider, and who’s the seeker(s)!
Big map for big game, better hiding, intense seeking!
Awesome UI
And more!
title: H&S Bedrock (beta)

description:
Author: ArcStudios05

Modern House Four is a simple clean modern mansion built in a spruce forest
title: Modern House Four - Spruce Mansion

description:
Author: PRODIGY

Toxic Water Island includes 9 different islands that the player must explore to obtain new materials that he can use to survive and another that will take you to the store.

The player starts out on a island which oncludes only the most basic resources you’ll need to survive.

Store 1: buy amor
Store 1: buy amor
title: Toxic Water Island

description:
Author: PoeticWhisper

This map has been in the works for over three years now and it was created to give the most authentic version of Hogwarts (& surrounding areas) on Console Edition of Minecraft and now also Bedrock Edition. Everything is hand placed, the terrain is placed block by block, and teeming with Easter eggs for true Potter fans.
title: Hogwarts & Surrounding Areas

description:
Author: IhsanF540

CaveStar Maps provides a variety of games to enjoy and have fun with friends, play online or play through the realm. the game is:

• Spleef

• Parkour

• Throwing out

• Skywars

• Deathrun

• TNT Run
title: CaveStar

description:
Author: DualRed

This map is perfect for anyone who've always wanted to live in a tree and experience an existence somewhat similar to that of Tarzan. There are plenty of houses too which means that you can bring a bunch of your friends to live with you up among the trees. None of the houses provide any furniture and blocks so that's something you probably want to start out working on.
title: TreeHouse

description:
By snowcoal

This is my 400 hour Medieval Kingdom project that Ive been working on for 10 months now. Its a 1500x1500 size map with tons of details. The main features are a giant castle with over 200 rooms, passageways, and staircases, 4 villages, and over 100 houses. I originally built it in Java Edition, and Ive converted it to bedrock so more people can play on it. Due to the conversion, there are some minor errors such as redstone doors not working. However, most things converted properly and the map is still playable in whatever game mode you want. If you want to get the full experience, I recommend you play the Java version.
title: Snowcoal's Medieval Kingdom

description:
Author: Piomex

This map features four different firework structures which can be used as a blueprint or inspiration to build something similar (or maybe even more epic) in your own worlds. It’s time to celebrate the new (and old) year and perhaps this map can help you to do that a bit more epic fashion in Minecraft.
title: 4 Fireworks

description:
Author: xX Last Warning Xx

This map is based on a very popular mobile game called Granny which was originally developed by DVloper. You’re trapped inside a creepy house and it’s up to you to find a way out using a hammer, wire cutter and your mind. Just make sure you get out in time and use the different hiding spots to hide from the Granny as she’s crazy and will most definitely hurt you!
title: Granny

description:
By tub34

Welcome to the library escape room made by MCM Tuber on 2021. He wants to celebrate his 600 subscribers making a new exclusive map! With an inespered final. How will go it? This evil librarier wants to keep you here forever, but you will escape. Good luck!
title: Library Escape

description:
Author: cleverlike, SnakeyeZZ

Arrow Warz is an archer minigame map for two players. It uses an addon which makes arrows explosive and water just as deadly as lava. Try to kill the other player by shooting explosive arrows at his fort. If you are lucky, he might fall down into the water and die. If not, then you will just have to continue for as long it takes to one of you to win. All in all, it’s a really fun map to play!
title: Arrow Warz (Addon)

description:
Author: GameFreak101YT, De Coolerd, captainfour4-beast

Evasion is an adventure puzzle map which takes place in a maximum security prison. You were sent there after you got a little overconfident and decided to rob the National Bank of Minecraft. The objective at hand is to solve puzzles and make trades with other inmates to one day be able to escape the prison and reunite with your old gang on the outside. It's definitely a fun experience and it's supposedly based off a popular game called The Escapist.
title: Evasion

description:
Author: Estrongel

Ready to steal the hidden treasure found in the Jungle Temple? Want to solve hidden puzzles and search for secrets? Then this map is for you! Welcome to THS: Jungle, a map designed to challenge your mental fortitude through it’s disorienting puzzles and your skill through parkour! Take the challenge, find the treasure, and escape!
title: Treasure Hunter Series: Jungle Puzzle

description:
Author: JPlaysPE

This is a map specifically designed for the use of elytra wings which is a new type of item in version 0.17.0 of Minecraft Pocket Edition. 0.17.0 is currently only available as a beta version for Android users. The levels are really cool and creatively designed. For example, in one level you will be flying into the mouth of a huge lizard. If you want to try out the new gliding feature then this map is a must-play!
title: Elytra Parkour

description:
Author: mineclan888

Bloxnite is a PvP and minigame based on Fortnite which is one of the top multiplayer battle royal games in the world. This map includes similar features such as a moving battle bus, a fully working crate and shop system and a building system which resets each round. Invite some friends and play a few rounds of Fort.. Bloxnite in Minecraft!
title: Bloxnite

description:
By Voxed Studio

1000x1000 Mountain Island is a custom terrain map created for you to use freely in your projects, it's perfect for using in video backgrounds, thumbnails, etc.The map has mountains, islands, beaches and a huge sea
title: 1000x1000 | Custom Map | Mountain Island

description:
Author: studofenfield

The Minigames City is a an amusement park with more than 15 different minigames you and your friends can enjoy. We highly recommend playing this map with other players seeing as most minigames require at least two players to be enjoyable. There are everything from archery games to boat races. You can expect at least one hour worth of gameplay here.
title: Minigames City

description:
Author: Kampston_city

Welcome to Kampston! Soon to be among the biggest cities made on Bedrock Edition, Kampston City is a project that I have been working on since February 2021.
title: Kampston City

description:
Author: the-professor-g

it is a survival spawn in which you accomplish 10 goals, at your own pace, to complete the map. It is not required to complete goals in a time frame (Unless your a YouTuber GET IT DONE ASAP)
title: The Goal World

description:
In this map, you’ll have to use your wits and skills to escape from a maximum security prison. You have to parkour, do a dropper and even a find the button.

The levels in this map include a:
Maze
Find the Item
Dropper
Parkour
Find the Button
title: Prison Break

description:
Author: jobetyk

Hello there! Are you looking for a good PvP map with different game-modes, many balanced kits, and amazing builds? Well it’s your lucky day! Mocha PvP is the perfect PvP map for demanding players. Every aspect of the map has been carefully made to ensure you won’t have any problem. The map has a lobby that contains everything you need to manage the map, so it’s very easy to use. How to play? You will spawn in a lobby and there you will find a few different options for each different game-mode. Such as the six available kits, Duel teleport (behind the pillars), Sumo teleport and FFA teleport. The three different game-modes are: Duels: A 1vs1 fight, you can choose between six kits. Sumo: Push your opponent out of the platform and be the victor. FFA: All vs all! Take your kit, jump in to the arena, and beat your rivals.
title: Mocha

description:
Author: GemuAddict

A map to gain levels and get weapons. Kill zombies, do Easter egg steps and survive! Shops and perks included while fighting zombies, cool sounds and custom weapons. And to top it of, a cool whole parkour at the lobby
title: S4 Zombies

description:
Author: PUMPKINSID

All the building been remastered and more detailed than the original one, and new levels such as chemical weapon room, personel id card service, and much more, the map difficulty is higher than the original version. More mutant zombies to slay !, mutant hunter is inspired by another game called ( doom and dead space ) because they have a horror gore zombie and some action adventure first person perspective. You can play with your friend, co-op to kill all the zombies by inviting them to your world, or you can fight them alone.
title: Mutant Hunter

description:
Author: LineOfCode

This map is a dropper minigame where the objective is to land safely in the water but most of the way down there will be obstacles blocking the way. It gets gradually more difficult as you make your way through the levels. Right now there are 16 different levels but more will be added in a future update.
title: The X Dropper

description:
Author: Vechrozilator

Are you ready to die? 15 ways to die map is a minigame map which your goal here is to kill yourself in order to pass the level and head up to the next level, in order to die you must find a way to kill yourself solve some redstone puzzle, command block puzzle, brew some potion for your needs and craft an item for your DEATH.
title: 15 Ways to Die

description:
Author: SINPHOX

This is an improved, exclusive and simplified version created by Sinphox of the popular Minecraft Skyblock map, originally created by Noobcrew, for the Bedrock Edition. New update (v0.2) with new features like custom trading and more!
title: Skyblock Bedrock Edition! (V0.2 Update)

description:
Author: MatPatCat

It’s some years in the future and artificial super-intelligence has reached an advancement where it’s thousands times more advanced than a human brain. Mankind have managed to almost reach self-destruction due to nuclear warfare but you are one of the few survivors in your region after a nuclear blast. You have now been put in a facility to go through a series of tests and one day hopefully save humanity from self-descrution.
title: Genesis

description:
Author: itsdominicplays

TNT Escape is a game where your objective as a player is to escape exploding TNT blocks. It’s an extremely fun and intense minigame where you have to be quick on your feed in order to successfully escape the explosions. It’s best enjoyed with other players but it can also be played in single player mode.
title: LG TNT Escape

description:
Author: tpar69

Futuretroplis is a small, futuristic city situated on the coastline of a plains biome. It's a magnificent build with amazing views and most parts of the city are made out of huge skyscrapers which reach far beyond the clouds. All of the buildings include floors and some of them even have interiors. It's really a city well worth exploring!
title: Futuretroplis

description:
Author: MODZCRAFT101

This is a recreation in Minecraft of Fringe which is a popular multiplayer map in Call of Duty: Black Ops III. It features an old and forgotten town located next to a space launch facility, supposedly somewhere in Southern California. You can use this for pretty much anything, but it would probably be most suitable for PvP.
title: Black Ops 3: Fringe

description:
Author: AboodyCraft

Do you like to paint? Well, I hope so! This creation lets you paint in Minecraft PE. You can choose among five different brushes and lots of different colors. It's possible to save (and load) paintings and much more. It's definitely an amazing creation worth trying out and most of it is made possible because of command blocks!
title: Painting in MCPE

description:
Author: Assassiner003

This map features 10 different command blocks creations. Some of the creations work just as decorations, e.g. the animated Steve face or the dance floor, but they are still good enough to make them interesting. Most of them are creations which I've previously not seen done for Minecraft Pocket Edition and that's always a plus.
title: 10 Awesome Command Block Creations

description:
Author: Lyon

Massive Kit PvP is a really cool map which includes four different arenas with custom terrains. There are four different kits which you can choose between and each kit has its pros and cons. But all of the kits have been balanced in order to make sure that no one is overpowered. There is also an admin shop which includes some cool game settings and an admin armor. You can expect more updates in the future!
title: Massive Kit-PvP

description:
Author: IEMOTIONLESS

This multiplayer world is a PvE PvP world for you to play with your friends. Get loot and kill enemies. Open random loot chests to get gear and buy items at shops.

Loot many lands battle mobs and your friends. Buy weapons and armor from villagers.
title: Looting RPG

description:
Author: blockmaster_203

This map is a recreation in Minecraft of Alton Towers which is considered one of the largest theme parks in England. The theme park offers a lot of crazy rides but also some stunning gardens which visitors can enjoy. Just keep in mind that this is a pre-release which means it is still a work in progress and will be updated with more features in the future.
title: Alton Towers

description:
Author: eeebee

Ruin raiders is a pvp arena style game with a twist. The map changes every game! This is only the first release of this map so there aren’t many features but in the future I plan to add more things to make sure no two games are the same

At the start of the game a map is randomly generated and up to 8 players are spread around the map. At the moment there is only one kit available but in the future I plan to add a lot more with a loot box style system
title: Ruin Raiders

description:
Author: chineLEISUREGAMING, Tyrael242

Notchland is one of the largest and most popular amusement parks in Minecraft. There are more than 70 different attractions including everything from roller coasters to awesome minigame. If you enjoy amusement parks (which I assume most of you do) then this is really a must-play. And this is actually an official port by the original PC creators themselves.
title: Notchland Amusement Park

description:
Hello! My name is Variety8, this post here is actually the first of I hope to be many more! I hope you enjoy Fishers! What should I add, remove, or tweak? What other minigame ideas do you have? Please let me know in the comments, thanks!

Fisher! is a minigame where two random players are selected, geared with a fishing rod, teleported to 1 of 4 arenas, and after a countdown, try to reel their opponents into the void below! The matches may end in a second!

When you first join the world, you will be greeted with a big sign with some ocean scenery pixel art, and the lobby. The lobby includes Start Game, How to Play, and Credits. The How to Play message includes a somewhat close description of what you can see above. Didn’t get picked to go one-to-one? Don’t worry because you will teleported to a spectator platform with a great view!

This minigame requires two or more players to start.

This minigame includes 4 different arenas to play on:

-The Pit

-Target

-Crosshair

-Smiley
title: Fishers!

description:
By DaxThePumpkin

If you are a fan of Garry's Mod then this map is for you. She repeats two locations from this sandbox game. Gm_construct and Flatgrass are very accurately transferred to Minecraft.

Garry's Mod is a game where you can do anything you want. In it, you can build a building, design cars, arrange a battle with friends and much more. Since Minecraft is a similar game in meaning, I decided to move the two main locations from Garry's Mod to Minecraft.

First map - gm_concstruct.

gm_construct is a map that is specially made for various cases. It is great for reviewing various mods and addons. There are all the most important things here: flat land, water, tall buildings, enclosed spaces, and more. gm_construct is ported to Minecraft quite accurately. By adding shaders and various resource packs, the map will become much more interesting.
title: Garry's Mod Map (SandBox)

description:
Author: americamx

It’s a pretty big map of The Backrooms, “infinite hallways” with flickering lights.
title: The Backrooms

description:
Author: crackedcubes

This expansive (10000×10000 blocks) map contains eight connected biomes each with unique characteristics for the player to explore. Vegetation is biome specific while animal/mob spawning occurs randomly across the map.
title: Eight Custom Terrain Biomes

description:
Author: TheSixthHour

This stadium contains seating for thousands of people and there is also more than 60 private, security and public suites on the third and fourth floors. All the interiors have been decorated to try to emulate a busy and crowded atmosphere, so there are a lot of different things to explore. The construction started on the 2nd day of 2018 and today is finally the release day!
title: Ice Hockey Arena

description:
Author: JLabDX

Do you have favorite cartoons? Do those have dynamic and energetic theme songs? Well for some of you, you’re in luck! This map is a showcase of 3 cartoon theme songs from the cartoons most of us love. Gravity Falls, Steven Universe, Star Vs the Forces of Evil and more to come! By the way, this map has a resource pack which make the noteblocks sound loud so you won’t have trouble hearing the awesome music. You may comment what I may add next.
title: 3 Noteblock Cartoon Theme Songs

description:
Author: umerkk164

This map is the sequel to The Tale of Steve: Escape. In the last map you had to escape prison but once back out on the streets it doesn't take long before you find yourself as a part of a crime family. Life as a criminal is a hard one and today you will be tasked with the objective to rob a bank. This map combines add-ons, custom textures and command blocks to create a fun and exciting adventure.
title: Tale of Steve: The Perfect Heist

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

This house looks at first like any other normal starter house for survival mode, but that’s far from the reality! Once you enter the house there’s a chest which can be used for accessing a secret control panel. The control panel can be used for changing the security level for the house. Some things you can enable include obsidian walls, lava trenches, wither turrets and even exploding walls!
title: Savest House

description:
Author: HankMMXVII

This is a house from the future. Meet HAL 9001 – a talking super intelligent computer that can chat, compliment, play music and much more. (It ca get a bit condescending. ;)) A beautiful modern design, from the exterior to the furniture, built on an amazing custom terrain with gorgeous scenery and haunting caves to explore.
title: Smart House

description:
Author: Tal_Melamed100

Welcome to the Working Mancala map! The map is based on the board game called Mancala and it was built just with redstone (meaning, no command blocks). This map is a work in progress and this is the first release, so that’s why there are some details / features missing at the moment (more info about that further down).
title: Working Mancala

description:
Author: starlight-productions

Do you like PVP Maps? Embark on the map based on the game Brawl Stars. 3v3 Gem Grab Mode to Play with up to 5 friends. But you can also play 1v1, it gets more interesting and challenging. More different game modes will come in future updates.
title: Brawl Stars Map v1

description:
Author: JEBR_Gaming

Random Arcades includes 8 different minigames which are made for multiplayer. There are a lot of command blocks which have been added, and you don’t need any behavior or resource pack to make the games work. If you (and preferably a group of friends) are looking for something fun to play, then this map should definitely be in your list of options. Most games are primarily focused on PvP.
title: Random Arcades

description:
Author: addythehealer

The World War Z is a zombie survival game by saber interactive which has been recreated in bedrock edition.

How to play this map ? You start from the rooftop of a building full of zeke you have to kill them in order to go to the next floor there are no switches all system is based on motion triggers so checkpoints will be saved automatically by finding your way through the building then to the subway you have to reach the train to escape . To help you clear the zeke horde neccessary guns ammo and meds have been provided placed in chests be sure to take and not miss a single chest.
title: World War Z Chapter 1 Descent

description:
By Joey gaming

Based on the film Napoleon Dynamite this is a 1:1 scale recreation of the real-life high school in the town of Preston Idaho. Google Earth and images inside the school were used to build and create textures for the school.

This is a 1:1 scale recreation of the school from the film Napoleon Dynamite which is located in the small town of Preston Idaho in 2004. However, after the movie was released the school added a new section where they added a new gym, cafeteria, and a library. Only the old part of the school is built.
title: Napoleon Dynamite's High School

description:
Author: TheEnderface

This map is a continuation of Entity 303 The Final Shadow. In this next part of the map series you will be challenged to bring an end to Null, uncover the shadows and start the war against evil. There are many different challenges included in this map. Some of them are obstacles such as parkour, mob battles and boss battles. There are also custom models, textures and new sounds – everything to provide a top notch game experience!
title: Null: Shadow Return

description:
Author: ToastUnicorn

So I got the idea for this a while ago and finally uploaded this here! This is kinda based on a fantasy idea, and a pretty good spot for role playing
title: Minn’s Inn For The Supernatural

description:
Author: raid-games

Raid royal is a 3-8 player battle royal map made for you and your friends (if you have any) to play! There are currently 1 map with 4 locations to fight in but more content will be added each month. So loot up and fight in this fun Minecraft world!
title: Raid Royal

description:
By Blorckits

A medium sized escape room, designed for skilled minecraft players. It is required that 2 or more people play it. We created this map because of how unsatisfied we were with other escape rooms. We made sure that every part of our map is interesting and difficult. Enjoy!
title: Escape Plus

description:
Author: gab_the_crafter

In this map you will serve as a knight to protect your castle, and mobs will try to kill you and if you die you will lose. This map has a custom shop so you can buy items like sword, armor and even guards to help you in battle against mobs. This map also have custom mobs and 10 waves of Enemies, wave 5 and 10 are boss fights (Boss:Golem=1000hearts)(Boss:FateMaster=5000hearts) Rules: 1. Turn off the keep inventory to avoid bugs on the map 2. Play in Survival mode so you can spawn guards to help you in battle 3. Don’t Cheat How to Play There are 10 waves of Enemies, your job is to protect the castle and survive as long as you can, also you can buy items from the shop by putting the correct amount of gold ingot on the chest Players means life the more the player is the more life you can get every players has 1 xp, the xp means life if all the players lose they’re xp you lose
title: Defend Your Castle

description:
Author: SkyGames

Lake Lunge is a minigame with features similar to the popular dropper minigame except that in this one you’ll do the same fall over and over again. However, for each fall you will have to avoid a different set of obstacles. It has a fully functional high score system which keeps track and saves your current high score.
title: SG Lake Lunge

description:
Author: JASUCARD

Do you have what it takes to scale the great Spiral Tower? Make your way up this unsettling ascent full of many different variations of challenging parkour to see if you can be the one that scales the legendary Spiral Tower.

Spiral Tower is a very tall spiraling column of parkour. You’ll be tasked with completing many different forms of parkour to make it to the top. It will start easy, but get much more challenging the higher you get. Prismarine blocks are your safe haven, step on them to activate a checkpoint. Good luck on reaching the top!
title: Spiral Tower

description:
Author: keithross39

This is a survival build based around a jungle temple which includes an extensive network of treetop platforms and walkways. There are lots of things to see here. For example, in one area there is a Nether Portal which will take you to the Nether not far from a Nether Fortress. There is also a Nether Wart Farm located inside one of the buildings. Basically everything (including resources such as food and weapons) are included which you'll need for going out and explore!
title: Treetops and Temples

description:
Author: wedge

This is the first map in the DeathCore CTM (Complete the Monument) map series. The main objective is to do whatever necessary to survive and find the blocks to complete a monument. It takes place in an underground world where there are plenty of monsters and other obstacles to make things more difficult for you (and your friends if you choose to player it in multiplayer). The map is recommended for 1-4 players.
title: DeathCore I: Wonderground

description:
Author: BulzRai21

This map contains:

Working Office door
Working cameras
Working light switches (Only applies for the window lights, but it will be added to other rooms)
Working elevator
Ability to crawl vents
title: Fantasy World

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Bow Brawl is a multiplayer team game where you must knock the enemy players off of their flying set of beams. You can jump between the beams and change levels, but don’t get shot off! Use one of the three kits to eliminate your enemy. The kits can explode the enemy, shoot them with instant unexpected arrows or fire a massive wave of them!
title: Bow Brawl

description:
Author: TheBasicType

Here we have many fun things on the SkyBlock that you can do for hours like Survive, hang out With Mr. Villager, Go Mineing, Find Secrets under the island, and so much more
title: SkyBlock

description:
Author: crackedcubes

This modern house builds itself. Walk out of a tunnel and find a switch which turns a forest clearing into a luxurious one-bedroom house.
title: Self-Building Modern House

description:
Author: MDS Minecraft

This is one of the most secured doors which you can build in Minecraft PE. According to the creator it has more than five tredecillion combinations (and no, I've never heard of that number until today). It's impossible to crack the code, but as long you've got the combination it won't take more than a minute to unlock the door.
title: The Most Secure Door

description:
Author: zucth

This map was inspired by Eronev Mansion which is an old map originally released one year ago (by the same creator). It’s a story about a man who travels to new and cursed lands. Many have gone before him, but none of them have every come back. He is the last hope of his people, and lonely he has to venture these lands and battle whatever unknowns awaiting him. It’s recommended for 1-2 players.
title: The Quarly Mansion – Chapter I: The Last Friend

description:
Author: Nanfuxian

Hangshui City is a fictional modern city with East Asian culture influence. Hangshui City was founded on 29th May 2020. This city is inspired from another Minecraft Cities (Kyokei City and Metropolitan Urashima) and also from real city (Shanghai, Taipei, Tokyo(Taito), Seoul, and etc). This city is heavily influenced by Chinese culture with some Japanese and Korean.
title: Hangshui City

description:
Author: sxemarc

FvDisco’s awesome Bomb defuse mini game completely rebuilt to work in Bedrock edition! Defuse the bomb before it explodes!
title: Bomb Defuse

description:
Author: Leo Mahesh

Modern Underground House

A switch that lit up all the lights in the house!
Automatic outside lights
title: Modern Underground House

description:
Author: DarthGarth83

Ever wanted to walk a highway in Minecraft admiring the stunning landscape and reminiscing on simpler times? Well in The Great Artesian Highway, you can!
title: The Great Artesian Highway

description:
By KingOfSpain52

Infinite Dungeons V is a Multiplayer PvP and PvE map where you go and fight monsters, bosses, explore caves, create custom items and gear, and so much more. This world is based off the realm I run.

These are some of the areas that you can go and explore in!
title: Infinite Dungeons V

description:
Author: DireWolf314159

An improvement to the fan favourite My Redstone Smart House I introduce to you… My Redstone Smart House V2!! Achievements edition, bigger, better, improved, and now in survival! Filled with many new contraptions, and a new nether, this Smart Mansion is ready and waiting for you and all the adventures you will go on!
title: My Redstone Smart House

description:
By NobleCrate mc

Noblecrate MC Treasure wars! A fully functional map that will bring you close to the original Hive treasure wars - offering great experience and similar game play as Hive. Minimum of 2 PLAYERS are required to start the game. An automated repairing system has been added to reset the map after each game. Stay alert for new treasure wars maps dropping soon on our official website!
title: Treaure Wars

description:
Author: theelectricg

The Wall is a fairly challenging parkour map where the goal is to get to the top of the wall. But to get there you will need to jump past a series of obstacles. All of the obstacles require some type of jumping and on some stages failure is punishable by death. But luckily, there are multiple checkpoints along the way. It's a quite fun challenge if you are into parkour maps.
title: The Wall

description:
Author: BROKEN PROMISE GAMES

TRLG: WWII takes you through the devastation of war in World War 2, that is ito you have to guts to show up on D-Day or make your way through some of the Bunkers.
Take a trip through the Trenches of Normandy Beach in D-Day with its twisty corners, or infiltrate the Bunker in Bunkers, just make sure there isn’t anyone in there. In Zombies, you’re going Underground, in this map you see more advanced details such as; currency and an introduction to the map.
title: TRLG: WWII

description:
Author: PIXELPOLYDIGITAL

Because of one of the natural factors such as earthquakes, new islands and rivers may arise from them. This deserted island is one of the islands that formed due to the earthquakes that occur in the oceans, what distinguishes this island is its calmness and distinctive place to live in!
title: The Forgotten Island

description:
Author: RPS Studios

This map contains 8 large dungeons and with many modifications, from mutants to archers, this game contains the following dungeons,You can also find some swords and armor along with many gems
This game has a limit of 6 players
title: Dungeon Battle

description:
Author: ShadowBlader21

This map features a small Christmas-themed amusement park. It includes multiple minigames, plenty of roller coasters and everything you might need to entertain yourself during the Christmas holidays. All of the creations are very compact and small but it’s nonetheless a great theme park worth exploring.
title: Christmas Theme Park

description:
Author: PUMPKINSID

Your name is Jack and you are an Anti Mutant Vanguard Soldier (AMS). You’ve been sent on a mission to shut down the Zombie Mutant Brain Controller which is to be found at the High Intelligence Lab Property of H.Y.P.E.R Enterprise. It has gone totally haywire and it’s your job to secure the area and eliminate all potential threats.
title: Mutant Hunter

description:
Author: LUCA_OMO

Welcome in this amazing parkour map, where you don’t have only to jump to a block to an another but you have to use special effects given by special block

,This parkour map includes three different levels. By jumping on different terracotta blocks you’ll gain different special abilities such as extra speed or a jump boost. At the same time it would have been impossible to complete the obstacles without those abilities it also makes it quite difficult as you will have to strategically plan your next moves to complete the levels.
title: 1000 Jump 3

description:
Author: zucth

This map is approximately 10-15 minutes long. It’s recommended for single player. To understand most parts of the story and get in character and also to understand the gameplay you will need to read the books that you find in the game.You can play it on version 1.7 and above.
title: {Evenhold} Drama Christmas Short Project

description:
Author: sanjanajagani

There are billions of things you can decorate, explore or modify according to your likings! Come and join the fun! I hope you enjoy!
title: Sanjana’s Castle

description:
Author: cormacchick

In my first Find The Button map there are 7 Levels. You have to find buttons, levers and even parkour in the map. In every level there is a button. You have to locate the button through parkour and even by flicking levers, but don’t worry, there is a hint book.
title: Hidden Buttons

description:
Author: SkyGames

TNT Tumble is a great minigame which can be enjoyed both in single player mode and multiplayer. While stuck on a small platform you’re forced to run around in order to avoid the TNT blocks which occasionally drop on the ground. The concept is quite simple but it’s actually a really fun and intense game in an awesome terrain.
title: SG TNT Tumble

description:
Author: mcpe0717

This is a really awesome recreation of the classic arcade game called Donkey Kong which was also one of the first platform games. The gameplay focuses on controlling a character known as Mario, and have him jump over different obstacles in order to progress through the map. It’s a really well made map with great game mechanics.
title: Donkey Kong

description:
Author: Faith_shupee

The OldCastle is a world originally generated as an old world type. The old world type used to be the only available world format for Minecraft PE way back in time. Even though that's a slight downside it's still well worth checking out since it features one ginormous fantasy castle with tons of majestic rooms to explore.
title: OldCastle

description:
Author: mdsminecraft

All of the following farms can be built in a survival world. However, it does require quite a bit of effort to obtain the necessary blocks and items to get one up and working. There are both semi-automatic farms and ones which are entirely automated, meaning no human intervention is necessary to keep some of them going and producing.
title: 12 Useful Farms in Survival Mode

description:
Author: Enderbrine01

This is a prison map which can be used for roleplays, cops and robbers, prison escape or any other time when you need a prison. There are some cool features built-in such as the possibility to choose between two different teams, a customized trading system, custom items and some new villager skins. The prison includes several different areas such as jail cells, a cafeteria and a yard.
title: PRISON 3.0

description:
Author: noahcraftreal, Jujustyle7

This map is a trivia map about a YouTuber named Rage Elixir. this map was made for his birthday, and in the map, you will have to answer questions about Rage Elixir. For every question you get right you receive some gear and you’ll need as much gear as possible to defeat the evil Rage Elixir boss in the end! How to play? Start the game by answering the questions. You will receive three different blocks in your inventory for each question. Place the A, B or C block on the matching block to make your choice. If you are correct, you’ll receive some gear. If you fail, you will not gain anything.
title: RageElixir Trivia

description:
Author: Team 47.3

Concrete Parkour is a really fun parkour map where all throughout the map you will automatically get different boost effects in order to complete challenging jumps. There are lots of great levels so you can expect quite a lot of gameplay. But since it uses repeat command blocks to detect the player position it might cause lag on low-end devices.
title: Concrete Parkour

description:
Author: WOLFKNIGHT777

Magically transported inside of a large dome, you find yourself in an abandoned cabin. In order to escape the dome, you must find clues of the previous survivors who once lived in that cabin. While in the process, you’re able to complete quests, find buried treasure and complete achievements made for this map. For the best experience, I recommend you use my “Invisible Bedrock Resource Pack”. Good luck to you all, and have fun!

Here one side and the top of the dome, with “Invisible Bedrock Resource Pack” turned off. The top is cut off due to world build limit.
title: Island Dome Survival

description:
Author: CATASTROPHE7777

This is a parkour map which is perfect for anyone who want to practice their parkour skills. There are 10 different levels which all vary in difficulty as well as a donus level in the end with some increased difficulty.

How to play?
You’ll start out in a lobby where you can read some instructions. Walk through the house which is fitted in the wall to begin the parkour. It’s multiplayer friendly and there are also checkpoints.

Every level is possible to complete even if it for some of you might not seem possible at first. The area where you’ll be doing the parkour looks to be in a giant house.
title: Parkour Paradise: Giant House!

description:
Author: tub34MCPEDL

This prison is so different like another one, there're too many places for explore and find hints. Aka the places: Showers, Gym, Cells, Armory, Police room (Room A), Kitchen, Playground, Security, Office and Engine room. The security and engine room is locked on the police's hall, who can opens with a 5 digits id code. I hear about a Reset DVD for reveal the code, can insert in a computer WinCraft 7. The main exit opens with 5 keys on security room. Now, the prison was reformed and alerts if the main exit is opened. Good luck!
title: Escape From The Prison 3

description:
By EvGENI

Vampires - truth or fiction? What is behind the blood-curdling stories about vampires? Madness and insanity, or something else, more sinister, more ancient? It was these questions that I asked myself when I made this map, putting maximum effort and my free time into it (a break of six months does not count). As a result, a good map came out, but extremely short. I wanted to make it much longer: add a lot of locations, more Easter eggs, more riddles, but even such motivation quickly disappears (especially when you try to fix bugs and flaws most of the time). In general, okay, let's get to the point.
title: The Awakening (ENG)

description:
Author: JELLYHAIR

This is a short status effect parkour map map that takes about 20-40 minutes. It is SINGLEPLAYER. It was made by a twelve year old, and is my first map, I made this in 8 hours, so I hope you enjoy it.
title: Magical Parkour

description:
Author: QDS_

This map has a lot of features. It has some really nice train tracks and sone really cool roads around the whole world. It has 4 cities and a big forest area. It also has a farmland with fields and small roads.
title: Evercity

description:
Author: the-sonic-master

The sequel to #1 hit title Escape The School is here! Featuring brand-new gameplay and a new storyline, can you escape again? This horror map features a character feared by many – Herobrine, who is determined to put a stop to you! Please ensure you play part 1 of Escape The School before playing this map! Story You escaped the school, or did you? The staff soon found out about you escaping and called on old adversary Herobrine to track you down! You were imprisoned in the secret school prison in F block, and once again you must escape. It will not be so easy this time though, as Herobrine is doing anything he can to stop you! Rules Don’t change any world settings. Avoid playing in multiplayer, although it should work in multiplayer. Music: OFF, Sound FX: 100. Use the resource and behaviour packs provided and don’t remove them or add external ones. Don’t play on a device with less than 1GB available RAM. You will experience heavy lag and frame drops. Brightness: 100. FOV can be altered by gameplay: ON.
title: Escape The School 2: Herobrine

description:
Author: MrGreenGames

Have you ever felt totally cramped on those itty bitty tiny little Skyblock Islands everyone loves so much? Well The Skyblock just grew up! This island is massive, big enough for multiple players to live easily side by side. Still all the same great Skyblock challenges just with more room. Including a full custom villager shop with over 60 items! Achievements enabled.
title: MEGA Skyblock

description:
Author: crackedcubes

This map features the White House which is the official resident and workplace of the President of the United States. If you’ve ever dreamed of living in the White House yourself, then this is the perfect opportunity. There are still parts of the area which are left unfinished but more updates will be released in the future. At this point in time you will be able to explore the West Wing, the Residence and some other structures.
title: A Minecraft White House

description:
Author: Smartiemax

Confetti Dropper is a fun minigame map with 8 different dropper challenges. It works in a way where you have to complete one level in order to unlock the next and so on. In each level you have to jump off a ledge and then move in different directions in air to push past different obstacles and hopefully land safely in the water at the bottom of each level.
title: Confetti Dropper

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

This map features a massive swamp biome with lots of trees, water and other structures. In total there are 100 custom structures and more than 800 biome variations. Let’s just say that you will not get bored easily in this map if you enjoy exploration in Minecraft!
title: The Sad Swamp

description:
Author: Zaidan Darmasakti

Hello, my name is Zaidan, and this is my first map ever on Minecraft Bedrock! This is the Battle of Hoth, from Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back. This battlefield contains aircraft, speeders, and so much more!
title: Battle of Hoth Recreated

description:
Author: A&C Playz MC

This is a map where the aim is to die. You have to go multiple levels by finding different ways to die. Each level is different from the other. You have to think logically because some levels are harder than others and you have to try and figure out how to die. ENJOY!!
title: 7 Ways to Die

description:
Author: CKCastGaming

This is an adventure with survival elements which takes place on an unknown sand planet. You have crash landed your spaceship and now you desperately need to scavenge for items to hopefully survive this disaster. Set off on your own or with friends to explore the mysterious structures of the planet and enjoy a unique experience with cool features and custom textures. It’s perfect for anyone who is up for a new survival challenge.
title: Planetary Confinement PE

description:
Author: PLAYGAMES

PG SkyBlock you are challenged to survive on an island where you start at our dear MCPEDL logo, around contain other islands to explore (in the future we will add more), your goal is to survive cautiously as there are not many resources available each As the island represents a game biome with its particular items, blocks and mobs, there is also the possibility of going to the end on this map different from other maps of the same theme.
title: PG SkyBlock

description:
Author: Fizzman797

Space Survival is a map of space exploration which will automatically generate planets for you to explore and exploit their resources for your own use. The main objective is simply to build the best home planet in the galaxy, and that is sure to come with the expense for someone else's planet. The planets are just a few blocks wide so they don't offer too much terrain to explore. It's basically an experience which combines survival skyblock with space.
title: Space Survival

description:
Author: Chronicoverride

Cabin in The Woods – A Minecraft Escape Room

This Escape Room Features:
-Compelling Story Line
-Challenging Brain Games
-Riddles
-Parkour and MORE!
title: Cabin in The Woods

description:
Author: Jamie GamingTM

This is a massive custom terrain consisting of several different biomes. Most biomes already exist in-game but have been greatly improved to appear more realistic (and majestic). It’s really a mind-blowing experience to walk through these biomes. It’s just too bad that it’s going to lag on low-end devices. But if it does, try lowering the render distance in the game settings.
title: Massive Custom Biomes

description:
Author: adam-loubaris

The cursed island is a great custom terrain that is very cool for your survival series. The cursed island is 2 unique island with mountains and hills adding a realistic survival.

Curly island is a great custom terrain that is an interesting survival challenge. It combines unique island formats, with a great survival challenge that turns out with mountains and hills that make it realistic. There is also a mushroom island area, and other locations to help you survive the minecraft world. Most of the island is jungle, but all of the structures like dungeons spawn here, and we were able to find a few of them around.
title: Cursed Island

description:
Author: Tim Walacy

The main island is where you will stay during the move, it has all the resources needed for your survival.

It also has a small island quoted in the rules book, the book explains everything about it and the main island.
title: Sky Islands

description:
Author: Ligged

This adventure map is about fictional medical cases in which you’ll have to intervene, travel inside the bodies of your patients, and help Dr. Nathan Melton heal them. It has 3 levels and different organs that we will visit throughout the game.
title: Dr. Melton’s Office

description:
Author: BlackZero

You’ve found some treasures but while doing so you set of an alarm which triggered the lava defence system. This map sets you up for an intense challenge where you need to complete three different parkour courses while trying to escape lava which is pouring down from the ceiling. If you aren’t quick enough you will die!
title: Lava Escape

description:
Author: EZEKIA

Ezekia’s Four Corners is a survival games map using the theme of Four Corners. Instead of the red, blue, green and yellow however, it uses 4 biomes: desert, mesa, mushroom and taiga!

The map can have up to 4 players (more if you want 2 people in the same starting position). The chests are not random, but they do refill automatically!

Mushroom

The mushroom biome is more like a maze, and has the most chests. There is one mushroom you can climb; the perfect sniping spot. This purple maze-like biome will have you running.

Taiga

This brown, spruce forest has a lot to offer: a watchtower (also a sniping tower) and a secret tunnel underwater…

Desert

The desert biome probably has the least chests; its wide, open space is hard to hide in. It has a well, an underground space and a lot of cacti!

Mesa

The mesa is like the desert: it has a lot of open space. Although, it has a few lava pits that you can hit players into..
title: Ezekia’s Four Corners

description:
Author: palm2570-playz

This map needs at least 2 players to start the game and you’ll also need the textures as well. It’s a build by PAG Builders team and it’s generally a great minigame. When playing in the map you’ll have to quickly move around as gravel disappear beneath your feed. Available speed settings: Very Sloth, Slow, Normal, Fast and Very Fast.
title: PAG Disappearing Gravel

description:
Author: Dikz27

This map features a huge park which used Jurassic Park as a great inspiration when building it. It's not a replica of the actual park but it does include many similarities such as the Visitor Center and the Raptor Pen which you will likely recognize if you've watched the movie. The best part is that the map can actually include dinosaurs as it's compatible with the Jurassic Craft Add-on. Some parts of the map are still a work in progress.
title: JurassicPark PE

description:
Author: GoldenEnergy

Classic Hunger Games is a small survival games map suitable for anywhere between 2 to 8 players. Hunger games is a very popular minigame for Minecraft, and especially for multiplayer servers, where players have to compete against one another in a PvP survival environment. The objective is basically to be the last player standing. To win you will have to combat other players, collect resources and survive!
title: Classic Hunger Games

description:
Author: SkyGames

Fortnite is the massive gaming success of 2018 and 2019 year. SkyGames has created the amazing game in Minecraft! If you love Fortnite, or just Battle Royale in general, then this is one of the best such maps you will find for Bedrock Edition! Creators: SkyGames Team (Twitter) (Website) (View all credits) Commands: Traswen Texture Pack: FogzGamez Builder: leefnut, Inviziy, FogzGamez, TylerSk8Z Updated: 7 March 2019
title: Fortnite V.11

description:
Author: toydotgan

Pow! is a one to four player game involving mobs, lots of them. The aim for this game is to shoot down all of the mobs inside an arena. Simple. At the start of the map, you will spawn in on a beach. In front of you is a little ruin, inside you’ll find a button, press that to begin the game
title: Pow!

description:
Author: BlazingFire203

Portal is an game created along time ago - this is not the fully original game but similar. It's play time is near 15 - 20 minutes i hope you have fun playing.
title: Portal

description:
Author: Miusername1

This city map is a sequel to the Republic of Newland / Ceylon City series. It was built in an old world type (255×255 blocks). The main focus of this project is to create a city that is on-par with many modern-day Minecraft cities, whilst bringing a world with a lag and file size to a minimum. It’s perfect in that sense for low-end devices who want to enjoy a cool city but can’t handle the size of certain cities.
title: City of Concorde

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG SkyWars is one of the best SkyWars maps for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with a total of 15 different maps and 5 upcoming mega mode maps. All aspects of the game are of course automated with redstone and command blocks, so all you need to do to get started is just to press the button in the lobby. It’s recommended for 2 – 4 players.
title: SG SkyWars (15 Maps!)

description:
Author: CATASTROPHE7777

Hey, my name is CatAstrophe and welcome to the YouTuber Head Parkour Map! I have been working to bring you guys this map, which consists of 20 of our favourite YouTubers incuding Unspeakable, RageElixir, BrandonCrafter, LogZotZip, AGHQ and more! The levels of this map will get harder as you go further in the map. Do you have what it takes to win?

Each Head is 8×8 blocks with parkour around it, for you to jump and climb to the top, where you will press a button and be teleported to the next level! The map is situated in the middle of the sky, with a cloudy-themed lobby, where you can find a board of instructions so you know what to do. You can also play this map with your friends!
title: YouTuber Head Parkour!

description:
Author: Resident Blockvil

I’ve been working on this project since December of last year, and I am proud to say it’s finally done! This is a complete remake of the original Resident Evil 3 for the Ps1. This map is really just meant for exploration purposes, but you can add in zombies and stuff to make it just like the game I guess. Also some of the locations, such as as uptown and downtown, have some revamped and expanded location. Anyways, enjoy!
title: Resident Evil 3 Nemesis

description:
Author: Jerry8860

This map is based an experience for ROBLOX called УSurvive the DisasterФ. All players will spawn in a room where some sort of natural disaster will occur. As a player your objective is to survive for as long you can and hopefully be one of the remaining ones alive. However, you're not supposed to kill other players. You should rather try help them.
title: Natural Disasters Survival

description:
Author: Voxellab Studio

Luna Nova is a school made for witches willing to learn how to harness their magic...

The academy is comprised of a look-out tower, A magic tower, The campus building and A dome.
title: Little Witch Academia - Luna Nova

description:
Author: Pastimeboy

This map featured a huge computer which is entirely powered by redstone and command blocks. It includes a few different features such typing, executing command lines and playing tic-tac-toe. It's definitely one of the best looking and most advanced redstone computers so far created for the bedrock version of Minecraft.
title: Working Functional Computer

description:
Author: Jhomes

This is a redstone and command block creation which lets you use an escalator to go up or down to reach your destination. An escalator is basically an automated staircase which does the walking for you. The only thing which is asked of you is to stand on the correct block and the machine will do the rest to allow you to reach your destination.
title: Working Escalator

description:
Author: GEMEN

You thought you had escaped… but more adventures await. Play the sequel of “The Cave”, and try to escape with your life. Use your wits, skills, and knowledge to escape for the second and final time.

A continuation of “The Cave”. You leave the elevator that gave you hope once, but now just leads you toward another part of this vast cave.

Objective: Find an exit that is not filled with lies
title: The Cave 2

description:
Author: WeededMuffin385

Play on this map with your friends. Rules are easy to know; At the start of the game random player from terrorists team gets detonator and also from opposite team (counter-terrorists0 random player gets defusers. Terrorist need to plant bomb on bombplace and counter-terrorists need to kill all terrorists or defuse bomb. It is easy and fun!
title: Counter-Strike Minecraft

description: Last Day on Earth is a survival and adventure map which is inspired by the popular game with the same name. You play as a character who is one of the few survivors after World War X. The lucky ones already left for a journey to Mars. But some people, like yourself, were left on Earth and now have to struggle for their continual survival. It’s tough surviving in a world with barely any food and infectious diseases which turn humans into zombies. The ultimate question stands: will you make it?
title: Last Day on Earth

description:
Author: SpunkieMunkie

This is a land of tamable, ride-able pet spiders and nasty Dark Elves. You start in the town of Davenport where you can build yourself up quickly (recommended, if you want to tangle with the Dark Elves early) or play as normal survival and use the town as a starting point. It’s up to you. These Elves can be very tricky, so ask some friends for help and play multiplayer! Hope you enjoy and try not to die too many times.
title: The Drow

description:
Author: StarBlock

Which side are you on? Pillager or Hero? The pillagers are ready to destroy the village and Hero will have to avoid this. Each player chooses his side and goes to fight – play with friends! How to play ? You will have 4 lives, kill all players of the opposing team to win the game. If you die 4 times, you will lose – Play with up to 6 friends – Do not cheat on the map
title: Pillager VS Hero

description:
Author: CatAstrophe7777

This is a parkour map which is perfect for anyone who want to practice their parkour skills. There are 10 different levels which all vary in difficulty as well as a donus level in the end with some increased difficulty. Every level is possible to complete even if it for some of you might not seem possible at first. The area where you'll be doing the parkour looks to be in a giant house.
title: Parkour Paradise: Giant House

description:
Author: thedanyfazbear

A map for two players and for one. the game will be much more fun if played with friends Game based on the HASBRO GAMING CONNECT 4 board game. The map simulates the original game with colors and landscapes. It has an easy difficulty BOT to practice or play alone. To start the game you must stop at the colors (Red and Yellow) each. Press the buttons to place your color chip when it’s your turn A map for two players and for one. the game will be much more fun if played with friends Game based on the HASBRO GAMING CONNECT 4 board game. The map simulates the original game with colors and landscapes. It has an easy difficulty BOT to practice or play alone. To start the game you must stop at the colors (Red and Yellow) each. Press the buttons to place your color chip when it’s your turn
title: CONNECT 4

description:
Author: ModzCraft101

TNT Wars is a type of multiplayer player vs. player minigame where you need to build TNT cannons to take down the other team. To win you either have to kill all of the opposite team members or destroy their base and knock them off the sky island. It’s a quite time-consuming challenge but nonetheless very fun! To play this map you will need at least two players but preferably more as it’s a rather big map, at least just for two players. Split up in two teams and go to one island each. Read the signs in the lobby to find the coordinates you must teleport to in order to start the game.
title: Medieval TNT Wars

description:
Author: TeamBOB123

This is a custom terrain which has been built to be used as a survival world. You'll spawn on a medium sized island and surrounding the main island are a couple of other small islands. There are no structures on the islands so you will need to build everything from scratch. There are no set objectives or quests so you will have to make them up as you go.
title: Desolation

description:
Author: The End TNT Wars

TNT Wars is a minigame where you need to construct TNT cannons which you then have to use to destroy the other team’s base. You will be split up on two separate islands which are divided by a huge wall. It’s a really fun type of minigame which I highly recommend to play with at least a couple of other players. Teamwork is essential here so make sure to communicate with the other team members! This map requires at least two players but if you are more then it will most likely be much more fun. Split up in two teams and teleport to the coordinates which can be found on a sign in the map.
title: The End TNT Wars

description:
Author: ROADDADDY

Somehow you have been teleported to a futuristic looking room!

Complete all of the puzzles to make it out alive!
title: Escape The Future Puzzle Game

description:
Author: RyanMinecraft71

This city has been in the works for about three years now, but probably not in constant development seeing as it’s a fairly small city. It’s a modern city including several skyscrapers and a few other structures. The architecture looks similar to that of the architecture used in big cities like New York or Chicago. All in all, it’s a pretty cool place to explore.
title: RyanMinecraft71 City

description:
Author: The Obsidian Gemstone

To survive this map there is just one thing you have to remember and that is to Keep Jumping! To get from start to finish you need to jump on pressure plates. Once you’ve stood on a pressure plate it will make the block beneath it disappear. This means you’ve always gotta keep moving. It’s a perfect map for anyone who’s up for a hard and intense challenge.
title: KeepJumping

description:
Author: LuisDaWeaboo69

This house is just a nice and simple house!
title: The Fantastic House!

description:
Author: PointySalt

This is a remake of a very popular map Ways to die in minecraft where you have to find a way to kill your character in order to complete the level.
title: 10 Ways to Die in Minecraft

description:
Author: HongyiMC

This map is really useful if you’re a group of friends and want a nice and simple way to practice your PvP skills. It has a fully automatic kits system which lets you select a class before entering into the arena. Everything about this map has been designed to provide a smooth and fun experience. Once you’ve entered the game it won’t take more than a minute to get started fighting.
title: FFA – Free For All PvP

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Parkour Pounce is a quick and intense parkour map which is recommended for up to four players. It’s basically a game where you’ll compete against friends in differently randomized parkour courses. There is also a big scoreboard with a counter displaying the current scores. It’s a good map to play with friends and also useful for improving your own parkour skills.
title: SG Parkour Pounce

description:
Author: minecraftstyler777

Elytra maps are some of the most popular maps right now. Elytra wings is an entire new item as of version 0.17.0 of Minecraft Pocket Edition (still limited to just beta users though). We have reviewed a few other elytra maps recently and I have to say that this one tops the chart. Besides some really cool levels it’s also obvious that it has been thoroughly tested before being released as I experienced no troubles whatsoever flying it through.
title: Elytra MStyler777

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

Do you want to be a pirate? Get in the mood with my new map! No, it doesn’t come with a pirate ship, or real pirates, but the custom terrain is great if you want to build upon it.
title: The Pirate’s Paradise

description:
Author: raid-games

Raid royal 2 is a 3-8 player battle royal map, unlike the first one this one has randomized chest, it also has a bigger and more interesting map! Every month the map will be updated to have new locations and features to play with.

How to play
1.) press the ready up button

2.) when everyone is ready press start

3.) loot up and fight

4.) when there is only one person left on the map press the end game button

5.) repeat


Locations
There are 8 locations on the map and they are forest, nether, mushroom, jungle, end island, crater, temple, and mountain. Each location has it own set of chest that it can use, what I mean is the forest and mountain will never have the same chest in them.
title: Raid Royal 2

description:
Author: KCMDcraft

It is a Rubix cube in minecraft made with command block no addon. It has more than 900 command block. All commands are hand written.
title: Rubix Cube

description:
Author: KamTheBamm

This creation includes a small neighborhood, a school, a theater and some other buildings. It’s a neat little map to use for role plays or you could try to expand the area with more buildings and maybe turn it into an entire city. Hopefully some of you will find good use for the map whatever you choose to do with it. It’s built in a flat world and as a result you’re kind of limited in terms of exploration.
title: School and Neighborhood

description:
Author: DingDong61

This is an experimental version of a Tardis which can go to 28 different destinations. The interior rooms include the Destination Databanks, Zero Room (removes effects, restores health and regenerates health), Cloister, Engine Room and a bunch of other places. You can return to the normal world at any point simply by leaving the Tardis. If you consider yourself a Whovian (also known as a Doctor Who fan) then it's really a must-play!
title: Tardis Prototype

description:
Author: Qwertycyz123

Egaland is a modern city built in Minecraft. The structures in the city mostly consist of skyscrapers and other large housing objects. It’s a very colorful city with a great variety of colors and there style of the structures are also varying which makes it a very interesting city to explore. Parts of the city are still a work in progress but so are most modern cities in the real world so that makes sense.
title: Egaland

description:
Author: Scuppy12

This map consists of several different minigames combined in one single map. It is best suited for Realms or for local multiplayer as most games are for two players or more. By playing this map you will be able to enjoy PvP games, parkour, quizzes, Bedwars, Speedrun, Drop and Jump, Total Wipeout and much more. The world also comes with a custom texture pack which makes it an even more fun world to experience!
title: Superland 2.0 Realm

description:
Author: diecies

This is Diecies first major build in the Pocket / Bedrock Edition Community over a year ago. The build started on December, 2016 and it was finished in the beginning of January, 2018. Most of the stadium was built solely by Diecies but the rest of the helpers are mentioned in the map. It is close to a replicate of Gillette Stadium in real life but it also has its own quirks and uniqueness to it.
title: New England Patriots Stadium

description:
Author: DØCTØR JØKER

This map is basically a simple box where you will find too many challenges, such as parkours, trying to survive from hostile mobs you can even challenge your friend in a PvP

how to play?
In this map you will start in a room where you can equip yourself, the grace of this map is to destroy all the spawning mobs that you find and open all the chests of the death box
title: DEAD BOX

description:
Author: MattH44

Recently an evil villager decided to overthrow your kingdom and proclaim himself as king. This obviously comes as bitter news and it’s up to you to take back what was once yours and reinstate yourself as king. It’s a fun map where you need to search for clues to find the tools you’ll need to save the kingdom.
title: Castle Adventure

description:
Author: mcmcpe1234

DeathRun is a game where your fate on winning depends on how good you are at avoiding obstacles and traps. This is a multiplayer minigame where some of you will be runners and others will be the killers. It’s an extremely intense game and especially for the runners who are constantly threatened by different traps.
title: DeathRun: The Timer Update

description:
Author: M7MoGameR

This map features an amazingly luxurious mansion built on the hillside of a big mountain. The mansion interior has an amazing level of detail which makes it very fun and interesting to explore. $24 million will seem like a bargain after you’ve started to realize the awesomeness of the estate. You also don’t have to feel confined to just the mansion. At any time you can step outside the estate and enter the wild and beautiful custom terrain forest.
title: $24M Hillside Mansion

description:
Author: Daroid7

There was a village. Living in peace, but suddenly. A dark wizard controls the village to take their souls and riches. But then, heroes from west shows up to save the village. And that heroes are You… Will you save us?
title: The Misty Dungeon

description:
By LittleDro11

The Queen Mary was one of the largest ocean liners to ever be built. She was built by the Cunard-White Star line in 1936 and served as both a troop ship during WWII and a passenger ship until 1967 when she retired. The Queen Mary is permanently moored on Long Beach and is currently a museum ship/floating hotel.

This is my version of the RMS Queen Mary (1936) at 1:1 scale. The original ship is 310.7 m in length this build is 311 blocks in length. It may not be 100% accurate but it's as close as I could get it with Minecraft blocks.
title: RMS Queen Mary

description:
Author: FantasticToast

Try to survive on this island
title: The Original Survival Island Series

description:
Author: Craftminer07

Egypt Survival is a survival map consisting of several different locations which have been built in a flat world. Currently there are 6 different locations you can visit and they include Qattara Depression, Great Sand Sea, Siwa, Giza, The Forbidden Zone and The End. Explore the tombs, passageways, towers and pyramids and try to complete the different quests listed further down on this page.
title: Egypt Surviva

description:
Author: Baruch Velasco Avila

Hello player, In this world you will embark on an epic adventure in a dungeon, full of all kinds of challenges, enemies and traps. Passing is not only finding the end of the maze, but you must find the 12 discs around the dungeon, to be able to face a horde of villains and save the planet, so take your things and get ready traveler, the adventure is about to end. Start.
title: The Dungeon Part 1

description:
Author: thecaramelkingdomm

This is the second part of GetDown!

It includes:

more Maps
new Lobby
new Commands
new traps
more fun
more Easter eggs
a secret Map!
a Map for UnspeakablePlays
Have fun with playing our Map!

(Recommended for 1-5 players.).
title: GetDown2

description:
Author: SEMagical

Welcome to MagicCraft Skyblock, the first ever Skyblock world that is a functioning realm type Skyblock run by commands and custom trades! Have you ever wanted to play a Skyblock with tons of other players on Pocket Edition and enjoy playing with your best friends inside of your faction then this is the world for you!
title: MagicCraft Skyblock 1

description:
Author: BlackZero

This map is a type of minigame where you have to run and jump across a field of mines. The mines are in fact pressure plates which trigger a TNT block if stepped on. Each level looks a little bit different and we recommend that you carefully plan your route before starting as you can never stop and think during a level.
title: Black TNT Run

description:
Author: darksidestudios

One of Minecraft’s most popular Minigame can now be yours! We have made it as close to the original as possible. BedWars in Minecraft bedrock edition! Features: This map contains lots of possibilities and can promise a very fun time playing it! All of the features are listed below: – Custom villager trades! – Custom generators. – 4 Teams, randomly picked! – Support for an endless amount of players(above 2).
title: BedWars

description:
Author: JustJee

Sumo Champions is as it says “sumo” but with a TWIST! You see its a tournament like game, it works so 4 players start off in the tournament and you get matched with someone random and depending on whether you lose or not you move on or not and the winner is crowned as the “SUMO CHAMPION!”
title: Sumo Champions (4 player)

description:
Author: JrPancakesStyl
