Bomberman is a classic arcade game where you blow up walls to access rooms to blow up your opponents. In this minecraft map, play with up to 4 players. There’s even a ceremony at the end! All rules are in the map! Happy minecrafting!
title: Bomberman

description:
Author: NobleCrate mc

How does it work you ask? You have to protect your spawn from enemies while you try to break theirs. Collect resources, trade with villagers and upgrade your team. Almost like bedwars. You can play with 2 to 8 players. Map repairs automatically.
title: Spawn Wars Monster Terror

description:
Author: FVDisco

Sonic the Hedgehog is a speed-based platform game. This is a parkour map for Minecraft Pocket Edition which uses a similar type of level design and it also uses command blocks to give the players different effects such as speed and jump boosts. It's a pretty fun map to play, and especially if you got some friends which you can compete against.
title: Sonic the Hedgehog

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Come and explore a tropical island surrounded by vast seas in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. With mountainous topography, along with a lake, lagoons, and beaches, this island is perfect for building. Animal/mob spawning occurs randomly across the map.

This custom terrain map will form the base of our future adventure map called Polynesian Getaway.
title: Polynesian Island

description:
Author: umerkk164

This map is based on a real life story taking place in the year of 1976 in South Africa. As a part of a freedom fighting group the regime has decided to label you as a terrorist and put you in prison. 200 command blocks have been used to build this adventure and it's expected to last somewhere around 15-20 minutes. The features include a fully working key mechanism, a door locking system and plenty of other neat features.
title: The Tale of Steve: Escape

description:
Author: MasterCraftIndo

Welcome to minecraft mini game "Find The Buttons"! Tasks: Find the buttons in 10 different map themes! Nether, Mesa, Village, Forest, Beach and much more! And also, there are a secret button to find! Can you find it? If you find it, then you're so lucky! Here's is the secret room if you click the secret button:
title: Find The Buttons Classic

description:
Author: MattH44

This map lets you go through 11 challenging levels which are each based on different biomes in Minecraft. In each level you will be tasked with the objective to find a hidden button. You'll most likely be quite surprised by how difficult certain levels are even though they aren't especially big. You can either play this alone in single player mode or in multiplayer.
title: Find The Button: Biome Edition

description:
Author: HeroBGamingHQ

You've been kidnapped by an evil scientist and you are forced to through a series of tests to prove yourself worthy. It's unclear why you were chosen in the first place, but one thing is for certain and that is that you have to escape your captivity. This is an adventure map which should take somewhere around 20 minutes to complete. It uses redstone and command blocks to provide a seamless gameplay experience.
title: The Experiment 1

description:
Author: the-sonic-master

The third and final instalment of the Evil Parkour series is here, as featured by Unspeakable. Evil Parkour returns with one extended level and only 6 checkpoints – will you make it to the end, or burn to a crisp in the choppy lava lying below? Rules Do not cheat. Only noobs cheat. The world options are locked to give you the best possible gameplay experience! Don’t unlock or change them. It’s advised you stay singleplayer. It has not been tested in multiplayer and you may experience issues.
title: Evil Parkour III

description:
Author: Haaky

Play this map if you want a fun way to count down the days to Christmas. Every day you can open a new door to play a new type of minigame. Continue this process for the remaining days until Christmas Eve. This is one of the best Christmas maps you can play for Minecraft Pocket Edition. Even though it’s tempting to go through all levels at once we do recommend that you wait until the next day to continue on a new level!
title: Minecraft Advent

description:
Author: Gona, Daniel Martinez

This map lets you explore Jurassic World in Minecraft Pocket Edition. At the same time it is an incredibly detailed map it's also amazingly huge. The park includes the Visitor Center, a big hotel, 18 different dinosaur types and much more. It's really a must-play for anyone who loves Minecraft and dinosaurs!
title: Jurassic Craft World

description:
Author: skygames

MS Regina Mystery is the amazing ship built by none other than the awesome Regina Cruise Line! The ship is very large and is a beautiful cruise ship for… cruising?!
title: MS Regina Majesty

description:
Author: zucth

The [VISAGE] was original a horror game by Sadsquare studio, the map has nothing to do with the story and area is only in chapter 1, you can play with your friends! AI as the ghost and Player as the ghost!

This map is based on Visage (by SadSquare Studio) which is a first-person psychological horror game. Your objective in the map is to find the truth, find an item and if necessary hide from Lucy and her insidious friend! In this map there is no story and the game is designed for two players. One of you will play as Lucy and the other one will play as a survivor. Find out who will be the last survivor!
title: VISAGE

description:
Author: Tyler707 Proarcher

This is a huge custom terrain suitable for survival gameplay or other types of adventures. It includes several different biomes with custom trees, mountains and more. There’s a huge cavern somewhere under spawn so be careful when you start digging. If you are playing the map on a low-end device then make sure to turn down the render distance.
title: Survival Delight

description:
Author: BendyCraftzOfficial

This is a Multi-Chapter story-based game, mainly based off the events that happened at Joey Drew Studios all those years past.
title: BATIM: The Second Chapter

description:
Author: DelisoJan

The Forbidden Cave is the third part in a series of adventure maps called Simple. This time you will go on a great journey to fight an ancient dragon and hopefully get some treasures by doing so. There are plenty of challenges along the way and the map is really well built in its entirety and this makes it both fun to play and a marvel to explore.
title: Simple 3: Forbidden Cave

description:
Author: cormacchick

Welcome to Turtle Isle! This is a place for all things turtles. If you love the Minecraft Turtle, you will love this island. This is a build by the YouTuber, CormacChick
title: CC: Turtle Isle!

description:
Author: agentcpu0

This is the lab which AgentCPU, also known as Zer0 Studioz, does his Minecraft showcases. There are four different sections of the lab. The main lab includes test tubes for mobs and an area specifically designated to show off items and crafting recipes. Upstairs there is a multipurpose testing room which can be used for practically anything. There is also an obsidian chamber which can be used for testing of explosives and weapons. The spaces have been built and secured primarily for showcasing add-ons.
title: Zer0’s Lab

description:
Author: DIAUB

Where the ocean’s surface is too far to reach- and the sea floor is absent- a challenge is presented. There are limited resources and nothing but water as far as the eye can see. AquaBlock tests your ability to survive beneath the deep. If you thought SkyBlock was difficult, try doing it while holding your breath.

The environment is unforgiving. There are only three small, submerged islands. There’s no Nether, no bedrock layer, the surface is too far to reach and, most importantly, there’s no air. But the rules are simple…

Rules:
1. Play on easy, normal or hard difficulty.
2. Do not use cheats.
3. Do not leave the ocean biome.

The goal of AquaBlock is to complete a list of challenges. The challenges not only provide objective, but also guidance for survival. The list is divided into categories of increasing difficulty. It is easiest to complete the categories in order, but the player can take any path they choose or ignore the challenges all together.
title: AquaBlock v1.0

description:
Author: matpatcat

Auxiliary is the long away sequel to Genisys which by the way is another highly recommended map to those of you who haven't played it already. The story picks up where it was last left off and takes you on a new adventure where you attempt to escape the genius mind of an artificial super intelligence called IRIS.
title: Auxiliary

description:
Author: PLAYGAMES

PG MagicPrison is a map based on the famous minecraft servers called prison or rankup, where your main goal is to mine to get better items and rank up, or in our case level, to become the best.

This map contains:

Mine: common Mine.
PvP Mine: mine with active combat and bedrock and obsidian mine.
PvP Arena: area where combat is allowed.
Shop: serves to buy better items.
Surprise Box: win by leveling up.
Events: happen every 10 minutes.
Level system: goes from 0 to 20, making it harder to go from level to level.
title: PG MagicPrison

description:
Author: JJJ_

A runner vs the Trap maker. Who will you be? Beat the course within the time while the Trap maker is making your journey to the end more challenging. Here is a preview on the map traps!
title: Coloured Deathrun

description:
Author: EnchantedHero

Halloween is closing in and the people of a village have prepared for this festivity for months. Rumours have passed through the village that an evil witch has set some plans in motion which might ruin it all. Now it’s up to you to stop this evil witch and save Halloween once and for all. But you’ve got to be careful because the witch has set up many traps along the way and some of them can cost your life.
title: Halloween’s Adventure

description:
Author: EVSH777

It was inspired by the small-town culture in North America.

The Belladonna Estate
A perfect crime
A drug lab
The Bloomingdale Preparatory College
The Northside Mafia meeting ground
Shadow Point Forest
title: Project Bloomingdale

description:
Author: leewei1702

Random Parkour is a very fun and challenging parkour mode which includes some very random gameplay modes. You are able to select a different mode by accessing the “Modes” room in the game lobby. The modes include normal, flying cow, raining arrows and several others. The level always look the same, but the environment will be completely different for each mode. It works for both single player and multiplayer gameplay.
title: Random Parkour

description:
Author: SLAMIKIO2215

This is a city based on Russian cities. It is kind of like a fantasy map, but still inspired by reality. The map has two towns and one city, four small districts and a subway. Sorry, that it’s quite small as it is currently, but I will continue to develop them.
title: Nagatinsk City

description:
Author: megamixer406

Welcome to Gamemodecraft. A city that is nearly 5 years in the making. Each building with its on personality and purpose, you’ll find something new everywhere you look. Running Vladu11’s Vanilla Vehicles Addon V3, you’ll get to drive on the iconic quartz roads. All the buildings have interiors and the houses are used by actual players.
title: Gamemodecraft

description:
By ThenoobBuilder

after 1 year of hard work, Introducing New Clark City V3 map for bedrock edition..if you are looking for a city map for role playing well clark city is for you
title: New Clark City V3 - Downtown Expansion

description:
Author: gab_the_crafter

Have you ever dream on living in a cliff side house with fully redstone and command block house? We’ll look no further this house is full of command block and redstone creations and working car This small house contain a Working Car, Working Garage Door, Secret Piston Door, Working Camera and a lot more to discover You can play in survival mode and used this Modern house as your own home
title: Smart Modern Mansion

description:
Author: Master Skin

Story: You are a wizard that returned after a long journey. The next day you hear a loud boom. It’s a guy called Herbert. You and Herbert go on a adventure to find a book called The book of spells.
title: The Legend of Book of Spells

description:
Author: The Obsidian Gemstone, Cheete

This is the second map in a map series called The Darkest Halls. The only thing you know is that you've been captured by СX' and somehow need to find a way out of his rooms of torture. The map includes several scares and creepy sounds and hopefully that's enough to send a shiver down your spine every once in a while. Beware, it's a very spooky map!
title: The Darkest Halls 2

description:
Author: SkyGames

This map was originally created for Java Edition, but it has now (by request of the original author) been recreated in Bedrock Edition. Pocket Expansion is basically a new survival gamemode where you must survive in the sky in an ever-expanding environment.
title: SG Pocket Expansion

description:
Author: JPlaysPE

This map is really useful if you want to showcase a texture pack since it is supposed to include all of the blocks which exist in Minecraft Pocket Edition. A great thing about this particular map is that the blocks haven’t just been lined up in row but they have instead been used to create cool structures. You don’t necessarily have to showcase something to use this map. Maybe you just want a quick and easy way to test different texture packs.
title: Texture Pack Review Map

description:
Author: Caiobrz, Reddit

This is a great world which you can use for your next survival adventure in case you don't want to start off entirely from scratch. It features a large main building which you can use as your home and just a little further away there is a small village. The village includes everything from a massive mining system to a really nice church.
title: Caiobrz Survival World

description:
Author: the-sonic-master

The sequel to the map which Unspeakable played is finally here! Let’s see how he manages this one – as the other one was “the easiest parkour map ever”. Before playing, be warned – this is not for beginners, or even intermediate players. Only experts of parkour will be able to even pass the first level, let alone the six levels there are in total. Do you think you have what it takes? Try the map and test out your skills!

Inspiration
Yes, we watched the video like everyone else, and we were indeed shocked to find out how easy it was. Unspeakable requested a sequel, and we’ve made it! It was extremely useful to receive this constructive criticism from such a parkour professional.

Warning
As mentioned above, most people don’t even make it past the first level. If you think this map is not for you, why not try Evil Parkour 1 first?

Rules
Do not change the world settings or use commands!
If you can’t do a level, just take a break and come back later. The key to winning is having a clear mind.
Play in singleplayer or multiplayer (however buttons in-game apply to all users).
Play Evil Parkour 1 first! Link below!
title: Evil Parkour 2

description:
Author: Jhomes

Rock-paper-scissors is a simple game which usually requires just two hands. But since your hands in Minecraft don't offer the same flexibility as in real life some things, such as rock-paper-scissors gets impossible to play. But don't worry! Here is a redstone solution which lets you play the game in Minecraft as well.
title: Rock-Paper-Scissors

description:
Author: XFighterPlayZx

If you like capturing flag theme… Then this is FOR YOU! It is also called Outpost. Standing in the outpost will give you reward but you need to capture it for 20 seconds! Invite your friends in this map for fun!
title: Outpost

description:
Author: XProfessorX

This is an ocean themed redstone house located on an island village with multiple custom houses surrounding it. The house is packed with 70+ redstone machines. It’s very well designed with the average player in mind, meaning it’s small enough to be easy to memorize, but big enough to make it fun to explore. Enjoy!
title: Oceanic Redstone

description:
Author: tgc_yt

Mega Skyblock is a little bit different from the ordinary skyblock survival challenge as it includes 23 different islands (instead of just one) which the player is required to go out and explore in order to complete the map. Each island is supposed to symbolize a biome or a dimension and will provide you with new materials you can use to survive.
title: Mega Skyblock

description:
Author: ZzeuzZ23

ShulkerWars is a skywars PvP map build design is inspired by the End (which is another dimension in Minecraft) and on shulkers. There are four different teams and each one will start out on a separate sky island. You’ll then have to craft blocks and items to reach the other islands where better items can be found. The ultimate goal is to be the last team standing.
title: ShulkerWars

description:
Author: Tyler707Proarcher

This map includes several custom terrains which include everything from a mushroom desert to a huge oak forest. It’s a great little world to explore if you want to set out on a new adventure. However, there’s one disadvantage and that’s the fact that if you go too far out you will get to a huge waterfall and everything after that is flat land. Other than that it’s pretty cool.
title: Advanced Island

description:
Author: Cre8 Studio

Do you like Pakour? then you will love this map, you will have to do Parkour to complete the levels, and if you make a mistake you will fall into the void and lose.
title: The Void Parkour

description:
By legendaryIV25

Project God Sector is a map for those that want something more special to play on, Featuring massive custom trees with a splash of fantasy elements to seal the deal in immersion in this custom terrain map for all to enjoy!

Welcome to Project God Sector, a survival world 3k by 3k meant to immerse you in a fantasy setting. Built with the foundation to support builders and content creators for their own content and journey to start.

It's colourful world brightness up anybody's day and with massive flowers surrounded my thorns and gigantic tress with stunning custom terrain for all to love and enjoy,
title: Project God Sector (3k by 3k)

description:
Author: skygames

This luxurious home is large enough for 4 players to have their own room, plus you can have friends over, and swim in the backyard pool, or watch TV in the huge living room.
title: Angle – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: MattH44

Find The Items is a new minigame not that different from Find The Button. Each level includes a structure which normally relate to some type of biome in Minecraft. However, in this minigame you will need to search through the structure (and the surrounding area) to find items. The items are hidden in normal chests and shulker chests and are basically keys for accessing the next level.
title: Find The Items: Generated Structures

description:
Author: tpops2017

UKS is a city built in a flat world. It includes a great variety of modern houses and many different kinds of structures. In one end of the city there is even a farm with a barn and horses and so on. The entire city is populated by villagers and iron golems and that definitely makes the city seem populated and not as dead as other cities. Since there are so many different creations it's a useful city to explore in case you need some building inspiration.
title: UKS City

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

This map uses a ton of command blocks which are used to create a house from scratch automatically. Different block animations and vanilla sounds are used to create this house. The whole house takes about 2 minutes to complete. After completion, it can be dismantled. Dismantling of the house takes about 6 seconds to complete.
title: Self Building House

description:
Author: Cheete

VerseCrafter: The Beginning is the first map in a series of multiple maps to come. It's a quite fun map with multiple levels and a story which goes with it. The story goes as following. You've lost your memory and to get it back you need to complete 7 different stages to reach the hall of memories.
title: VerseCrafter: The Beginning

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Zombies 2 is a PvE sequel of SG Zombies. In this map we have added guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack plus re-wrote the whole code so there is way less lag. It has also been created on an entire new map with 6 different zones and loads of gates to unlock. There are more cool features and the waves are also a whole lot harder!
title: SG Zombies 2

description:
<p>Author: JASUCARD <p>

Find the button in 8 different Fortnite locations. Levels include: Moisty Mire, Tilted Towers, Wailing Woods, Kevin (the cube), Meteor, Pleasant Park, Loot Lake, and Dusty Depot. Can you find every button?
title: Find the Button: Fortnite Edition

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is a minigame based on the popular game called tag. There’s a slight difference though and that is the fact that it involves TNT. But besides that, it’s pretty much the same. You run around inside an arena. If you’re a tagger then you try to tag other players to become the runner and so on. The SkyGames team loves TNT so you can expect more TNT minigames in the future!
title: SG TNT Tag

description:
Author: john4987

Mine York City is one of the oldest cities for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. The city is based off of New York City and include many of the famous landmarks (with a Minecraft twist) such as Ender Island (Staten Island), Minehatten (Manhattan) and Creeper of Minecraft (Statue of Liberty). If you enjoy the excitement of exploring then Mine York City is a must go for you to visit!
title: Mine York City

description:
Author: RealTnTMaster, CRAFTER-98

The Living Dead (most likely inspired by The Walking Dead) is an adventure map using an addon which helps create a more seamless experience in a post-apocalyptic world of zombies. The antidote for this horrible disease is somewhere in the city. It’s up to you to go and retrieve it in order to help save the world from this madness.
title: The Living Dead (Addon)

description:
Author: Emzy255

This map was created a little over two years ago for the Xbox Edition for Minecraft. It's a hide-and-seek map taking place inside the SpongeBob movie. You'll start out at a movie theater and from there you can enter a boxed-in world which features some of the SpongeBob characters. This type of minigame is best suitable for multiplayer gameplay.
title: SpongeBob The Movie

description: The Site of the first SCP-682 breach needs some cleaning up! RIP AND TEAR hordes of Growths with DOOM inspired gameplay mechanics! The Super Growth Nest Classic Gamemode features a wave-based arena. Unlock the Praetereo (Super Shotgun) and the Praedo (Chaingun)! If you're a fan of fast-paced weapon switching destruction, this is the map for you! Works in multiplayer!   Introduction - Operation Praetereo The O5s have given you a (very) simple task - Neutralize SCP-682 Enter Site-68, either alone or with friends, to complete your mission. Fight with your arsenal of weapons, each with unique mechanics and utilize them well in order to stand a chance in completing your mission.  You can keep re-playing Missions to gain more Experience Levels, which you can use to Upgrade / Unlock equipment.  This map has multiplayer support. Try playing with 30 players, it should still work fine. It's more fun to play with friends than on your own, but you're still welcomed to do solo if you're willing to take up the challenge!  This map has 6 gamemodes  Operation Praetereo - The Classic, Neutralize SCP-682! Free For All (FFA) - Fight your friends to the death! Buff Totem - Same as Operation Praetereo, except there's a Buff Totem which makes enemies stronger and faster Ultra Nightmare - Same as Operation Praetereo, except SCP-682 has a bazillion health, cannot be stunned, always buffed & takes 1/2 damage. Super Growth Nest - Classic - Fight a series of 10 waves! Epic DOOM inspired combat. Beating certain waves unlocked powerful weapons! Super Growth Nest - Endless - Fight an endless stream of Growths until you're bored or until you die. Super Growth Nest - Devastation - Fight 1 Insanely Difficult Wave! Only for the most skilled players
title: THE SUPER GROWTH NEST

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Questful is a fun adventure for anyone who enjoy questing. You’ll start out in one part of these vast lands and from there you will go on a great journey to complete a series of quests. Most quests relate to obtaining specific items and then bring them to other characters in the adventure. Even though the full version is exclusively distributed to the Chinese Minecraft platform, there is still a great deal of content to be experienced in this demo.
title: SG Questful

description:
By Voxed Studio

1000x1000 | The Infernal Rift is a custom terrain map created made for you to use in your projects however you like, as long as you credit Akamiro. The map has mountainous areas around it with trees and in the middle a huge field of lava and magma, like a volcano.
title: 1000x1000 | Custom Map | The Infernal Rift

description:
Author: MattH44

This minigame brings soccer to Minecraft by transforming pigs into soccer balls. The map design is fairly simple as it’s built in a flat world, but the game mechanics are both fun and engaging. There are two different teams (red vs blue) and each team’s objective is to kick (or rather hit) the soccer ball into the other team’s goal. Have fun!
title: Soccer Game

description:
Author: Gatharian

The Neighborhood is one of the largest suburban neighborhoods in Minecraft Pocket Edition. There are more than 60 realistic houses and other structures. All of the homes have fully landscaped front and backyards, but there's a downside and that's the fact they don't have any interiors. But as a whole it's an amazing and very inspiring map to play!
title: The Neighborhood

description:
By BlackPrince7185

The RMS Titanic was largest and most luxurious ocean liner to ever be built. She was built by the White Star line from 1909 to 1912. In the spring of that year, Titanic steamed off on her maiden voyage which was never completed. On April 15, Titanic struck an iceberg and sunk. From that night, the ship was not seen until 1985, when the wreck was discovered.The SS Nomadic was built in 1909 to transport mail and passengers to and from Titanic and her sister ship, Olympic. Today Nomadic stands alone as the last ship build by the White Star Line.

This is my version of the RMS Titanic (1912) and transport SS Nomadic (1911) at 1:1 scale. The original ship is 269.1 m in length this build is 269 blocks in length. This build may not be 100% accurate and it may lack a few details, but it is as close as I could get it with Minecraft blocks. Hope you enjoy, Thank you!
title: RMS Titanic

description:
Author: FooxYT

RUN!! A zombie apocalypse has started, many areas are being invaded and taken over of by the waves of infected. Explore this map I made of a rundown zombie apocalyptic outpost, the zombies have invaded it, breaching the lower basement and have massacred all the soldiers, scientist and refugees. Explore this outpost for yourself! It includes a LAVA DOOR, BUNK BED ROOMS, BASEMENT, TUNNEL SYSTEMS, 4 WATCH TOWERS , good luck and don't get eaten!
title: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Outpost

description:
Author: Edoudou14

Radiator Springs is a small town situated in a mesa biome and it was originally featured in the movie Cars which was produced by Pixar back in 2006. A few years later it was recreated in Minecraft for PC and that map has now been ported (to some extent) to Pocket Edition. It's not completely bug free, but it's perfectly playable and a must-play for anyone who watched the movie.
title: Cars Land

description:
Author: megastriker

This is an elytra map with creations inspired by the Brazilian Carnival. Do you feel like celebrating? Then join the festivities in Minecraft (preferably with other players) and play this map. There are four levels included in the map and each level consists of enough challenges to make them both exciting and enjoyable to play.
title: ElytraElite: Carnival

description:
Author: studofenfield

This map is good for multiplayer use if you want to compete against friends in different challenges. Currently there is a good mix of 9 different minigames and most of them can be played an infinite amount of times (as long you refill certain dropper blocks). The map is recommended for somewhere around 2-6 players.
title: Minigames II

description:
Author: SCERRI

This map is a Dropper. As the name implies, it consists of jumping from a high point, and trying to dodge obstacles in the middle without dying, to try to land and go to the next level. Do you like to throw yourself? Download the map now!
title: Dropper Random

description:
Author: BEMZ

Welcome to Waves of Chaos! This map is a PvE map that is actually infinite. That’s right! As long as everyone doesn’t die, the game continues! If everyone dies however, the game is over.
title: {PVE} Waves Of Chaos

description:
Author: DelisoJan

You’ve traveled to Davao Island which is an old forgotten island somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean. The reason why you went there is because you are looking for some valuable gems which appararently can be found somewhere on the island. Anyone who made it this far never made it back home so you are a little bit worried of what’s next to come. The map is set in an open world environment which means you can basically go anywhere you want (with some limitations), discover secrets and complete side quests.
title: Simple 2: Lost Temple

description:
Author: ElectroCreeper

Serenity Independence is one of the largest and most detailed cruise ships ever created for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. The size dimensions are as following: 330 blocks long, 45 blocks wide and 15 decks tall. All rooms have complete interiors on the inside and on the very top of the ship you’ll find water slides and other structures for entertainment. Go on a cruise in Minecraft!
title: Serenity Independence

description:
Author: Allan1905

This map is made for anyone who consider themselves a true Minecraft geek and don't want to miss out on even the most trivial things about the game. Minecraft PE is very similar to the original PC game but there are still things which are different, and in most cases for the better. If you want to learn more about the differences then make sure to play this map!
title: All PE Exclusive Features

description:
Author: PMNguyen

This is a singleplayer-adventure horror map which remake from a Roblox Horror game called “They Lurks” made by Terribleblox, A sequel from It Lurks. If you haven't play the previous story, please go check It Lurks before playing this sequel.
title: They Lurks

description:
Author: Assassiner 003

This is a great creation to use in case you want an easy way to hide your house from possible intruders while you are out fighting monsters or down in the mines looking for diamonds. You don't need to be a technical genius to do it either since all you'll need to do is to press two different buttons to build or collapse the house.
title: Self-Building Command Block Mansion

description:
Author: LC Studios

There are various reasons, such as not having a PC or just wanting to do SCP:CB with Minecraft.
title: SCP:CB LC Edition

description:
Author: MAUKATYT

Starosia Life is a city in which we can really play RP ( Like In Real Life ) thanks to its map and its different ways of making money .
This map is inspired by the celebrity game Garry’s mod.

This map takes us 2 months to do all the mechanics, we hope you enjoy the map !

Your money replaces the XP bar

You can choose a job from these list:

-Police officer

-Gangster

-Fast Food

-Seller

-Civil

Each profession has its own rights and must respect them and also its own items.

Example :

The policeman has the handcuffs ( To put near someone to lock him in prison for 1 minute) and his gun

When we work at the fast-food or as a seller
we need to drop the items that we earn in the order to craft the items that you want and sell it

There is also a working bank :
For example, The XP is like a bank account, you can withdraw your money and deposit it.
Click on any withdraw button to take the money from your account.

To offer a better gameplay there are also shortcuts that you can find all over the city :
title: Starosia Life City Working RP

description:
<p>Author: ZUCTH <p>
“Mystery Of Vemor” has a part in two teams… Players and Vemor! Game is available for PVP and PVE modes! Short story. Players must gain score without getting capture from Mr.Vemor

Misty’ O Vemor was one of the horror maps experience that I created up for multiplayer gameplay. I recommend you, guy, to play with a friend. In this game, I use a lot of effort to make all the systems come together, so I hope you guys will enjoy it!
title: Misty’O Vemor

description:
Author: the-sonic-master

Explore 10 naturally spawning structures and try to find the hidden button in each of them! Can you beat all 10 levels? You may play in multiplayer – we tested it and it works! nfo Explore 10 naturally spawning structures and try to find the hidden button in each of them! Can you beat all 10 levels? You may play in multiplayer – we tested it and it works! To advance to the next level, you need to push the button found in the previous level. If you are stuck, grab a hint from the Hint Book, but it only helps you, it doesn’t reveal the answers! Rules Don’t change any world settings. Play on peaceful mode (unless you want mobs to spawn in the structures!). Maximum brightness on device and game. FOV: Mobile: 60, Console / PC: 70. No unauthorised resource / behaviour packs – use only the ones provided.
title: Find The Button: Structures

description:
Author: KruCrafter

BeatCrafter is an advanced redstone machine which lets you create your own music within Minecraft. It’s basically a machine/sequencer/controller all-in-one for making all kinds of beats. It’s highly recommended to watch the video tutorial further down on this page to learn more about making your own music.
title: BeatCrafter

description:
Author: ItsMeProHech, MineworksPH

There are lots of different activities taking place in the World of Color. You can do parkour, go out on a small adventure and do a bunch of other things. It’s a really cool map which design is greatly inspired by the World of Color Update for Minecraft. If you are looking to have some fun in Minecraft then give it a try!
title: World of Color

description:
Author: Epic Gaming

This map includes 15 different challenges which include everything from basic parkour to surviving a small chamber packed with zombies. It's most suitable for beginners who are looking to experience a wide range of challenges in one map. You can probably expect somewhere around 15 minutes of gameplay, but it might also be less since it's entirely dependent on your own skill level.
title: Rooms

description:
Author: EYEATOMIC500

This horror map contains jump scares, great use of command blocks, and a story that will send shivers down your spine!

Your wife and daughter have tragically died in a cabin fire a few months ago. Once you start recovering from the event, Megan & Mommy (your wife and daughter) begin to haunt you. You find your self hallucinating and making your way through dark tunnels, sewers, and scary hospitals etc. But what did you do to deserve this? You better find out!
title: Megan

description:
Author: D Flog Flag

Have you ever played Zelda Ocarina Of Time? No?, Well, I will recommend you try this world! It is more than anything a simple concept a little cursed but great or is it not?
title: Temple Of Time

description:
Author: MABSUAREZ9

Welcome to Call Of Craft. where there is a jungle a hospital, graveyard, theme park, city, nether and hundreds of ZOMBIES!!!!! Join the battle with your friends and choose out of up to 9 load-outs from engineer to infantry we have it all on this delightful zombie destroying minigame! You can cowardly sit in a corner, swing in the trees and even fire around the place on a minecart. download this map and join the fight.
title: Call Of Craft

description:
Author: Zucth

The first start of the hardcore series was come from from this tallest building, The SkyLayer Survival or SLS were made up as a series when time pass. There’s two way to play this map! first is to race with friend who will reach the ground first or do it as a team. and the second will be do every achievement in the game and reach at y4 longer than 1 minute…
title: SkyLayer Survival

description:
Author: TheDarkness344

This is a small 4 bit redstone calculator, built so you can see how logic gates and parts of the circuit are built. Using this knowledge you can go out and build your own calculators with designs like this.
title: Redstone Calculator!

description:
Author: MB PROJECTS

Welcome to the new Baldi School, Baldi’s High School Basics! The old one caught fire and you don’t know why, but now there’s a new school with lots of new things! But even though it’s a new school, Baldi’s is still the same. If you make a mistake, Teck, Teck, he’ll take his rule. But get the Notebooks from the 3 Levels, Find Mysterious Rooms, Buy New Items, and Most Importantly: GET OUT OF THIS SCHOOL LIVE! (Map inspired by “Baldi’s Basics Full Game Kickstarter Demo”.
title: Minecraft’s Basics™: The Chapter Two

description:
Author: DelisoJan

This is a multiplayer minigame map where each team will be tasked to build a ship. The ships will later be used in a battle on the sea so it's important that they are well armored and equipped with some TNT cannons. It's a really fun and exciting map to play if you enjoy building and PvP!
title: Simple BattleShip

description:
Author: BENDYTHEDEMON18

Siren head is a minecraft horror map was inspired from the original character made by an artist named Trevor Henderson, If you’ve ever heard of Siren Head then this map is for you

The objective in this map is very simple:

You will be putted into the forest to find out what inside it,

all you need to do is follow the objective and rules
Siren Head ability is disguised he can aproaching you very quickly is you don’t keep moving
Find 6 code around the forest to win
title: Siren Head

description:
Author: MissMegan

Shipwreck Island is suitable for survival gameplay and role plays. A cruise ship is stranded on a deserted island. There’s a small house on the island which works great as a shelter for the first night on the island. But to survive you will really have to start scavenging the ship or look in your surroundings for ways to survive.
title: Shipwreck Island

description:
Author: BEEZEEBOX

*HIDDEN DIAMONDS ADDED TO GAME! – CAN YOU FIND ALL 3?*

You wake up and find yourself trapped in the scary skeleton dungeon!

Can you find the hidden passages and make it out this place alive?!

– Escape your cell

– Get some weapons

– Kill the enemies

– Find the treasure
title: Escape The Skeleton Dungeon PART 2!

description:
Author: TW2ALRoCraft

The YouTuber’s Adventure where you follow A and J in their teachings of becoming a YouTuber. A short and simple map where you venture with A and J by your side to become the greatest video creator.
title: The YouTuber’s Adventure

description:
Author: KruCrafter

Formula Boat is a spin-off of Formula One. Here you won’t be racing with any cars, instead you’ll be using a boat to drive around on the race track. Boats on ice (in Minecraft) can reach incredible speeds while being very difficult to control. It’s a really long and cool racing track set in a futuristic city and it’s really cool to play together with friends.
title: Formula Boat

description:
Author: dingdong61

This is to date one of the most advanced TARDIS creations for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. The TARDIS is fully functional and can be used for traveling to several different planets which exist in the Doctor Who universe. The planets include locations like Skaro, Gallifrey and others. But that’s not all, it also adds 10 new mobs to the game such as the Dalek and the Time Lords!
title: Doctor Who Tardis

description:
Author: Levielatory17

This is a map which includes five complex redstone structures. All of them can definitely be useful in most worlds. It really provides a great showcase for anyone who is interested to learn more about redstone or just want some inspiration.
title: 5 Complex Redstone Creations

description:
Author: OldPapaJoe

This map features a futuristic platform which work great to use as a survival base or for similar purposes. The base includes an underground home, data towers, nuclear reactors and several other technology based facility. It’s one of the biggest bases you’ll find and this means there are also lots of things to explore to it. If you’re looking for a new survival experience then this base definitely has something fresh to offer!
title: Futuristic Platform

description:
Author: Ghost White

Ghost Jump is one of the longest parkour maps you will ever play, and it's not easy! But luckily, there is a checkpoint on each new level which ensures some safety even if you were to fall down and die. It's really well designed and includes a great mix of style and challenges. It's probably going to take somewhere around 30 minutes to complete it for most of you, but that is obviously dependent on your skill level.
title: Ghost Jump

description:
Author: DireWolf314159

This map features a big mansion which is suitable for all kinds of adventures where you need somewhere safe to stay. There is one master bedroom (with 8 beds combined) and lots of different redstone mechanisms which will greatly improve your standards of living. Outside you will also find multiple different types of automatic farms. You could literally stay within the boundaries of your property and still survive for a long time.
title: Redstone Smart House

description:
Author: MaiconAF

Looking for challenges? This map will be ideal for you, it contains more than 5 levels for you to test your skills in parkour, there will be several levels, with the final boss and 3 special levels as soon as you complete everything.
title: Parkour S

description:
Author: tazmoe

This is a survival/CT map, it is made for harder survival, and also for building. This land has no structures of any sort. Made for people who want to play survival but harder. The Nether has been morphed into Black Underworld, and the End is now the ancient islands. This place is really big, really big. so I made a map for it. There is a regular world beyond the ocean of death (which is literally just air), but you’ll need to create a 100-300 block bridge. the trees have custom models to. The forests are dense and spread. A pair of mountains can be found far located near the west coast.
title: Lands of Aveail

description:
Author: Skygames

Lime is a bright green styled house in a plains biome. The exterior has bushes and flowers surrounding the simplistic modern house. There are windows surrounding the entire house from every angle, plus a sunlight in the top. On the inside, there is a ton of space for whatever builds you want to add, and there is a partial layout for you to build upon.
title: Lime – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: SMCYT

Do you have what it takes to beat all 6 stages in one tower? Show your minecraft parkour skills if you want to beat Tower Parkour.
title: Tower

description:
Author: AzozGamer936

cs_italy. one of the most iconic maps, a very special map that has an opera radio playing in Terrorist spawn point. This map may contain nostalgia because of the opera in T spawn.
title: cs_italy

description:
Author: Pastimeboy

This is a fully working recreation of the iPhone X in Minecraft. iPhone X is one of the latest Apple products currently available on the market. This map gives you a (very simplified) preview of the smartphone in Minecraft. You can interact with the creation in several different ways such as swipe to unlock or accessing some of the pre-installed apps.
title: iPhone X

description:
Author: Ishetsannie

Explore one of the greatest (and at the same time smallest) cities of all time in Minecraft Pocket Edition. Mini Town uses the Mini City Texture Pack which converts some of the blocks in-game to miniature skyscrapers and similar which then can be used as building blocks for creating mini cities. It's by far the best mini city (for Pocket Edition) which I have explored and it's definitely worth checking out.
title: Mini Town

description:
Author: TheF2Pgaming

Spook your boots off with this brand new adventure map experience. We’re just a few days away from Halloween. It’s that time of the year when the moon rises, ghosts awakens and monsters rule the night. This is a really neat map which is perfectly suitable for Halloween. It includes many secrets and lots of other different things to see. Explore the horrors and attractions of Halloween Land today!
title: Halloween Land

description:
Author: legendaryIV25

Want to experience a lush new cave system compered to what Minecraft can offer? well look no further as this map will include 4 new biomes to explore and survive in

This map is 1k by 1k and offers 4 new biomes! going from the red mushroom land to yellow, cross the lake inside and explore the scorching heat of magma cube terrain.
title: Fantasy Cave

description:
Author: RealChocoGamez

Elevation is a fun, fast-paced parkour map where you have to get to the top of the map via parkour. It’s a bit like King of the Ladder except it is parkour and not climbing a huge ladder. There are five maps right now and they include Temple, Wild West, Frostbite, Forest, End City Desert and others! Be sure to download this map for an amazing parkour experience and to help improve your parkour skills. Enjoy!
title: Elevation: The Ocean Update

description:
Author: LightKnight2311

This KitPvP world has a ton for you to do. It has a wide variety of kits, arenas, and plenty of other features that will make your experience as amazing as possible. Not all features in it are ready, but more will be added along the way.
title: KitPvP

description:
Author: CreeperGamerZXZ

This is the threequel (also known as the second sequel) in the One Night At Frankie's horror map series. And for you who don't know, it is greatly inspired by Five Nights At Freddie's which is a popular horror game for the PC. You will play as the Steve who works at Frankie's as a night guard. But this isn't an ordinary place. During the night the animatronics come to life and it's your job to stop them.
title: One Night At Frankie's 3

description:
Author: FloBoi

Looking for a simple PVP experience with a few extra bells and whistles? Maybe you want to test your PVP skills against your friend.. Or, perhaps, you just want to have a good time with your friends! Regardless, this map may be for you!
title: Capsule

description:
Author: zucth

Black Celestial Survival Map have a inspiral from Skylayer series, which agree to increase the challenger and difficulty. When the start you will have auto-lock item slot, which allow you to start with only 5. And many custom gameplay allow in! BlackCelestial Survival is a Complete The Monument map with several survival challenges. It’s a quite fun map in that sense that it includes some custom features. For example, by collecting each block you will gain a new special ability. The gameplay works similar as to skyblock and the game uses a lot of custom commands and customized mobs. It’s recommended for 1-2 players.
title: BlackCelestial Survival

description:
Author: Fariduddin.ar

Nature Border includes one big tree house, lots of supplies, a mine and a lot of building space. The map is based on a beautiful old seed which for some reason can’t be generated anymore. It’s a quite useful map in case you’re looking to start a new survival adventure but don’t necessary want to go through all the trouble of building your first base.
title: Nature Border

description:
Author: TheEnderface

Wake up to a world where intelligent machines are one step closer to world domination. You've been sent on a mission to a science facility which has been invaded by the machines and it's your job to take it back. But as you get there you notice that things are worse than anyone expected. Most scientists have been drugged (or possibly killed) and it's up to you to wipe out the machines and bring some order to this world.
title: Mechanics Apocalypse

description:
Author: ElementX

This is an advanced TNT cannon which is really useful if you want to set up a defense for your base. For example, maybe you are going to play a TNT wars then it would be a good idea to build this machine as it lets you fire TNTs in 8 different directions!
title: Advanced TNT Cannon

description:
Author: agentcpu0

Do you own an Xbox? Do you wish you could play one in Minecraft? What would it look like, and how would it work? This map should answer those questions. This is the Working Xbox in Minecraft

This Xbox is built in Minecraft. Credits go to Chef Dane, Chef Franky, AgentCPU0, and DerpyBanana. As of this first version, there are only 3 working features. You can change the color of your Xbox, the A B X and Y buttons on the controller can all be pressed, and it can be powered on and off, which includes a working start-up animation.
title: Working Xbox

description:
Author: Ishan007

This map contains 9 different minigames which are most enjoyable to play together with friends. Most of them are Minecraft versions of games you’d find in the Olympics. Some of them are actually quite clever. For example, my favorites are javelin throw, archery and athletics 100m. You can expect somewhere around 30 minutes of gameplay but it mostly depends on how many people are going to play.
title: Olymcraft

description:
Author: eefritts

Now with more buildings, some more ship interiors (Bridges mostly), and the first shared hand built 1:1 scale Enterprise A from the 1979-1992 original movies is completed. Now on to the final phase of the build with more buildings finishing the interiors of the ships, and a “Mozzie” scale U.S.S. Excelsior with interior.
title: Star Trek: Shipyards

description:
Author: MEGASTRIKERMCPE

Insane combats, shooting and explosions everywhere, tanks, weapons, grenades, and tons of different arenas for take on COMBAT FORCE! Call your friends and let’s start this party now! All addons and stuff included.

Welcome to COMBAT FORCE!

You always asked who of your friends is the strongest into the battlefield? Time for test it!

Combat Force have few choices of Weapons, Grenades, and arenas to play, on different ways: Singleplayer and Multiplayer.

Tanks are included on this party, as much Combat Force is an remodelation of a old project called TANK ROYALE, by the same map creator, LucasMegaStriker.

Have also specific arenas called “Warfare Battlezones” intended for be a EXCLUSIVE WEAPON-ONLY arena.

Choose between Military Base, an Brazilian Favela or even a Warehouse for battle!

How to use tanks/weapons:

For use the tanks, get closer, and press the ride button. You can shoot cannonballs holding or pressing SHOOT button. For leave, just crouch.

For use the weapons, make sure they have ammo (and you are holding some extra ammo clips for safety) and you just need CROUCH to start shooting. I know isn’t very comfortable, but for now is the only way we find to use them.
title: Combat Force

description:
Author: itzBojan

Santa has sent you on a mission to find and retrieve one of his presents which he as lost. This is a disaster because if you don’t find it then someone will be without a present and nobody likes that, right? To complete this map you have to go through a long series of challenges mostly consisting of parkour. There are also some other games but you should really enjoy parkour if you want to have a good time in this map.
title: Santa Story

description:
Author: Dantheshepard13

This is a really cool command block creation which happened by random. Dantheshepard13 was playing around with the command blocks and soon he managed to manipulate the way that moon phases are displayed on the night sky. In this map you can do the same. All you need to do is to press a button to see some strange things happening in the sky.
title: Broken Moon

description:
Author: Wilzon The Builder

Skyscraper City is an updated version of Wilzon City. It was renamed to better reflect the style of the city and also to better demonstrate what makes it unique. All skyscrapers take a lot of time to build but they are well worth it for creating a believable and realistic city. It’s still under heavy development, so this means that some areas aren’t fully developed yet.
title: Skyscraper City

description:
<p>Author: JONAS MERCYLAND <p>


You visit a guertena art gallery and see the weird gallery but this painting is something wrong and this place, maybe have something in this place. Now you need to escape from fabricated world.
title: Ib Adventure map

description:
Author: Furminator

Dungeon-Craft is one of the oldest map series for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition (previously Pocket Edition) and this time you will be able to play both Dungeon-Craft and New Dungeon-Craft in ONE single map! It includes 40 bonus missions, several secret unlockable modes, achievements and so much more. Either replay the classic Dungeon-Craft map or re-experience the New Dungeon-Craft!
title: Dungeon-Craft

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Mexa is a new survival world series which include a series of different worlds created with world edit tools on Java and ported to Bedrock Edition. SG Mexa: Insane features an insane island with chunk glitches on the borders which were generated when the world was imported from Java to Bedrock.
title: SG Mexa: Insane

description:
Author: MrGreenGames

Ever get tired of the early game grind? Wanna jump into a world where you're miles ahead? Would you like to play a world with lots of modded gear available to you? How about 68 resource generators? If you want to enjoy the easiest, most relaxing survival experience you have ever had and still earn achievements, then this map is for you!
title: Fully Loaded Survival

description:
Author: PMNguyen

This is a singleplayer-adventure horror map based on a Roblox Horror game called “It Lurks” by Terribleblox. In this map, player have to go through the story to know what is happening.
title: It Lurks

description:
Author: ItsDominicPlays

You guys finally can play my survival map! This is a survival map call Hard SkyBlock Survival. I already made this map long time ago, and I hope you guys enjoy my first survival map! How to play? This is a 10x10x10 survival cube, there are many minecraft block that you can found in this map, but I give a warning to you guys: This is a survival map that you will not easy to survive This map not include nether skyblock survival, but you can still having adventure on there.
title: Hard SkyBlock Survival

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Have a sneak peek at the an upcoming map – the new Minecraft PE verison of Jurassic World coming June 22nd. A Fallen Kingdom update will be released shortly after the initial release. Explore Main Street, Jurassic Circus, T-Rex Kingdom, the Petting Zoo, Spinosaurus Paddock and more. The most recent version will not be uploaded until the release day so that there is more to explore. The final park will have forty exhibits (see park map below).
title: Jurassic Minecraft

description:
Author: TGplayz

This is a beautiful raceway using 3 cars, which very depending on which version you download. The old one uses a Lamborghini, a Ferrari, and a Bugatti, and the new one contains 3 of the same race car.he new one contains 3 of the same race car. You can choose between 2 track options and race your day away!
title: Hyper Car Racing

description:
Author: SEMagical

This map includes a fully functional factions minigame controlled by redstone and command blocks. If you don’t have a Realms server yet, then you can try it out in local multiplayer or by joining the official Realms server for this map here. The game includes custom shops, a custom currency, a custom terrain with beautiful buildings and tons of other stuff!
title: MagicCraft Factions 2

description:
Author: Xeno of Cyprus

A Great Castle is a map of a giant castle which is decorated externally, this is a map that can be used as a server loby or as a map to see and have fun on, enjoy it.
title: A Great Castle

description:
<p>Author: FOGZ <p>
Paint wars is a paintball inspired game in which you can cover a large arena in your color while attempting to parkour to the win button above your opponents tent!

When you join into the world you will see a wall of all the items that you can obtain in the game, as well as a description of each item!
title: Paint Wars

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Mexa is the new Survival World series! With advanced world edit and amazing survival maps! In this massive island there are trees surrounding the land and a mountain straight in the middle. Just know that this survival world does not contain all of the necessary items to survive. For that you will need to boat to the border where ordinary worlds are generated! Get ready for many more of these maps! Enjoy cloudies!
title: SG Mexa: Original

description:
Author: EaterComputer

Welcome to the Parkour Adventure! Complete all 10 increasingly challenging parkour levels to gather blocks to use to complete the monument. Travel between various Minecraft biomes and fantasies beyond your wildest dreams as you jump your way to completion!
title: Parkour Adventure

description:
Author: HEROCREEPERSF

Do you want to Parkour? At the same time you dont want to parkour cause its difficult?

This parkour map will help you do the basic parkour jumps without even stressing about it at all!
Have a nice parkour through all the biomes of Minecraft as islands!

Well in my observations, you can learn parkour by just climbing up the mountains… just jumping around… testing knowledge how to get up.

In this parkour map, you pretty much jump amd sprint! You can even do it without even stopping running (Only Legends when it comes to level 10)

I made this map… pretty easy… I want it to be Stress free… but it depends on you. For those people who wanna be challenged… level 10 is pretty challenging… but hey.. its possible.
title: Natural Parkour

description:
Author: TUBERGAMER2010

Welcome, you are playing the escape room hardest in Minecraft PE, in this map are 5 easter eggs (you can find all but do you have to find the 5th easter eggs for unlock an diamond tool). Enjoy it and good luck!
title: MCPE Escape Room

description:
Author: Kingbudderjr

This map is a port of the original Donkey Kong Arcade game and it includes almost the same features as the original game (except for the hammer feature). It's a very simple game where the main objective is to get to the top of the platform and save Princess Pauline. But it's not going to be easy. Donkey Kong are throwing barrels at the player which have the potential to knock him off the platform or just hurt him.
title: Donkey Kong Arcade Game

description:
<p>Author: KRAFTOID <p>
This season, feel joy and relaxed with this cliffside Modern House! No more fancy stuff, no more headache – just chill and feel the winter on your fabulous, wonderful home!
title: Cliffside Modern House

description:
Author: Herotorxp

35 Mini games overall 63 different places with huge designs. And you will see here some of the popular Mini games from popular servers like Bedwar, Skywar, Tnt run, Death run, Block Party, Capture the flag, Turf war and much more! So check this out!
title: Boom Battle Heroes

description:
Author: keithross39

Mesaville is more than a village as it features everything from a naval base to impressive strongholds and other cool structures. It’s by no means a realistic city but that’s what I like about it. I guess you could say it looks very “Minecrafty” and as if these structures could have been an actual part of the game. The uses for this map are many. For example, you could start a new survival adventure using this map, or you could just download it to explore all the different things in the map.
title: Mesaville

description:
Author: wedge

Unknown Waters is the second entry in the DeathCore CTM series. The map immensely features deep waters that the player must survive in while many monsters lurk in these deep depths.

Unknown Waters is the second entry in the DeathCore CTM series. The map immensely features deep waters that the player must survive in.

Trapped underneath a labryinthine flooded cavern, the player must live off fish and the resources they have in order to have a chance at survival, and possibly escape. Can you survive the deep waters or will it become your watery grave?

Some mobs are tougher as they pose stranger abilities than their vanilla versions. For instance, Endermen gives the player blindness when in proximity of one and Husks are invisible, but they have obvious looking pumpkin heads.

You can also make the game more difficult and challenging thru challenge modes.
title: DeathCore II: Unknown Waters

description:
Author: Galoremanatee

Roblox KITTY is a game like piggy but Tom and Jerry style. The cat chases the mouse while the mouse (YOU) try to escape.
title: Roblox KITTY

description:
Author: crackedcubes

The Stark Mansion, or simply the Malibu Mansion, is an advanced modern minimalistic and high-tech mansion created and owned by Tony Stark situated on Point Dume. It is where he lived up to 2014 when it was destroyed by the Mandarin. This house represents the birth of the Marvel Cinematic Universe in film, and the start of Tony Stark’s progression from self-interest to self-sacrifice as Iron Man.
title: Tony Stark’s Mansion

description:
Author: zephyreum

Welcome to Rew.EXE, the low budget map that hopefully won’t waste your time!
title: Rew.EXE

description:
Author: OSK Oak soe khant

The AVA Music Festival is a yearly EDM Festival where famous artists such as DJ Martin Garrix, Jay Hardway and many other DJs have played. This map is supposed to be a replica (or at least inspired by) the AVA Music Festival which took place in Myanmar last year (2016). This map features a big stage and a control panel which can be used to fully control the lights, LED screens and fireworks on stage.
title: AVA Music Festival 2016

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

The Walls is a type of survival game suited for at least four players. There will be four different teams and each one will spawn on a different location. Surrounding each team's base is a huge wall. For the next 10 minutes players will have to gather resources and craft new items. And all of this needs to happen before the walls fall and the final battle takes place.
title: The Walls

description:
Author: SethBling, BlockWorks, Mindcrack

In this map you will have to help villagers defend their castle against evil monsters which are going to try to attack it. In total there’s somewhere around five minutes worth of gameplay. You won’t be alone (even if you play in single player) as villagers, iron and snow golems will also stand strong and help protect their castle. Pick up arms and try to defeat an army of evil and become a long lasting hero in the Minecraft universe.
title: Castle Siege

description:
Author: darksidestudios

Two teams…Two islands…One bridge. DarkSIde is proud to present Speed Bridgers. A multiplayer minigame, perfect for servers, realm or just you and your friends! We can definitely promise you a great time playing it.


Features :
This map contains lots of possibilities and can promise a fun time playing it! All of the features are listed below:

– Support for an endless amount of players! (as far as Mojang allows).

– Two fair picked teams.

– Quick to play!

– Nice builds!

– Different team kits.

And more! Download today and check us out!

How to play?
1. Install by following the part below(How to install).

2. Team up with a few friend (1 is enough).

3. Press play!

4. Build a bridge, or snipe the enemies! have fun!
title: DS : Speed Bridger’s

description:
Author: enderdad

This map is one of the most challenging elytra maps currently available for Minecraft Pocket Edition (alpha version 1.0). There are no checkpoints and underneath you there is a consistent flow of hot burning lava. Traps and hostile mobs are common and you can’t do much to avoid either other than continuously dying and by each try slowly learning the dangers of the map. Find the items in the chest and think of a way out of your prison cell. Hint: lever! Find the access point for the elytra course, jump off the ledge and press the jump button once again to activate the gliding feature for your elytra wings. Try to avoid the obstacles and find a way down to the Nether portal.
title: Enderdads Epic Elytra

description:
Author: Crabbyfeet Minecraft

Redstone World (only for bedrock). Is an map (Made by : Crabbyfeet Minecraft Team). Which is us. In this map, you can build your own Redstone creations!

Note : It’s not too deep/infinity.

YES! You can create your own creations!

You can make commands/redstone and more!

There is a small spawn waiting for you! Make sure you destroy that small thingy, before you do something/build.

Good luck, on what you do!
title: Redstone World

description:
Author: penguinstarking

This is a difficult but interesting and challenging map with a fantasy story. Your goal is to find the legendary sword hided inside the tower to beat the evil wizard. This in my first map and is all been done with hands without using commands. Download is available in Italian and English.

The hardest challenge: The Parkour tower!

Fight your road in lots of levels in different biomes!

Woods…
Caves…
Desert..
Enchanted forest into the tower…
… and so on
title: PARKOUR TOWER

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

The Rift is a custom made command block boss fight. The boss is basically a zombie, but unlike normal ones. This zombie is way stronger and can carry out multiple different attacks. Everything is powered by command blocks. It’s also programmed to track your movement and carry out special passive attacks (see about section). This map uses no special addons. Everything is vanilla based. There are 4 difficulties. Each difficulty decides the power-up spawn rate and the type of kit that you receive.
title: The Rift

description:
Author: ZMIY

When darkness calls, and the wind howls through, there are secrets to find. and monsters anew. So hide in your covers, or fight through the night, for the creatures of Spooky Town are prepared for a FRIGHT!

Spooky Town is a short Halloween Adventure map filled with all kinds of puzzles, unique mobs, and more!

What kind of spooks and thrills might you expect to find in this adventure map you ask? Check out a short teaser here to find out!

Neighboring Houses
Monsters are not the only things ready for the spooky season! View houses with an eerie orange and brown theme or visit spine-chilling locations like Dr. Frankenstein’s Mansion.

Talk with NPCS!
Redstone allows players to speak to NPCS. Be cautious, however! Some of them bite….

Re-textured Items!
Items are fancier than ever this Halloween season. Expect to find yourself some sugary delights including candy, cookies, cakes, and more! It ain’t Halloween without any treats, after all.


Monsters Prepare for a Fright!
RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!!! This isn’t vanilla Minecraft anymore. Monsters with new skins are sure to make you tremble! Careful, they’re not quite the same mobs you knew before…

The Mystical Seneca Forest
What secrets could be hiding in the mystical Seneca Forest? Not many know for sure, but rumor has it that visitors who come in never make it out alive. As the age old saying goes, “Keep your eyes peeled.” You never know what is lurking in the shadows!
title: Spooky Town

description:
Author: KTR Builds

The modern Beachside Villa, now updated with “Buzzy Bee Update” blocks, features multiple rooms with different furniture in each. From bedrooms to kitchens and living areas, this house also has an underwater viewing room!
title: Beachside Villa

description:
Author: iemotionless

You spawn in an abandoned dungeon, your goal is to escape. Use keys, tools, and weapons to break out and to defeat the guards in this PvE adventure map. This map should take about 20 minutes to complete and is multiplayer compatible.

Loot chests for weapons and tools to break out. Tools have NBT tags which allow you to mine certain blocks with them to advance through the game. You will also receive keys which can be used to escape. Defeat all the enemies and escape the dungeon.
title: Dungeon Escape V2

description:
Author: IEMOTIONLESS

This world is skyblock with a twist, you can get dirt from mining trees, and you can sieve blocks by breaking them. You will get ores and everything you need to beat the game from sieving.

You can sieve:

Dirt
Cobblestone
Gravel
Sand
Netherrack
Soulsand
Endstone
Mining these blocks will get you items.

This map has 0 addons, everything was made with commands
title: Skyfactory

description:
Author: KRAFTOID

The most luxurious, pure and expensive Modern Mansion you’ll want to have is here, with a lot of joy and excitement to come with the design, utilities and privacy of your new home!
title: Luxurious Modern Mansion

description:
Author: Toramtyces

The map is based on a boat race on ice in which you will have to overcome the curves as best as possible to get a better time than your friends! It’s similar to an old Mario Kart 64 race called “The Rainbow Road”.
title: Boats Cart

description:
Author: Ammarmr

Megacity is a really cool city to explore. It's especially beautiful during the night since most of the buildings include lots of lightings to make them more visible during the dark. There are lots of skyscrapers and other types of structures which can be found all over the city. But it's far from completed as you will notice lots of empty land spaces around the place but hopefully those will be developed soon.
title: Megacity

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a command block creation which lets you customize the roofing, walls and plenty of other features of a house with just pressing a few different buttons. For each possible customization there are three different options. As soon as you’ve made your choice, just press a button and the change will be instantaneously, and if you change your mind you can always change it back. Find a combination which builds your dream house!
title: Customizable Command Block House

description:
Author: PLASMA7007

A twist on classic Skyblock, and an superior to my old Flatlands Survival map, Void Survival is a new and unique experience, changing the way you play Survival but keeping to Minecraft’s roots and providing a fun challenge for all
title: Void Survival

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a find the button minigame which includes 20 different levels where each one is based on a different house inside a room (e.g. kitchen, bedroom and so on). Read the hint book in case that you can’t find the button for the current room. You can play this minigame both in single mode and in multiplayer.
title: Find The Button: Rooms Edition

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

This creation features a really nice looking house built in a savannah biome which could serve as a great outpost for your next adventure. Inside the house you'll find some basic furniture and some levers. You can use the levers to access an entrance to the basement. Down there you will find a huge farm which is fully automated by redstone.
title: Smart House Mega Farm

description:
Author: LIGGED

This map is inspired by the PC map of author JustMrGarreto. It consists of a room separated by an invisible wall that we cannot pass. On the one hand is the visible Parkour, which will serve as a guide. On the other, there’s you, and you have to go the same way but with invisible blocks.
title: REFLECTED PARKOUR

description:
Author: LightKnight2311

This KitPvP world has a ton for you to do. It has a wide variety of kits, arenas, and plenty of other features that will make your experience as amazing as possible. Not all features in it are ready, but more will be added along the way.
title: KitPvP

description:
Author: GATOR1380

Hey, are you a fan of roleplay like me? What about in Minecraft? Then this world is best for you! This world contains a School with over 45 Classes, 10 halls and more!

Credits: Gator1380

Exterior:

Parking Lots
Cafeteria Patio
Tennis + Basketball Courts
Stadium (Track, Bleachers, Field, Concession Stands)
Interior:

All Classrooms
Commons
Media Center
Auditorium
Gym + Auxiliary Gym
Cafeteria
title: Highschool – Roleplay World

description:
Author: nxtDxny iOS

What it is? A small minigame, you need to guess the mob egg from the itemframe. You can play with your friends for more fun. Created by nxtDxny tested by Hazzord.
title: Guess The Mob Egg

description:
Author: Yellowfox

This map features twenty different redstone creations which include a great mix of complexity. However, one thing they have all got in common is that each one is very useful in its own way. Each creation is very easy to examine so it's a great map if you are a redstone beginner. Check them out in-game and see if there's any you can find use for in your own worlds.
title: 20 Redstone Creations

description:
Author: itzgamerbonez

ESG King of the Ladder is a minigame where you race each other to reach the top and whoever is the first person that stays on top of the ladder during 1 minute will win. You’ll need at least 2 players to play this map, but more are recommended for the best experience. It’s a quick and intense PvP minigame!
title: ESG King of the Ladder

description:
Author: EvilChicken0990

Use your cunning escape skills and help from your prison-mates to eventually escape the prison! Gain emeralds and buy an axe to cut down the wood wall hidden among the station. To win this unique and well-made map, you will need to steal the warden’s ship at the end of the map. Flick the lever and the ship’s control panel and you win!
title: Escapists: The Prison of Minecraft

description:
Author: Luma

This is the most perfect inn which I personally would have liked to arrive to after a long day of mining. It really feels like a place which have been taken straight out of The Lord of the Rings. The inn is fairly small but everything is incredibly detailed. The creation includes two main structures (one stable & one inn) and also a mysterious Nether portal.
title: Medieval Fantasy Inn

description:
Author: Pedrinho1799

This is a recreation of Freddy Fazbear Pizza with various animatronics and other objects to really make a cool creation. It was inspired by the first game in the Five Nights at Freddy’s series. There are custom textures to ensure a much better experience. Join up with some friends, explore the place and unveil the secrets of the map!
title: Five Nights At Freddy’s

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Mexa is the new Survival World series with advanced world edit and amazing survival maps. In this installment, there is a curved tropical island with a curved tropical island with a large mountain and smaller hills followed by a couple of small islands in the ocean. Just know that this survival world does not contain all of the necessary items to survive. For that you will need to boat to the border where ordinary worlds are generated. Get ready for more maps of these!
title: SG Mexa: Tropical

description:
Author: JELLYHAIR

Mine Time is a short map that takes between 60-90 minutes to finish, It is SINGLEPLAYER. Your objective is to mine blocks and works your way up collecting better tools, enchantments, and items until you finish the game.
title: Mine Time

description:
Author: Blazer_Studios

Get ready for splash-tastic fun at the wonderful Blazer Water Park, enjoy a variety of themed areas with fun slides such as Aqua Falls, or relax and cool down in the Mega Wave Pool or the Jungle River! Even check out the Big Blue Aquarium, where you can meet some spectacular marine life.
title: Blazer Water Park

description:
Author: mcpedash

Memory Parkour is a parkour minigame where you need to focus your memory. There are 12 levels in total, and it gets harder and harder. It’s not similar to any other parkour map, as in this map you will need to memorize the track and then complete an invisible version of the same track.
title: Memory Parkour

description:
Author: FluffyCraft

Pistol Royale: Zombies is a PvE survival zombies map. Complete any of the multiple endings solo, or with friends. Try to survive for as long as possible and beat high scores. Or, play against friends with the game mode Team Deathmatch, or by enabling PvP in the settings.
title: Pistol Royale: Zombies

description:
Author: jakemccarroll

This house is suitable for anyone who want to start a new survival adventure. No cheats have been used for building this house which means that you can use it and still be able to earn achievements. The house has everything which you could possibly need such as lots of storage space, a bed for sleeping and even a portal to the Nether. If you like medieval styled architecture then you'll love it!
title: A Good Survival House

description:
Author: RylandPlayzYT

Super Lava Run is a really fun parkour minigame where your main priority is to avoid the lava by completing different parkour jumps. At this point you will only have access to one stage called the Overworld but later on more stages will be introduced to expand on the length of the gameplay. The map is well built and have several clever uses for command blocks.
title: Super Lava Run

description:
Author: Raymancaster

This map is a ported replica of the area around Idlewood in Los Santos, San Andreas. GTA San Andreas is an old and still quite popular game (and especially so the online version known as SA-MP). The map was created a few years back as a survival hunger games map for the PC version of Minecraft but has since been ported to Pocket Edition. It does include some shadow bugs but it can all be fixed by using a night vision shader or by drinking night vision potions.
title: GTA San Andreas

description:
Author: xLUIS6234x

A village has been overrun by zombies and the inhabitants of the village have to get their gear and weapons and try to defeat these monstrous creatures from totally destroying their lands. This is a PvP map which requires at least two players. One team is zombies and the other one is humans. It’s a really well designed map with a simple PvP system. This map is recommended for at least two players but preferably more. There are two different teams (zombies vs humans). Make sure that there is an equal amount of players on each team. Before starting make sure that every player enters the graveyard and sets his spawnpoint by typing /spawnpoint in the text chat.
title: Infected Village

description:
Author: PIXELPOLYDIGITAL

This is one of the most popular classic game mode on Minecraft, BedWars! You can now play this game on your PC, Android, iOS and even Console devices for free! We have made it as close to the original as possible. BedWars in Minecraft bedrock edition!

Have you ever wanted to just play a BedWars game just with your friends, and not with all those other people on the servers? Well, you are in the right place!
