The Medieval BedWars by PixelPoly is one of our biggest community projects ever! With advanced features which you can read more about below. All of it is, of course, available easily just click the download button below and enjoy a fully functional BedWars map!
title: Medieval BedWars

description:
Author: DudeNotANoob

This variant of Skyblock is in the void of space. The islands are planets that display different dimensions or biomes.
title: Space Skyblock

description:
Author: NexQubic

This map is perfect if you want to learn more about the fireworks and cool features related to them in-game. It includes several tips and tricks which you can use to create an amazing fireworks show. The new year is coming up so perhaps you could prepare something for that in Minecraft. The map is split up in several different sections each explaining and demonstrating a specific feature.
title: Firework Secret

description:
Author: LC Studios

Have you ever considered a very well made SCP Foundation facility?

Of course I thought about that too…
title: SCP Foundation Universe

description:
Author: LepStarlk

Are you looking for easy dificult maps that is actually easy? Then you definitely have to give the map a go.
title: Droid Parkour

description:
Author: KorgMcCoolMC

The most recent in the PvP Power series, PvP Power: Ultimate brings the true power by introducing a new point system, improving the kit shop, and a new boost shop. From new maps to remastered maps from older entries, PvP Power: Ultimate is the ultimate PvP Power game.
title: PvP Power: Ultimate

description:
Author: Kidsource

Cobblestone Island is a fun and exciting adventure with tons of surprises. The villagers of this exotic island have been locked behind bars by some evil mobs. You’re a brave warrior and it’s your objective to find all of the required items to override the locked door and release the villagers from their captivity. The items are hidden all over the island and to get them you have to complete numerous challenges.
title: Cobblestone Island

description:
Author: JCGAMER

Cowboys vs Indians is an old childhood game which has been recreated in Minecraft Pocket Edition. It’s a team deathmatch PvP map where you select a side and then fight the other team with everything from primitive weapons such as tomahawks (axes) to more modern ones like pistols (snowballs). It’s a great map which can be played by up to 10 players! This map can be played by anywhere between 2 – 10 players. You can either use the gear and weapon kits provided in the map or use custom kits.
title: Cowboys vs Indians

description:
Author: AB Gaming Studios

Hello guys this is a lucky block skyblock map lucky skyclock this is a adventure map break all lucky blocks and explore 3 lucky block islands and 1 lucky block tower and complete the story line so i hope like this map thanks for read!
title: Lucky Skyblock

description:
By Voxed Studio

Biomes parkour 2 is a continuation of Biomes parkour, a map whose objective is to make parkour and go through the obstacles of each level.

There are 6 levels, each with a different biome: Nature, Snow, Desert, Mushroom Island, Nether and ocean.

This is a parkour map with 6 different levels based on the different biomes in Minecraft. To complete a level and proceed to the next one you need to get from the ground level to the top platform. Download now and enjoy!

- 6 Levels

- Multiplayer [1/4]

- Very fun
title: Biomes Parkour 2

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

This map is, as you may have guessed, a colorful wonderland! It introduces a new biome to my #aTerrainAday series, called rainbow1, that allows concrete to spawn at different places, based on world height.
title: The Palette Place

description:
Author: DaSchmitt

Colossus is a huge, monstrous machine armed with explosives, missiles and dispensers and it is inspired by Cubehamster's massive slime creation. It really is a killer machine which once activated has the potential to wipe out much of its surroundings. Let's just say that you probably never would want to face some of these in a real battle.
title: Attack Robot Colossus

description:
Author: dashze

A second installment of the “Space” series, a minigame where you play with 2-4 friends and fight on planets in space! There are 4 planets in total where you fight on, and a large sun in the center. There also an asteroid belt surrounding the sun so it’s easier to access other players. Each planet has its own moon/comet with another optional chest with loot. Be the last to survive to claim victory in space!
title: Space Wars

description:
Author: thegoldenspade

You are Apollo and nothing’s more important to you than your pet cat, Ginger, who is also your long time best friend. She was the first gift you received from your father on your first birthday. Everything went normal between the both of you until one day, you found out that your precious little cat gone missing. You promised to yourself that you’ll cross the highest mountains, swim the deepest lakes and roam the darkest forests just to find your pet. And now, that adventure begins.
title: Apollo’s Cat

description:
Author: theckyt

Time Stuck is an unforgettable adventure where you’ve been stuck in a certain time which you need to stop to move on. Now you’ll have to complete the challenges to break the looped time, to break the Time Stuck! [STORY]: You are alone in a current train station called Clockwork. And you are about to go to the next station called Freeland. But something unnecessary happened, you’ve been stuck inside the time. You need to continue looping the time to end it. Now it’s your TIME to do it, to stop the Time Stuck.
title: Time Stuck

description:
Author: TheUltimateBrex007

10 Ways to Die is all about dying. There are 10 different levels and in each one the objective is to find a way to end your life. It might not sound like a great idea but it’s actually a quite fun puzzle map to play. As you progress through the map things get more difficult and there might even be times where you doubt your abilities to complete it. This map makes use of some of the new text commands which was introduced in 0.16.0 of Minecraft Pocket Edition. For example, to get to a new level you will have to use a teleport command. And to set your spawn point you need to use another text command. Everything is explained by signs in-game.
title: 10 Ways to Die

description:
Author: keyyard

Snipers vs Thieves is a multiplayer heist minigame where the thieves have to rob the bank while avoiding getting killed by the snipers. It’s a very intense game with lots of action. One team will be the thieves and the other team will be the snipers. Find out if you have what it takes to be a bank robber, or if you have the abilities to stop one..
title: Snipers Vs Thieves

description:
Author: brosephmc-jojoglick

The Chicken Catcher map is an endless mini-game where the player has to remotely control a character in order to catch chickens (as the title suggests). Each time a chicken is caught, coins are given which can be used to customize your character. Try to get the highest score as you can!
title: Chicken Catcher

description: CS:GO Assault Deathmatch version! The game contains AK-47, P90, M4A4, AWP, and MP7. Its FFA so just kill everything you see moving! And please do not team. There are no chickens that distract you, so don’t worry.  As you know from the introduction, this is Assault CS:GO Deathmatch. No teaming, No help, Just kill whatever is moving and try to get most of the kills. This is just like other Deathmatch maps. Nothing has changed. Just a new map. That’s all. Enjoy!
title: Assault Deathmatch

description:
Author: xammax

LAVA is a not-so horror map featuring a single in a cottage, who finds something very mysterious. A world of DEMONS, trapped in a portal seeking revenge. Part 2 is hopefully going to be here by the end of the month. LAVA: A not-so horror map. It is a pretty short and fast paced map, but it has an interesting story (AND this is only Chapter 1) I think I’ll make Chapter 2 more long and take my time. You are a person living in a cottage. You witness a portal opening to the world of demons.
title: LAVA: Part 1

description:
Author: ARTHUR CRAFT

In this game, your goal is to capture the flag, cross the underground maze, pvp with your opponent and even climb trees. This map is 100% automatic if you have any bug reports that report to me.

Players: 2-4
title: Capture The Flag

description:
Author: Luma

Start your next adventure in a snowy winter world. This map includes a life-sized gingerbread house, a Christmas tree and some presents. Around the house you will find a beautiful winter landscape consisting largely of snow and ice spikes. If you want to get in a Christmas mood then give this map a try!
title: Gingerbread House

description:
Author: AutoGrind, VanillaGrinders

This is a jungle themed PvP map which is recommended for 8 players or less. It has been designed to work smoothly for most devices (even low-end devices at a 4 chunks render limit). It is entirely automated by command blocks which means you can easily reset the map in-game as well as taking advantage of other clever solutions. It's a really good PvP map!
title: VanillaGrinders SkyWars

description:
Author: TheWarHawk2005

Download this map, invite friends, give everyone some snowballs, and become a SUMO MASTER. “Sumo” is a classic Minecraft party game, in which players try to knock the others off of a small platform. The arenas in this map are built small on purpose; specially designed for quick, fun games with a few of your best friends. I don’t recommend more than 4 players/match.
title: Sumo Masters

description:
By Voxed Studio

Your plane just crashed on a mysterious island, try to find ways to survive and escape from the island.The plane crash is a map (creation) that consists of a plane crashed on a giant island
title: The Plane Crash

description:
Author: anearplayz

Welcome to the official Levels Parkour map by anasw06 and Anearplayz. This is a parkour map made for people who are good at parkour and want a challenging and an adventurest map to play. Try not to rage quit ???? There are many levels that are included. 7 levels to be clear. Ranging from different biomes and other levels. Each level containing it’s own style of parkour. Each level includes a lever in a chest, all levels have them. Some of the levers are hidden in chests. Find them to unlock the next level…
title: Levels Parkour!

description:
Author: tpar69

Futuretroplis is actually a map released on our website in the past and today the creator is bringing a brand new experience to the world. It’s the same city, but it is after a huge plague which killed a large chunk of the population and decimated parts of the city. All buildings look abandoned and overgrown, and some are also partly damaged. It’s definitely a pretty cool apocalyptic environment worth exploring.
title: Decimated Futuretroplis

description:
Author: Kidsource

Far into the distant Minecraft future, humanity is forced to save itself from a cosmic disaster. As a result of humans mining the sun for valuable dark matter, the sun began to implode. The Earth began to cool rapidly, and a solution was needed quickly.
title: Space Colony KS

description:
Author: Llama Studios

You’re tired and hungry. All you need is some pumpkin pie to cheer you up. Collect the three ingredients in pumpkin pie and craft them together to complete this map.
title: The Quest for Pie

description:
Author: Supa Ming Ming

This is a map for players who loves playing parkour or minigames with rainbow colors! If you are one of them, please be sure to download this map!!! I think you will like it.
title: Parkour Of Colors

description:
Author: SANJANAJAGANI

From a theatre to a school this map has everything you need for a school roleplay or a neighbourhood roleplay. This is originally meant for roleplaying but, you can play with your friends. There are more than 20 houses and other structures, not much. All of the homes are fully decorated, landscaped front & backyards, and contains interiors, the downside is it’s not lit up in all the buildings. But as a whole it’s an amazing and very inspiring map to play!

All of the houses and structures are liveable, & not cramped, they are specially designed, like this one. It’s the clitter shop. Where you put your pets when you’re away, like a care taker for pets.
title: Sanjana’s Neighbourhood

description:
Author: MrPogz Zamora

This map was created to showcase an idea (or concept) for TVs in Minecraft. Right now it can only be used to watch one TV program and to build it you will need a whole bunch of different items. It makes use of a resource pack and it’s included in the world download. If you like this idea then make sure to give it a try in-game! As soon as you’ve entered the world you will notice that you’ve spawned in front of a house. Enter the house to find the TV. The TV is very basic as it shows just one program and there is no sound. Fire: Replaced by other images to create the TV program Glass: Retextured to make it look better as a TV screen Painting: One painting has been replaced by a TV off-air picture. It is displayed when the TV is turned off.
title: Basic TV

description:
Author: MattH44

Crazy Wipeout is a map based on the once popular game show called Wipeout. The map features an obstacle course which includes many different parkour challenges. There are also some automated mechanisms controlled by redstone which are intended to make the course even more difficult for those who try it. You can either play it alone or with friends in a multiplayer game!
title: Crazy Wipeout

description:
Author: BROKEN PROMISE GAMES

The Real Life Game is heading back to WWII, this time, we’re in the Eastern Front. You’ll be fighting in iconic places such as Pavlov’s House, Stalingrad Oil Refinery, and Barracks. Kristall Natch or the Night of Broken Glass is the location of the Zombies Mode, with its open area you will be able to traverse the map with ease.

The Real Life Game: WWII Eastern Front takes it back to 1944-1945 on again. You’ll fight with iconic weapons and in iconic locations. MP-40, PPSH, the P08, and Kar98k are the weapons you’ll be using. Some iconic maps are:

Barracks
The Germans are defending a barrack in Stalingrad as the Soviets are pushing the defending Germans out of the Barracks.

Pavlov’s House
Both the Germans and Russians are advancing to capture an apartment building in Stalingrad, both of them are well-equipped for the battle, but who will come on top?

Stalingrad Oil Refinery
In order to deal with a crippling blow to the Russians, the Germans decided to take over the Oil Refinery in the city which would wear down the Soviet tanks.
title: The Real Life Game: WWII Eastern Front

description:
Hello, I’m Krog, i live in the stone age, me and my friends Krag and Krook created the first cars ever.

We have invented the first race in the Krooaaar valley.

Join us in the first race!

Travel in time and come meet us and our dodos but be careful of the dinosaurs!

This map supports up to 6 players. All players will spawn in the lobby. To start the game one of the players will have to click the start button, located on the wall.
title: The First Race

description:
By RookieAhmad

NightD is a famous Minecraft Youtuber in Indonesia. As one of his fans, I want to make a Minigame Map with a black, white, & gray background just like his skin. This map is neither too good nor too bad, I made it with all the skills and experience I have.
title: Map Parkour & Minigame NightD

description:
Author: DØCTØR JØKER

This map is basically a simple box where you will find too many challenges, such as parkours, trying to survive from hostile mobs you can even challenge your friend in a PvP

how to play?
In this map you will start in a room where you can equip yourself, the grace of this map is to destroy all the spawning mobs that you find and open all the chests of the death box
title: DEAD BOX

description:
Welcome to The Carnival of Fears! We have taken 5 of the most common fears and turned them into a spine-chilling Halloween map for you to enjoy! The attractions featured are:

– Darknesse, a large-scale horror maze

– Mortem, a horror maze

– Klinic, a multi-inversion roller coaster

– Arachnid, a horror maze
title: The Carnival of Fears

description:
Author: skygames

Castle House Mansion – Linear, is a big mansion in the middle of a plains biome. The mansion offers a one car garage, multiple entrances, two balconies, and much more. The front has a huge window, and the back has a place for you and your friends to have a party!
title: Castle House Mansion – Linear

description:
Author: skygames

Auto Lava House is a survival world and also a custom redstone house! At night your house will be surrounded by lava to protect you from the devilish monsters that lurk in the dark!
title: Castle House Mansion – Auto Lava House

description:
Author: MINIPRO27YT

Have you ever wondered what minecraft would feel like if you were playing in slow motion? TAS stands for Tool Assisted Speedrunning which players use to slow down the game but can still interact with objects normally. This map recreates that slow motion effect and applies it to combat.
title: TAS PVP

description:
By Joey gaming

Modern Mansion 6 by Arcstudios is a massive sandstone house which has been left empty for players to furnish and decorate to their own liking. The house consists of two stories with a swimming pool, chandelier, and more! Activate shader in world settings.
title: Modern Mansion 6 - Sandstone House

description:
Author: AdvancedMann

UCN is the game in the Fnaf Series where the Main antagonist William Afton ends up facing his creations in hell to suffer again and again forever, this map represents Ultimate Custom Night which is Afton’s Hell where Golden Freddy Keeps him there to suffer in eternal purgatory.
title: Ultimate Custom Night

description:
Author: TheSixthHour

Brookfield is a miniature city which started its construction in mid-2016. It’s the biggest miniature city currently available (for Bedrock Edition). It includes tens of skyscrapers and loads of different areas worth exploring. The city is very well planned with a great variety of different districts. Have fun exploring!
title: Brookfield (Mini City)

description:
Author: Castroma

This small cruise ship, the MS Castrøma, is a beautiful cruise, with 5 decks and 55 rooms. It includes terraces and even Jacuzzis. It has a casino, coffee, pools, spa, even a little hospital. You will enjoy it
title: MS Castrøma

description:
Author: ArcStudios05

Modern House Three is a simple contemporary home
title: Modern House Three

description:
Author: Clarence365

This map is the recreation of the infamous The Backrooms Creepypasta. This map is not a sequel to the Backrooms map 2020. Its a remake with accuracy, and sounds.NOTE: This map has assets were inaccurate.Warning:This map has worst jumpscares that were difficult to predict.
title: The Backrooms

description:
Author: MiPuraSangre, JdMC2805

This is a project consisting of a complete state which has 3 cities under development with their own capital – Amundsen. There are several neighborhoods and each with their own unique style and there is also some other areas like a financial district. It’s plenty of different places to explore and buildings to see. As a whole, it’s a really good map which took 1 year of development to make.
title: HighBlock State

description: This is NOT just a regular ‘find the button’ map! It has different challenges in every level. There are 5 levels, all of them are possible. I’m sure you can do this!
title: Classic Find The Button

description:
Author: BeezeeBox

Explore this mystical ocean temple and see what secrets lie below the ocean!

– Mobs

– Parkour

– Puzzles

– Traps
title: Raid The Ocean Temple!

description:
Author: ItsBlueDev

Hello There! Welcome To Our Newest Minigame World! Today we will going to introduce our world called “SB: [SPLEEF] MINIGAME” And Also This Map Has Very Enjoyable To Play With your Friends! This World Also this World requires 2-30 Players! So its very much fun and very enjoyable to play.
title: [Spleef] Minigame!

description:
Author: Dreamurprism

This map is highly inspired by a movie with the same name. this map use some sound effect and soundtrack to make it more realistic. However the soundtrack is copyrighted, so im also made the map without the soundtrack for anyone who wants to record it. There is an option in this map which can turn on multiplayer mode or low detail mode.
title: The Commuter

description:
Author: thedanyfazbear

Do you think you can spend 5 nights with 4 animatronics that try to go for you? Dare and play Five Nights at Freddy’s in Minecraft Bedrock Edition by yourself or with your friends. MINECRAFT BEDROCK +1.11.0.4 BETA Map with the modality of surviving from 12:00 AM to 6:00 AM without any animatronic catches you saving your energy watching the cameras. Observe the pizzeria in Free Roam mode and spend it also with your friends playing and even making videos! If you want to play the map in another language such as Spanish or Portuguese, you can download it from my website. The map will be updated when things are added or repaired
title: Five Nights at Freddy’s v2

description:
Author: ZackTDM

This creation features is a really cool (and Minecrafty) base suitable for your next survival world in case you don't want to build everything from scratch and nothing. A good thing about it is that the chests and such are empty so you will need to do some hard work in order to secure food and similar for surviving the next days. The main house is built on a hilltop and it has an amazing view overlooking many different biomes.
title: Hilltop House

description:
Author: pixelman546

Toadstool Castle is a famous building in the Super Mario universe. It has been featured in several different Super Mario game titles but it first appeared in Super Mario 64. This creation is largely inspired by the castle but it is by no means an exact replica. However, the exterior looks astonishingly similar and it even includes many of the rooms which you will recognize from the games. It has been in the works since 2013, so please take a moment or two to experience this map which might for some of you might bring back some memories of the past! This map includes the castle, Bob-omb Battlefield, and Thwomp’s Fortress. The map is my own view of Super Mario 64’s castle. The creator originally planned to make the entire game, but this feat was too big to complete by himself. This is the final update to this six year old map! Enjoy!
title: Toadstool Castle

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

This map features a great survival base with multiple redstone creations which produce most necessities you need to be kept alive for a long time (such as food and other valuables). You could probably stay within the walls of the base for as long as you wanted or until some monsters found a way in and killed you, but even then you'd just respawn in the base so there wouldn't be much harm done.
title: Ultimate Survival Base

description:
Author: laki67

In this map you have to walk into some portals and you’ll teleport to some amazing zones of the world. Here you have to search for some object and put them in a monument to complete it. multiplayer is recommended
title: Portals & Dungeons

description:
By Voxed Studio

Mushroom House [Creation] It is an amazing house created in the middle of the forest, With the aspect of fairies and fantasy. The house is completely decorated inside and out, perfect to use in a survival map.
title: Mushroom House

description:
Author: Wartave

Paranoid: The Box is a map inspired by the Mandel Box. It’s really a colossal challenge as you’re forced to survive in a very harsh environment while searching for a some different objects that you will need to Complete The Monument.
title: Paranoid: The Box

description:
Author: Tpops2017

Epic Cliffs is one of the best mountain bases you'll find for Minecraft Pocket Edition. The structures have been built to somehow make use of the amazing mountains which can be found around the area. And there are plenty of tunnels which connect most places and this means you rarely ever have to leave the base to get somewhere else inside the base. You might want to upgrade the redstone security to make sure monsters are kept locked out.
title: Epic Cliffs Base

description:
Author: NotABigGamer

Tired of doing parkour that is too short or too hard? Have you ever been aggravated when the command blocks just don’t do their job? Then this is the map for you! Quartz parkour consists of 50 diverse and entertaining tested levels!
title: Quartz Parkour

description:
Author: OrigamiStudio

From easy as pie to nearly impossible, Parkour (most of it) includes all difficulty of parkour for all Minecraft players! If you’re not sure which parkour world suits you best, give it a try!
title: Parkour (Most Of It)

description:
Author: Wambo_6Foot_

This map features a life sized room which is based on Wambo's own room. You'll basically be an ant in comparison to any of the furniture in the room and that makes it a great map to use for hide and seek minigames. There are no guidelines or anything for it in-game but that you can probably figure out yourself. You can expect more updates to come in the future.
title: Wambo's Room (Hide and Seek)

description:
Author: MineClan888

It’s that time of year again! 12 Days of Minigames is a Christmas themed map, set up like an Advent Calendar. Each day you unlock a box (Christmas themed mini-game) until the 12th day (Christmas/Christmas Eve) This map can be played as a countdown to Christmas, or just a fun mini-games world, with a reset button available. How to play? Simply open the green-shulker box underneath you when you spawn, and throw the corresponding days item onto the ground. Start with day one, then on Christmas you should open day 12. After you play that days game, you cannot play the game again, unless you are not going in order (Advent Calendar rules) in that case, by the calendar you will see a manual reset button, push that button and all boxes will be filled again, allowing you to play all the games over again. Please NOTE that certain games are multiplayer, while others are solo/multiplayer, when ingame, step on the important information pressure plate for a complete list of which games.
title: 12 Days of Christmas Minigames

description:
Author: SkyGames

GenChink is a hardcore survival challenge. Your objective is to survive on a chunk that is being randomly generated. Every block you need will be available in the grid, but it’s your job to figure out how in order to hopefully survive the first night in GenChunk. This map is suitable for anyone who’s interested in a fresh and exciting challenge for survival mode.
title: GenChunk

description:
Author: UNSPEAKABLE90

Have you ever wanted a modded skyblock bedrock map, well you found one, my first skyblock map for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, with custom crafting recipes and custom textures!! A new skyblock experience without having to grind wood. In this map, you will be starting in a room with most of the recipes being shown on the walls and you will have a stone pickaxe(nearly broken) and 10 stone. throw the compasses to teleport to areas. Now have fun!!!
title: SkyBlockBE

description:
Author: gab_the_crafter

Are you a fan of action games? Well look no further cause this map is main on action/shooting game where you battle your enemies to save the world Note: This map is not accurate on any COD games, All maps are based on imagination Also, This map is Pre-release so you can expect bugs and errors Mission #1 – Get the abort codes from the enemy ship Mission #2 – Protect the codes from your enemies Mission #3 – Get back the codes from the enemy encampment Mission #4 – Stop the missile!
title: Minecraft : Call of Duty (Chapter 1)

description:
Author: JmCgamer774

This is the first part of Slendrina (Cellar 1) where you need to find 8 old books to escape from Slendrina you also need to find keys to open several doors, look around as soon as you see Slendrina, Never look back
title: Slendrina: The Cellar 1

description:
Author: MINETUBE

This is the world’s best Minecraft house! It’s a redstone house where everything works. There’s a pool and a boat! Secret rooms are the best rooms. You can go to the cinema!
title: Modern Redstone House v2

description:
Author: Kidsource

This map is a skyblock survival challenge where the main objective is to reach the final island. You will start out on a small island with few resources. The resources have to be used carefully in order to one day have the necessary building blocks to create the bridges which will take you to your end goal. I provided some recommended guidelines but you can obviously use whatever rules you want.
title: Kidsource Easy Skyblock Challenge

description:
Author: IHave1Dollar

This map features 16 different farms for 1.1+ that can be used in a survival world. They all can be built in a world without cheats (You don't have to use the mob spawners in the mob grinders.) Note that some farms do use gamerules like mobGriefing and doDaylightCycle.
title: 16 Useful Farms

description:
Author: Fizzman797

It's time to put down your pistols and head down to the mines. Gold Rush is a 1 vs 1 minigame where the objective is to mine as many ores as you can, smelt them and then collect them in chests. There are plenty of gold, emeralds and diamonds wherever you turn but there's also another player out there to get them. The gold rush is real and you'll both be racing against time as you've only got five minutes to spend before the game is over.
title: Gold Rush

description:
Author: SquarePixelsStudio

Cloud City is one of the largest and strongest buildings in the world of Star Wars. It is here that Luke Skywalker meets his father and Han Solo is frozen.
title: Cloud City – Parkour Adventure

description:
Author: Andiuber

In this map you will find a 100% functional car, made to run with just command blocks and redstone. There is no use of any mods or add-ons. To use the car you will need to take the key and get close to the car. Point at the seat and press Ride to enter the vehicle. Once you’ve assembled the car, you can select the key in your hand and the car will begin to advance. It only moves in 4 directions (NESW) based on where you’re looking. You can also drive the car remotely.
title: 100% Functional CAR

description:
Author: MrCoolKid6780

Soul Town is one of the most Minecrafty towns you can find for Minecraft Pocket Edition. Much of the town exists in an extreme hills biome and several parts are quite unrealistically built but that just gives it a unique and interesting style. Even though it's not your typical realistic city it definitely has its own charm and is well worth exploring.
title: Soul Town

description:
Author: ligged

This map contains a minigame that consists of surviving a rain of gravity blocks such as sand, red sand, gravel and anvils. Your job is to overcome this block rain!

When you enter the map, you will find in your inventory a book that contains the credits and some details of the map.
“Normal” is the game mode available for now

NEW

Farmer: Take care of the 3 cows of the falling blocks, they could suffocate or be crushed by anvil. To win you must arrive with all the live animals to the top. If the 3 cows die, you lose.

To start the game, you must press the button. Once pressed, we teleport and the block rain begins:

In the room, we find this button, which should be pressed in case of emergency only if the fire above us stops spreading and goes out. A mechanism will be activated to reignite the flames and the game will continue:
title: SAND AND GRAVEL FREE FALL

description:
Author: Zucth

Goldfen Legend, Is a 4 Players RPG Map, as a ROTAR Series it’s a series of an Mostly Fight to Stack Of Mobs. Support with a few story to defeat the Fallen King…
title: Goldfen Legend (ROTAR 2)

description:
Author: Goreckicraft123, Mrblockcrafter

This is a map and addon which lets you try modern hunting in Minecraft. The bow has been replaced by a rifle both by textures and sound. And most of the mobs have been replaced and now include everything from bears, deer and buffalo. You can also wear camouflaged hunting gear. It's a well rounded hunting map which is actually really fun to play!
title: Big Game Hunter

description:
By Anika Y.

“Where I’d live if I ran away from society to live off the radar, cottagecore-style” This house is based off the dark cottagecore aesthetic. The world contains a beautiful, earthy dark oak house filled with plants, skulls, and good vibes. Escape from civilization and get closer nature (virtually) with this aesthetic build. Fulfill your dark cottagecore fantasies.

The map includes a medium sized house built from dark oak, perched high upon a cliff overlooking the sea. The exterior is covered in vines and moss. Inside, there is a hallway, a living room, a study, a bedroom, and a bathroom. The house is decorated in a dark, earthy aesthetic, with many plants, skulls, rugs and lanterns scattered throughout.

The bedroom includes a dresser, seating area, and green double bed. The study includes a bookshelf, seating area, and a desk/work area. The living room includes a fireplace, couch, and shelf. The bathroom includes a toilet, tub, and sink. The hallway contains a seating area and cabinets.

There is also a dock with boats and a staircase leading up to the house. The area surrounding the house is filled with trees, water, and striking cliffs—a place filled with natural beauty perfect for the cottagecore aesthetic.
title: Dark Cottagecore House

description:
Author: JonCris

4 Pillar Survival is challenging survival map where you will find yourself stranded on a skyblock island surrounded by four huge pillars. Each pillar symbolizes a biome (or in one case a dimension) and together they include most blocks which you would find in an ordinary survival world. You'll also find a villager in each pillar which you can trade with to obtain better items and blocks.
title: 4 Pillar Survival PE

description:
Author: Syken

In this map you’re gonna climb the highest mountain in the world. The 8848 high mountain is really dangerous and it requires great skill to accomplish this climb. Bad weather can quickly put you in serious problems on a high altitude, and you might also experience oxygen problems. Will you make it to the top? And if you do, can you make it all the way down to the base camp?
title: Everest Expedition

description:
Author: sapphirecraft

GenChunk Parkour, is an awesome map modeled off a popular Minecraft Java mini game map called “Chunk Runner”! When you spree start you will be teleported to the arena where a parkour course will be generated in-front of you! Your objective is to complete the parkour and get to the end before you fall into the void, due to the parkour crumbling!
title: GenChunk Parkour v2

description:
Author: iLordQuackers

In this horror roleplay adventure, you play as a group of paranormal detectives (or just one), investigating the death of Indigo Springwood at the Springwood Manor. Watch out, the manor is rumored to be haunted...
title: Springwood Manor

description:
By Daniiye

This map is base on the Netflix Series Squid Game. You will be the one to choose the game you want to play. But since this is just the Beta Stage, the only game you can play for now is Green Light, Red Light, and Glass Bridge.

In this map, you can choose the character you want to play.

But since this is just the Beta Stage, the only game you can play for now is:
Red Light, Green Light
Glass Bridge
title: Squid Game (Glass Bridge, Red light, Green Light)

description:
Author: Rifkibootboist

The Santiago Bernabeu Stadium is the home stadium for Real Madrid which is a professional soccer club based in Madrid, Spain. Even though it's not an exact replica it's definitely fair to say that it was a huge inspiration when building it. The stadium is huge and it could most likely fit thousands of players if a Minecraft soccer match ever would take place in Minecraft. If you are into soccer then you must check this out!
title: Santiago Bernabeu Stadium

description:
Author: bemz

Welcome To BEMZ’s Minigame Mashup. This map is made up of 30-40 Different “mini-mini-games”. Average around length is 5-10 mins, as you can tell. These are very quick competitive and random game modes. About the Mini-Minigames There are 30-40 different minigames, these are specifically designed to be played quickly and because you play all of these so quickly, there are infact a mini-minigame. There are loads of challanges that happen randomly, some more rare then others, you could be shooting friends with snowballs or just testing your brain by compleating one of the numerous puzzles. It has it all!
title: BEMZ’s Minigame Mashup

description:
By Arcstudios

Modern Mansion 2 by Arcstudios is a beautiful simple home located beside a river. It consists of two stories with a dining room, living room, and more! Activate shader in world settings.
title: Modern Mansion 2 - Riverside House

description:
Author: superspider3500

Since there haven’t been many Sonic games, or many games featuring popular video game characters at all on this website, I’ve decided to make my own: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Chaos Quest, a 22-level 2.5D platforming game which sports its own resource pack, an animated title screen (where Sonic wags his finger, like most Sonic titles), functional rings and monitors (with ring, extra life, and Robotnik varieties), lives (which are lost when falling into pits, the only obstacle in the game), an introduction, two endings (both good and bad), and three playable characters: Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles! Sonic is the fastest, Tails jumps highest, and Knuckles is the strongest!
title: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Chaos Quest

description:
Author: SkyGames

Winning Walkers is the strategy game of speed, skill and shortcuts! Start in a certain part of this beautiful map and make your way towards the beacons [Follow the Compass] The first player to the beacon wins. There are many ways to the beacon which makes this game so fun to play!
title: SG Winning Walkers 2

description:
Author: InsomniaGamesMCPE

Alright, so how do I use it?
The building is already done for you. Unless you want to change something, the building is scratched off the list for your to-dos. All you need to do now is the coding. If you can't code, then the next best thing would be to use Redstone. Remember, this game doesn't actually need commands to work. The game revolves around the beds, and as long as the player sets their spawn point there, all you need to do is give everyone a chest, and scatter materials around the map. It's that easy!

An example of this would be to give everyone a wooden pickaxe and leather armor. They can break the blocks on their island to build out and mine the ores to craft stronger armor, while also protecting their spawn point. If their bed gets destroyed, they'll have to return to spawn. When the game is over, just re-download the world and play again!
title: Lighthouse Bedwars

description:
Author: blockmaster_203

Thorpe PE is a recreation of Thorpe Park in England. It features every single ride at the park, including 5 roller coasters and many interactive shows. Download to escape to the Island Like No Other!
title: Thorpe Park

description:
Author: joako2015

This is the classic Block Party minigame which you play by saying a color and then everyone needs to stand on that a block of that color. It’s recommended for 2+ players. It was the first map that I upload so I hope you will enjoy it. There might be some glitches, but they shouldn’t cause any major problems.
title: BLOCK PARTY!

description:
Author: MrGreenGames

Are you tired of mobs hassling you around your base? Maybe you want a more peaceful experience without actually playing in peaceful mode? Maybe your tired of all that new world grind that has to be done when you start a new seed. Well boys and girls, do I have the world for you!
title: Peaceful Spawn

description: This map includes more than five different subway stations, a fully automatic system for departure and other processes to keep things moving smoothly and without interruptions. There is also a custom texture pack which adds signs such as arrows and similar to make it a more seamless and enjoyable experience. Redstone is an essential part of this build which automates nearly everything.
title: Metro / Subway

description:
Author: CRACKEDCUBES

Welcome Aquarium
This is where you will spawn when you enter the map, and if you die during gameplay. With a functional command block airlock door, you can use this part of the map to explore the ocean without drowning.

Harbour
Park your yacht and speedboat here after a day out exploring the ocean. This has direct access to the main house and is where you will spawn after leaving the welcome lobby.

Guest House
Relax as a guest in style away from the main house with your own private bathroom, bedroom, and kitchen—all with sea views. There is redstone lighting, a functional command shower, a working kitchen, and a command fireplace.
title: Modern Island Mansion

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Mega Games is the biggest and greatest minigame tournament map with 100 different minigames and many more to come! The possibilities are almost endless, literally, as there are over 1 vigintillion game orders (~10^200)! Play with up to 8 friends, or play solo. If you love minigames then you definitely have to try this map out!
title: SG Mega Games (125 Games)

description:
Author: The_Redstoneer

This map features a miniature golf course with a total of 18 holes. Miniature golf is a quite fun game to play with friends but it works almost as good in single player as well. To get started all you need to do is to get a ball and then just throw it at the hole on the golf course and hopefully hit the hole. Give it a try and let us know your score in the comments!
title: Minigolf Course 1.0

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Planet Patrollers is a multiplayer minigame similar to Domination. The main objective of the game is to capture all the different planets. This is done by standing on a planet which you want to capture, while making sure there’s no other enemy player on the planet. It includes a custom resource pack with new sounds and textures and the game also includes space like game mechanics. Do you have what it takes to be an astronaut?
title: SG Planet Patrollers

description:
Author: vechrozilator

Copy the banners is a minigame where you need to copy the design of the banner standing in the block of gold. Test yourself in designing banner with this minigame map The objective of the map is to copy the design of the banner standing at the block of gold, get banners and dyes and design the banner as same as you see at gold block after that place on top of the loom then click button, if you’re correct you will head up to the next banner to copy. The map contain total of 35 banners to copy, the first five is for practice mode only this first five will not count as your score because these are super easy. It has 3 sets; Set-A, Set-B and Set-C Each set has 10 banners to copy. Map Features Skip Level: If you can’t copy the current banner you can skip. (No Score) Auto count score: Your score and levels you skipped will automatically count using scoreboard command
title: Copy The Banners

description:
Author: TheluckyguyNL

This is a Find The Button map. I hope you enjoy it anyways.
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: Dany16

This is a huge creation which is really useful if you are a big group of players who need a map where you can do your PvP battles. It also looks amazing and it probably took days to build. I would say it's best suited for 5-20 players even though you can obviously play it with less. There are no specific guidelines for this map so feel free to make up your own.
title: Fantasy Sky Island

description:
Author: Adventure Maps

This is a short adventure map where your abilities will be put to a test to see if you’ve got what it takes to obtain a sacred treasure. It’s a quite fun map where you have to play through three different levels. Personally, I don’t think it’s a difficult map and I would expect it would take on average 15-20 minutes to complete. I won’t tell you about the end but it’s definitely something different!
title: Hidden Treasure

description:
Author: HAVOC INS4NITY

This is a Fortnite based minigame map, which includes almost all of the Fortnite cities, and has a lobby where you can wait for the game to start. There are chests located inside of buildings all around the map, and will refill after each game.
title: H4 MC Fortnite

description:
Author: simonvaldin

Welcome to Valdin City, huge metropolis with a giant amount of things to explore, in the city we have many Skyscrapers, mansions, shops, hospitals, services, and almost all of the builds are decorated.
title: Mega Metropolis Valdin City

description:
Author: Brenden_MC

This is a really fun minigame parkour map in which you'll have to jump from one platform to another by bouncing on slime blocks. If you fail, and accidentally hit the quartz blocks, then you will die and have to start over the entire map. This makes every bounce incredibly important and failure less of an option. If you are a fan of parkour then you have to try it!
title: Bounce Steve Bounce

description:
Author: vechrozilator

You’ve been locked up in a strange room, you need constantly observe, think, guess, inference, to guess the word and escape in this strange room. You can play with friends or solo. This game is based on the popular game with the same title of this map “Escape Room: Mystery Word” were you need to guess the word by looking clues around the room and if you’re correct you will head up to the next level. How To Play? Letters are in the chest get them, guess the word and put it on item frame (1 letter per item frame). Then click the button to see if your answer is correct.
title: Escape Room: Mystery Word

description:
Author: DarKBaCoNMc

This is a minigame which requires at least two players. To win, your team will have to get to the center point and capture it for 60 seconds. But it won’t be easy as you’ll have to fight the enemy team when they come trying to take it away from you. It’s a fun and exciting minigame which works great for smaller LAN parties.
title: GCS King Of The Hill

description:
<p>Author: GLOWINGROAD <p>
Race through this icy Parkour course while taking out your friends with your enchanted bow. Be the first to the finish to claim your trophy! Save your trophies to keep score of your wins using the shulker box provided. Simply leave them inside and add to the box every time you win. Good luck!
title: Sharp Shooter Winter Edition

description:
Author: megastriker

It’s time to explore the mysterious Uganda Knuckles Island where lots of small, cute creatures have settled down and made their home. It’s just one problem, sometimes they can be quite dangerous and often it’s heard that they are chasing away (and sometimes even attack) anyone who’s trying to visit their island. This is a fun survival experience taking place in a cool environment with funny (and sometimes bitey) new creatures!
title: Uganda Knux Quest

description:
<p>Author: YATHARTHYT <p>


Welcome to boat minigames,in this type of world/map,you would be playing minigames!Don’t Forget to invite your friends as playing with them makes the map enjoyable!

Note: Some worlds might not support multiplayer,you can change it in world settings!
title: Boat Minigames!

description:
Author: W1LTHEDUDE

This world has a lot to offer! With a custom made terrain, a waterfall, multiple awesome and unique houses, a big storage system, hidden dungeons and rooms, and hidden chests with loot inside, this world has everything! Over 10 structures and things to explore. Lots of hidden areas and rooms, can you find them all?!
title: Simple Spawns: Grassland Base

description:
Author: Sopasman

You've been sent as an investigator to find out what happened to a friend of yours at a mysterious house in the woods. Strange sounds have been heard coming from the house but no one have had the courage to investigate it further. Find a way to the house and investigate the situation. Just keep in mind that behind anything there might be a more complex truth. That might sound like a riddle, but it might also help prepare you in some way.
title: Uncaged II

description:
Author: Otonomega

This is a PvE arena map where you are challenged to fight hostile mobs in four separate arenas. You can either team up with up to five friends or play it alone to harness your skills in battle. There are plenty of different classes (with unique kits for each) and it's definitely one of the best maps you can play if you are up for a hard challenge.
title: Mob Arena Battles 1: Revamped Edition

description:
Author: RPS Studios

if you want a little action then download
title: Mega Parkour Masters

description:
Author: apexcroc

What Is Mafia?
Mafia is a game of skill and intelligence. This map comes with a variety of maps, roles and every game is different. Will you be mafia?

Roles
Mafia: Try and kill everyone without being discovered by the sheriff.

Sheriff: Find the mafia and end him.

Doctor: Heal everyone and keep them alive.

Innocent: Don’t Die

There are 4 different maps (shown below)
Camp

Swamp

Desert

Mineshaft
title: ApexCroc Mafia

description:
Author: DRATH TEAM

Wildfire is a puzzle map in which you have to go through the levels with different challenges, reaching the end and releasing the key to the next challenges. Each level contains a different challenge. Try to go through all the challenge rooms, coming to the end and getting the wool to open the next door!
title: WildFire

description:
<p>Author: AJ STUDIOS <p>

Do you love parkour or even just Minecraft? If so this exciting, interesting, quality parkour map, made by AJ Studios is perfect for you! More levels for this map in the future! Enjoy
title: Elemental Parkour

description:
Author: Vareide

This map is a survival games world set in an apocalyptic city which is suitable for anyone who is a fan of The Walking Dead or just find apocalyptic worlds fascinating in general. Personally, I think exploring the map is half the fun even though its main usage is supposed to be for PvP.
title: Apocalyptic City

description:
Author: Jasucard

The sequel to Classic Parkour 1 is here. Relive the good ol’ days of simple parkour mechanics. No Redstone magic(besides checkpoints) here. Only your skill will help you here. Good luck!
title: Classic Parkour 2

description:
Author: ancientmariner

AM Ballpark is a baseball stadium which won the first place in one of NebsGaming’s building competitions. It’s a highly realistic baseball stadium in which you can find everything from the traditional football field, spectator stands, lots of seats for different types of audiences (family, press etc) and much more. AncientMariner, the creator of the map, has surely gone the extra mile to provide a really cool stadium for all you baseball fans out there.
title: AM Ballpark

description:
Author: FUNKIERPARTY12

Ever heard of or been to this place with the best spa pools and saunas? If not, then this map is for you to explore. As in real life, Spa Castle MCPE is built for relaxation, comfort and an escape from the ordinary. But for Minecraft, if you’re exhausted from mining, fighting with monsters, or just want some peace & quiet, this map will keep you company whenever you’re taking a break from your other worlds.

There are also an unlimited amount of space surrounding Spa Castle (Since this was built on a flatland world) for you to build your own house, village, or big city. You can either do that, or just simply settle in the spa.

This is based off the Spa Castle in College Point, Queens NY.

Spa Castle first opened on May 12, 2007, given the name “In Spa World”. In 2012-2013, the name was officially changed to Spa Castle, also following renovation to improve the interior for the guests. I first stepped foot into Spa Castle on February, year of 2016.

Here are some screenshots of Spa Castle MCPE, from outside view to inside view.
title: Spa Castle MCPE

description:
Author: Cleverlike, SnakeyeZZ

Glass Tower is a minigame spleef map which requires at least two players (but preferably more) to be enjoyable to play. An addon is included to enable some new explosive items and other tweaks to make the minigame as smooth as possible to play. The objective is simple. Blow up the floor by using the explosives and be the last man or woman standing.
title: Glass Tower (Addon)

description:
Do you want to experience the wonder of Christmas and theme parks all in one? Christmas Adventure is a theme park with 3 rides and two shops, all themed to different aspects of Christmas!

*Please be aware that this has not changed the rides, it is just an update to the mechanics of them*. The map includes 3 rides (a launched coaster, a dueling coaster and a dark ride), a café and a gift shop. It is a small theme park, however there is a lot to do and see and it is very fun to go around with your friends.
title: Christmas Adventure

description:
Author: christian-beast

This map is a replica of Evac which is a multiplayer map in Call of Duty: Black Ops 3. It features an evacuation center which is centered on top of a huge complex building. The entire structure is overgrown and looks very post-apocalyptic. This is a ported map (with no shadow bugs) and you can use it for anything from hide and seek to a PvP battle arena.
title: Evac

description:
Author: Trinity Block

Transcendance is a strategy multiplayer map inspired of Werewolf and games inspired of this last one. The map is only working for 8 players for now but have a spectator system for other players. We will add support for more and less players when scoreboards will have been added on an official version (not in beta version).
title: Transcendance

description:
Author: ApoPotame

This map features a small Gladiator Arena which is best suited for 2-4 players. It's meant for deathmatch but there aren't any strict guidelines so feel free to do whatever you seem fit. Before starting each player will be able to choose between three different kits. It's definitely a nice map to use for training your short range battles techniques.
title: Gladiator Arena

description:
Author: Bayar97

Gorilla Island is like a small theme park which is located on the coast of one huge island. There are lots of different structures which you can explore here. For example, there's a huge gorilla head with eyes of lava and a medium-sized castle situated in the water. Are you someone who can't get enough of roller coasters? No problems, there are plenty of them here. Everything looks very Minecrafty and blocky but it's nonetheless a fun map to explore.
title: Gorilla Island

description:
Author: TheluckyguyNL

This map is about practice and teaching some parkour jumps. I will update it to add some more different parkour techs. I would also love to get feedback and suggestions.
title: Lulu Parkour School

description:
Author: bemz

Survival Games is a gametype built around the core of Minecraft; surviving. 24 tributes are spawned with nothing on the map, with one goal: to be the last alive. You must use your skills to discover supply crates to get weapons and food to aid you on your quest. You can form teams, or kill anything that steps in your way. Just remember, only one person can be the champion.

Survival Games is a game-type that specializes in survival-PVP.
Players are rounded up into a spawn point and is given a certain amount of time to find and craft items to defend themselves.
Players who are killed are kicked from the game and the rest compete to be the last man standing! Do you have what it takes to survive?

BEMZ has spent over a month thinking and creating ways of making the game feel more smooth and finished, one way they have achived this is by making the game completely random! Crates, the storm and players’ spawn points are all random. This means there is over 1 Million different outcomes for this game!

Using the power of Addons and resorce pack magic I have been able to replicate Server-like gameplay while still keeping the download size for the resorce pack very small.

The game runs optimization checks when you start the game to give you the best experiance for your device! That means there is little to no lag at all!
title: BEMZ | Survival Games

description:
Author: SharpStuff227

So, there are two lines:

1. The Great Minecraft Railway Line: From the Northern Terminal to the Egyptian Desert Settlement

2. The Great Frontier Railway (GFR): Starts at the Egyptian Desert Settlement currently runs upto the Hilltop Halt.
title: The Great Minecraft Railway

description:
Author: BluJayGames

This map features a survival world which has been built during a series of 31 Let's Play episodes and today's the first time it's being released as a download for the public. The world includes several redstone creations such as mob farms and smelters. But also just the base as a whole is really well designed which makes it something fun to explore. Just by watching his last episode I can tell that he's really knowledgeable about Minecraft and he also got an entertaining way to explore and share it in his videos.
title: BluJay's Let's Play World

description:
Author: Examinedcat669


What is Parkour Islands? Parkour Islands is one of the biggest parkour maps currently available for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. It currently features 9 levels, and a Tutorial to help you get started. Nothing ever gets boring as there is a good variety of jumps and obstacles. New content is also being worked on, and will be released with future updates. Have fun in Parkour Islands!

Levels:
Tutorial
Level 1: Dirtland
Level 2: Stood
Level 3: Slime Mania
Level 4: Redstonia
Level 5: The End?
Level 6: Into The Nether
Level 7: Rainbow
Level 8: MADNESS
(NEW!) Level 9: The Trials
title: Parkour Islands

description:
Author: ShaolinMiner

Fight for king and country in a war against the other team which preferably should consist of both players and non-player characters. You can also spawn in your own guards who will help fighting the other team. Castle Wars is supposed to be an intense battle with lots of fighting and there's just one way it'll end. Either you will win or you will die trying.
title: Castle Wars

description:
Author: Hivison

Are you ready for this exciting parkour journey? Go through six unique parkour challenges, the difficulty will greatly increase along the way. It is time for you to challenge your limit! Or you can just give it a tour and look for some cool jump ideas!
title: Mechanical-Section Parkour

description:
<p>Author: JASUCARD <p>

You’re placed in a room with your only task being to escape. Look around for secrets, find buttons, levers and pistons to place all to help you escape the room.

Escape the Room is a fairly easy puzzle map. There’s no fancy rules to this map. Simply just try and escape the room. All the rules of where you can place buttons, levers, etc.. will be given when you press the initial button to begin. Have fun, and Good Luck!
title: Escape the Room

description:
Author: BEEZEEBOX

Can you find the button in each level?
Test your finding skills in this fun, find the button Christmas special!

This is the first find the button map I have created – more COMING SOON!

– Find the button

– 5 small but challenging levels
title: Find The Button! (Christmas Special)

description:
Author: SCERRI

In this map you will have to try to save your abducted puppy about to be killed. Are you ready to save it by crossing different biomes? Please do not go creative as errors may occur!
title: Find The Button 4 (Story): Dream Edition

description:
Author: Spectro Anime

This map is based on Nuketown which is a popular map in Call of Duty: Black Ops. It has been designed to provide a great battle arena for close range battles. Weapons such as the bow have new textures and sounds to make it similar to a modern assault rifle. The map is recommended for multiplayer, but you can also spawn in custom mobs (such as NT Robots) to fight.
title: NukeTown

description:
Author: CreeperGamerZXZ

This map is a horror game which is inspired by the popular Five Nights At Freddie's video game. There have been three maps before it but this one is different. In this version you will not be limited to just cameras. No, instead you'll be walking around inside inside Frankbear's Pizzeria avoiding a scary animatronic.
title: One Night At Frankie's Freeroam

description:
Author: DJKenleyTrack

Treat your furry friends with the most respect by providing them with their own house. This creation includes 30 different designs for homes which are specifically meant for animals such as dogs, cats, pigs and plenty of other animals. Even though most of them are fairly simple to build they look really cozy.
title: 30 Animal Home Designs

description:
Author: DJKenleyTrack

Are you new to Minecraft and just want some place nice to live without having to build it yourself? If that's the case then this map is perfect for you. It spawns you at a small cottage which is situated in a plains biome. There is a river right next to the cottage which is a great spot for fishing. There are also lots of forests around the house which means you'll never run out of resources such as wood.
title: Simple Starter House

description:
Author: DarkSide Studios

Treasure wars, a fun minigame which brings Minecraft command block maps to a new level. this map actually inspired from famous minigame of the Hive Bedrock Server! Features: This map contains lots of possibilities and can promise a very fun time playing it! All of the features are listed below: Custom villager trades with the new villager UI! Custom blocks which prevent Griefing. Custom generators. Spectator mode. Custom Treasure model. Respawn system. 4 Teams, randomly picked! Support for an endless amount of players (above 4).
title: Treasure Wars

description:
Author: Vernian

The work on this map began back in August last year and today is the first time it’s being released. It’s based on a fictional island called Mysterious Island in a novel (The Mysterious Island) by Jules Verne. This same island has also been built at Tokyo DisneySea and that is the place which this same map is based on. It includes a new mobs and a fully customized terrain which you can explore.
title: Mysterious Island

description:
Author: Alvin Launcher1024

This flood escape map is a parkour map! You need to escape to the top and stand on the gold block to win!
title: Flood Escape!

description:
Author: disneyfan2005

This one of the best theme parks I have ever come across which is specifically created for Minecraft Pocket Edition. In the map you will find lots of different attractions such as roller coasters and even the Cinderella fairy tale castle. No matter whether you have or haven’t been to a Disney Park I highly recommend this map as it’s a very well built and detailed map!
title: DisneyPark (Theme Park)

description:
By WIXEL

Welcome to the "NATURAL PARKOUR" map. This is my first map created, I'm waiting for suggestions and opinions, but above all, have fun, If you see any inconvenience or failure in the map, let me know in the comments.
title: Nature Parkour (Spanish)

description:
Author: OposingCritt

This horror map is about you having a nightmare but there is something haunting and messing with your mind and its up to you to escape your own nightmare.
title: A Nightmare

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

There is a lot to be seen in this map, a lot of tales to be told, and even more fun to have! This map is a tropical paradise for anyone who needs one, but beware of the dangers that lurk below! If you want to influence the future of my map making.
title: The Beachside Boogie

description:
Author: raid-games

Raid battle is a 3-5 player battle map made in Minecraft. There’s 7 characters red, blue, yellow, green, orange, lime, and cyan and 6maps gardens, town, forest, hills, towers, and big hills. Each character and map are different so play them all and find out which one you like most.

How to play:
1.) choose a character

2.) pick a map and press the “start” button

3.) fight

4.) after fighting press the “end” button inside the arena

5.)press the “reset” and “clear” button near the characters

6.)repeat

About the characters:
red: iron armor, iron sword, power bow
Blue: iron armor, stone sword, 40hp
yellow: leather armor, iron sword, bow, quick charge crossbow, speed and jump boost effect
orange: iron armor, iron sword, crossbow, shield
Green: chain armor, iron sword, 3 crossbows
Lime: leather armor fire aspect gold sword, power bow, jump boost, speed
Cyan: leather armor, diamond sword, power bow
Purple: iron armor, sharpness wooden sword, power bow
Gray: has 4 variations
title: Raid: Battle

description:
Author: Funkymunke

Start out your next adventure gameplay in a small medieval village. It’s beautifully designed with lots of cute little houses, farmland and other nicely designed structures. In one end of the city you will find a large portal which will get you to the Nether. It’s really the perfect map if you want to live in a city but don’t want to do the hard work of building it.
title: Medieval City

description:
Author: ron_the_k

Freddy Fazbear’s Pizzeria Simulator it’s a recreation in Minecraft from the original game play with friends play some minigames and have fun with other animatronics and watch out when you going to the office evil animatronics awaiting there!
title: Freddy Fazbear’s Pizzeria Simulator

description:
Author: RylandPlayzYT

This is a creation which lets you view a preset 3D animation or create your own ones. It's actually much more immersive than a 3D movie seeing as you will be able to view the animation from multiple different angles. It's a fairly simple which doesn't last more than 10 seconds or so but it's still pretty cool.
title: 3D Animator Studio

description:
Author: Andiuber

Island Wars is a multiplayer map suitable for 2-10 players. There are two different teams (blue vs red) and each team will spawn on their own island. Every so often there will be chests spawning on your islands with the weapons you will need to take down the enemy team. There are 8 different weapons and each one work a little bit different. Every 30 seconds, 3 chests will be placed on each island containing different weapons. You can take the weapons you want, but you have to be careful that the opponent don’t attack you. Get together with your team to come up with a strategy to eliminate the enemy team.
title: Island Wars

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

The Rift is a custom made command block boss fight. The boss is basically a zombie, but unlike normal ones. This zombie is way stronger and can carry out multiple different attacks. Everything is powered by command blocks. It’s also programmed to track your movement and carry out special passive attacks (see about section). This map uses no special addons. Everything is vanilla based. There are 4 difficulties. Each difficulty decides the power-up spawn rate and the type of kit that you receive.
title: The Rift (Command Block Boss Fight)

description:
Author: ENDERCRAFT STUDIOS_

Parrot Village is in danger! The Village is running out of energy to run, and needs YOUR help! Exclusively made by Endercraft Studios, this 20-30 minute Adventure Map is a Perfect Way to spend you Minecraft Time! Save the village by completing challenges, mini games, and much much more along the way!
title: Jungle Adventure

description:
Author: awesome5185

The objective of the map is to complete 10 levels of parkour without dying. There are no checkpoints so this will most likely be one of the hardest parkour maps you ever play. And to make things even harder your health has been reduced to one half heart. One wrong step and you are dead and have to start over. As soon as you’ve loaded the world make sure that there is a behavior pack enabled. Go to Settings and then press the Behavior Packs button to check this. The included addon sets your health to one half heart. Your health isn’t visible in the interface for unknown reasons but it works fine anyways.
title: Half Heart Survival 2

description:
<p>Author: PIGFORDAY <p>
A new map from the “Find The Button” genre. This map contains 10 unique city-themed levels, where you have to find the button to get to the next level. Some levels may be more challenging than the others, but they are still possible.

Have fun!
title: Find the Button: City!

description:
Author: SpiderDestroyer

This map is inspired by the minigame УLucky Blocks ChallengeФ which is played by SSundee and MrCrainer on a weekly basis. Invite a friend (or multiple friends) to participate in the challenge. The setup is pretty simple. All players will get some lucky blocks which they have to destroy in order to obtain items which can be traded for other items you can use for combat in a PvP arena.
title: Lucky Block Challenge

description:
Author: POCKETKENT

Do you lack of inspiration for your home? Then you need to energize your home with interior ideas and furnitures from here! Tons of ideas, furnitures, and style for every part of your room!
title: Modern Interior Ideas

description:
Author: TheBlue

Start out on a small planet (based on the Overworld in Minecraft) and use the resources you find to explore the rest of the galaxy and its planets. There are tons of different planets and each one look very different from the other. For example, one planet is made out of just slime blocks and another is a miniature of The End.
title: Skyblock Planet

description:
Author: WISHLOLZ

This is a very powerful kingdom with a big castle in the middle. As for now, there are only a few buildings and a castle. The whole planned city will be made in a medieval style but the map is in the 1800s. This map is a WIP, do expect updates.

This is a very powerful kingdom with a big castle in the middle. As for now, there are only a few buildings and a castle. The whole planned city will be made in a medieval style but the map is in the 1800s. This map is a work in progress, do expect updates.

The castle:

The castle is quite big but only has a few rooms and that is because most of the space is the throne room. If you see armour stands wearing armour, just imagine them as guards.

The town:

In the town, there are currently 3 buildings. Two of them is a house and another is a workplace. In the same town, next to the town, there is a statue of a past king..

The enemy:

For now, they are just a normal village. Nothing special, just some scaffolding and banners.
title: Kingdom (WIP)

description:
Author: JoaBroYT

Missing Color is a map where you need to find your way around in a black and white environment. Since there are barely any colors it really makes it much more difficult to figure out where to get next in order to complete a level. However, all of the levels are possible and there's no timer so you really have as much time you want to complete it.
title: Missing Color 2

description:
Author: Vechrozilator

This a parkour game with a new twist where there are a lot of fake platform in its ways such as the platform will disappear when you jump there or there is hidden barrier there that block your way or the fire will appear once you step on it and many other things that trolls you.
title: Troll Parkour

description:
Author: Mod Creator

Welcome to TNT wars a minigame that is all about tnt and explosions. This is a automatic refreshing map meaning you don’t have to copy the world over and over. And there can be as many people as you want in it.

There are two teams: Red and Blue. At the beginning you can click the buttons to which ever team you wish.
title: Minigames: TNT Wars

description:
Author: DREDDING2000

Behold… Pac-Man in Minecraft

I like the games. I like games so much. I made one of my favorite games in another one of my favorite games. I liked playing Pac-Man before going to get my teeth checked. I did not like going to the dentist but: it was worth it by playing Pac-Man.

But sadly. I don’t live there anymore.
title: Pac-Man

description:
Author: walkertyme

Dead by Daylight PE is a multiplayer survival minigame based on a video game with the same name. The map features a 100 x 100 blocks game area where survivors have to activate 5 different generators to be able to open a gate and escape. All of this needs to happen while avoiding and hiding from the Killer (which is a role assigned for another player).
title: Dead by Daylight PE

description:
<p>Author: WEEDEDMUFFIN385 <p>
Play on this map with your friends. Rules are easy to know; At the start of the game random player from terrorists team gets detonator and also from opposite team (counter-terrorists0 random player gets defusers. Terrorist need to plant bomb on bombplace and counter-terrorists need to kill all terrorists or defuse bomb. It is easy and fun!
title: Shoot and Loot

description:
Author: NECRONZ

Welcome to Broland!

This map is inspired by youtuber called Pewdiepie.

Hope you enjoyed the map

This map is way more better if you have the Pewdiepack Bedrock

Build and Create other building your own

Explore the whole world! Work and Build!
title: Pewdiepie’s Broland!

description:
Author: GULDMASTER12

Hello, and welcome to my map.,in this map you are a king and one of your villages got burnt down and now you kingdom [ALBION] has a new enemy the pillager army you have to stop…..hurry
title: Castile The Quest

description: Guess Who! is a simple minigame for two players. Each player will pick and block and then try to guess which block the other player has chosen by asking yes or no questions. One game usually takes a few minutes so decide on multiple rounds before beginning.
title: Guess Who!

description:
Author: SkyGames

Beast Battles is a PvE minigame where you’ll find yourself in an arena having to battle different kinds of hostile monsters. Collect experience points and trade them at the shop for new weapons, food and other items which will come useful to survive the waves of monsters. You can either play it with other players or alone. It’s fun either way!
title: SG Beast Battlers

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

The adventurer’s Amazement is my biggest (publcally available) glitch-free custom terrain yet! It is a huge map with a ton of things to explore, and dungeons to crawl! If you want to influence the future of my map making.
title: The Adventurer’s Amazement

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

Untenable means ‘Illogical’, a map where nothing makes sense. There are ten levels in which the objective may be anything, from finding a button to doing the most obvious things. The map is made to distract you from your main goal. Can you pass all ten levels? This map is made for versions 1.5 and above (not tested in beta versions).
title: Untenable 2

description:
<p>Author: DANIELDEAK70 <p>
How scary can Minecraft be? This map is based on the gameplay style of the Alien Isolation and features single player horror, Custom Sound effects, a dynamic alien that hunts you down and Advanced command block features. Custom Animated textures going to be added in a next version, maybe.
title: Alien: Bedrock Isolation

description:
Author: TheluckyguyNL

This is a Find The Button map which me and some friends made. Some of the levels are made by me and other levels are made by my friends. I hope you enjoy it anyways. This is also my first map.
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: CryingGolem2636

Hot Feet is a minigame (very similar to Sand Scrambler) which requires at least two players but preferably more. It's a very intense and exciting type of gameplay where you always gotta keep moving around. Each player is equipped with a flint & steel which can be used to set the ceiling on fire and make sand fall down and suffocate other players (or yourself if you aren't careful).
title: Hot Feet

description:
Author: SliceOfMinecraftCake22

Welcome to a serene and calm void where you can practice easy parkour in 15 different courses that anyone can master in a flash. Have fun and play with your friends as well as you race towards victory, I even made a custom addon for this world specifically which you can use custom made potions and foods to help you travers this tricky track.
title: Sky Islands Parkour!

description: This is a great minigames map which is best played together with at least one other player. There are more than 20 different minigames and they range from PvP battle arenas to waterslides and boat races. There are lots of different choices of what you can do and that is to make sure that the time you spend playing it will be filled with fun moments.
title: Adventure++

description:
Author: ENDERCRAFT STUDIOS

Do you love parkour or even just Minecraft? If so this exciting, interesting, quality parkour map, made by Endercraft Studios is perfect for you! 4 Complete Parkour levels and a custom skin pack coming soon!
title: Four Elements Parkour

description:
Author: AgentCPU0

Fire up those neurons! It’s time for eight confusing puzzles which will get your mind working. Most of the challenges include some sort of redstone mechanism which you must use to complete the level. Each level has its own set of rules so make sure to read the signs carefully before moving onto the next level.
title: Behind Locked Doors

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Come and spend your Christmas holiday relaxing like a millionaire. This vast mansion, built into a cliff, has been dressed up for a season you won’t forget. Come and explore.
title: Christmas at Durton Cliff

description:
Author: Cody2074

This is a PvP map which lets you customize the colors of the arena and it's all done by using a simple selection system (powered by redstone and command blocks). It uses 16 of the new concrete blocks and you can combine them any way you like. Players are given some weapons and gear but also some wood planks which they can use for skybasing.
title: BasinPVP

description:
Author: SHAPESHIFT STUDIOS

Down in Delta, the worker (you), was out to work in a space station, and there was no one around but you and the AI. You are giving missions that are needed to do your job. Space Shenanigans Delta is a map that was originally start by SkyGames, but has been continued by a team called Shapeshift Studios.

#How to play

Follow your compass to guide you to the next objective.
title: Space Shenanigans

description:
Author: MattH44

Do you like food? Well, you must, if you have survived this far in life! This is a food themed parkour map consisting of 10 different levels. In each level you will be jumping around on different food items such as pizzas, candy canes or toasts. Jump from one block to another to finally reach a pressure plate to teleport to the next level. Have fun!
title: Food Parkour

description:
Author: awayne99

This is a creation which is based on the design of the Batcave in the Batman: Arkham Knight video game. This is the best version of the Batcave which I’ve come across for Minecraft Pocket Edition. It really looks like a cave but with a lot of high-technology stuff which you would expect to find in Batman’s headquarters.
