Even if you haven’t played the game (like me) it’s still really fun to explore!
title: Batman: Arkham Knight Batcave

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is the second part of the SG Dreaming map series. The story is quite similar to the first part where you wake up in your bed, but aren’t really sure whether you’re awake or still dreaming. There are multiple occasions all throughout the map which could be considered scary but that’s of course all dependent on your own tolerance level when it comes to fear. It’s slightly longer than the first part and it also includes more Easter eggs.
title: SG Dreaming Part 2

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Explore a millionaire’s rural paradise — a secluded British manor house set within a forest with expansive grounds and amenities. This complex has a completed exterior and interior. There will be one more update to include: cinema, gym, airstrip, pool house, guest house, wine cellar, etc. Please comment with suggestions for the final update.
title: Titan Manor

description:
Author: skygames

This desert mansion is perfect for your adventures in the barren lands. On your way back from an adventure, stop at this house and enjoy 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a kitchen, lounge area, and many more things to keep you comfortable.
title: Drylands – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: poccetblocc

With more than 10 coasters, multiple attractions and resturaunts, and a new hotel, you are sure to find something for every Minecraft player!

Featuring 6 different biomes, each attraction is matched to its surrounding atmosphere.
title: Woodlands of Wonder

description:
<p>Author: KRAFTOID <p>


The $1,000,000 home, powered with Artificial Intelligence+, modern state-of-the-art design, and useful utilities on the interior on your home! You’ll never want another home for your friend and gamemates again this time!
title: $1,000,000 Spectacular AI Mansion

description:
Author: Avrin09

Avrin City includes one big city with several huge skyscrapers and other modern buildings which are fun exploring. It’s still very much a work in progress as there are many open and undeveloped areas, but hopefully those will be populated soon as well. This reason for this update is to adhere to the on-going National Referendum for the 2017 Constitution to be ratified. If you like cities, then Avrin Country has it all!
title: Avrin City

description:
Author: ScareCrew

This huge lab complex is situated far deep into the jungle. It features four interconnected large rooms which can be useful if you want to experiement with some new add-on or similar. It looks quite similar to the lab where The Diamond Minecart records some of his videos.
title: Jungle Lab

description:
Author: juliusscizzor

Did you think there will never be a closely accurate remake of SCP: Containment Breach on Minecraft Bedrock? Well you were wrong! This is an early developmental map made using only vanilla commands and redstone, with my own resource pack (with only sounds and textures) Main Features -Most details of the intro sequence – Light Containment Zone -SCP-173
title: SCP: Containment Breach

description:
Author: SkyGames

Compass Survival is a small ordinary terrain map with a North, East, South and West indicator at your hotbar. This cannot be added to any other world. It will only work with this map as it is done with commands. It can be used to locate and point your friends in the right direction. The compass will automatically update as you turn around in-game.
title: Compass Survival

description:
Author: BRANDON TAN

Tired of the old rain and want something new? Im here to the rescue you with a recreation as a command of a function pack by Blue Commander, Creeper Rain

How will it work?

You will spawn in a world beside a village and in front of the commands. Climb the ladder and pull the lever to start. Upon realeasing the lever you have 30 seconds before the first wave of Creeper will came crashing down on you. It will then continuelestly rain Creepers every 30 seconds. There will be also green particles above your head spraying down on you.
title: Creeper Rain

description:
Author: Gab_The_Crafter

Hide n Seek is a popular minigame for multiplayer games. But this map in particular has a twist to it which makes it possible for you to change the map each round. There are two different maps currently and they include Temple and Pirate Ship and one additional with be added in the future.
title: Hide n Seek

description:
Author: Brix_18

6 BLOCKS 6 SECRETS 6 ROOMS

Hello! Welcome to another Escape Room Part 2! THE RETURN! Have you enjoyed playing the Part 1? This Part 2 is a lot harder than the part 1! If you want to download the part 1 search “Escape Room: Do or Die” Big Mazes, Invisible Parkours, Finding Keycards and MANY MORE! So what are you waiting for?
title: Escape Room 2: The Return

description:
Author: Ligged

This map features the famous lucky blocks that were created 100% with commands, without the need for texture pack, mods or add-ons. In addition, the map includes two game modes to enjoy 1-4 players.
When you start the map you will appear in a small lobby where you will have to choose FIRST the game mode and then choose which player number you want to be
title: Lucky Blocks

description:
Author: Ex0ticLettuce

Try to make it out of the temple alive while more of your friends are killed and turned into hunters! Run, hide, and collect powerups to try to loose the hunters and outlive the timer, If you make it through the exit doors you win!
title: Temple Trouble

description:
Author: Xeno of Cyprus

This is a modified desert village which contains commerce and cultivation areas, all the houses are decorated, this village was built in Minecraft PE. This is a very large village and to entertain yourself, enjoy it.
title: Modified Desert Village

description:
Author: Jhomes

The flying house is the ultimate solution for anyone who like owning a house but at the same time enjoy to move around and don't be stuck to just one place. It's also a very safe way of living since you can literally park your house in the sky and never have to worry about monsters intruding (at least not in the Overworld where there are no flying monsters).
title: Controllable Flying House

description:
Author: CRIMSON DEVELOPMENT TEAM

Welcome to Minecraft PE’s #1 zoo!
What you seek here isn’t just an ordinary zoo. In that case, Crimson Zoo is the #1 destination for zoos! Started with Worlds for Minecraft by Kayen Works for iOS, we have now moved to the growing MCPEDL!

In Crimson Zoo, you can:

 

– MEET ANIMALS – Say hello to over 15+ animals and 2 areas!

– Current areas include:

– Natural Area

– Minecraft Earth Area (used w/ addons)

 

– PLAY GAMES – Ranging from animal facts to horse racing, the

zoo also has games too!

– Games include:

– FAX (in demo)

– Horse Racing (in development)

– Hostile Mob Arena (in development)
title: Crimson Zoo

description:
Author: SkySlimeCrafter

Find The Button is probably the most self-explanatory minigame in Minecraft. This map consists of 10 different levels and in each one there is a button which you need to find. One thing that really makes this particular map stand out is that all of the levels are very well designed. For example, in one level you'll be at a nice cottage by a lake and in another level you'll find yourself on the beac
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is a recreation in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition of SethBling’s popular DeathSwap survival minigame. You’ll need two players to play the game and it’s similar to normal survival mode except that you will randomly switch places with the other player. This means that there’s an ever-changing survival environment with new difficulties and potential traps. The objective is to be the last surviving player!
title: SG DeathSwap

description:
<p>Author: GUNNER BOSSGR <p>


If you want to play a 2D arcade game then this one is the right for you Bubble Bobble this time is a mini game than an addon! You can play this game alone, it cant be multiplayer for now!

It’s also easy to play on both devices, since it has automatic shooting!

It also includes custom music just like in the game of Bubble Bobble 2!
title: Bubble Bobble

description:
Author: darksidestudios

Have you ever played Spleef? How about on a pizza? DS pizza spleef is a fun minigame for as many as you wish! Grab a shovel and defeat your friends(or enemies ;)) You can easily download it by clicking download below.

How to play?
– Spleef is a minigame where you have to destroy the blocks beneath other

players to make them fall. Be the last player standing to win.
title: DS : Pizza Spleef

description:
Author: Examinedcat669

Find The Pressure Plate is a minigame in which you must find the pressure plate that’s hidden on a secret location in each level. It’s basically the same as Find The Button, but with pressure plates. This map includes 13 different levels and each one is set in a different environment. For example, one level is set in a Nether like environment, and another on a nice beach.
title: Find the Pressure Plate

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

This is a survival map with similarities to SkyBlock. It features many different planets and some of them, such as Earth, are inspired by ones found in our own solar system. There are also other astronomical bodies like asteroids and moons. Your most foremost objective is to survive but then also find a way to explore other planets to scavenge for food and other items necessary for your survival.
title: Planetary Survival

description:
Author: xcrossyyt

Have you ever wanted to just knock your friend off a 100+ block platform? Well now you can playing Platform wars. This map was created by XcrossyYT and YallSuckAtCod on Xbox! The last one standing on the platform wins!

HOW TO PLAY?
i recommend playing with friends on discord this game requires 2-4 players when you start the game make sure you have slot 1 selected in your hot bar so it will enchant your wooden sword with knock-back. After you and other players get telported onto the platform a 5 second timer will start on your screen while it’s counting down everyone get into a corner on the platform when it hits 0 you will be given diamond armor a shield and a wooden sword with knockback. from there you attempt to knock other players off the platform! Once there is only 1 more player on the platform they are the winner then the people who died in that game can click play again at spawn!
title: Platform Wars

description:
Author: GAB_THE_CRAFTER

The sewer horror map revolves mainly in the sewer as the title suggests, where you must find 8 bags of gold scattered around the place and escape one and only enemy!


Story:

In this map you are a homeless person who lives on the street by himself but one day while a bank truck passing by it had an unexpected accident cause 8 bags of gold fall on the stinky sewer and you decided to retrieve the 8 bags all by yourself but in the sewer you are not alone, You must run for your life!
title: The Sewer

description:
Author: minecraftstyler777

One of the most legendary pickaxes in the Minecraftian universe has been stolen by an evil force. Anyone who’ve got the pickaxe have an equal power to that of God. It’s an immediate threat to the world and you’ve been sent on a mission to take back what was stolen and restore the world order.
title: Tomb Crafter: The Legendary Pickaxe

description:
Author: AutoGrind, VanillaGrinders

TNT Toss is an exciting multiplayer minigame where teams have to throw explosive TNTs at each other's ships to ultimately destroy them. The ship is essential for a team's survival since falling overboard will result in an immediate death (and if it happens to the entire team then it's a game loss). As a whole, it's an enjoyable and well designed minigame which has been optimized to work for low-end devices (4 chunk render distance).
title: TNT Toss

description:
Author: McMCPE1234

The Tower: Parkour is a unique parkour map that uses a new experimental mechanic of limited lives. This new mechanic will challenge players and will make them think twice about jumping recklessly.
title: The Tower: Parkour

description:
Author: Aden Lynn

Play with your friends in fun and engaging minigames

Each minigame was manually built, by yours truly. As the owner and the main creator in the world, I’ve tried my best to give all players on the world the best experience possible.
If you want to see all the work I’ve put in, you can see the changelog in the Info Centre, where I’ve written down, essentially, everything I’ve ever worked on in the world.
title: Minegames

description:
Author: Valkies

HOWDY! Looking for a Hard task? Well this map is for you! This has some difficult Find The Button maps!
title: Ultimate Find The Button

description:
Author: BluFlyaway

This map includes multiple different minigames such as Disasters, King of the Hill and Hide & Seek. It has been in the works for somewhere around 8 months and it has been through thorough tests to ensure functionality. The games are mostly powered by command blocks and redstone and they are all possible to reset once they have been played. You can choose whether to play this map alone in single player or in multiplayer.
title: Blu’s MiniGame Map

description:
Author: thecaramelkingdomm

This is my first time making a map and sharing it online. I really hope you guys enjoy the map! The map includes two “GetDown” levels which basically means that you need to get down without dying by using your parkour skills. The map also includes a minigame. (Recommended for 1-10 players.)
title: GetDown!

description:
Author: revenjoakim

This is my FoxCo Tower, fictional Avengers Tower which you can find in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. It includes the lower part of the metlife building and grand central station (modified) There are some decorated floors in the center of the main tower. For the rest can you let your imagination get crazy!
title: FoxCo Tower

description:
Author: zucth

This map is based on Visage (by SadSquare Studio) which is a first-person psychological horror game. Your objective in the map is to find the truth, find an item and if necessary hide from Lucy and her insidious friend! In this map there is no story and the game is designed for two players. One of you will play as Lucy and the other one will play as a survivor. Find out who will be the last survivor!
title: [VISAGE]

description:
By Wormwal

Nation Of Calvada is a nation map project in Minecraft. Focusing on both the city and also the countryside. This nation map is a remastered version of my previous work -Mojave Region. This project is still in it's 'rebuilding phase' and it will soon be one of the largest maps created for Minecraft again. Please do visit Nation of Calvada and see the many buildings and it's countryside.

Nation of Calvada was created in 17 April 2013. Over the years, It has received a ton of reconstruction, quality standard of building and city planning has improved. As of the latest 1.0.4 update, there are 2 cities (Las Vegia and Grandia) and of course a few areas around the map. There are a lot of things to see in the map, visit the many skyscrapers, the suburban area, the shops, public services and more to discover. I hope you have a good day in Calvada!
title: Nation Of Calvada

description:
Author: Kandymusic88, Frank Reese

Quest Open RPG is a an adventure and exploration map with 8 main quests and 9 side quests as well as a few hidden Easter eggs. There’s a custom trading system, several dungeons and supposedly hours worth of gameplay. It appears to be built in an old world type but it’s nonetheless a quite interesting and fun terrain map to explore.
title: Quest Open RPG

description:
Author: jackalot

Castle Wars is a multiplayer map where you have to build a castle and then defend it against the other team. It's a really fun mix of gameplay where you'll start out building a castle and then fight to protect it in a battle. The main objective for both teams are to protect an obsidian block. The team which first loses its obsidian block has lost the game. Make sure to read through the instructions in-game.
title: Castle Wars

description:
Author: azozgamer936

After Zombies failed to invade Zombie Hero: Assault, the Zombie Master came to the Hero and his Side-kick peacefully, He asked for a rematch- But, In this world There is no such thing as Side-Kick and there is no such thing as Hero! Just Humans Vs Zombies. Zombies are more stronger, and Humans have more places to hide in! Let our war begin!
title: Zombie: Mega Assault

description:
Author: GAMMEX

Epican Republic consists of two main cities and combined they include hundreds of structures such as suburban homes, skyscrapers, stadiums and churches. The main thing which I like about this map is that it looks very “Minecrafty”. The building style is much similar to how the default structures in Minecraft look like (e.g. villages). The only downside is that it is built in a flat world and that means that you are limited to the cities and can’t really go anywhere else.
title: Epican Republic

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Mexa is a new survival world series which include advanced world edit and really cool survival maps. This release includes a desert world with multiple mountains, a small mirage and a nice sandy beach in a sandy biome. Just keep in mind that the world doesn’t include all the necessary items to survive. For that you will need to use a boat to get to the map border where the ordinary world is generated.
title: SG Mexa: Desert

description:
Author: BenjaminTheJump

A Reimagined version of SkyBlock with islands based on the elements.

You will only get water in the water island and only get lava on the fire island, so survive and get resources in the Elemental Islands!
title: Elemental Islands

description:
Author: Jeracraft

This map features an Arabic city constructed in a desert biome. The city is quite big and there is lots of beautiful terrain surrounding the city. But maybe most impressing is old temple found in the main center of the city. It was originally created on PC by Jeracraft who is a popular YouTuber. It's really a great map well worth exploring!
title: Arabian Desert City

description:
Author: NateTGM

This map is inspired by a game in ROBLOX called Prison Life. It's basically a multiplayer minigame where guards have to watch over prisoners and keep them from escaping the prison. It's a quite open-ended map since there is no strict path a player must go. The only way that prisoners can win are by escaping but that also comes with a risk of getting killed.
title: Prison Life

description:
By MenGamer_off

A very fun game mode to survive on an island in the sky but with the difficulty that now you have to Fish all your items to survive in this world.

Sky Fishing It is a SkyBlock game mode but with the difficulty that you have to fish to survive in this world.

In this game mode with you the following.
title: SkyFishing - SkyBlock Survival

description:
Author: mineclan888

This Realm is the sequel to our first realm made only a year ago. Our team has taken the time to create a new and improved Fan Realm 2.0! The realm has new and incredible features that make it amazing! Remember this is version 1.0 so realm still contains many bugs, but those will be fixed in the realm overtime!
title: KC Minigames

description:
Author: mcpedash

This minigame is similar to Find The Button, but there’s a major difference. Instead of searching for hidden buttons you will have to find hidden friends. At each level your friend will be hiding somewhere. To access the next level you have to search for your friend and find him. There are 10 different levels.
title: Find My Friends

description:
Author: CameronTheWolf

This map includes 9 different levels divided into 5 different sections. It’s an elytra map, so that means you’ll be flying around in order to complete the different levels. The primary objective is to fly through the rings and land on an island to advance to the next level. This map works for single player and multiplayer mode (max 2 players).
title: Nine Levels

description:
Author: ron_the_k

The Abandoned:Warehouse it’s a horror free roam game with custom sounds and objectives follow them carefully and try at least to survive..also you can believe if this is a fan game or not You are a janitor who had worked in previous places for some money you was just cleaning floors and have things perfect but then a call suggests for you a new job.
title: The Abandoned: Warehouse

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a new minigame based on minigolf. There are 15 different courses and each of them are based on biomes in Minecraft. Play by yourself or invite some friends to play. Each player gets a ball and their objective is to get it in the hole (hopper by the flag) in the least amount of throws as possible. Throw the ball item and it will slip due to ice underneath the carpet. Some courses have additional challenges like soul sand, slime blocks and water.
title: Matt’s Minigolf: Biomes Edition

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG CraftBros is a minigame inspired by one of Hypixel’s popular games called Smash Heroes. Players choose a hero class and then fight each other in five different arenas. The arenas are fairly small and thus it’s most suitable for maybe 2-4 players, but there’s really no limit. If you are looking for a simple, but fun PvP minigame then this is a great choice.
title: SG CraftBros

description:
Author: Rian Basudewa

All rooms on this SCP Site 59-TR

Light containment zone

Heavy containment zone

Personnel room

Cafetaria

SCP chambers
title: SCP Site 59-TR

description:
Author: CoalsGuide

This is an attempt to recreate We Will Rock You by Queen in Minecraft. It’s one of those songs most people have heard, so that means you’ll most likely recognize it as well. Even though it doesn’t sound as an exact replica as there are obvious limitations with the vanilla Minecraft sounds, there are definitely similarities in terms of the rhythm.
title: WeWillRockYou (Song)

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

This map includes 10 different automatic farms which most of them can prove very useful and especially for survival worlds where resources sometimes are scarce. The creations have been carefully optimized to make their efficiency make up for their cost for building them.
title: 10 Automatic Farms

description:
Author: TheLastHacker

Have you ever wanted a top-secret authority to share with your friends, then you have come to the right place. In the future, there will be multiple bases, connected by secret underground tunnels,
title: Top Secret Authority

description:
Author: ChCody2074, Logan2922, Madrussianeete

This is a medium sized player vs. player map which is suitable for a large group of players. There are 10 different kits to choose between and most of it is designed to let the players decide the way they want to play themselves. It's great map if you want to improve on your fighting skills while having some fun with your friends!
title: Volcanic Desert

description:
Author: MaiconAF

Do you like to have fun with friends? This is the ideal map for you who like a hide and seek. This map has more than 10 hiding places for you to escape from the catchers.
title: Hide And Seek School

description:
By Skyify

Hey! Im Skyify and ive created a 2000 x 2000 block map! The map is full of rocky mountains, hills, rivers and much more! Explore through this map with friends or family! The choice is yours!
title: The Deserted Valley

description:
Author: I RedPenguin I

Hand Island is a huge island shaped as the palm of a hand. At the main center of the island you will find a forest and some mountains. And at the fingers (which are basically peninsulas) you’ll find a hilly terrain with beach coastlines and trees. Surrounding the island there is a huge ocean. However, if you travel far enough you’ll eventually reach some mainland. The map is useful for both survival gameplay and for creative building.
title: Hand Island

description:
Author: Splayer28410

This is a creation of a Zoo named ‘Lapiz Point Zoo’. It is a very detailed and big map which you can explore or use for roleplay it has many rooms for different animals. Plus with easter eggs, signs e.t.c. Enjoy!!!
title: Lapiz Point Zoo

description:
Author: TheUndercoverCactus

Bikini Bottom is the city and main setting for the SpongeBob SquarePants animated TV series. This map includes everything from SpongeBob’s own pineapple house to the Bikini Bottom Mall. If you’ve ever watched it on TV then we can guarantee you will find many similarities to this Minecraft Pocket Edition map. To really get in a SpongeBob mood we recommend that you download a SpongeBob skin!
title: Bikini Bottom

description:
Author: agentcpu0

The Hungry Bot is an AI pet which loves food. Basically it's a food eating robot which for unknown reasons has been brought to life in Minecraft. And it's your job, as the pet owner, to feed him and make sure he always stays satisfied. The Hungry Bot doesn't age and die so there's really no end goal here except for continuing to feed him in all eternity. (Hopefully this isn't the future of artificial intelligence in the real world..)
title: The Hungry Bot

description:
Author: Grany Morris

Granyland is a unique and really one-of-a-kind type of city which is scattered over a large chunk of land. It's great for anyone who enjoy open-world exploring since there are a wide range of buildings which you will be able to come across. The architecture is something unique and much of it include cool and fairly complex redstone contraptions.
title: Granyland

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a parkour map which includes 15 different levels and each one is based on a different color. It’s similar to most other parkour maps in that sense that you need to complete a series of challenging parkour courses to complete it. Included in each track there are some more difficult blocks like burning magma blocks or slippery ice blocks which will challenge your jumping skills a bit further. This map works well for both single player mode and multiplayer.
title: Rainbow Parkour

description:
Author: chemicalweapons

Pyke Castle is a map which is inspired by Casterly Rock in the Game of Thrones. It features a medium sized castle built on top of a mountain rock. Surrounding the island is mostly water with a few small islands scattered out here and there. The castle itself doesn’t have any interior, so that will be your quest to build while trying to survive on the island.
title: Pyke Castle

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

This is a minigame where one player will be the trapper whose mission it is to trap and kill the other player who tries to complete an obstacle course. The obstacle course consists mostly of parkour jumps and at some levels you'll get different effects to help you. It's a very intense map, especially if you are the runner, because then you have to constantly worrying about the other player trying to stop you.
title: Deathrun

description:
Author: HAVOC INS4NITY

FS NUK3TOWN is a minigame remake of COD: Black Ops 3 NUK3Town and includes features like a lobby which serves as the main menu, a black market shop, custom classes and an automatic match system which starts with the click of a button. This map is a Free For All gamemode and can hold as many players as you want.
title: FS NUK3TOWN

description:
Author: crackedcubes

This mansion is larger than it looks. Come and relax this Christmas in style. This manor house is larger than it looks–and has been decorated throughout for Christmas, both inside and out.
title: Christmas at Fox Manor

description:
Author: skygames

Boat Battlers is the classic Boat Exploding Game! Battle with your friends by exploding and knocking them into the poisonous water! Fight with the ordinary bomb, fire bomb, speed bomb, and the nuke bomb! They all work in different ways and can destroy the enemies boat!
title: Boat Battlers

description:
Author: CircularAlloy

Journey with friends or yourself through multiple different, unique worlds while defending yourself from zombies, skeletons, spiders, and anything you can think of, as long as they want you dead!
title: Super Zombie Run

description:
Author: 2cuteredstonekitty

Elmsville is a small, modern city which is mainly meant for roleplaying. Everything is interactive, from the showers (which actually work) to the garage doors and shops. Lots of commands and redstone have been implemented into the map in order to make the experience great. It’s perfect to use for role-play!
title: Elmsville: A Modern City

description:
Author: Xeno of Cyprus

This is a map which has four islands of different biomes in which you must survive from the zombies and others that will appear depending on the chosen difficulty
title: Mob Arena Biomes

description:
Author: Kidsource

This is a simple adventure map which takes place in the Diamond Village. Villagers have lived there for ages but last night something horrific happened. One of their elders were kidnapped by some evil monsters. The villagers need your help to save the elder and bring him back safely to the village.
title: Simple Adventure

description:
Author: TerrySze

This map is unlike most maps. The main objective is to kill yourself in order to be able to move onto the next level. In each new level you will find either a set of items in a chest and/or blocks in a room which you have to use in a way to kill yourself. It might sound kind of depressive but it’s definitely a quite fun thing to do but only in Minecraft only of course! Here are a few of the levels which you will find in the map. Some of them include redstone puzzles which you sometimes must solve in order to enable some type of mechanism which you can use to shorten your life.
title: 20 Ways to Die

description:
Author: ArcStudios05

Modern House Two is a beautiful simple home
title: Modern House Two

description:
Author: WEEDEDMUFFIN385

Play on this map with your friends. Rules are easy to know; At the start of the game random player from terrorists team gets detonator and also from opposite team (counter-terrorists0 random player gets defusers. Terrorist need to plant bomb on bombplace and counter-terrorists need to kill all terrorists or defuse bomb. It is easy and fun!
title: Counter-Strike

description:
Author: PigmanGamerCXC

Baldi wants you to keep the fire going so you have to go collect some sticks then go back to refill. If you want to drop the sticks, select the stick so it will drop automatically. If you let the fire go out, Baldi will chase you with his ruler. Baldi has set up bear traps around so watch out for it.
title: Baldi’s Field Trip

description:
Author: M7MoGameR

This map features a relatively small house but with much more to show. There are over 60 redstone creations and together they use more than 500 command blocks. This is by no means your typical house but it’s actually most likely the best and most optimized house you can get for both survival and creative mode.
title: RS Smart Modern House Super Ultra

description:
Author: LOLIEDOOM

Epic Battle is a fun and challenging mini-game inside Minecraft. Players will spawn in a little village, where they will loot chests, craft items, etc. While that’s happening, a series of events will occur where you have to take care of that, as well as your opponent. Last person standing wins!

IF CERTAIN MECHANICS DON’T WORK, TURN UP RENDER DISTANCE!

An unlimited number of players will spawn in a village. Each will have to scavenge the building and landscapes for loot. Battle other players after the 8 second grace period ends. Hold up! a monster appeared! In Epic Battle, random events will occur making for a more challenging experience. You have around 1-2 minutes to be the last one standing!
title: Epic Battle

description:
Author: CANINEPRAWN6409

In this zombie game, you will have to escape a mansion which is full of zombies. You only have one stone sword to fight the zombies.

This game is suitable for both multiplayer and singleplayer. (multiplayer is recommended cuz it’s so dam hard)
title: Escape The Zombs

description:
Author: K73MC

Find the Button custom map. This map is multiplayer friendly and will not break with multiple players. So that being said invite your friends to join you on this journey.
title: Find The Button: The Adventure Begins

description:
Author: megastrikermcpe

Elytra Elite is an incredible elytra map consisting of 7 different levels which all are equally awesome. It might not sound like a lot of levels but I can assure you that some of them are insanely difficult. This map is a little bit different from other elytra maps as parts of it is similar to dropper maps except that you now will be flying. This is by far the best elytra map which I have played to date.
title: Elytra Elite

description:
Author: COASTERCRAFTER1

Cedar Camp is a Fictional Cedar Fair Park I created. Inspired of my 5 favorite theme Parks Cedar Point Knott’s Berry Farm Dorney Park King’s Dominion and Six Flags Magic Mountain. The Park Features 16 Coasters with pixelated realistic appearances and the rides are ridable except carnival flat rides Just 99% of Rollercoasters Scenic/Dark Rides and Water Rides. Some Flat Rides are ridable that contain tracks in them. Looping Coasters don’t actually invert but you can always simulate with the right joystick or mouse with the movements but the inversions are also for decoration and scenery. It took me 5 months to this current state of progress.

Map Features:

16 Rollercoasters

Over 8 Water Rides

Realistic Looking.

Tracked Rides are Ridable

Camp Snoopy will be worked on

Keep a heads up with my updates don’t expect them too instantly since its done on my Nintendo Switch Since that’s the console Im always on. The updates are slow because of budget cuts and no by the progress im in.
title: Cedar Camp Amusement Park

description:
Author: zad103

Santa has been locked up in a lab and is right now being used for experiments by some evil scientists. Christmas is at stake here and it’s up to you to go on an adventure to find him and release him from his imprisonment. There are still lots of presents which need to be delivered and the elves need their Santa to complete this extraordinary task!
title: Santa Mission (Addon)

description:
Author: shredrw

This is a survival games arena located in an old abandoned theme park. It can be played by up to 12 players and offers a challenging survival experience in an amazing environment. Survival games is one of the most popular PvP styles in Minecraft. It’s most likely inspired by The Hunger Games movies where combatants have to compete in a deadly survival game to be the last man or woman standing. To play this map it’s recommended to be anywhere between 2 to 12 players. Find a yellow platform and stand on the trapdoor until everyone have entered the map. Make a countdown from 10 and then open the trapdoor. Everyone will then fall down into some cobweb before they finally entering the survival games. The rules are simple. Find a way to survive and be the last man or woman standing.
title: Abandoned Theme Park

description:
Author: pixelman546

Toadstool Castle is a famous building in the Super Mario universe. It has been featured in several different Super Mario game titles but personally I first came across it in Super Mario 64. This creation is largely inspired by the castle but it is by no means a replica. However, the exterior looks astonishingly similar and it even includes many of the rooms which you will recognize from the games.
title: Toadstool Castle

description:
Author: mikadekunder

FIRST HARRY POTTER ESCAPE MAP. This a multiplayer (3 player for best experience) map based on the Harry Potter movies. You have to escape all of the rooms based on the first two movies of Harry Potter.

In every room there is a different theme. They are all based in the Harry Potter movies. The rooms are really small. i. Each room you have to find a lever to escape. There are a few rules.

play in adventure
play in peaceful
do not cheat, everything is 100% possible
have a lot of fun
title: Hogwarts Mystery Escape

description:
Author: BendyCraftzOfficial

Hello, welcome to Fazbear Entertainment. We are most known for our company policy DEATH of having fun Five Nights at Freddy’s Maps! The game involves a character, later revealed as Mike Schmidt, who has begun working as a night security guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where the animatronics move at night and kill anyone they see by stuffing them into a spare animatronic suit; this is apparently due to their misinterpretation of any human at night.
title: FNaF One Map

description:
Author: Allswal

This is a fantasy adventure map where you play as character who for months have been training to reach the highest level of Magician and today is your final test. Even though it's a fairly short map it includes a multitude of exciting challenges ranging everywhere from mob battles to parkour. The storyline is also pretty good and that definitely adds to the experience.
title: Mini Magic: Night Star

description:
Author: edhyjox

This is a fully functional calculator which makes use of the new scoreboard feature in version 1.7.0.2 (Minecraft beta). It’s really an insane calculator which you can use to calculate any numbers from -2147483647 to 2147483647 and everything are made with just command blocks. A “no mod” is a command block creation adding non-existing mechanics to the game (e.g. new items or features) without the player needing to install a mod or an add-on.
title: Insane Scoreboard Calculator

description:
Author: minecraftstyler777

This is the most recent map in the popular Tomb Crafter map series for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This time you’ve traveled to the North Pole where you have to find a solution to a serious problem which is threatening Christmas. If you can’t solve it then no one can! Everyone is counting on you and it’s essential that you complete this mission!
title: Tomb Crafter 7: Christmas

description:
Author: gemen

 

You wake up in a cave having no idea how you got there. The only way out is through the means of restoring power to a broken down elevator. Will you make it out of the cave?

“The Cave” is a mashup between puzzle, parkour, and some-what of trivia with some exploration into the mix.

Objective: Restore power to an elevator to escape the cave
title: The Cave

description:
Author: Starmy

Gravity Falls is the name of an animated television series. It's centered around two characters by the name of Dipper and Mabel who have gone to spend their summer with their uncle who runs a tourist business there called the Mystery Shack. Slowly they will start to unravel mysteries such as paranormal activities and supernatural creatures.
title: Gravity Falls

description:
Author: TheEnderface

This map is a sequel to the first Mechanic Apocalypse map. In the first map you helped destroying the Vanguard but now it's time to take the fight one step further and fight them at their own headquarters. It's all up to you to eliminate this threat once and for all, but even then it's uncertain whether it's actually the end or if they have already spread globally and become a worldwide threat to the human race.
title: Mechanic Apocalypse 2

description:
Author: trawzen

A quality Hide and Seek map created for you and friends at the click of a button!

#How to play

The Seeker will jump into the cobwebs and have a quick one minute countdown. You will try to kill all the Hiders.
The Hiders will run into a gigantic Kitchen full of hiding spots! Pick a good hiding spot and have lots of fun.
title: Hide and Seek : Kitchen

description:
Author: SkyGames

Cart Dodges is an intense minigame for 1 – 6 players where random sets of minecarts will speed towards you and it’s up to you to dodge them. All players get the same patterns of minecarts, so this makes the gameplay balanced and fair if you play it in multiplayer. There are also powerup carts which you can jump into to kill all the minecarts in your lanes.
title: SG Cart-Dodgers

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG EasterFest is the third installment of the popular Minigame Festival by SkyGames. This map includes five different Easter games such as Egg Hunt and Egg Defense. It’s entirely up to you whether you play it together with other players, or alone by yourself. However, for some games you’ll need at least two players. Happy Easter!
title: SG EasterFest

description:
Author: MattH44

This map features 10 small mazes and each maze is different and challenging in its own way. It should be mentioned that they are very small, and that means they won’t take any amazing amount of time to complete. However, if you’re up for a quick and hopefully fun challenge then make sure to give it a try. It’s compatible with multiplayer and should be played in adventure mode on easy.
title: Maze of Amaze

description:
Author: Paradiscal

This map features a paintball arena which is suitable for 2-4 players. The map automatically includes an addon which replaces some of the items in-game with tools and weapons related to paintball. All of the block textures have also been customized to suit the apocalyptic map theme. It’s a great map if you want to play paintball with some friends in Minecraft! This map requires at least two players but if you are more players then that’s better. Split up on two separate teams, gear up and then head into the arena. Paintball Launcher = Bow and arrows Handheld Paintballs = Snowball Visual Barrier Paintballs = Eggs
title: Paradiscal’s Paintball 2: Apocalypse (Addon)

description:
Author: BLOCKMATIC STUDIOS

In the Monster Arena, created by Blockmatic Studios, you can fight monster hordes with your friends. Kill monsters to get coins to buy better gear in the shop. For each round you survive, you will get Sparks that you can use to purchase skills such as a helping golem or a healing field. You can fight the monsters with alone or with 1 to 7 other players.
title: Monster Arena

description:
Author: Ekza

This is a custom world terrain which took the creator (Ekza) over two months to build and in it are most of the Minecraft biomes. Everything in the map has been handcrafted and as a result most of the terrain looks very natural. There are a few downsides and those are that it's built in a flat world and that the ocean floor is limited to 2 blocks high.
title: Ekza's Terrain Overhaul

description: Are you trapped in a forest, do you have any way to escape?  Go through several puzzles in different villages to escape this mysterious forest!  Get a way to get to the other half of the forest, but the path is blocked, solve the riddles passes proceed!  Map consists of trying to leave the mysterious forest passing through several different enigmas, passing different villages and caves!
title: SB: The Secret Forest

description:
Author: OposingCritt

This short horror map is about your dad wants you (John) to check the camp if there are any problems….. but you dont know that there is something watching and wanting to kill you.
title: The Camp V2

description:
Author: AlexL1980

You were arrested for a crime and put in prison for the rest of your life. But you have no intention to stay there for any longer than deemed necessary. No one has ever been able escape to escape this place before, but perhaps you’ll be the first one to figure it out. Just be careful, if you get caught then you’ll most likely end up in solitary for a long time and that’s no fun.
title: Prison For Life

description:
Author: BETTER UNITED

Welcome to Hide and Go BOOM! (HAGB). First, this map needs 4 players to actually be playable. HAGB is all about exploding your friends! Based on a Mario Party game, this Minigame is about The Cannon Master V.S. Hiders! The Hiders consist of 3 players while the Cannon Master consists of 1. Hiders try to not get eliminated by the Cannon Master. Can you survive?

Get completive with your friends! Battle it out! End friendships. Sellout your best friend’s position! It’s all here, all in one package!
Who will come out as the Winner? That’s to be decided.


The Cannon Master
Want full control of exploding whatever cannon you want?
Wanna be the one to possibly blow up a friend?
Then, The Cannon Master is for you!

The main goal of the Cannon Master is to eliminate all hiders!
The Cannon Master only can explode 3 cannons, but there are 4 cannons and 3 hiders, Get lucky and kill all 3 hiders with 3 shots or less, you win. If you don’t then you lose.
Remember. No Survivors.

The Hiders
Wanna gamble for your survival?
Oddly addicted to the thought of being blown up?
Then, being a part of The Hiders sounds like a fit!

One or more of you have to survive The Cannon Masters killing spree to WIN!
The Hiders will choose one cannon each out of the four. More than one hider can go into one single cannon to change up the game. In other words, go solo in a single cannon or bring the whole crew!
The Hiders only have one life each, if the Cannon Master eliminates a hider they are sent to the Death Room to sit and watch the destruction play out.
title: Hide and Go BOOM!

description:
Author: endxenoc

This is a map of a world that has no life, the trees are dead and the rivers dried, on the map the resources are limited so take advantage of them to the maximum. This is a map generated in an “Old” world replacing the blocks of the surface by land and removing the water to make it look more desert, adding customized trees the result is a totally inhospitable map. I hope you enjoy.
title: Death World

description:
Author: justintdml

Do you love the underwater game Subnautica!? Well, now you can play it in Minecraft Bedrock. Explore this vast underwater world of 1024 x 1024 blocks. With updates planned for the future. This is Subnautica in Minecraft. Others have made modes for PC, maps and more but none like this. With a new texture pack changing mods and the world it give a all new feeling. A small behavior pack was made to give armor the ability to alow you to breath underwater. With that you will need new and better armor if you want to go deeper in the world.
title: Subnautica

description:
Author: Azizkhasyi11

Hi! This is my first time to make a map because I’m so bored and in this map I added a lobby, mining area, sell room, shop, PVP and Parkour.
title: Mining Simulator

description:
Author: END_BOY_

Fantasy Islands is a made up theme park with over 50 rides & attractions for you to enjoy!

Kahiti Point Waterpark is now open! Watch the trailer further down for more information!

Fantasy Islands is a medium sized theme park with several fun areas worth exploring. Each area is themed around a different topic and they include Roald Dahl, The Lord of the Rings, Castle, Pirates, Tropical and Horror. It’s really a great mix of everything compressed in one theme park. Some other cool things checking out are the daily fireworks shows, a hotel with lots of themed rooms and five restaurants.
title: Fantasy Islands

description:
Author: SkyGames

Live in a harsh environment filled with crazy terrain, and few trees. Parkour your way around the spikes to collect the items you need to survive, and fight monsters. If you consider yourself a survival expert and are looking for a new challenge, then this is a must-play.
title: Insanity Glitch

description:
Author: MattH44

Rainbow Mazes includes 10 different mazes which is each based on a different color. The main objective of the map is to search and find the a hidden Shulker box and collect the stone button from the box. You then need to search the maze for a diamond block and place the button on it. When you press the button you will be able to access the next level!
title: Rainbow Mazes

description:
Author: Itsryanfire

As you are driving to get back home, a shining grey object draws your attention, so you decided to park your car somewhere near the bushes and decided to follow. You arrive in an office where a skeleton is lying on the floor, as you are exploring the various files, you accidentally press a remote not knowing the consequences. Within 5 minutes you hear a strange Robotic voice behind you.
title: Survive By Crafting

description:
Author: itzBojan

This is a useful map if you are in need of some inspiration for building your next house. There are 16 different designs and each one uses materials which relate to a different biome. All of them are fairly easy to build (since they are small) and include most of the essential blocks you'll need (e.g. crafting table, bed and so on). And they also look really nice!
title: Simple Small House Designs

description:
Author: Velozrt

10 Stages Parkour is a fun and quite challengingparkour map with 10 stages in it. Each stages has a different difficulty. This parkour have block that give youdifferent effect. Your mission is to eat the ancient cake at the end of the map!
title: 10 Stages Parkour

description:
Author: The Wooden House

This map will simulate your worst nightmare in Minecraft and I can guarantee you it's going to be scary. It is a really well made map which includes great sound effects, jump scares and just an overall creepy experience. If you are looking to get scared then look no more. This is honestly one of the scariest horror experiences currently available, so be careful what you wish for!
title: The Wooden House

description:
Author: SNAILDOS

Crossy Craft is a game about running across the road with Minecart’s. The aim of the game is to get across to the other side. Enjoy this game made by the SnailDOS team. We hope you click on this world and download it and enjoy! Have fun!

This game is all about jumping over the minecarts and making sure you don’t die. Everytime you touch a minecart you die and loose a HEALTH point also getting teleported to the start of the map. You have only 5 hearts and when you loose all of them, the game reloads. The point of this map is to increase your concentrating skills. We hope you enjoy this game and you leave a review.
title: CROSSY CRAFT

description:
Author: keithross39

This is a custom terrain map which features a moonscape area covering 70 000 blocks (approx. 290 x 270 blocks). It is supplied only as a blank canvas with no other structures on it. You may use it for anything. Some examples include a space station or perhaps a rocket launch site. It should be noted that the boundary slopes are hollow so mining them won’t get you anywhere.
title: Moonscape

description:
Author: gab_the_crafter

This Minigame has 20 different YouTubers and you have to guess the right one or you will die There are 20 levels in this map, to guess each YouTubers you have to click a button then they’re intro will play and you have to guess the right youtubers
title: Guess The Youtubers

description:
Author: xXRubyGamersXx

This is a medieval styled map based on architecture of the 1300s. It's a really nice map if you like exploring since it includes a realistic medieval town with a big castle in the town center and lots of other structures such as shops and a few hidden features which you may come across while exploring it. It's a really well made map with many nice details and even some beautiful gardens.
title: TRG Village

description:
Author: PIXELL

Have you already played find the button? The game consists of you find the button hidden in the level to continue in the game, each level presents a different phase. It is very cool!

Each level has a different village than the new Minecraft Village and Pillage update.

Try to find the hidden button on the levels to move on to the next !!
title: Find the Button: Villages

description:
Author: Fizzman797

Meet your opponent at high noon at the main street of a small western town and find out who is the fastest gunslinger. It's a really fun map which is greatly inspired by the old western gunslinger duels. You'll be equipped with one revolver and some ammunition but besides that your life is left in your own hands so be careful. It can only be played by two players at the same time, or you can arrange a series of duels with different opponents.
title: The Duel

description:
Author: megastrikermcpe

Are you ready for pure insanity? Super Mega Dropper is the latest creation in an on-going series of mind-blowing dropper maps. Each level is much more than just a fun dropper challenge. It's essentially a piece of artwork usually including mind-boggling patterns. And due to a recent increment of the build height all levels are two times longer than before!
title: Super Mega Dropper

description:
Author: AnuGrahbodi123

Mining Simulator! A Mini game that aims to upgrade our items to the max level! Upgrade equipment by collecting Money by mining the available ores then selling them! each ore has a different price. The money you earn is used to buy items in the shop! Don't forget to Enchant your gear so that this game is easier to play and becomes the best!

This map also has Parkour and fishing spots so don't forget to check those out in the lobby!

It is recommended to play Multiplayer in order to compete to get Money or to play PVP!
title: Mining Simulator

description:
Author: BluJayGames

BluJay released his first Let's Play World just a few months ago and since then he has gained thousands of subscribers. Today he's releasing a second world in celebration of reaching 5000 subscribers. The world works as a testing ground for new redstone contraptions and other structures which he intends to build in his own survival world or in the Unity SMP world.
title: BluJay's Creative Testing World

description:
Author: Sleepyhead101

The sequel of RGBY Parkour. Featuring: Even more difficulty, a larger variety of jumps, larger levels and an actual prize. Beating this map is a good way to prove your parkour skill.
title: RGBY Parkour 2

description:
Author: TeamBOB123

This map features 21 small islands scattered around the ocean in an infinite world. You can either use the map as a survival world (and yes you can earn achievements) or you can use it to build an adventure of some kind. The edges of the ocean doesn't connect perfect with the rest of the terrain, but that's a minor problem which could be resolved with some in-game terraforming.
title: Little Islands

description:
Author: Zucth

This custom terrain have 3 biome. swamp, Dark Forest, Mountain. Under the theme “Freeze Swamp Mountain” or shortly call FS_Mount create by using Worldpainter convert from java edition. Made for creative content and survival challenge.
title: FS_Mount

description:
Author: mcpedash

This is a completely different type of minigame than the traditional TNT Run. You will die many times and you may think it’s impossible. But if you keep trying, you’ll find that it’s not that much difficult. Actually, I passed all levels in 20 minutes.
title: TNT Runway

description:
Author: VirusX728

It has been 10 years since you have been to that dreadful place in the middle of the woods. It is the place where you have been captured by Herobrine and imprisoned in your own mind. You stopped him and escape, saving not only yourself but everyone in Mineville. Herobrine has never taken another soul since then, until now. People are disappearing from the town, just like the time when Herobrine was alive. You are suspicious that Herobrine has somehow reawakened and is again terrorizing the people of Mineville. You went back to that castle in the woods to confirm your suspicions.

Warning: This map contains jumpscares, loud noises, and flashing lights.
title: Escape From The Mind II

description:
Author: mcpe_map_maker

You’ve probably wanted to relax on a sunny South Sea island on the beach, drink cocktails and play beach volleyball. In this world your dream will come true and you will even get a huge house. In this world you spawn on a lonely island close to two yachts. You can follow a road and come to the villa. At the entrance you will need one of the two keys you got at the spawnpoint. In the house you won’t find much redstone-technology except a bowling alley. And a lot of different amazing places.
title: Paradise Island

description:
By solarzod

I started this map 6 months ago, and I finally decided to share it with you, you can use it for videos or clips, but ask me permission first. This castle isn't finished, but another version is coming, so be patient.
title: Mountain Castle

description:
Author: YoshiKoopa99

This is a 3 stories modern luxurious mansion with 3 swimming pools, and a hot tub. 4 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, A full home cinema, fully customized as a 40 million dollar mansion in Los Angeles, Beverly hills, enjoy you are gonna love it.
title: 40 Million Dollar Mansion

description:
Author: mcmcpe1234

This is a parkour minigame where your objective is to get to the top of each floor, complete parkour challenges and solve puzzles to avoid the flood at all costs. It’s a real intense minigame where you’ll experience a constant struggle for time. How to play? The main objective is to avoid touching the floor because if you do then you’ll lose and have to start over. There is currently two levels, called “Factory” and “Noah’s Lab”, but more are expected to be released soon. In this one first level there are three separate floors of parkour and puzzles you must complete in order to escape the flood of water. Lapis Blocks: Places a block that will help you advanced through the floor Emerald Blocks: Opens a locked gate on an exit door
title: Flood Escape: Noah’s Lab

description:
Author: ryfol

This map was originally created for Minecraft: Education Edition and released as a part of the Chemistry Update. As it was not originally intended for Bedrock Edition it means that many of the blocks and textures and any other features relating to the Chemisty Update are missing from the world. But looking past that, it’s still entirely possible to use for Bedrock Edition as it’s a very cool build which you could use for other things!
title: World of Chemistry

description:
Author: JakeDaWolfLover

Like mazes? This maze contains outside walls that lead to anywhere. There will be dead-ends and pressure plates that teleport you closer to the exit or to a random spot on the map!
title: Teleporting Maze!

description:
By FOXYNOTAIL
InsideMind is a single-player game that has Deltarune Mechanics but an entirely different story and characters. (Although I threw in some references)
(SPOILER) The Main Idea of InsideMind, is after a freak accident at the end of Chapter 1, you are trapped in a close friends brain, exploring the shear power of one's imagination.
Chapter 1 takes on Average 1 Hour to complete
The current playable version is just the entirety of Chapter 1 and the Chapter 2 Demo, NOT THE FULL GAME.
In this game, YOUR. CHOICES. MATTER.
title: [Chapter 1] InsideMind (Adventure Map)

description:
By Urez

the world trade centers are not done yes because I’m waiting for the new update on bedrock ed so I’m gonna wat for the new update to come. Also I duplicated another one I hope u like it and enjoy.
title: World Trade Center

description:
Author: puzzle_map

This is a fictional adventure map. You will understand the story of the map in the notes left to you. After landing on Mars, your main mission begins. This map is optimized for one or two players.
title: Mars Mission

description:
Author: GrenadeofTacos

Notch’s Soak City is a remake of Knott’s Soak City located in Bueno Park, California. It’s a waterpark that includes eight attractions and over 15 waterslides, as well as two restaurants and two additional playplace attractions suited for children. If you’re a fan of waterparks in real life, this is a must-visit for you!
title: Notch’s Soak City Waterpark

description:
Author: RebornTrack970

This is a hard challange for people who think the game is super easy! There are acid rains, Void world, random fishing, super hardcore health and food runs out super fast! Your goal is to kill the dragon and Dont go to the nether!

You have to fish in this world in order to progress you have one rod if it breaks you lose! You can get every item using just the rod!

Also Rain, its toxic!
title: Hard? Not So!

description:
Author: einua_trinity

This Find The Button: Ground Hole is made up of 5 deep and dark levels ranging from easy going to hard. Well as we always say it is always be depending upon on whose playing.
title: Find The Button: Ground Hole

description:
<p>Author: JASUCARD <p>

Parkour! currently has one long stage. You’ll encounter multiple different blocks that will give you various special effects. This map will be updated regularly with new stages with their own mechanics.

Parkour! will grant players with the ultimate parkour experience as time goes on. Currently there is one long stage that will take you roughly 10-15 minutes to complete. The stage includes multiple different blocks that will grant you with special effects to aid you in the course. The main appeal to Parkour! will be it’s future updates. I plan to update Parkour! with new stages very frequently. Each stage will come with it’s own unique mechanic as well. The video below will give you an overview of the current update on the Parkour! map. A new video will release with each update to give you an in-depth look at what to expect from the current update.
title: Parkour!

description:
By CreeperSwagMan56 Awesomeness

This is a Hide and Seek map where the Hiders hide from the Seekers, while the Seekers have to kill all of the Hiders before the 5 minutes is up. This map has the First, Second, and third Five Night's at Freddy's locations into one map. There is also the fourth location which is just the main lobby area. There are many hiding spots to hide in while there are also many ways for the Seekers to hunt them down. There are no mods, or any texture pack required for this map.
title: Five Night's At Freddy's Hide and Seek

description:
Author: aquazeus3384868

Hello! This is my first map. In this map, you have to try to escape from the center of the earth to the outside world. There are 5 stages increasing in difficulty. Good luck! If there are any bugs, please do tell me about them.
title: Centre Of The Earth

description:
Author: cormacchick

Hello! This is a secret base made by the YouTuber, CormacChick! This base is built in a modern style and built in to the side of a mountain! The Secret base has all the basic house essentials!
title: CC: Secret Base

description:
Author: HANIC

Are you ready to jump into the squeal? Become King Pig’s soldier and fight a battle to become one with the pig.

This map is single player, but it may also work with multi player. Be prepared to fight.

This map is single player, but it may also work with multi player.

RULES

Be in gamemode 2

No cheating

Follow the instructions

Don’t kill the mob that is not moving
title: When Pigs Take Over 2

description:
Author: vico124

This is the continuation of the easter eggs map where you will pass through the missing biomes of the previous map I hope you like it
title: Easter Eggs 2

description:
Author: MT714

Welcome to this new and engaging SkyBlock adventure! But that’s not just a normal SkyBlock, this is THE SkyBlock you’ve always wanted to play!

Discover new ways of surviving with a marketplace where you can buy useful items, daily and monthly challenges that give you special rewards and, most importantly, a whole monument to complete!

Discover new Islands, look for hidden treasures, defeat the wither and much more in Extreme SkyBlock.
title: Extreme SkyBlock

description:
Author: BROKEN PROMISE GAMES

Elite Strike takes the modern war to the next level with an amazing pvp war and the best zombies experience you will ever have in a TRLG game! Version 2.2.
title: TRLG Elite Strike

description:
Author: MINIPRO27YT

If you're into the minecraft community or just the pewdiepie community in general, you've probably heard that he's returned to playing minecraft now for quite a while. He spends hours of his time working on his hardcore world for fun, and this map is a recreation of that.
title: Pewdiepie's Hardcore World

description:
Author: blockmaster_203

Thorpe Park is a theme park in England which now has been recreated in Minecraft Pocket Edition. There are more than 40 different attractions (and that includes everything from roller coasters to water rides). However, it should be noticed that it's not a 1:1 scale recreation and some attractions have been moved or changed to make everything fit nicely together.
title: Thorpe Park (Theme Park)

description:
Author: BlackZero

Black TNT Run 2 is an intensely fun parkour and minigame map. There are 10 different levels and in each one you must get to the other side of the room by jumping on pressure plates. Every time you step on a block you got less than a second to make a decision of where to jump next. This map was created for single player use but it could be used in multiplayer as well but then it’s much more difficult to complete.
title: Black TNT Run 2

description:
Author: Minmintyfusk

Minuswondermin-park is an (eh? small?) unfinished town (???) filled with buildings and creations, ranging from a knockoff lego store to a sad looking zoo! Each section of the town has its own name and flag, along with fully furnished houses and strange statues.
title: Minus-Wondermin Park!

description:
Author: Cookiie

Find the 10 hidden Buttons! The Buttons will disappear as soon as you click them. If you want to start over you can always go to the Introduction Area and click the Reset Button. The Map will reset itself after you found every Button.
title: Find the 10 Buttons

description:
Author: Tyler707 Proarcher

This map features a round island which includes beaches, low mountains, a lake and multiple forests. It has plenty of resources to make it possible to use as a survival world. For example, it does include ores underground and there is a chest full of goodies found at spawn. You can earn achievements in the world as long you keep the cheats off and play in survival.
title: Tyler's Custom Terrain

description:
Author: YEEan

What You Have To Do Is Very Simple.
title: Escape Room 2

description:
Author: IBLESKIM

This is a sky block map but with my own twist. I have added new island that are not in a normal sky block and added my own twist to the other islands.
title: Sky Block Extended Worlds

description:
Author: Fizzman797

Pixel Playground is a large community driven pixel art map project which lets anyone from the Minecraft community submit his or her own art and have it added to the map. Currently there are 228 regular pixel art builds and 10 mega pixel art build. In each new update of the map Fizzman797 (the creator of the map) will add 20 new pixel arts and 1 mega pixel art, as well as the pixel art submitted by the community.
title: Pixel Playground

description:
Author: Alalu

This is our first map. Me and my friend decided to make a parkour map one time and that’s what happened. I’m good at making commands and my friend likes building.
title: World Of Parkour

description:
Author: Luca_omo

More than 64 floating island and a monument with empty slot. Will you be able to find all the coloured blocks that you are in the chests to complete the monument?

How to play?
Welcome in floating CTM 2 in this map you have to complete the monument with all the requirement blocks that are wool, terracotta, concrete powder and concrete.

You cam find all there blocks in the chests of everty islands and to reach them you have to use elytra that you can obtain from the base island. In every island there are also some shulker boxes with some enchant items that could help you to kill all the monsters which will attack you in the islands, not all the islands have mobs some are puzzle or labyrinth, sometimes to complete an island you have to die.

When you spawn you have to select the language of rules italian or english, than you can start a little tutorial so you’ll know the base of every island that assemble the base island. There are the rules island, the elytra one, the monument and the checkpoint.

To reach this base island you have simply to walk on colored block and you’ll be teleport. In the monument you can also place 5 special block in the monument which provied you special items or set of items.
title: Floating CTM 2

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is the RedTech Modern Island House located in the Pacific Northwest region of North America. The House was built in a perfect spot on an island surrounded by redwood forests on the coasts with a mountain at the northeast.
title: Massive Modern Mansion Island House

description:
Author: I RedPenguin I

This is a custom made world which features 5 completely different islands with different biomes like desert, mesa, mushroom, plains, and an exotic biome. The world includes a large mountain and custom trees. It’s mainly that which makes it stand out compared to an ordinary seed world in Minecraft.
title: Island Biomes

description:
Author: Ryalator10

You awake in a test tank, you feel strange, an AI named Augu5t greets you,… Download the map to find out the rest of the story!
title: Target

description:
Author: achachin-wormwal

Mojave Region is a world containing two medium sized cities. Inside the cities you will find things like an airport, parks, shipping ports, schools, fire departments, police departments and so much more. All structures stay true to the original Minecraft build designs and since there are such a good variety of builds it makes it quite useful for role-plays and similar gameplay.
title: Mojave Region

description:
Author: LetsdothisEpic

This beautiful adventure starts you off at your treehouse and leads you through a series of quests which you need your completion. The ultimate goal is to obtain a potion of immortality and be paid enough money to be able to finally build a rooftop pool for your treehouse. It can be played by anywhere between 1 to 9 players and the map is solely an adventure and exploration map so don't expect any battles or player vs. player instances.
title: The Journey of Life

description:
Author: Pdtheyoutuber

The mundane mountain isn’t as boring as the title. It consists of a few mountains, with some nice terrain around them. The new location, Gradient Graveyard, holds the most spooky tales to be told.
title: The Mundane Mountain

description:
Author: MarmotteNapat Minecity

The Mansion Findell is a huge mansion situated on the top of a hill in a huge forest biome. There are a lot of different activities spread out all over the map which in some cases takes the player away from the mansion and out on basic adventures. For example, you can participate in a boat race, renovate one half of the mansion or search for a shipwreck. It's great for anyone who are looking for a fun adventure in an open-ended world.
title: Mansion Findell

description:
Author: DerpMaster11

Wing Wars is an elytra based PvP minigame which requires at least two players. The objective is simply to fly around, kill other players and collect items from the different chests. Anyone who is the last person to be alive will be considered the winner.
title: Wing Wars!

description:
Author: Maxim777YT

Use your blocks, weapons and pickaxes to destroy the enemy’s nether reactor core! Jump high with the potions and don’t let your enemy get to your base!
title: TheBridgers

description:
Author: The Gaming Lamp, Guava juice8277

This map features cool command blocks creations that Eystream & ElementX have featured on their YouTube channels. However, I have done some things to reinforce the creations so that they are more resistant to bugs and glitches. I have also decorated them so they are more presentable. I have also put in some of my own cool creations.
title: Top 10 Command Block Creations

description:
Author: zad103

Breaking Shards Skyblock is a great survival map which you can use to challenge your own survival skills. If you make it long enough you will be able to explore 11 different islands which include everything from floating pirate ships to mushroom islands.
title: Breaking Shards Skyblock

description:
Author: Ahmad Hawari

This map contains a long railway line with several different train stations both underground and above land. It’s a really good start for anyone who would like to build their own complex railroad system as it includes already finished stations. There are even switches and toggles which you can use for activating different redstone mechanisms such as stop lights or the power to a train track.
title: Station Plengeh

description:
Author: Cheete

TNT Maniac is a minigame involving explosions and kits. It’s similar to that of Mineplex’s Bomb Lobbers where the main objective is to eliminate the other team. TNT Maniac is suitable for any amount of players and before starting each player will be able to select among one of three classes. Right now there’s just one arena (Pirate Ship) but more will be added in a future update.
title: TNT Maniac

description:
Author: BALI GAMERZ

Map Create By BaliGamerz12/Made Untung This map features a modern home with a complete redstone system. There are greenhouses, lighthouses, helicopters, fighter planes and much more to explore. It’s a great map to use for your survival adventures, or just to explore!
title: Mega Redstone House

description:
Author: EzCraftMC

This is a team PvP map with a cool system of diamond generators and shops for buying medkits and team lightning strikes. The teams include Red and Blue and before starting you will be able to make your choice of which to join. Each team will get items and armor based on their color which makes it easy to distinguish the enemy team from your own teammates.
title: Red Vs Blue

description:
Author: dakonblackrose

This is a really fun map which combine gliding with PvP and all of it takes place on more than 10 different sky islands. You'll start out with just your bare knuckles and a pair of elytra wings, but scattered around the islands are chests which contain better items. It's recommended to agree on a set of rules before starting a game.
title: Glide PvP

description:
Author: jndl2k15

TheMagicEmerald BE is a fun minecraft map filled with lots of minigames and quests and when you complete them you get an obsidian block to build a nether portal On the other side there is the magic emerald, There are some secrets and easter eggs too so have fun (; There are 16 unique levels for you to complete and when you complete them you get an obsidian block or a flint and steel.
title: TheMagicEmerald

description:
Author: RylandPlayzYT

Have you ever wanted to travel to Isla Nublar? For those who don't know, Isla Nublar is the fictional island which is the primary setting in the Jurassic Park and the Jurassic World movies. This map is a sneak peak for something much greater to come. It features the Visitor Center and a huge forest area. In the future you'll be able to explore it in more detail and also come face to face with the amazing dinosaurs who live on the island.
title: Jurassic Park

description:
Author: THEDENUX

Welcome to the Cosmopolitan! a luxury apartment that contains 25 floors!
with 8 different, and detailed apartments. Higher up their is 4 apartments. The topmost floor, is the largest floor filled with art and other stuff.

The interior is of highest possible quality and design, I hope you’ll enjoy this complex apartment, as much as I enjoyed building it, just for your pleasure!
title: The Cosmopolitan

description:
Author: EDLUX02_YT


Hi! Welcome to my best creation, this is a minigame map in where you only will have to shoot the button with your bow until the time finish!

Good Luck!


Don’t let your nerves end with you!
title: Shoot the Target

description:
Author: sxemarc

After originally starting this map back in 2012 on Java edition and holding it off for years I finally decided to port it over to Bedrock and completely overhaul it into what I always wanted it to be. This map is a recreation of the map Gorge and is fully playable with the Control Point game mode! The map was originally inspired by SethBling and Hypixel’s TF2 Dustbowl map.
title: Team Fortress 2: Control Point

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Come and explore an island off the coast of Costa Rica surrounded by vast ocean. With five different biomes, along with two lakes, this island is perfect for building. Each biome has unique characteristics for the player to explore. Vegetation is biome specific while animal/mob spawning occurs randomly across the map.
title: Isla Lluvioso

description:
Author: The_Redstoneer

The Floor Is Lava is a parkour and minigame where you are allowed 10 seconds to examine a room before the floor turns into lava and you have to escape. The parkour is fairly easy to complete but it's nonetheless a fun minigame which perhaps could be expanded on in the future with harder and more difficult levels. If you like parkour then give it a try!
title: The Floor Is Lava

description:
Author: LiL Craft YT & UseData_Plays

Are You A Avid Plants VS Zombies Fan? If yes then thats perfect because I’m also! I created this map to give you a really fun PvZ experience in Minecraft! You wont be disappointed, You will have fun, 100% guaranteed! This map have some unique features,like Zen Garden,and more!
title: Plants vs Zombies

description:
Author: LightCrew

This is version 2.0 of the Halloween Challenges map, which was a very small map, but now this map is very big and with many challenges!
title: Halloween Challenges 2

description:
Author: microjp

Do you consider yourself a true Whovian (also known as a Doctor Who fan)? If that's the case then you definitely have to download this map and give it a try in-game. The map features many of the control rooms and other TARDIS areas and all of them are based on the ones in the Doctor Who TV show. You'll start out in the Overworld at a police box and from there you can access the TARDIS!
title: Welcome To The Tardis

description:
Author: LILGATORWOOD

Mobsters Inc. Battlez is a minigame influenced by a java map. In this game you get to battle your opponents, Hopefully your friends, to win for one side. Each side possesses the same abilities as the other but your goal is to defeat the other team by overcoming them with mobs of your choosing. First player to get 15 deaths loses.

Greetings fellow minecrafters. I am here to release an action packed minigame for the bedrock edition. You should enjoy this minigame. As said above the goal is to get ur enemy to 15 deaths and you win.

Starting Point/hub
When you spawn in you should be faced with either a Aquarium or with two opposing side teams. Team A The illagers. they fight on the zombie side while the villager fights with the enderman. It is not seen in this image but there are Lore that you can read. Should be lots of fun.

The Battle Field
This is the battle field. Use it to your liking. But be warned you will be swarmed with skeletons, Creepers, zombies and more. Each side is equipped with four Mob drops areas that are used to buy spawn eggs for you to send against your opponent and vis versa. But be warned the battle field is not a forgiving place

Vending machines
Yes, The vending machines (Created by @FoxyPmc on twitter) these are your main go to items. Use them to your advantage. Buy mobs, armor, food and more. Spend your money(Spent using IRL Cash – muhahahaha im evil) to get an advantage over your enemy.

The Slaves . . . uh . . . i Mean Very much paid Workers
