Ahhh. . . A Fine day for capitalism (Reference) For your workers. Purchase workers (With real money Muhahaha Evil again) to passively help you earn more money. But watch out you can only hire four workers. Darn OSHA wont allow more.
title: Mobsters Inc. Battlez

description:
Author: MattH44

This is a new type of minigame inspired by a popular YouTube series by PopularMMOs. The levels include three different structures (which look like desserts) and is each considered a separate level. It’s the objective of the players to find a way to survive on these forsaken deserts which are slowly burnt down by lava and fire. It’s recommended for multiplayer.
title: Burn It Down: Desserts Edition

description:
Author: MRBROWNIEHC

Realm of Beturune is an open world RPG adventure map. In this map you will fight mobs, solve puzzles, and explore a beautifully crafted open world. Keep in mind that this map is a work in progress and more stuff will be added every update!
title: Realm of Beturune

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

The Lands of Notch is one of the greatest custom terrains so far created for the Bedrock version of Minecraft. It features vast lands of forests, epic volcanic mountains and huge deserts. It was built using the WorldPainter tool and then imported to an infinite world. This means that you will never run out of land to explore. Even though most if it is nature there are some structures around the world such as ancient temples and villages.
title: The Lands of Notch

description:
Author: MattH44

This version of Find The Button is considered extremely difficult. There are 10 different levels and in each level there is a hidden button. The objective is simple – find the hidden button which unlocks the next level. However, that doesn’t mean it will be easy. It was specifically created for Minecraft veterans who need something more challenging. If you really can’t figure out a level then use the Hint Book as a last resort to find the hidden button.
title: Find The Button: Extra Hard Edition

description:
Author: REBORNTRACK970

This is a skyblock map that has a giant buy shop and money to spend! İt has some mods for you to use! Like tree capitator and more nuggets (Thx to creators of mods) This is the perfect map for you to get nearly all the items and blocka in skyblock!
title: Omega SkyBlock!

description:
Author: MrClassicSonic

Zones/Weeks:

1- Daddy Dearest Theather.

2- Skid & Pump House (Week 2 House)

3- GO PICO YEAH YEAH GO PICO YEAH

4- Mommy Mearest Flying... Car... Thing? Idk (is a limousine lol)

5- Week 5 Mall

6- Senpai Dating Simulator (Gf videogame)

7- Tankman's Week 7 Base
title: Friday Night Mining

description:
Author: CHRISMP

You have went deep into the warehouse which you don’t remember if that room existed before. But now something which has been kept a secret appears during your way out.

The Abandoned Warehouse is free roaming horror game search carefully and follow the objectives and try at least to survive.
title: The Abandoned: Warehouse (Chapter 2)

description:
Author: skygames

This is a fully functional Bed Wars minigame which which can be played by loads of players at the same time. It features one arena called the Desert Destroyers and it also includes a fully automated shop. You will be able to collect items in-game and then trade them for other items and it’s all done with a very simple chest user interface.
title: Bed Wars

description:
Author: CATASTROPHE7777

This is the Temple Glide map originally from Minecraft Console Edition! The aim of the game is to race your friends or yourself to fly to the end of this fun and challenging course using Elytra and Fireworks! This map has been Arranged by CatAstrophe7777 so you guys can play this map on Minecraft Windows 10 Edition and Minecraft Pocket Edition!
title: Minecraft Elytra Race! Temple Glide Map

description:
Author: CELLIXID

I think everyone know these classic Find The Button maps. So I made my own map in this style called «Biome Button». Complete 10 unique levels and find all secrets of this map.
title: BiomeButoon: Find All Buttons!

description:
By Koffyt

On January 20, a contest was broadcast on the koffyt youtube channel "The best medieval construction", this construction is set in the medieval theme.This contestant did a good job, with his building style, he has quite a bit of imagination and experience building.In case you were wondering, who is this contestant? GaboPE.We can see many houses, there are many exterior details, such as several balloons in the air, trees simulating that they are pushed by the wind, the houses have a very homely and friendly color.Likewise, the interior details are very nice and well set. It can be used as a survival world to play with friends for even more fun.The creator GaboPE gave us the rights to build it.Thank you very much for reading, have a nice day! <3See you in another post, your Koffyt server says goodbye happily.
title: Medieval Village

description:
Author: TPBOSS909

This Dungeon Crawler has an expansive maze with varied loot throughout to help you fight bigger and better bosses that lead up to the ultimate boss fight. Roam around the maze and collect monument fragments (pieces of wool) after defeating 5 different stages of mobs to help you finally complete the monument after the final boss fight where you will face 4 further groups of mobs and then if you are successful youwill be teleported to a winners arena to celebrate.
title: Nether PVE Dungeon Crawler

description:
Author: Mr Shadow

Have you ever started a survival world but does not have any time to make a base? Or no time to explore and gather resources? Steve made a base for you guys to use for your another journey.
title: | Steve's World |

description:
Author: Itsyoboi_acid_C

Flame bow and snowballs. Can you defeat everyone else on the TNT platform?

When you are put on the platform you will get a bow and snowballs to use wisely against your opponents and knock them into the lava and be the last man standing!

There is no winning system so when you are the last man standing you have to kill your self in the lava!
title: TNT Tumble

description:
Author: HarryHJL

Are you looking for a decently hard parkour map with an awesome theme at the same time? You've come to the correct place. This map has 4 long levels of easy, medium, hard and super hard. This map has an unique ice theme with sealanterns making the experience truly spectacular. This map also features an epic spawn and is FULLY cross compatible and multiplayer friendly. This map is 40x40 with the height going up all the way to the max. It offers a hard experience for the more experinced players and and a easier level for beginers.
title: Ice Parkour

description:
Author: neelson

High Rossferry is a Minecraft Realistic City, its a perfect world for your roleplay and stuff. it have Subway systems, Highways, Bridges etc. download to check them out!
title: High Rossferry

description:
Author: Pasteljungle67

This is a parkour map. There are some modes such as easy, normal and hard. You can choose the mode you want. This map is suitable for multiple players. If you want to wait for your friends coming into your world this map has a practive area for you.
title: God Parkour

description:
Author: SteelSlick

White Tower parkour will be one of the most difficult Parkour maps that you will ever do... if you are pretty bad. I personally would give this more of a 6 out of 10 ratings in difficulty! But alas it is pretty difficult. This map will give you a tough and hard time! Just try and do it! I bet you would probably go in creative to beat it.
title: White Tower

description:
Author: player19375

This map is made mainly to show some of the redstone contraptions which can be used to make your ice boat race more enjoyable. It also features a part where contraptions are shown on their own so you can copy it to your world. The map takes advantage some of the new features related to water which was introduced in Update Aquatic.
title: Redstone Boat Race

description:
Author: minecraftstyler777

An evil octopus has surfaced from the water and for unknown reasons she hates the Minecraft universe and wants to destroy it all. It’s up to you to protect this world from total demolition. Find a way to its head and pull the lever to blow it up. Even though it’s a very short parkour map it’s really well designed and that is the main reason to why we decided to post it here.
title: The Evil Octopus

description:
Author: JustMeGarett1

This just may be the longest rollercoaster in Minecraft bedrock edition. Traveling through 8 different biomes and over 45 minutes of ride time is the exploration coaster. I hope there are enough cool builds and contraptions to keep you entertained for almost an hour. Have fun!
title: Exploration Coaster

description:
Author: awesome5185

This is a parkour map which uses an addon to drastically reduce your health. As a result you will notice that doing the different jumps becomes much more difficult as one wrong move and you will immediately die and have to start over. If you like parkour maps then this is well suited for you as it’s basically that but a bit more difficult.
title: Half Heart Survival

description:
Author: Ryalator10

This is just something that me and my friends used to kill time, now I’m releasing it to the public! This map is made by the creator of Target, which you should check out!
title: Ultimate Spleef

description:
Author: JoshuaGamer

Hello and welcome to “Tower of Craft” witch is in Roblox but its in Minecraft are you ready to face the Minecraft challenge well lets get straight into it!

First we need to look at the rules if some of your Friends are coming over and trying to beat the Tower they need to obey these rules
title: Tower of Craft

description:
Author: EnderKnight159

Fight to death in an offline skywars custom map! You can select kits and get tools , weapons and armor from chests to survive on islands in the void such as servers! and the map will reset after every fight.
title: SkyWars

description:
Author: SharkGames

and the best of all is that they are all combined in one single map. As a result, it makes it a great map to use for your Realms or for local multiplayer parties. There are also lots of other cool features to be explored such as custom shops, crates and more. This map is constantly being updated on SharkGames own Realms.
title: SharkGames Realms Map

description:
Author: Xeno of Cyprus

This map is a mob arena, it has 4 islands with different biomes.

You can collect the armor and weapons from the barrel, they appear once you have taken something.

Make sure you are equipped with armor because the fights will be difficult. You can also play with friends to make it more fun.
title: Mob Arena Biomes

description:
Author: koalaz

Find The Pressure Plate! Version 1. This was my very first custom map, so thank you to everyone who has downloaded it! This map comes with 5 levels, completely built in creative mode on the Windows 10 Edition.
title: Find The Pressure Plate

description:
Author: BugCore

Find The Button is a puzzle map with the goal of finding a button which is hidden in each level. Once you’ve found it you need to find a way to activate it in order to open a door which leads to the next level. In this map there is a total of six levels and they gradually get more difficult as you progress throughout the map. This map is great for anyone, but especially beginners who might want to try out a puzzle map for the first time.
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: MINIPRO27YT

If you've been interested in the minecraft community recently, you may have heard of the famous growing server for content creators that create improv role-playing, DreamSMP. This map is a collection of the iconic and special structures in the server and has been used as a parkour course.
title: DreamSMP

description:
Author: K73MC

Join your friends in this new Find The Button Custom Map! This map supports multiplayer and will not break if multiple players join. So what are you waiting for? Download the map and play with your friends!
title: Find The Button 2: The Adventure Continues

description:
Author: SkyGames

Do you want to live on the moon, or experience moon life in minecraft? This map lets you do so, with a 1,500×1,500 area, there is a lot to explore, and see the realistic mountains and valleys of moon rock. Craters can be hazardous, so don’t fall in!
title: Insanity: Moon Mountains

description:
Author: Sleepyhead101

The final map of the RGBY Parkour series. This time, the parkour will be extremely unforgiving, starting at the moment you enter the first level, and it only gets harder the further you go.
title: RGBY Parkour 3

description:
Author: The_Redstoneer

This map features one large house built in a flat plains landscape with lots of beautiful terrain surrounding it. Most parts of the house include some type of redstone mechanisms. For example, the garage doors can be opened and closed and the bathroom has a fully working shower (and it's nothing similar to what I've ever seen before).
title: Redstone Neighborhood

description:
By Vissom_

A Dust port of Counter Strike Global Offensive for Minecraft.

Due to the version made in Minecraft on Xbox 360, it may contain unwanted blocks, not found in the conversion.

Comments are welcome.

In this map there are 2 bombs: "A" and "B"

To win the Terrorists must place the flags on bombs, A or B, Counter-Terrorists have to win the round in less than 40 minutes, making a pvp against the Terrorists, since they have to protect the bombs at the beginning of each round.
title: Counter-Strike Global Offensivel De_Dust2

description:
Author: Sprex34

Do you like parkour? Well, you better, because in this map your parkour speed will be tested. There are 8 different stages and in each stage you only have 10 seconds to complete it. Failure is punishable by death, so you better hurry! However, each level is a checkpoint so you won’t have to start all over in case you failed on one level.
title: Complete in 10 Seconds

description:
Author: GULDMASTER12

In this map you are a knight who goes out to explore the kingdom and make good choices about the life of the villagers in the kingdom. There’s really not much else to say, so it’s probably best if you try it out for yourself.
title: Castle

description:
Author: likeman

This map consists of one medium sized city which is built in a plains biome in an infinite world. It's a very clean looking city which include multiple great designs for structures such as skyscrapers. The one thing which makes it stand out is the fact that it really looks Minecrafty and doesn't attempt to look any other way. It's not the biggest city but it's definitely pretty cool if you are looking for someone Minecrafty and not too realistic.
title: GoldenBurg City

description:
By Voxed Studio

Steampunk Castle [Creation] is an island set in an alternate time where society is kept strong by steam power and spinning gears.Prepare your airship, become a mechanic and start your survival adventure on this amazing island!Download now and enjoy!
title: Steampunk Castle

description:
Author: SkyGames

Welcome to Space Shenanigans. Be prepared to enter a unique story. Be prepared to enter a style of map never seen in Minecraft before. Be prepared to follow a story that will captivate your imagination and leave you begging for the next installment.
title: Space Shenanigans EP1 : S1

description:
Author: CRACKEDCUBES

The New Avengers Facility was the primary base of operations used by the Avengers after the defeat of Ultron and the establishment of the team’s new roster.

After the Avengers Civil War, Tony Stark continued to use the facility as his primary place of residence, and after selling Avengers Tower, moved all the equipment into the facility as well. It would later be annihilated before its ruins would be the stage for one last battle against the genocidal tyrant, Thanos for the fate of the universe itself.
title: New Avengers Facility

description:
Author: WavePlayz, DerpCyanStoner

This is a redstone showcase map which shows off a bunch of cool and useful redstone creations which you could attempt implementing in your own world. It’s split into three different sections whereas the first one is dedicated to hidden bases. The second part contains lots of automated 2×2, 4×4 and 1×2 glass doors. And the third part is dedicated to just elevator designs.
title: Ultimate Redstone Creations

description:
Author: MDS Minecraft

The previous tenants (Evokers and Vindicators) have been evicted and most of the interiors have been refurnished to be better suited for modern people. This is a Woodland Mansion which has been naturally generated and then had the rooms replaced by 17+ different redstone contraptions. Here you will find everything from an automatic item sorter to a swimming pool.
title: Redstone Woodland Mansion

description:
Author: da4thedge

Apollo 11 was the first manned mission to the lunar surface, back in 1969,or…….was it the first one? In this game, you are Subject-58, a product tester of Grissman Corp. Recently, this tech company has turned it’s focus on genome memory research, codename: ‘Project Synapsys’. Using it’s latest prototype, you are tasked to sync with one of the test profiles, Dimitri Kianov, a missing soviet cosmonaut during the era of space race. Follow through the journey of a single man’s endeavour, an untold fearsome adventure to an unknown selestial body……. Rules: ▪Game brightness1 00% ▪Device screen brightness 30% ▪Render distance 5 ▪Gamemode survival ▪Difficulty easy
title: Dreams of Luna

description:
Author: TenierWiz

This is Minimap with a “CTM” style, if you want a challenge Dry Valley is for you. Is a very short map but very difficult even for good players. I hope you enjoy it, have fun.
title: DRY VALLEY

description:
Author: JustJee

Sumo Champions is as it says “sumo” but with a TWIST! You see its a tournament like game, it works so 4 players start off in the tournament and you get matched with someone random and depending on whether you lose or not you move on or not and the winner is crowned as the “SUMO CHAMPION!”
title: Sumo Champions

description:
Author: Luma

This is an adventure map which takes place in the American Old West. After years of working as a bounty hunter you’ve finally decided settle down somewhere else and move on with your life. But as things progress it soon becomes clear that some people are in desperate need of your help and you have to do this one last thing before retirement.
title: Hang Him!

description:
Author: IEMOTIONLESS

Mine coal in the peaceful mine and purchase new pickaxes, weapons, armor, etc. from scoreboard shops. Go into the pvp mine and battle other players over currency and exp. Create better armor and tools.

This map has 1 PvP arena and a scoreboard shop. Better ores spawn in the PvP arena. Fight using diamond weapons, armor, and with the help of golden apples. Enchant your gear to battle more effectively and to get more money from mining.
title: PvP Prison v2

description:
Author: BEMZ

Hello! This is my second installment of the classics where I intend to rebuild the classic minigames inside of minecraft bedrock. With some twists such as power ups or technical new ways!

This weeks classic minigame is Spleef. Spleef is a competitive minigame. When playing spleef, players will destroy blocks below other players, allowing them to fall off the playing field and into a pit. The object of the game is to be the last player on the field.
title: The Classics Spleef

description:
Author: SkyGames

SG Zombies 3 is a PvE sequel of SG Zombies. In this map we have added guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack plus re-wrote the whole code so there is way less lag. It has also been created on an entire new map (By Hypixel: Transport) with 7 different zones and loads of gates to unlock. There are more cool features and the waves are also a whole lot harder. We also added a control room that once opened becomes the only zone spawning rooms.
title: SG Zombies 3

description:
Author: zucth

Skyblock Roll Pick Challenge is a bit different from what Skyblock have to be! No more cobblestone generator! Just sit and GACHA! Finding the item! The challenge is to find every rarity item! The game doesn’t requied much command block (so I don’t think any redstone gonna clash!) All along! This challenge is seem a bit boring, because all you need to do is pick item from the random box that will grant you the random item! But for people who like to play with luck and do some GACHA I think it’s not bad!
title: Skyblock ~Roll Pick Challenge~

description:
Author: JGMcpe

In this map you will face 25 different puzzle challenges and each one of them is in some way related to redstone. Get your wheels spinning and try to complete all of the challenges. Don’t worry though, there’s no time limit so you can spend as long you want in each level. Right now it’s only available for 0.17 for Minecraft PE because some of the blocks used in this map are exclusive for that version.
title: Redstoney

description:
Author: Jenew

This map features a small city built in a flat world. There are many different skyscrapers and a multitude of structures such as a police station, McDonalds, a city hall and other things you would expect in a city. Some parts of the city are still a work in progress so don’t travel too far outside the city.
title: Korea Anju City 5.6

description:
Author: BrosephMC-JojoGlick

Are you sick and tired of finding buttons? In this puzzle map, you can find levers instead! Search for and flick levers in traditional and unique ways in 10 confined levels. This map’s theme is the Mesa, and this is only a single game in an 8-part map series. Stained clay mountains make great obstacles for losing things (like levers).
title: Find The Lever – Mesa

description:
Author: Nereid

This great adventure map calls for mesa islands, as well as a few other biomes. It also includes a rather diverse terrain, such as floating cities!
title: SkyWorld

description:
Author: InsomniaGamesMCPE

This 2D world restricts your movement patterns to forward, back, up, and down! That’s it. It’s quite simple to play, but it’s also very different! Another thing to mention is the world is very restricted. You start with some mob spawners to keep you company, some ores, and not much else! You gotta be self-sufficient!
title: 2D Survival World

description:
By BlackPrince7185

This map is a model of the well-known Chernobyl disaster and the nearby city of Pripyat, built by one person during the year. All buildings have been worked out and taken from the photo.
title: Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant

description: Hotels, bank, museums and ancient temples are just a few of the structures which you will find in this amazing city. No space has been left empty. There’s literally a structure everywhere you go. But it’s actually good as it creates a quite realistic appearance to the city. It’s by no doubt one of the most detailed maps for Minecraft PE which I’ve come across thus far.
title: Blue City

description:
Author: TargetPractice

The Dungeon Tower is by far one of the best arena maps I’ve ever come across for Minecraft Pocket Edition. It contains six beautifully designed levels (especially so if you’ve got the optional texture pack applied) and the redstone mechanisms seem to work flawlessly. It’s a perfect map for anyone who enjoy monster battles or just want to improve their fighting skills. Also, it can be played by up to three players!
title: The Dungeon Tower

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

The Walls is a popular PvP and minigame which requires at least four players. The arena is split up in four different squares each looking just the same to the others. Players will spawn in one square each and then have 15 minutes to prepare for the final battle. It’s of extreme importance to use that time to gather the resources needed for defeating the other teams.
title: The Walls 2.0

description:
Author: EasyMCIdeasYT

Elite Gliders is an elytra map which is best played in multiplayer. It consists of one long elytra course and you must always stick to the track and fly through the rings. The main objective is to beat the other players by collecting the most nether stars (assuming that you play in multiplayer). This map can be played either by yourself or against your friends. The objective is to collect as many nether stars as you can. The nether stars are hidden in chests which you will find throughout the map. The player who have collected the most nether stars and completed the entire elytra course is the winner.
title: Elite Gliders

description:
Author: botpixel-games

Four skilled contestants will be fighting for empowerment of the world! Rage, Neutral, Peace and Mastery will compete for the strongest, and the most qualifying champion. Each category will have a unique set of Kits that fit the desired needs, Power Ups will lay in the crates that will be falling in the arena and the arena layout is immensely packed with diverse landscape and platforms. May the best of PvP and Parkour be blessed into the tournament, who will win the death match? How to Play: [1] • Pick a Side: Select Peace, Neutral, Rage or Mastery in the lobby! [2] • Select a Kit: Step on Glazed Terracotta next to the kit you want to select! [3] • Multiplayer: Play with up to 3 other friends in separate teams, multiple players can be in one team if preferred! [4] • Have Fun: Perform awesome tactics and PvP as a death match, players can make their own game rules!
title: Ultra PvP Fighters

description:
Author: Kurokuma, Tomoya Dani-kun

Kurokuma is a medium sized village with multiple different areas to explore. Some things to explore include an underwater restaurant and several different shops. It’s a very Minecrafty build with similarities to maps like Stampy’s Lovely World. It’s great to use for survival gameplay since it includes many different housing options as well as a bunch of farms for ensuring your food supply.
title: Kurokuma Village

description:
By AdrielYR

A parkour that consists of 3 levels, but this is not a normal parkour, there are blocks that will help or interrupt you to reach the goal, so, be very careful when jumping and running, let's go!

This Parkour Map contains difficulties that will make your life more difficult or easy, depending ... For now there are only 8 variations of blocks , this map support 2 players or more! if you find a bug, please report it in the map comments
title: High Effort Parkour v1.2

description:
Author: THATONECD

A fun mini-game map where you survive waves of zombies while you open and explore more areas to the map and getting better gear and finding out secrets of this mysterious building.
title: Night Of The Living Dead

description:
Author: Wheaten, DiamondKing567

Half Heart Race is a minigame race in which you have to compete against other players in a short obstacle course to come first to the finish line. The thing that makes it difficult is that you only got one half of heart left so this means that as soon you get hurt you will die immediately.
title: Half Heart Race (Addon)

description:
Author: ETSTFU

An auto-reseting small survival games map. Includes a village, ravine, mineshaft, a jungle temple, and a pyramid.

Instead of just chests, items can be found in chests, shulker boxes, and barrels hidden throughout the map.
title: ET’s Survival Games 1: The Jungle

description:
Author: Scuppy12

This map consists of several different minigames combined in one single map. It is best suited for Realms or for local multiplayer as most games are for two players or more. By playing this map you will be able to enjoy PvP games, parkour, quizzes, Bedwars, Speedrun, Drop and Jump, Total Wipeout and much more. The world also comes with a custom texture pack which makes it an even more fun world to experience!
title: Superland 2.0 Realm

description:
Author: LegoAidan10155

The Islands of Khanta features several large islands situated somewhere far out in the ocean. On each island you will find a different biome and this makes it a quite interesting and enjoyable map to explore. For example, the main island in the center includes a normal plains biome with some rocky mountains and another island features a huge mountain of lava.
title: The Islands of Khanta

description:
Author: Skygames

The Monkeys are Pooping everywhere! Quickly run and dodge the yucky poop! You have two lives, be the final player standing to win! The poop when hit deals 10 hearts out of your 20 hearts! Pooping monkeys are hiding in the trees. If you’re hit by poop you’ll lose half of your total health, and if you are hit once more then you will die. Avoid the poop and see for how long you can survive!
title: Jungle Monkeys

description:
Author: MACE

Der Grobe Krieg is a parkour map with a style of combat. throughout the map are places where you can sell rotten flesh and trade them in for weapons the end goal is to defeat the boss and win the map! This is re-playable and supports multiplayer!
title: Der Grobe Krieg

description:
Author: its_Brix

A map inspired by the movie “Escape Room”. In this map you are invited to play for your life. There are many different rooms, there are clues and riddles to help you escape every rooms. the last survivor wins, the map is only for 1 player to 6 players. The time is running so solve fast or you will become a helpless ant in the sea. try the map and HAVE FUN and ENJOY!
title: Escape Room 2

description:
Author: Shubh Aggarwal

This is horror map
title: Haunted Palace

description:
Author: azozgamer936

A very famous game mode comes from Counter-Strike Nexon: Zombies. Zombie Hero! Zombie Hero is a Human vs Zombie PvP (Player vs. Player) mini-game which humans need to survive the attacks from zombies and one of the humans is going to become a “Hero” and another human will be “Side-Kick”, those players will help you defeat the plague. Zombies have invaded cs_assault – now who’s gonna save it? You! Zombie Hero is a game mode from CSNZ (Counter-Strike Nexon: Zombies). In this game mode, 1 of the humans will be Zombie, 1 will be selected as “Side-Kick” and 1 lucky human will be the Hero! The hero gets powerful weapons. Another human will be Chosen as the Side-Kick and he also gets weapons. But not as good as Hero’s. Humans need to survive the 3 minutes to win, Zombies need Infect Humans before 3 Minutes is Up! There is also Supply Boxes that appear in the map every while.
title: Zombie Hero: Assault

description:
Author: noblais

What happens when you only have a 5×5 area of space? You go up! 5×5 Parkour has little segments of parkour for you to finish! The higher you go, the harder it gets, but there are checkpoints that makes the parkour a little less frustrating.
title: 5×5 Parkour

description:
Author: Scuppy12

This map consists of several different minigames combined in one single map. It is best suited for Realms or for local multiplayer as most games are for two players or more. By playing this map you will be able to enjoy PvP games, parkour, quizzes, Bedwars, Speedrun, Drop and Jump, Total Wipeout and much more.
title: Superland 2.0 Realm Christmas Update

description:
Author: Schleid

This is the sequel to Apollo 18, Return to the Moon! This time you’re going to an entire different planet known as Mars. Just some interesting facts. Ares is the name of an actual NASA program for going to Mars but it was cancelled due to budget constraints by President Obama. Also, Ares is the Greek name for Mars. Anyways, this map simulates a Mars mission in Minecraft!
title: Ares-I – Mission to Mars

description:
Author: m0thkith

This map contains seven levels, all of which are pretty easy but not easy enough to be boring. The button at the last jump of each level will take you to the next. Each level will be fun and possibly challenging depending on your skill level in parkour. Have fun!
title: Moth’s Parkour

description:
Author: Jhomes

This map features the ultimate redstone solution for building a hidden base. By the use of just one button you can switch the appearance for an entire room. There's of course a much more complex redstone system involved in allowing this process to happen but it shouldn't be too hard to rebuild in your own world since I've added a video tutorial in the bottom of the post.
title: The Transforming Room

description:
Author: Cubical

Five Night’s at Freddy’s is a game that has been out for many years already and the FNaF Legacy has inspired people like me to build the original location aka fnaf 1 in minecraft. With the recourses I had i managed to try and accurately build it in minecraft. This is currently a roleplay map. I am planning on building Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 in the future along with 3.
title: Five Nights at Freddy’s

description:
Author: RMPlaysMC YT

This map was under development for now, but you can have enjoy it with your friends or just by yourself and you can suggest me for more structures or something.
title: Republic of Lexie City

description:
Author: zZPROGAMERZz423

DeadRunner is a fun minigame which you can play together with some friends. Most of you will be runners, but one of you will be the zombie. The runners have to quickly find some place to hide and make survive all the way through the night without being found and killed by the zombie. Once the sun rises, the zombie dies and any still living runners will be the winners.
title: DeadRunner: Classic

description:
Author: cadenbarbour

Caden Island is a unique yet standard world which employs the traditional style of the Minecraft village into one large city. The city is divided into five different sections with varying type of archtecture. Even though it’s located on a fairly small island there are lots to be seen and explored here.
title: Caden Island

description:
Author: Fanky Supreme

Skyline Labs is a wonderful place to test experiments, hang out and have fun. I built this lab when I was 11 and now im 14 and want to share it with the world enjoy!
title: SkyLine Labs

description:
Author: AceAttacker

This map includes a cool concept for a desert oasis which maybe similar to woodland mansions could appear in Minecraft. A desert oasis is basically a small area of vegetation which surrounds a small water source. It would be really cool if these generated in vast desert biomes with plenty of sand. Sure, deserts are already known for desert temples and wells but this would make it even better.
title: Desert Oasis

description:
Author: SquareIum

This map is ready for the battles. Once you finish, leave the world and Import it again to go for Round 2.
title: 1v1 Lucky Block Wars

description:
Author: TUBERGAMER2010

Welcome, this map is a Minigame called: Answer Correct Or You DEAD!, created by MCM Tuber. In the pictures there’re 9 screenshoots of all levels and 2 screenshoots for the start lobby, final lobby and special prices. All players will be start with 10 lives; if one player lose; all players will be lost a life. When all players get in 0 lifes, all players will have to be to start again. Good luck and enjoy it.
title: Answer Correct Or You DEAD

description:
Author: vechrozilator

The Part 2 of 15 ways to die is here, come up with a new challenges whereas you need to solve that has a harder levels. Find out how would you kill yourself by solving puzzles such as redstone puzzle & command block puzzle, craft an item & brew potion for your needs in order to kill yourself. More challenges awaits you in 15 ways to die.
title: 15 Ways To Die (Part 2)

description:
Author: endxenoc

This is a map on which you can survive on an island totally different from the original mushroom biome, with personalized mushroom trees the map looks more beautiful than the original biome.
title: Mushroom Island

description:
Author: TheEnderface

Mechanic Apocalypse is the continuation of a popular map series taking place in a world where mechanical redstone robots have emerged with the intention to be destroy the world. You have arrived at a laboratory which appears to be the root cause for these mechanical maniacs. Now it's up to you to find and uncover the mysterious origin of these redstone robots.
title: Mechanic Apocalypse 3

description:
Author: MARCOGAMER21

Welcome to the world of fire and ice where temperatures are combined and strange, the strange thing is that the dungeons come out of nowhere, do not miss this and much more on the magnificent map of ICE AND FIRE WORLD
title: Ice And Fire World

description:
Author: BeezeeBox

You have found the ancient redstone railroad!

Can you get the loot and escape this place in one piece?!
title: Escape The Redstone Railroad!

description:
Author: DJKenleyTrack

This is a great source of inspiration for anyone but especially beginners who need some help on what they can build in Minecraft. Most of the decorations here are just to improve the visual look of your build since they don't actually add any other functionalities. It's a great mix of decorations which will work great for both modern and medieval creations.
title: 50 Ways To Decorate

description:
Author: GoldenEnergy

"The Monster Arena 2.0 is a beautiful remake of the original The Monster Arena. It has a ton of improved old and new features. Such as a new monster for you to fight, shops, custom armors, humongous arena, and much more! In the middle of a vast desert, an old arena stands. Legends have it that the arena is cursed, anyone who enters the arena will be attacked by hordes of endless monsters. Warriors from all over the world came to the arena to test their power. You, a brave warrior, challenge yourself to enter the arena… When you first started the map, it is recommended for you to collect your Daily Loot to obtain a headstart. Daily Loot is a loot that you get daily (Minecraft time). Make sure you talk to every single villager that there is to understand the map completely. To fight monsters, go into the entrance in the right, to watch a battle, go to the entrance in the middle. Follow the path of each entry as you go. In the fight entrance, you will see a red line when you want to open the gate, pass the red line to open the gate automatically and a battle will start. When a battle has started, players couldn’t join the arena until the battle ends. The battle ends when no one is left in the arena.
title: The Monster Arena 2.0

description:
Author: Goreckicraft123

This mansion is the perfect base for anyone who want to own their own huge mansion situated in a jungle. It has lots of room to fit plenty of people. One unusual (but a bit funny) part of the house is a village which is situated on the inside of the house. Yes, this sounds a bit strange but that’s the case. At least then you are never alone as you will always have villagers around you.
title: Rugged Jungle Mansion

description:
Author: tndptanster

Blackwell Academy is the school attended by Max, the main character of the game Life is Strange. I have fully rebuilt it in Minecraft. It has a completely built interior, and an exterior of course.
title: Minecraft Blackwell Academy

description:
Author: ShadyPE

This is a survival map mixed with an adventure which starts off on a ship at sea. You've been sent by your king to go out on the ocean and discover a legendary island. Alone and tired you finally go to bed but you don't get much sleep before you're woken up by an awful noise. A few moments later your ship is wrecked and you find yourself stranded on a tropical island.
title: Akkumuna

description:
Author: Paradiscal

Paintball is a type of game where players have to shoot other players and by doing this take out the other team. This game doesn’t work exactly as in real life as here you will be able to kill other players which for obvious reasons aren’t possible in real life. This map includes an addon which turns the snowball into a paintball gun. The aim is set to infinite range and will hit the target exactly where you aimed. You will need at least two players to play this map. Let two of the players stand on one pressure plate each to access a hidden lever. Pull the lever to open the front gate and you will be able to access the arena.
title: Paradiscal’s Paintball

description:
Author: keithross39

This map features the International Space Station, the Hubble Space Telescope, a Saturn V rocket, a Delta IV rocket, the Space Shuttle and launch towers for each rocket. All of the space structures have custom interiors which have been realistically designed to include the mission hardware and other things you’d expect. It’s a very realistic map (for being Minecraft) and perfect for any NASA or space enthusiasts out there!
title: Spaceflight (Beta)

description:
By Koffyt

On January 20, a contest was broadcast on the koffyt youtube channel "The best medieval construction", this construction is set in medieval times.

This contestant did a good job, with his building style, he has quite a bit of imagination and experience building.

In case you were wondering, who is this contestant? Baruch Velasco Avila.

Here we have a medieval fortress, somewhat fanciful, of a beautiful color.

Many libraries within the place, it shows that it is a site for knowledgeable people and readers.

Several rooms under construction, there is also a ring to be able to fight with more companions and improve for the next battles.

The soldiers tell us that walking through the corridors at night seems like they are in a horror story, apparently working there is a great challenge.

Everything is done in the snow biome, near the fortress we can see a very nice bridge.

The interior details are very nice and well set.

It can be used as a survival world to play with friends for even more fun.

The creator Baruch Velasco Avila god us the permissions to publish this map
title: Fortress

description:
Author: Impetus

Are you looking for a Minecraft Mansion? Well you’re in luck, because I built a Vintage style one just for you.
title: Vintage Mansion & Village

description:
By Villagecool

Welcome to holiday puzzle rush! This is a exiting puzzle minigame that will certainly get you pumped. You will go through many different setups of puzzles in set amounts of time, there's also a fun deathrun mode if you really want a challenge.

The game is pretty basic, to start the game you simply walk into the fireplace in the house or for deathrun mode, in the ice cave. Then you will levitate up the fireplace and pop into the arena. This is where the game is. during the time you have selected. You will solve the puzzles given to you. The goal of the game is to pass as many puzzles as possible.
title: Holiday Puzzle Rush 2!

description:
Author: MCPEJohn

This map features 15 different redstone creations which in some way relate to pistons. All of them are structures which in some way or another can be used to greatly improve your own builds in Minecraft. Most of them are also fairly easy to build so it shouldn't be too difficult to rebuild them in your own worlds.
title: 15 Piston Creations

description:
Author: scplayzmc

Go play with your friends in this brand-new map we’ve made. Hide as a baby and seek as a baby. Don’t get caught or you’re out. A random player will be selected as the seeker! Go play with your Friends with this brand new Map we made.. Hide as a baby and Seek as a Baby. Don’t get Caught or Your Out.. A Random Player will be Chosen as a Seeker. How to Play? Don’t get caught by the Seeker If you get caught you can spectate them But If all the hiders get caught press the button that is said on the sign.. Seeker A Seeker has 1 Diamond Sword to Kill Hiders If the all Hiders are killed The Hiders will Press The Button on the Spectate Menu/Area Hiders Hiders can hide any where they want but don’t hide out of the Map that’s CHEATING. And Don’t get Caught by the Seeker You can see him wearing a Diamond armor.
title: Babies Hide and Seek

description:
Author: Otonomega

Mob Arena Battles 3 is a PvE (player versus environment) arena map which is recommended for a group of max 5 players. You can play it alone too but it will be quite difficult. Right now it includes just 2 levels with 10 waves each. A future update will include more than 5 levels with a total of more than 50 monster waves. Have a good time in an awesome map while improving your fighting skills!
title: Mob Arena Battles 3

description:
<p>Author: MAXIM777YT <p>

Use your blocks, weapons and pickaxes to destroy the enemy’s nether reactor core! Jump high with the potions and don’t let your enemy get to your base! CB: Maxim777YT; Map and lobby: AvesTheFox

TheBridgers is a 1v1 minigame made without any addons and mods, only Command Blocks! The first one to break the enemy’s nether reactor 5 times wins!
title: TheBridgers

description:
Author: POPULARSONIC

This is the kit PvP map made by Popularsonic(me), the map has 3 kits(I will add more If I want to). This map is made out of complex Commands, enjoy my first Kit PvP map
title: Sonic Kit PvP

description:
Author: LanceOfJynnue

Invite your friends and have an epic battle within this world! Where you choose your own characters and fight with one another to gain experience and money!! More experience and money, more chances of winning!
title: KitPVP Advance

description:
Author: Miusername1

The Republic of Newland is an expansion of Ceylon City and it features a huge city with lots of modern architecture. The city appears to be extremely well planned with everything from commercial to more residential areas. It's definitely one of the top choices if you want to experience a realistic city in Minecraft.
title: Republic of Newland

description:
Author: FlareShiro

Welcome to Every Color Rainbow Parkour recreated by me for Minecraft Bedrock Edition (almost) block for block, with 16 different levels, an added toggle-able timer & unique parkour in every level.,
title: Every Color Rainbow Parkour

description:
Author: MDS Minecraft

This map is a showcase which demonstrates 12 different piston extenders. They basically use different redstone configurations in order to extend the push limit for a piston. The max piston extension is 12 blocks and with this map you will be able to learn to make multiple different variants.
title: 1-12 Piston Extenders

description:
Author: MattH44

This map includes 10 different levels and each one is based on a friendly mob in Minecraft. To finish this map you need to complete all the different levels and this is done by doing parkour to end of each level. Some functionality in some levels are based on a mob. For example, the Dolphin level will give you a speed boost, and the Turtle level will give you slowness.
title: Animals Parkour

description: Explore a secluded billionaire’s paradise cut into a cliff on a private island. Accessible via bridge, boat or helicopter. Detox from the outside world in this resort sized house. At this current time, the majority of the exterior, other than the gold course, have been completed. However, the entire east wing (where sports facilities, forty seat threatre and four bedrooms are located) lacks an interior. The main complex of the house has a full interior.
title: Island Retreat

description:
Author: EDLUX02_YT

This is a short minigame map in where you would have to pass it with only half heart.

Are you good enough to pass this map?

( It will make you desperate)
title: Half a Heart

description:
Author: TheRedEngineer

This is a really cool map which you can use to compose your own music using a huge instrument somewhat similar to a piano. You can add your own notes to a track and then listen to your own music. If you enjoy making music then this is definitely something worth checking out.
title: Music Maker

description:
Author: MashBruv

This map is based on the popular Missile Wars map for Minecraft: Java Edition (originally made by CubeHamster and SethBling). The objective of the game is to destroy the enemy team’s colored concrete located at the back of their island. To do this you can use a variety of missiles and bombers. There are also shields and flaming arrows which you can use for defending your own base.
title: Missile Wars For MCPE

description:
Author: Capoul

Ice PvP now available! Run and be careful not to slip! Push your opponents and hang in there! Fight to win! This game is very fun. If a player has the bad luck to fall off to the bottom of the void, then the player will be completely eliminated from the game!
title: Ice PvP

description:
Author: leewei1702

Copy the Painting is a minigame which can be played either alone in single player or with other players in multiplayer. It’s a quite fun game where each player will be presented an image and which they then have to copy using wool as the blocks for placing and shears for removing blocks if any are accidentally placed. How does it work? You can play this game in single player and multiplayer with max 5 players. Copy the painting using the wool and place it on the quartz blocks. You can use the shears to remove wool. The player with the highest score wins!
title: Copy the Painting

description:
Author: azozgamer936

cs_italy. one of the most iconic maps, a very special map that has an opera radio playing in Terrorist spawn point. This map may contain nostalgia because of the radio!
title: cs_italy

description:
Author: Tal Melamed

The brewing stand is a block in Minecraft which can be used for brewing potions.

You can then consume the potions to gain temporary powers such as increased strength or agility.

This is a redstone map which recreates the block on a much bigger scale. And since it’s entirely powered by redstone you can actually use it to brew potions!
title: Working Brewing Stand

description:
Author: MattH44

Monsters Parkour is a fun and challenging parkour map which includes 10 different mob themed levels. Your objective is to jump from one platform to another while avoiding the swarming mobs beneath you. This definitely adds to the challenge and makes it a whole lot more intense than ordinary parkour maps. In some of the more difficult levels there are hidden shulker boxes which contain weapons you can use to protect yourself.
title: Monsters Parkour

description:
<p>Author: RAID GAMES <p>
Raid zombies is a 1-3 player zombie survival game. It is quite difficult but fun nevertheless. You can get “perks” and items by buying them with xp! the goal is to escape whatever map your playing on in Raid Zombies.
title: Raid Zombies

description:
Author: PeacelandGov, Nick_Miao, PLBroadcasting

The City of Democratia is one of the largest and most detailed city maps so far created for Minecraft PE. The city offers a great variety of colors and there are peace signs all over the city. Probably in relation to the fact that it’s part of the Peaceland republic. Another city which can now be explored is the City of Hollowoodenplank. You can reach this city by finding the long red bridge and follow it until you get to a mesa biome. In the republic of Peaceland there are loads of different areas and buildings which can be explored. Everything from hospitals, libraries, univeristies to residential houses and apartment complex.»
title: State of Democratia

description:
Author: Cool J T E P

It is a hand-built research station in a Maya Tempel with a small Village with 20 Villiger. You are welcome to copy the buildings. It can be stutter, but I do not know why.
title: Forschungs Station

description:
Author: medude27

This map is based on a Netflix original show called The Rain. You’ll spawn inside a bunker which is in need of Energy Rods. A more thorough gameplay guide will be presented to you as you’re playing the game. It’s a really good map if you’re interested in survival and want to combine it with a ready-made adventure. There are tons of command blocks and other features to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience.
title: The Rain

description:
Author: Fizzman797

The Smurfs’ Village includes all the mushroom shaped houses that we’ve come to know and love, along with iconic locations like the Smurf Windmill and the Smurf Hotel. All locations have fully fleshed out interior, including the massive tree in the middle of Smurf Village! Climb up the interior of the tree to find even more Smurf houses and some of the Smurfs’ gardens.
title: The Smurfs’ Village

description:
Author: creativemines

CreativeMines presents Find The Button that will really test your skills. Find The Button has 21 unique levels, each built with time and care. Once you complete the levels, you will be rewarded with cake, a ceremony, and more!

Find The Button is a classic game where you have to, well, find the button! The levels are simple, but have a lot of effort put in them. Each level has been tested to ensure the map is playable. Each level is unique, challenging, loaded with fake buttons that kill you, and has a playful setting and theme.
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: VinnieBuzz, Dobo Dude

Stampy's Lovely World is created by Stampylonghead who is one of the most popular YouTubers in the Minecraft community. Here you will find lots of shops, restaurants and other weird structures which have been featured in Stampy's videos. This was originally created by some fans for Xbox but has now been ported to Pocket Edition as well.
title: Stampy's Lovely World PE

description:
Author: scerri

This map takes you on a quite parkour challenge with a special survival twist. There are 10 different levels and in each one you will only have one half heart. This means that you are extremely vulnerable and any misstep can be instant death which results in you having to restart the level. It’s certainly quite difficult but definitely a fun challenge!
title: 1 HP Heart

description:
Author: minecraftstyler777

Tomb Crafter 6: Lost Temple is an amazing adventure map in which you’ve traveled to an old forgotten temple in search for another ancient artifact known as the Royal Mask. It’s easier said than done because first you need to get there and then you need to complete a number of difficult challenges which await you inside the temple.
title: Tomb Crafter 6: Lost Temple

description:
Author: mobspawner

Welcome to my Working Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza Restaurant that features working doors, lights, and power. I am hoping to improve this creation map in the future and make an exact replica of FnaF 1, but of course, in Minecraft. This map was made possible by The Dany Fazbear’s English Texture Pack The original FNaF 1 crew is here. This includes Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy.
title: Working FNaF 1 Restaurant

description:
Author: angious2004

This is my version of the awesome game Hello, Neighbor! It’s heavily based on Alpha 1, Alpha 2 and Act 3 of the game. It has some functionality and somewhat of a story, but the main focus of this map is the Neighbor’s tremendous house and it includes a full basement. Enjoy it! Important: This map requires the Vanilla Vehicles Addon and the Mine-Furniture Addon.
title: Hello, Neighbor! 2004

description:
Author: umerkk164

This is an awesome map in which you will fly a helicopter, obtain a stolen gem and drop some bombs on some thieving villagers. The main attraction here are the flyable helicopters which are entirely powered by redstone and command blocks. It's suitable for both single player use as well as multiplayer since there are multiple helicopters you can use.
title: The Missing Gem (Flyable Helicopters)

description:
Author: swagcaster

Have you ever wanted to PVP in a prison? have you ever wanted to play cops n robbers with your friends, have you ever wanted to stage a mock prison riot? have you ever wanted to do literally anything but in a prison isolated on an island away from civilization? well than this is the map for you.
title: Prison Island

description:
Author: jr_playverse

Maze Apocalypse is my first adventure map I’ve ever created. In this map, you need to finish all different maze levels and to get your reward. Note: only higher minecraft versions are recommended to play this map.
title: Maze Apocalypse

description:
Author: devdrone

This is a great map to use if you want to improve your battle skills in Minecraft. Before starting you will be able to select among 4 different kits and then one of several different maps. There is also a shop you can access but to buy upgrades you will need rotten flesh which you get by killing zombies in the maps.
title: Zombie’s

description:
By Yosi Zi

Welcome to the Happiest Place in France This Includes Recreation of Disneyland Paris Resort!Includes : Disneyland Park, Walt Disney Studios and Disney Village & Some of the Hotels!Pls Enjoy the Map!
title: Disneyland Paris

description:
Author: skygames

Cubed is a modern mansion situated in a plains biome. The house has everything you need to survive, and is full of rooms to eat, sleep, and play in. The mansion is open concept, meaning that it has lots of room to live in, and is modern on the inside and outside!
title: Cubed – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: Xeno of Cyprus

This is a map of a medieval village with custom trees and decorated houses. The interiors of the houses are fully decorated
title: A Medieval Village

description:
Author: jacob1duke

The goal is to complete levels and obtain the colored wool. After obtaining the wool, place it down at it’s assorted color.
title: Colors

description:
Author: FLUGXE

Rock’ Em Sock’ Em Robots, the classic toy and game, has now been remade in Minecraft. It’s played like the original, where players go all out button mashing in an attempt to knock their opponent’s head off. Credit goes to SethBling for designing the game. You’ll need a friend to play with you as this is a two-player-only map.
title: Rock’ Em Sock’ Em Robots

description: This map is one of the puzzles and parkour, you will have to go through 15 challenges some easy and some difficult, good luck and enjoy this amazing map and proucure well because it has some things well hidden
title: ADVENTURE MAP

description:
Author: Jannik_DE

The Prison Break is a map inspired by the Prison Break TV series. Your brother was sent to prison after trying to rob a bank and your mission is to try to save him. Not only will you help him escape prison but you will also go through with a bank robbery and escape by helicopter. It’s one of the most clever maps I’ve tested and it is definitely worth playing if you enjoy some intense action, clever puzzles and an intriguing story.
title: The Prison Break

description:
Author: yantivenom

This is Ice Cave Escape where you are trapped inside an ice cave and have to find out how to get out. You need to find secrets that will give you powers you can use to get out.

Get your starting chest to start:
Find secrets:
Fight enemies:
title: Ice Cave Escape

description:
Author: MICKEYNERD17

This is Epcot Center, a custom recreation by Mickeynerd17 Productions, giving a Minecraft twist to the Iconic Experimental Prototype Community Of Tomorrow.

This map was made completely by myself, taking approximately 1 year to build, and is always a work in progress, but all open pavilions have complete interiors with functioning rides you can enjoy. I hope you enjoy my hard work, and have a good day!

This map was a personal endeavor by myself. Ever since I discovered the past version of the theme park I love most, Epcot, as it looked in 1989 with all the original pavilions, I have always wanted to build my own version to enjoy and modify. Now I want to share my hard work with the world, so everyone can enjoy the promise of a bright future!

Thanks for checking out my map, and welcome to the 21st century!

Photos of some of the pavilions:

Spaceship Earth
title: Disney’s EPCOT_Center

description:
Author: PIXELL

Have you already played find the button? The game consists of you find the button hidden in the level to continue in the game, each level presents a different phase. It is very cool!

Each level has a different village than the new Minecraft Village and Pillage update.

Try to find the hidden button on the levels to move on to the next !!

-Only 1 player allowed
title: Find the Button: Villages

description:
By Fiswanan

This is a mansion built to be round and it has many lights to prevent mobs from spawning everywhere within the base. The mansion is beautifully and very fun to play survival mode with. Hope you enjoy.
title: Round Mansion

description:
Author: Team Freinercraft

Lucky Block Race is a fun mini-game where you will test your luck in a race against your friends! And don't worry, if you don't have a wifi network or you can't play with friends, you can play alone because the map detects the amount of people so you can have fun alone!
title: Lucky Block Race

description:
Author: BendyTheDemon

This is an adventure combining a puzzle with a horror story. You recently returned back home after a hard day at work and while you’re relaxing inside your home you get a call from your friend and he asks you to come over to his house because he has something to show you. As you have nothing better to do you decide to find your way to his house. Play the map to find out what happens next!
title: The Dummy Horror

description:
Author: DREDDING2000

There are many different maps. Ones to see big great builds, adventuring maps with interesting stories, or challenging yourself and or your friends. This is a map to test your skills on how long you can survive random events that the map throughs at you.

Survive the random events that the map through at you. there are many different events that may happen.
title: Survive The Event

description:
<p>Author: DIAMONDGAMERASH <p>

This is a MAP for Celebrating NEW YEAR with some FIREWORKS! And MINI GAMES
title: New Year Special

description:
Author: SCERRI

In this map you will face 25 different levels, and in each level you will need to find a button to go to the next level. In this map the levels have been created in detail to explore them as well (even if they are small)
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: mrcookienub

Cracked Memories – The Horror Game is a first person horror game where the player has amnesia and can’t remember who they are but they are hurt. You find a nearby abandoned hospital and hope that someone or something can help you. Try to explore everything and not just jump too the ending. Enjoy the map to your hearts content but be sure to follow the rules ????
title: Cracked Memories

description:
Author: Fizzman797

Snowball Brawl is a small but fun minigame where you'll fight another player in an arena. It's a fight to death minigame so this means it won't stop until one of you've lost and respawned. The game uses command blocks to give players access to several clever tools which can be used for everything from spawning a snow wall to slowing down the other player.
title: Snowball Brawl

description:
Author: Joey gaming

This map includes
Light Containment Zone
Heavy Containment Zone
Entrance Zone
SCP 106 Recontainment Zone
Warhead Silo
gate A entrance
Class-D holding cells
Custom Sounds
Class-D Termination Room
title: SCP Roleplay Filming World

description:
Author: SpunkieMunkie

This is a survival spawn in which you will spawn on a ship called Mandrake. Unfortunately it ran around. There are several loot chests on the ship and you can also trade with a a whole lot of passengers on the ship. If you plan on surviving the night it’s extremely important that you prepare by gathering items and trading with the villagers. After surviving the first night you can use Mandrake (the shop) as your home while exploring the rest of this wonderful survival world! You will find a hint at the back of the ship.
title: The Curse of the Mandrake

description:
Author: ZeReaper

The Split is a horror map taking place in part inside an abandoned hospital. It’s a single player experience where you will go on an exciting and sometimes scary journey to find out how you got there. From beginning to end there is a story to always keep you engaged in the adventure. There are custom sounds and textures to really create a spooky environment and atmosphere.
title: The Split

description:
Author: pixelman546

Toadstool Castle is a famous building in the Super Mario universe. It has been featured in several different Super Mario game titles but personally I first came across it in Super Mario 64. This creation is largely inspired by the castle but it is by no means a replica. However, the exterior looks astonishingly similar and it even includes many of the rooms which you will recognize from the games.
title: Toadstool Castle

description:
By Mixtongent73

This map is and ice rink that I built. It is and NHL size ice rink with a working scoreboard and clock. It is meant to be built around.

This ice rink is meant to be customized. The point of this map is to build your own stadium around the rink. The map can also be used to make up your own minigame. It is an NHL size rink. The scoreboard is fully functional and has a working clock and penalty indicators.
title: Mix's Ice Rink

description:
Author: MB_PROJECTS

Welcome to Baldi’s School Basics! Here you learn the best subject ever, Math! Your teacher is Baldi, a teacher who loves math and HATES a lot when someone misses a question. Therefore, you will have to be a good student and answer correctly.

Attention! This map works for multiplayer only (One being Baldi and the other is Player).
title: Minecraft’s Basics in Education and Learning

description:
Author: Captain_cookie4

This is part 1 of an adventure map called Time madness. In this crazy adventure you will face a variety of challenges such as parkour, find the button, PVE, mini boss battles and much more!

On a mission to help one of your friends you will have to time travel to 3 different time periods in order to gather ancient items…unfortunately things don’t go as expected.
title: Time Madness-Part 1

description:
By JMCbrine

A remake of Parkour Corridor 1. But its x5 bigger. Some parts of this parkour map can be harder or easier. Can you accept this another challenge?Be good at parkour to complete these 30 stages with specific theme and biome. I add some cosmetic feature like Trails. Discover some shortcuts(Easter Eggs) to pass stages much easier.
title: Parkour Corridor 3

description:
By Voxed Studio

Mushy Island (Creation) is a wonderful island full of giant mushrooms and Nordic houses, as well as a ship and a mountain fortress. Explore this amazing island and have fun!The map was created by Toii and ported by Voxed Studio to the Bedrock Edition.
title: Mushy Island

description:
By Koffyt

The build is by HASMA777, second winner of the koffyt contest. (He gave us the rights)It is a beautiful medieval castle, to be able to walk and play with your friends, it has beautiful interior details.What are you waiting for to immerse yourself in this wonderful time!?
title: Medieval Castle

description:
Author: JMCbrine

Having a big ang realistic styled city that over a 70+ buildings at total and 1000 houses on neighborhood. And added a Estates for additional living purposes and added a new lines of railway.
title: Bricksville City 2.0

description:
Author: lcb

This is my survival world! This world is full survival (No cheats, mods, or add-ons). I have built a lot of stuff on this world. I’m planning on updating it every now and then, because I’m still working on it. I hope you all enyjoy it, because this isn’t the only map that I’ll ever create!
title: LCB’s Survival World

description:
Author: catadventurer22

Minecraft has creativity for everyone, whether its someone who likes to build, create complex command contraptions, or even resource packs. But aside from resource packs, how else could you embrace your artistic talent within Minecraft? Maybe a large canvas with a large selection of colors? You got it!
title: Map Art Maker!

description:
Author: B0NY434445

This is a find the button map, it has 20 challenging levels with different difficulties easy medium and hard, there is also a clue available in every level after 10min
title: Find The Button

description:
Author: Zen0ie

Funtopia Park is a huge themed amusement park built by only two persons. It features a wide range of attractions such as plenty of fun roller coasters and water slides. There are really endless of possibilities for what you can do in Funtopia. Besides building Funtopia Park the creators are also very busy building Funtopia City and Funtopia World and they hope to release them soon.
title: Funtopia Park

description:
Author: You Koala

Minecraft Dungeons is now available, with an epic map full of adventure and missions that challenge the best heroes in a battle with terrible villains and bosses. Will you be that hero?
title: MINECRAFT DUNGEONS

description:
Author: TheF2Pgaming

Are you looking for “The One”, or are you already happily with someone? Regardless of your real world status, this map is for you! This might be short and a little bit rushed map but it is perfect for anyone who is looking to get into the Valentine’s Day spirit. The map includes flower-filled gardens, minigames and also the Magical Valentine Boat Ride!
title: Valentine’s Day 2018

description:
Author: Metal Baci

This is the city that lies in the Medieval Highlands. Explore this world and discover the story of Atlantis, written in the books that tell the legends. Collect them all and find all the secrets in this medievel style city in the Mountains. Have fun!
title: Medieval Highlands

description:
Author: SkyGames

Magic Maze is the confusing maze game! The maze is constantly changing and messing with your brain! The aim is to beat your opponents to the escape [Using your map] Since the maze is changing it helps to be in certain parts at certain times to get to the exit! This map is recommended for older players as younger players might find it frustrating more than fun!
title: Magic Maze

description:
Author: GioFTS

We’re in a plane.. carrying this blue meteor named “Element 115”. A passenger touches this mysterious rock. But when he comes back. He attacks the pilot. WERE GOING DOWN!! *Crash*. “You Just Survived a Plane crash. You thought your crew was dead from the accident. You were wrong.”
title: Nacht Der Untoten

description:
By José the builder

welcome to liberia city, a very detailed map, this map has 2 big cities, one is liberia city and the other is gravel city, each city has something special !. in these cities there are shops, supermarkets, town halls, banks, hotels, airports, factories and much more!, Now you can play well in creative or in survival, have fun living in this great city!
title: Liberia City v10 Final Update

description:
Author: Pastimeboy

This map features several amazing optical illusion creations which have the possibility to truly trick your mind in the most mind-blowing ways. Each of them look individually amazing but it's only as long as you stand looking at it directly from a specific position. If you like art and design then you definitely have to check it out.
title: World of Illusions

description:
Author: Blaze0212

Challenge your friends (and enemies) in a duel. This is a PvP arena suitable for anywhere between 2-10 players. Its limited size makes it most suitable for melee combat (e.g. sword fights) as the bow is more suitable for long-range combat. The arena is very well built and this makes the map so much more cool to play! Grab some food, a weapon and gear from the chests. Then walk into the arena and wait for the other player(s) to join. Once everyone have entered then start a countdown from 10. The objective is to kill everyone in the arena and be the last one alive. You can play multiple rounds as you will respawn in the lobby once you die.
title: Blaze PvP Arena

description:
Author: MrJohnWeez

The renowned Minecraft world that we usually play is transformed into a grid of a diverse range of blocks suspended over the void. This creates a challenging and fun playthrough to Minecraft. Parkour mastery is vital to avoid any unnecessary deaths in the map, not to mention the presence of hostile mobs. The goal is the same as the vanilla Minecraft – go to the end and defeat the dragon. Only one rule! Never cheat in any means (bridge to the mainland, for example).
title: Advanced SkyGrid Survival

description:
Author: POCKETKENT

A unique modern mansion built in the jungle, full-packed with beauty of nature, light and power of redstone! Finely-built with love and created with combination of multiple designs to experience the best of your mansion!
title: Luxurious Modern Mansion

description:
Author: Xnimates

This is a challenge consisting of five levels which lets you test your flying skills using the elytra wings. Elytra wings is a new type of item available in 0.17.0 of Minecraft Pocket Edition which allows the player to glide. 0.17.0 is currently only available for Android users as a beta version.
title: Elytra Challenge

description:
Author: RedstonePhantom/GrinnAzeed

This map includes 10 different advanced redstone creations. Some of them are essential to build at some point in time since they will allow you to more easily keep track of the different items you’ve collected throughout your life span in Minecraft. Redstone is pretty much the key to reach maximum efficiency and to be able to much quicker reach the End (in a positive way). Wardrobe: Mix up your choice of colors for the day! Use the arrows to select among a wide range of dyed armors, step into the wardrobe and then press the button to automatically get dressed. Imagine if this existed in real life.. it would really make life so much easier! Industrial Elevator: This is a fully automated elevator and it appears to be completely bug free. You can even call the elevator in case the door is closed simply by pressing a button. Massive Auto Storage: Have you ever got to a point where you’ve collected more items than you ever think you’d need? Well, then it’s time to build an automatic storage machine. Drop the items into the input chest and then have them automatically sorted in different containers. You can later get whatever items you want by pulling the levers to select them and then take them from the output chest.
title: 10 Advanced Redstone Creations

description:
Author: Lumpy Schits

Parkour RA(N)GE | Challenging parkour map for Parkour Pros. Featuring: 30 Unique Level Challenges
title: Parkour RA(N)GE

description:
Author: ilegendianoth

Have you played on Death Run on servers? Yes, of course. But in worlds? No. Now the answer will become yes. This world is a 100% automatic Death Run. Interested? Let’s find out more! Objectives There will be 1 death and 1-9 runners. If you are Death: You are trying to kill all runners with traps, and power-ups (such as kill a runner, give runners bad effects, etc., which costs emeralds), or hold them down until the game is over. We will tell you how to get emeralds below. If you are a Runner: You are trying to get to the end of the map without using all of your lives (you get 3 lives in the beginning, you can buy lives at each checkpoint in “life stations”, which costs emeralds), and before the time runs out. There are multiple obstacles that death controls, so be careful of the death! How to Get Emeralds You will get emeralds in the following ways: 1. By participating, you will get randomly 1-4 emeralds each game. 2. By winning, either as Death or as a Runner, you will get randomly 4-16 emeralds each game. There is a spectator mode, if someone joins mid-game, or if someone gets eliminated, they can press the spectator mode button when the game is running! Now you can play without any struggles, remember, never give up, even though some of the obstacles are HARD!
title: IL Death Run v2.1

description:
Author: Argent Studio

Mine and get more balance to can buy better tools, rankup, open crates and more!

Our map supports multiplayer aswell! you can enjoy it with your friends now without any bugs or issues


– Here we will try to answer your questions ?

# How can i sell items ?

If your game is EnglishUK or any other English version the blocks will be get auto sold, if your game is not, please make sure to put it EnglishUK to avoid crashes and bugs.

# How can i get better ores and tools ?

For the ores, you need to RankUp the more you rankUP the more it get expensive but the better ores. For tools, you can get better tools by opening crates and unloading custom Abilities such as perks etc…

# How can i get crates, mana and coins ?

For coins, you get them from : Finishing quests(Coming Soon), mining or by claiming donations which you can find it in shop in the perks manager (White Shulker Box) or finally you can open crates to get coins aswell. For mana, currently it’s only obtainable from crates and about the way to get crates is that everytime the mine reset you get 35% crate chance if you didn’t get a crate last reset if you got already one last reset you will get 45% to get an other one.
title: PrisonMC

description:
Author: end_boy_

Previously The London Dungeons, we have now expanded to include more of Merlin’s Magical London with our new attraction – Sea Life! The London Dungeon and Sea Life London are both attractions designed to be as enjoyable as possible in the center of London, which we have now recreated into Minecraft. “Dive to the deepest depths!”
title: Merlin’s Magical London

description:
Author: CameronTheWolf

This particular map is almost 5 years old and was originally created on the console version for Minecraft. It’s inspired by a multiplayer minigame called One In The Chamber which is quite popular on servers. The map has now been ported over to Bedrock Edition and it has been updated with some command blocks and spawn randomizers. The objective is to kill all enemy players in the arena either by using a bow and arrow or a sword.
title: One Shot One Kill

description:
By kokumbannock

Hells Nightmare is a WWII styled Minecraft Bedrock Edition PvP map. In this map, you are immersed in famous WWII locations to fight with famous WWII weapons with a variety of game-modes to choose from. Currently in Beta
title: Hells Nightmare

description:
Author: mcpedash

This is similar in many ways to any other SkyBlock survival map except that there are some unpredictable events that can make the game either easy or extremely difficult. All of this depends on your own luck! There are four different islands (floating in a void of nothingness) and they include the normal Main Island, a Desert Island, a Stronghold Island and a Lucky Island.
title: LuckyTree SkyBlock

description:
Author: fizzman797

Alien Escape! is a multiplayer minigame which is recommended for 2-5 players. One player will be the Alien and the remaining players will play as the Humans. The Humans are stuck on an alien spaceship and have to escape by shutting off 5 different power generators to activate the exit. But the Alien has different plans and have to eliminate them before they can escape.
title: Alien Escape!

description:
Author: BlackZero

This map has an incredible amount of 49 different levels but none of them are especially hard to complete. It's best suited for beginners who don't have too much experience with parkour in Minecraft. Each level is a small room with four white walls and somewhere hard to get is a button. Your task is to find a way to the button and press it to complete the level.
title: The White

description:
Author: MattH44

In this world you’ll spawn on a floating island up in the sky. Your objective is to collect resources, explore and survive.
