There are several other islands surrounding the spawn island which have all kinds of useful features such as mob spawners, chests and valuable ores. The primary goal is to find a way to explore all the islands and build on them. This map works for both single player and multiplayer gameplay.
title: SkySurvival

description:
Author: megastrikermcpe

Do you feel strong enough to survive a dangerous place in the depth of cyperspace? This Halloween Edition of Project Spectron will provide you an intense experience inside the Trojan District. Lots of treasures and different special biomes are waiting to be discovered by you! This map includes quests: Find 8 Emeraldines, 4 Cyber-Stars and a rare Rainbow Emeraldine! All hidden around the place. Good luck trying find it!
title: Project Spectron: Halloween Mode

description:
Author: shahid-hussain

Mosephet City is a 1 year project developed by Shahid. In this city you can explore downtown (also known as Standard Scrap City and Moject Architurecture District). More builds are currently in construction. You can expect more hotels, apartment and more in a future update.
title: Mosephet City

description:
Author: JDMMaster26

This is a remastered version of map that I submitted on utk.io! It has changed slightly. For example I added my texture to easily navigate through the race track and know where is the correct place for the car you’re driving.
title: Race Track

description:
Author: HANIC

A Minecraft adventure map in which pigs take over the world and kill the villagers to steal their emeralds. Pigs don’t kill humans because they are not materials. They only want the villagers to steal their emeralds so they can make an emerald block which they can use to power the PCS2000.

RULES
Be in gamemode 2
No cheating
Follow the instructions
Don’t kill the mob that is not moving
title: When Pigs Take Over

description:
Author: fizzman797

You managed to escape Gargamel’s Menacing Mountain with the help of Brainy. Upon arriving back at the village you learn that Gargamel has managed to steal Papa Smurf’s secret potion. The Smurfs overheard Gargamel talking about hiding the potion in the Menacing Mountain. You(Jokey) and Brainy being the only 2 smurfs that know where the mountain is decide that one of you needs to go back into the mountain and retrieve Papa Smurf’s potion. Brainy has promised you that if you go and get the potion back, he’ll have a huge surprise for you when you come back. As enticing as that is, you can’t resist and once again you enter Gargamel’s Menacing Mountain! This map is a direct sequel to Gargamel’s Menacing Mountain. It is advised that you play that map first. Papa Smurf’s Secret Potion is a parkour oriented map with story elements. As you complete each area you’ll be greeted with dialogue from characters in the map. There are checkpoints after each major area. Players: As many as you’d like Difficulty: Medium (Very few difficult jumps) Playtime: 15-20 minutes average
title: Papa Smurf’s Secret Potion

description:
Author: anearplayz

Hi again, welcome to Biome Tower Parkour by anearplayz. In this map, your goal is that you need to get through all the biome levels to reach to the top of the parkour tower. The map is great for multiplayer, parkour races, speedruns and more.
title: Biome Tower Parkour!

description:
Author: CameronTheWolf

This is a great minigame which sets you up for challenges which require you to locate a couple of different monuments and then ultimately find a way out of the maze. It's not going to be too easy since all of the mazes are fairly complex and definitely require some brains to be completed (or to avoid getting lost inside).
title: The Three Mazes

description:
Author: ZEUSXPRESS

Tag Der Toten is a map inspired by Nacht Der Untoten. This map is a fun mini game in which you survive waves of zombies. You get rotten flesh from the zombies and you can by items in a shop. There are also Perks, Barricades, Power, Pack a Punch, and Mystery Box in addition to all that.

About:

This map is a mini game in which you survive waves of zombies. By killing zombies, you get rotten flesh. With rotten flesh you can buy items, perks, doors, enchantments, and the mystery box.

If you are done with the mini game, please visit the credits which there is a special treat! Teleportation to the credits can be found in the shop in the brick room(recommended to go into peaceful game mode for credits).
title: Curse of the Undead

description:
Author: telepathicgrunt

Castellia is an extremely challenging adventure map where you will combat dangerous monsters, solve difficult puzzles, defeat the Wither boss and complete a series of other challenges. All of the levels are medieval themed and just in general very beautifully designed. As there are two versions of this map you can play anywhere between 1 – 4 players.
title: Castellia

description:
Author: WalkerTyme

This map is more than just a redstone showcase map. It was created for people who are completely new to redstone and want to learn more about it. Every creation you will come across is a fully functional contraption with detailed information explaining the functionalities. There are also a wide range of creations which allow you to start at a level which matches your current abilities.
title: A Beginner's Guide to Redstone

description:
Author: Carp Corps

This is a map in which two teams fight each other in many ways, being challenged by an economy system, it’s impossible to spam any attack button. With infinite lives, the goal is to destroy the opposite team’s base entirely, not kill them. With over 3400 TNT per team, hundreds of repeaters, you’ll probably never run out of material to destroy the enemy base.
title: Base Wars

description:
Author: HorizonCrew

ArkCraft is a magnificent world with many foreign places yet to be explored. There are lots of adventures and quests to take on in this brand new survival world. And the terrain is nothing like you would ever be able to experience in vanilla Minecraft. Find a way to survive either on your own or with your friends. Build a base, or use any of the already existing structures to make your own. Have fun surviving!
title: ArkCraft

description:
Author: Kingbudderjr

This is a quite clever redstone machine which lets you build an electric furnace. The electric furnace is much better than an ordinary furnace since it doesn't require any fuel (e.g. coal) to run. However, the downside is that it is slower than an ordinary furnace and doesn't have the same mobility since it requires the redstone structure to be somewhere close to function properly.
title: Electric Furnace

description:
Author: skygames

Birch is a modern house near a river, and also by a village. The house features an upstairs living room, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and an indoor tree! Multiple windows let you look out onto the village, and the river that is in your backyard, but if rushing against the current isn’t for you, the house also has a backyard pool!
title: Birch – Castle House Mansion

description:
Author: M7MoGameR

This map features three of the most popular minigames in just one map and for each minigame there are several levels. The minigames include parkour, find the button and puzzle games. All levels are also very well designed and constructed which makes the gameplay an even better experience to enjoy. Before starting you will be able to select among three different difficulty levels.
title: PFP Series

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

The Lands of Falconia features an amazingly huge island map (1500 blocks x 1500 blocks in size) with lots of custom terrain, custom trees and even a medieval village to explore. The work of the terrain is quite well done with a smooth transition between custom terrain and the normally generated Minecraft terrain.
title: The Lands of Falconia

description:
Author: DaphneElaine

Here are a bunch of awesome sofa designs which should provide you some great inspiration when designing one of your houses in Minecraft. Most of the ideas are best suited for modern homes but there are also a few which look great for medieval builds as well. It's not just the sofa which makes them beautiful but also the choice of colors for the floor and walls, so take some time to examine it closely.
title: 10 Sofa Ideas

description:
Author: Zhaox

Unfair Villager is a parody of unfair maps originated from java edition.
title: Unfair Villager!

description:
Author: Arshle

Always wanted to live in a castle, like the kings and queens? Wanted to play survival, but with grandeur and royalty? this map has got everything you wanted, and more!
title: Survival Castle!

description:
Author: A Random Dabber

Welcome to Coastropolis, where you can have lots of… Fight for your life, because there has been a recent outbreak! Stay safe, and slap on your gas masks. Or, fight off the enemy team from destroying stuff, upcoming.
title: Hostility

description:
Author: Dragekk

You are bored in home and you don’t know what do? No more play this map with much minigames like: stone run, duels, sky pvp and more with your friends.
title: MiniGames World

description:
Author: Tyler707, Proarcher

This is a custom terrain which is suited to use for survival gameplay. It features a medium sized island with plenty of different biomes and areas to explore. Some of the areas include new forest types, waterfalls, a vast beach and once you’ve spawned you will find a chest full of tools, food and armor. And if you are of the creative mind then there is also plenty of flat areas for you to build!
title: Custom Rewrited

description:
Author: Cheete

The Fire of Determination is the second of map in the VerseCrafter map series. All of your memories have been lost and you are forced to look deep inside your own head to unlock your hidden memories and take back your sanity. It's a really cool decision based adventure map which combines everything from puzzles to parkour to create some exciting gameplay. It's best suited for version 1.0.4.1 of Minecraft Pocket Edition since it uses custom sounds.
title: VerseCrafter: The Fire of Determination

description:
Author: CRACKEDCUBES

The Stark Mansion, or simply the Malibu Mansion, is an advanced modern minimalistic and high-tech mansion created and owned by Tony Stark situated on Point Dume. It is where he lived up to 2014 when it was destroyed by the Mandarin. This house represents the birth of the Marvel Cinematic Universe in film, and the start of Tony Stark’s progression from self-interest to self-sacrifice as Iron Man.
title: 10880 Malibu Point | Tony Stark’s Mansion

description:
By Marvandrew

Welcome to Emerald City, a modern city map by Marvandrew. There has a lot of structures such as buildings, skyscrapers, shops, houses, and more to see. This city is good for roleplaying. Explore the city and have fun.

Welcome to Emerald City, a modern city with lots of awesome buildings, shops and houses. This city has everything like fastfood chains, buildings, shops, houses, school, skyscrapers, hospital, mall and more to explore. This city is good for roleplay. The city will have an update in random days. So explore the city and have fun.
title: Emerald City 1.0

description:
Author: Marvandrew

Welcome to Marvis City, a massive and very big city that made for you. This city has everything you need that the city needs, from tall skyscrapers to cool neighbourhood. You can live freely in Marvis City.
title: Marvis City 2.0

description:
Author: mcpe_map_maker

The Pirate-Island is a customize built landscape with much jungle trees (also customized), which was created with WorldPainter and then ported over to Bedrock Edition. Around the island there is an ocean and after the ocean you will find a normal generated Minecraft World, so that you can play this map in survival mode too. In the world you will spawn at a pirate ship, which is heading for the island. With a little boat you can drive to the island. You will find a big lonly jugle island (circa 1600 x 1600 blocks) with a river and two mountains called Pirate-Island. At and around the island there are some special places: the big pirate ship, a little island near the big island, a coral reef with a big shell, a reef with many ship wrecks, some hot water sources under water, a big Turtle-Beach, a little fort for the defense and a secret Pirate-Cave with a big treasure. At the spawn you will find some more specific information about the location from the things I mentioned. I used some command blocks in the Pirate-Cave for some particles… so you should turn the gamerule “commandblockoutput” into false. Because of WorldPainter, with which I created this island, there aren`t things from the aquatic update under water… I tried to make this a bit more interesting with the hand built reef, the coral reef and the hot water sources.
title: Pirate-Island

description:
Author: EckoSoldier

EckoSoldier is one of the biggest YouTubers in the Minecraft Pocket Edition community. More than half a million people are subscribed to his channel and there are of plenty reasons why. His videos showcase things such as news, add-ons and servers.
title: EckoSoldier's Let's Play World

description:
Author: Andiuber

This map was created to showcase all the different particles that has been added so far as of beta 1.9.0.0. You can view each particle by pressing the button at the command block. There are 34 different particles in total. Particles are really useful decorations to use when creating maps, servers and so on.
title: New Particles

description:
Author: PickoMods

This is an open-world adventure map set in a medieval environment with multiple different towns to visit and quests to complete. You play as a character called Picko who is a brave warrior who fight against evil. It's very important to read all of the signs you can find as they will provide the necessary information for your progress in the map. Beware, sometimes the English in this map isn't perfect!
title: Kirio RPG

description:
SG Minigame Festival is the ultimate map for anyone who loves minigames. This map brings a total of three different games and as usual with SkyGames maps they are very reliable to play and (as far as I know) also bug free. All minigames besides one game are multiplayer games so make sure to invite

Author: SkyGames

some friends to your game.
title: SG Minigame Festival

description:
Author: Spectrum Studios

Mini-Walls is a fast paced minigame with a lot of intense action. You are in your own zone. 4 PLAYERS MAXIMUM. You have 4 minutes to mine and get a lot of resources. Then, the walls drop! Let the action begin! How to play? There are 4 teams and they are clearly listed. Red, Blue, Green, and Yellow. To start, stand on your desired team color’s iron block. Then click play! Please not that the last player alive will win.
title: Mini-Walls

description:
By Drake132

1000x1000 | Have you ever wanted to play hide and seek with friends, but always had to go to servers and it's a mess because you can't simply play alone with them? I got you. This map is 100% working with redstone and commands, where you will hunt your friends, hide or escape from them. Would the hunters win, or will the hiders be hidden enough to not be caught by the hunters? (Map available in Spanish!)

Hello everyone! Firstly, as i said before, this map works with redstone, so u don't need to install anything except the file (obviously) and ofc will need to follow some instructions & steps and some things I will say later...

For now, let's check the images to see if these images will take your attention...

But before doing so, a little warning: Map is made in Spanish and English (both languages in the same map) so in each sign and text u will find something like (English text) / (Spanish text) ... Or even inverse! Or sometimes I won't post even a "/" ... But u will know that it is on Spanish so don't worry, the text is the same but translated to Spanish. You won't miss nothing
title: Hide and Seek | Working with Redstone Map [Beta]

description:
Author: Sleepyhead101

The Ruins is a short and hard parkour course with 4 checkpoints. Each checkpoint is filled with hard jumps which you have probably not seen before. Strategies and consistency are required to pass the map.
title: The Ruins

description:
Author: ariankhatabi80

This is one of the most amazing (bug free) custom terrains I've so far seen created for the bedrock version of Minecraft. It features multiple humongous islands with some mind-blowing terrain. On the main island there's a huge mountain reaching far over the clouds and lots of other beautiful terrain. There are also other islands with other fantasy-like terrain.
title: The Islands

description:
Author: Aammaraa

This map is a Hunter map called Slime Rage. Why do I give that name ??? Because in this map you will be surrounded by a strong slime…
title: Slime Rage

description:
Author: dudebroagain

You wake up inside an undead prison. Cold and alone. One day, a shining savior come to your aid. He drops a key in your cell. Maybe you’ll be able to make it out. But even then, you must traverse the undead prisoners who did not make it and slay the immortal Fallen Knight. Can you still escape and live?
title: Dungeon Escape

description:
Author: SkyGames

Enjoy the SkyBlock style island survival! Avoid the poisonous water and the beautiful terrain! There are some hidden ores around, and loads of ways to enjoy this map! Enjoy Cloudies! Surrounding the islands there are nothing other than a huge ocean and after than an endless void. Good luck surviving!
title: Island Survival

description:
Author: Fizzman797

Quest to the Castle is a fully functional RPG board game which is really a must-play for any of you board game enthusiasts out there. It works quite similar to games like Monopoly or Trouble but it's based more around an adventure where the ultimate goal is to get to the end of the board and defeat the End Boss. It's truly a multiplayer experience which is recommended for 1-4 players.
title: Quest to the Castle

description:
Author: Dmoral21

Have you ever wanted to practice Free for All or Duels? Have you ever wanted to duel your buddies or fight against lots of people in your own world? Well, now you can!
title: FFA & Duels!

description:
Author: studofenfield

The Minigames Central map is a great map to play together with friends as it features 7 different minigames. There is a great variety of games which ensure that there's something for everyone. You can expect at least one hour worth of gameplay in this map.
title: Minigames Central

description:
Author: CaptianCamera

Hotel Escape is an adventure and puzzle map which tests your skills at solving puzzles and abilities to escape. It takes inspiration from popular escape rooms and brings similar challenges to Minecraft. There are 10 different rooms which you’ll need to escape from and you can expect between 20 minutes to 2+ hours worth of gameplay. It’s all dependent on your own skills.
title: Hotel Escape

description:
Author: RAID GAMES

Raid jailbreak is a 2-5 player prison escape map. Escaping is quite easy, what makes it hard is one player is the warden and can easily kill you if make a mistake! I will update the map about every month so remember to check back on the map! (Please share this map because it is not as simple as my battle maps)
title: Raid Jailbreak

description:
Author: scerri

In this map you will have to face 15 different levels, and by progressing through the levels you will advance in the story that has been included in order to make the levels more interesting. In this map you will face 15 different levels and each level has been built in a detailed way so that it is fun and nice to explore, even though it is a small map. The map has a lot of interesting things such as a story as the levels progress. The story is connected to the “Find The Button (Story)” map so it is recommended to play that one first.
title: Find The Button 2

description:
Author: KirbyGaming Studios

SCP Site 71 you will have lots to explore and find!
title: SCP Site 71

description:
Author: funshuffles17

Hey guys this is my new wwe maps I will be doing more in the future this is monday night raw next I’ll be doing smackdown live. In this map I have added wwe entrance music such as AJ styles, john cena, the fiend and so much more

Hello everyone this is my wwe Arena map where I will be adding new arenas very soon for e.g smackdown live, clash of champions and alot more to come
title: Minecraft WWE Arenas

description:
Author: Joldiso O

Classic find the button
title: Find The Button Mega

description:
Author: JacobCasler

This map spawns you on a skyblock island with very little resources. It's up to you to use whatever survival skills you've got to survive for as long as possible. If your intention is to survive (which it should be) then I highly recommend that find ways to explore the other islands as they will provide the necessary resources you'll need for your survival.
title: Sky Survival Islands

description:
Author: mcmcpe1234

DeathRun is a game where your fate on winning depends on how good you are at avoiding obstacles and traps. This is a multiplayer minigame where some of you will be runners and others will be the killers. It's an extremely intense game and especially for the runners who are constantly threatened by different traps.
title: DeathRun: Wild West

description:
Author: KRAFTOID

Do you lack of inspiration for your home? Then you need to energize your home with interior ideas and furnitures from here! Tons of ideas, furnitures, and style for every part of your room!
title: Modern Interior Ideas

description:
Author: SkyGames

This is the third and final episode of Space Shenanigans Season 1. After escaping the planet’s defense station through a teleporter you must find a way to escape the Exodian Mother-Ship. Be prepared to follow a story that will captivate your imagination and leave you begging for the next installment.
title: Space Shenanigans EP3 : S1 FINALE

description:
<p>Author: BLING <p>
BRIEF INTRODUCTION:
This map consists of 10 different levels and in each one, there is a button you need to find. Search between the different levels. the button, the button is in areas with a medium difficulty, so you can enjoy more on this map. so you can find the button without much effort.
title: Find_The_Button_PRO

description:
Author: Danyy9710

The Worlds is an amazing map consisting of four large cubes. Each cube includes 6 different biomes (one per side) and much of what you will see are terrain and structures which generate randomly in Minecraft worlds. It’s a really cool map which can either be played as a challenging survival adventure or just as something to play around with for fun.
title: The Worlds

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Explore a millionaire’s rural paradise — a British manor house set within a forest with expansive grounds and amenities (including tennis courts, a pool, guest houses, a walled garden, a garage, a helipad, and more). There will be one more update to include: command blocks, a cinema, a gym, stables and a wine cellar.

Main House
Gardens
Guest House
title: Titan Manor

description:
Author: M7MoGameR

This map features an extreme safe house which will keep you well protected from most dangers in Minecraft. The main feature of the map is the modern mansion which is powered by more than 350 command blocks, 3 different safety modes and much more. If you thoroughly dislike mobs intruding your house then definitely try this map out!
title: Extreme Safe House

description:
Author: BlackZero

Run Away is a minigame where you are in a constant battle for time. The floor under you will disappear as you move through the obstacles. This means that you quickly have to use your beloved legs to run away or else fall into the lava and die. It's primarily meant for single player mode but with some tweaks to the guidelines you could possibly use it for multiplayer too.
title: Run Away

description:
Author: Cheeriodude

The World of Colours is another challenge where players are tasked with the important objective of finding a button. There are five different levels and most (but not all) relate to the new color palette which was introduced in version 1.1 for Minecraft. The map is most suitable for a younger audience since the challenges aren't too difficult to complete.
title: The World of Colours

description:
Author: flugxe

12UN is a speedrun/parkour map. This map consists of 12 very challenging levels with you having only 12 seconds to complete each one. Let’s see if you can complete all 12 levels and acquire all 8 achievements. Note that this is a single player map. Oh, and it’s highly recommended that you use a keyboard and mouse as it’ll be impossible to play this with touchscreen controls.
title: 12UN

description:
Author: CHRISMP

The Abandoned:Warehouse it’s a horror free roam game with custom sounds and objectives follow them carefully and try at least to survive..also you can believe if this is a fan game or not

You are a janitor who had worked in previous places for some money you was just cleaning floors and have things perfect but then a call suggests for you a new job.
title: The Abandoned: Warehouse (Chapter 1)

description:
Author: LIGGED

On this map you’ll have to escape a swarm of 7 bees that will haunt you along 100 blocks of honey blocks that will prevent you from running easily. If you can reach the end of life, you’ll advance to the next level

You show up here
To start playing you must press this pressure plate
title: Runners vs Killer Bees

description:
Author: multirautix

The Arena is an arena style map, with 10 waves of increasing difficulty zombies, and two boss battles. This is meant to be incredibly challenging, and hard. It should take a few deaths. Hello! I am MultiRautix, and this is my first map, [BC] The Arena. It is a map where you will fight up to 10 waves of mobs, and even two bosses. Each wave gets harder, starting from leather to finishing at diamond, and a boss that summons lightning. Welcome, to The Arena. -How to Play – Load the map in the usual way (instructions below) – Read the credits and rules, by stepping on the pressure plates – Play by pressing on the respective pressure plates – Go to the storage, and get supplies. – Hit the button that is on the diamond and quartz cube. – This will start the round, and will for the next few as well. – For the next round, press it again, and repeat for the rest.
title: The Arena

description:
Author: MINECLAN888

This map is a sequel to our map made a year ago called “Bloxnite”. The map contains new features, new game modes, and new weapons. This map has new additions to it that make it amazing! It also has new vehicles!
title: KC – Battle Royale

description:
By Okami-

Welcome to the biggest event in the nation Súper bowl LV last years super was the Kansas City chiefs and the San Francisco 49ers that night the chiefs won the Super bowl for the first time in 50 years and their back to repeat but this time their facing against one of the teams from the nfc south the Tampa bay buccaneers.
title: Super Bowl LV

description:
Author: Eternity Studios

You are a famed explorer and have built a large collection of priceless artifacts. You are always looking for adventure and when the ultimate offer comes you can’t refuse, Time Travel…!
You need to collect some artifacts for the Quantum Research Institute then you free to collect for your own private collection. But when you encounter Resistance what will you do? Enjoy this epic sci-fi adventure map
title: Time Adventure

description:
By TerseStampy

The classic game "Find the Button". In this game you have to find buttons in different locations to complete the game. The game has only 9 levels and 2 parts. Good luck!
title: Find the Button

description:
Author: Chef Dane12345

Welcome to Puzzle Kits, a difficult map combining elements of escape rooms and solving puzzles, making for a fun challenge. With threats of mob attacks, rising lava, and nearly impossible parkour, this map is not one to be taken lightly. It may take quite a few tries before you complete the entire thing!
title: Puzzle Kits

description:
Author: studofenfield

Find The Exit is a map with enough challenges to keep you busy for anywhere between 30 minutes to an hour. There are a good variety of challenges including everything from monster battles to puzzles. The main objective all throughout the map is to find the exit. But usually it just leads on to the next level which you then must complete.
title: Find The Exit

description:
Author: itzBojan

Dropper IB Halloween is the 6th map in an ongoing series of dropper maps. This time it features 14 different levels and some of which are Halloween themed. Most levels are really cool as they include really amazing color and pattern combinations which definitely boosts the experience of the map. If you are new to dropper maps then you might want to try one of the previous maps first.
title: Dropper IB Halloween

description:
Author: RAID GAMES

Raid battle X is the sequel to the map “raid battle” in this map you and up to 4 friends fight each other on pre-made maps with one of 5 characters; each of which have unique weapons and tools to kill each other with.


Red- a good all round character with a iron sword and enchanted bow.

yellow- a fast class that is good for fast paced combat.

blue- a slow tank like character that’s good for defensive combat.

green- a great character if you know how to use crossbows!

Orange- a mixture between offensive and defensive combat, an good character to play as overall.
title: Raid Battle X

description:
Author: Andiuber

TNT RUN is a very popular minigame for Minecraft multiplayer. This map can be played with up to 8 players at the same time (but you can also play it alone). There are three different scenarios and two different game difficulties which makes it both unique and an exciting game to play. The objective is to walk or run around the arena without falling into the lava. Every minute that you stay alive you will get a bonus score. You can automatically repair the arena once a game is completed.
title: TNT RUN

description:
Author: Fotor

You're being attacked! Set your defence towers to kill enemies and protect yourself. You have 3 type of towers, what would you rather have?
title: Tower Defence

description:
Author: Palm2570 Playz

What is dodge anvils? Dodge anvils is a game where you need to dodge anvils as much as possible!
title: Dodge Anvils

description:
Author: LloydSemblante

This is a really useful map if you are looking for solutions for hiding certain parts of your base or creating some type of secret room. The map includes five different redstone creations. Examine the builds and try to replicate them in your own worlds. You might need to remove some of the blocks in the map in order to better understand the redstone structure though.
title: 5 Secret Entrances

description:
Author: Triangle Plan

Reminiscent of ‘Super Craft Bros’ pvp maps you’d find in 2013, SCB takes everything to the next level.

28 mob classes
10 boss classes
14 Steve classes
18 maps
4 game modes
infinite playability
title: SCB – Prerelease

description:
Author: MrDiamond

There’s a water somewhere in the map. Stand on the water so you will survive. Enjoy!
title: Minecraft Survival But Every Minute Explodes!

description:
Author: RudeGbxYT

This map includes 50 different questions and each question has three alternative answers. All of them are in some relation to Minecraft and most of it relates to things which only a geeky Minecraft player would know. It's highly recommended to read up on the wiki before starting. All in all, it's a great quiz for Minecrafters.
title: The 50 Trivia Questions

description:
By Katalinee

You suddenly wake up in a room you’ve never been in before and you MUST get out, to do so you need to make your way through challenges, puzzles and finding things. Can you figure it out? Can you escape?This is my first ever map! Suggestions are welcome!
title: Escape Room - House

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

The Floor is Lava is a popular minigame where players have to constantly be moving around in order to avoid dying. The color of the block under the player gradually shifts color and will eventually turn red and then disappear. If this happens while a player is standing on it then the player fall downs into the lava and dies.
title: The Floor is Lava

description:
Author: McMuffinator

Welcome to SNIPER vs RUNNER! This is an exciting PvP map made for at least 2 players where one player is running the parkour and the other is trying to knock them down.
title: SNIPER vs RUNNER

description:
Author: MT714

Test your skills in Minecraft by going through a series of 9 different challenges inside the space of a cube. You’ve been trapped inside the cube and your goal is to make your way through all of the challenges to ultimately find a treasure and hopefully a way out. Parkour, mazes, reversed droppers and puzzles are just some of the challenges you will meet.

There is a vast array of challenges. For example, in one room you will have to complete a parkour challenge.
title: The Cube Escape

description:
Author: GAMEZ

This a new skyblock map with few biome based island. Also it has huge shop system. The nether and the end in normally generated but the over world is fully on void. It is possible to get almost everything of normal game by the help of shop. So download and enjoy✌.

There are total 12 islands with a nether , a end and a shop. You can earn coins by selling different items like planks,cobblestone,foods etc. With coins you can buy other important item like lava,water,saddle etc.

The main Islan. You will start with a backpack(shulker box) with few basic items for skybock. Make you way to the other island and find new stuffs.
title: GZ Skyblock

description:
Author: KTR Builds

Overlooking the ocean, Woodland Lodge is a massive rustic house featuring a Kitchen, Living Room, Bedrooms and a creepy Attic. It also features a majestic garden, with lots of foliage!
title: Woodland Lodge

description:
Author: Blazer_Studios

Blazer Land is a medium-sized theme park, packed with many rides, shops, attractions and best of all; Rollercoasters!
title: Blazer Land Theme Park

description:
Author: FirmFeet

You may just think this is just another spleef…. well it is but their is 1 key component in this spleef that other spleef forget about, whats that you may be asking, will its the fact that this one is small, easy to download, never crashes (unless you have a really bad phone) and you can have infinite fun with your friends because the world never breaks!

Instructions on how to play,

Step 1, When you load into the world you will be in a small box with three button the first one says “Creator” the second “how to play” and the third “Play game”

Step 2, Once all your friends have joined press “Play Game” you will be loaded into a white box and you will be floating then you will want to move around to the place where you want to start while that will have been happening the count down hopefully you will have gone down and you will have been equipped with a diamond shovel.
title: Epic Spleef

description:
Author: SheriffBenny

The basics of the map is to survive in the biospheres that you are presented with. There is a sphere for almost every biome.
title: BioSpheres Survival

description:
Author: MegaVSPrime

Saint Patrick's Day is a cultural and religious day of celebration. The purpose of the feast is to celebrate the arrival of Christianity in Ireland and to show respect for Saint Patrick who is supposed to have died on this day (17th March). If you want to learn more about Irish culture in general (and also things related to Minecraft) then give this map try!
title: St. Patrick's Day Trivia

description:
Author: Mustache116

This is a detailed map based on WWI and it includes lots of trenches, craters, dead trees and so on. It also utilizes quite a few add-ons as ell such as the BMWar Addon, the Villager Guards Addon and Mizuno’s 16 Craft Texture Pack. It’s a 100×100 blocks land mass in a flat land world with plenty to explore.
title: WWI PvP Map

description:
Author: SCERRI

In this map you will have to face different levels in the biome theme, where each level is a parkour. Pass the level to go to the next level! Are you curious? Download now!
title: Pillar Parkour

description:
Author: CREEPETIA

“This is my second uploaded map. But, this map is the first more detailed and fancy PvP map I created ever! This map is also continuing update for the commands bug, redstone technical fixing, and added more maximim possible players to 4 (team 2 vs 2).”

Recomended for 2 players. This world is only for personal use. Contains free original add-ons pack from CreepeTia.

“Colloseum”, is the same building from Colosseum, but it is shorter, smaller, and more geometric than the Colosseum.
title: Colloseum Sanctuary

description:
Author: EEEBEE

Swap Bots is a single-player puzzle map with a unique feature. You play as two different robots that work together to solve puzzles. The gameplay is simple but the puzzles will get challenging.

Info
At the moment, the map is only a demo, like really far before any alpha release. In the demo, you play the tutorial that is set inside a simulation. The map will hopefully include a story that is interesting, easy to follow, and funny.
title: Swap Bots

description:
Author: noahcraftreal

Lava Runner is a type of parkour map where you get a short head start before lava starts pouring down the ceiling. Your objective is to jump from one block to another, past all of the obstacles, to finally reach the end of the track and access the next level. All of this has to be done while knowing that you are just a few blocks away from being swallowed by lava.
title: Lava Runner

description:
Author: StereoTitan

Explore a new native village at Minecraft! This is a map contented from the Southeast Asia/Pacific Stilt Villages to right in your Minecraft gameplay. This map contains lots of houses good for roleplays as natives or even animations! This map is designed to work exclusively for Bedrock Edition!
title: Stilt Village

description:
Author: K73MC

Join your friends in this new Find The Button Custom Map! This map supports multiplayer and will not break if multiple players join. So what are you waiting for?
title: Find The Button 2: The Adventure Continues

description:
Author: Assassiner 003

This creation lets you use different spawn eggs to spawn self-building structures. Some of the structures include a guardian statue and a mini-base. It's definitely a useful creation in case you want to learn more about the possibilities which command blocks have created. It's a simple showcase which displays some of the possible things you can build.
title: Self-Building Egg Structures

description:
Author: HexCode

This map features a huge floating island floating somewhere in the sky. Anywhere around is just air so there's no terrain or anything surrounding it. It doesn't seem to be meant for anything specific but some suggestions could be PvP or just using it as a survival island similar to skyblock. On the island there is an old village and some custom made mountains.
title: Old Village

description:
Author: KimikoRaico69

Mt. Olympus from Greek Mythology. Which if you didn't know, was the dwelling of the 12 Olympian Gods of Greek Mythology. In this map, you'll find two small mountains, separated by a river. And on top of it and all round it is Mt. Olympus.
title: Mt. Olympus

description: A city has been invaded by aliens and their intentions are clearly not good. It’s up to you (and your friends if you play this in multiplayer) to save the city from this evil. The objective is pretty clear. Grab some gear, kill some aliens and shoot down the spaceships. This map comes with a required add-on which works for 0.16.0 and above. It was created by the Minecraft developers to showcase add-ons in one of their presentations during Minecon.
title: Alien Invasion (Add-on)

description:
Author: crackedcubes

Come and explore a jungle island in the Caribbean surrounded by vast ocean. With mountainous topography, along with a lake and beaches, this island is perfect for building. Animal/mob spawning occurs randomly across the map.

This custom terrain map will form the base of our future adventure map (with an add-on) called Captain Lazuli’s Lost Treasure Island.
title: Jungle Island, Caribbean

description:
Author: Madlad3718

Lakewell Kingdom is an extensive medieval kingdom including a mountain top castle, a dense market and port, and a detailed village and a mysterious mine, with many aspects of the build designed to show off the advanced lighting effects of Ray Tracing.
title: Lakewell Kingdom

description:
Author: JMCbrine

Roblox Game Remake Again!!! Came from mega fun obby.
title: Easy Parkour

description:
Author: CRACKEDCUBES

Explore this beautifully designed British mansion set in Surrey. This is the second of four updates. If you would like to have things added into the next free update, please comment below or on our Discord with the suggestion(s)!
title: Fox Manor

description:
Author: RubeGbxYT

The Evil Zombie Scientist is the cause of a horrible scientific experiment where he kidnaps villagers and then tries to transform them into zombie villagers. It's clearly the work for a madman who needs to be removed from his position of power and preferably killed. Too many have already died and it is up to you to escape his wrath and hopefully deal with him in the process.
title: The Evil Z-cientist
